Jorge's place is, quite frankly, spectacular. A 2 bedroom appartment with absolutely everything you may need. We even cooked there and it felt like home.

The style of the place is very modern, comfy leather couch and all. The host was very punctual and we had no problems at all

As a summary, I certainly recommend both the place and the host. It was a pleasure and I am already looking forward to being back there again

Très bel appartement très bien situé. 
Spacieux, propre, confortable, je le recommande.

The apartment is absolutely fantastic! It is only steps from the beautiful beach area of Foz do Douro and was very spacious and clean. Jorge was great with communication and always available if needed. If you are looking for a nice place to stay in Foz, then I would recommend this place.

O apartamento é fantástico, muito bem equipado e confortável. Localizado na melhor zona do Porto com estacionamento fácil e gratuito  nas proximidades o que nos permitiu quase sempre andar a pé. 
Fomos com o nosso bebé e tivemos apenas um problema com o aquecimento que só pode ser regulado centralmente e por isso a casa estava sempre feia, e só ficou resolvido no ultimo dia de 4. Tirando isso uma estadia foi perfeita. Recomendamos.
O apartamento é muito confortável, com uma vista ótima e muito bem equipado. As camas sao muito confortáveis.
A equipa do Porto Concierge ofereceu-nos à chegada uma garrafa de água e de vinho para melhorar o ótimo serviço de acolhimento.
Vamos repetir!

Our stay here was really great. From the moment we checked in they were very attentive and had very open communication. The property looked exactly as it did in the pictures, I would even say it was better. There was a lot of space, the kitchen was very well stocked and clean. There was an extra half bathroom, which we weren't expecting but was very nice to have. And the bedrooms were big, very nicely decorated, and the beds were fantastic. My group and I really enjoyed our stay here and would not think twice before staying here again!

This condo is just as described. It's in a great location near public transit and if you prefer to just hang about the neighborhood it's a few steps out the front door. The condo is modern, clean and quiet. And the beds are super comfy!
zona agradavel do Porto
Lovely,clean apartment. Very modern. Very comfortable beds.

We had a very enjoyable stay at Beach Manor. The flat was as bright as advertised and very convenient for two couples. The location was perfect, with restaurants and shops within walking distance and handy public transport to the centre of Porto. We had no issue finding parking spots on the street for our car. On the (minor) negative side, we thought a second set of keys should have been provided when the place is for two couples and you require the key to get out of the building. The washing machine did not tumble dry clothes so a dryer would have been handy. Last I had to fix the TV myself as it was not working, but in the end we never watched it anyway :-)

It is a very nice and comfortable appartment very well located if you like beach and walking. No metro station around but there is a good bus connection with the city centre and Matosinhos area if one wants to visit more than Foz quarter. 
I can recommend this offer.

name: SOOTHING WAVES WITH A 180* OCEAN VIEW
summary: Valley Isle Resort 306  We are located beachfront with an amazing view  of the ocean and sunset. We can look right down into the water and watch the turtles swimming. We offer a full kitchen including poolside barbecue grills. Within a block of our Resort are several restaurants and bars. Our condo has a comfy queen-size wall bed along with a small sofa bed.   The ambiance is soothing and relaxing. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with one child).
interaction: We offer my phone number so you can call or text at any time. I will send you information on check in, obtaining your free parking pass, laundry information, and things to do and see in the area. We also offer a guest book with dining and happy hour suggestions.
houseRules: - Coin operated washer/drier down the hall from 8am to 10pm -Valley Isle Resort is a non-smoking Resort. There is a smoking area to the right side of the parking lot for guests. - Valley Isle is a pet free Resort, sorry but you will have to leave your four-legged family members at home just like we do! Service dogs are allowed however. - It is required that you relax to the soothing sound of the waves, enjoy the turtles swimming below you, and have an overall wonderful Maui Adventure. - It is Valley Isle's rule that beach towels and clothing may not be hung on the Lanai railings.  With the trade winds, your articles may end up on someone else's Lanai or down on the beach.

host.location: Lake Havasu City, Arizona, United States
host.about: I am currently a 6th grade math teacher and competitive baton twirling coach.  I fell in love with Maui and the Valley Isle Resort over 7 years ago.  I have an amazing husband, 2 daughters with great husbands, and 3 grandchildren.  I have a love for the island and the culture of Hawaii!

reviews.txt: My first experience with Airbnb was perfect. The location was great, on one of the sunniest sides of the island, near a mall with a general store and a gas station. The condo was exactly as described, the building is right by the water and it's really tidy and well organised. The view is amazing. You get to wake up with the sound of the waves every morning and watch the beautiful Maui sunsets right on the balcony. The process was really simple and stress-free. The place was immaculate. We really felt at home and got everything we needed and more! I'm really grateful for Sherry and Shane's attention to detail and recommendations about the island. Thank you for making this experience better than we could have imagined. I hope we can stay there again soon!

Beautiful place along the beach. Good location. Pictures are pretty accurate and close to McDonalds, Maui Brewing Co. and a Coffee Shop within walking distance. No central A/C so be prepared to run the fans in the summer. Hosts were very responsive and extremely helpful with requests.
This was one of the coolest places I've ever stayed in. And definitely the most beautiful neighborhood.

The owners, Sherry and Shane, were great. They were very responsive, the place was great and the view was unbelievable. Thank you so much for sharing your place with us. It was a great spot for me and my wife to vacation as it was right by the ocean, grocery stores and restaurants. We highly recommend!

The view from the Lanai is nothing short of spectacular. It was every bit as advertised. Plus, the proximity of the 3rd floor to the actual ocean means you can hear the waves thoughout the day and night. We literally watched people line the beach in front of our lanai each night to watch the gorgeous sunsets - we didn't need to do that however, we could watch it from the lanai!  We're going to miss that. Folks from the north should be aware that there is no A/C here, which is common in Lahanai apparently, we learned, because of the strong trade winds which cool things considerably. The hosts were very responsive and gracious. This was a very nice experience and we look forward to our next Maui adventure!

Sherry left us great instructions.  We loved the location and the beach --not too crowded, perfect.  Garbage disposal and laundry facilities just across the hall.  The condo felt like a home ratherthan just a place to put your head!!  Beautiful view, and so nice that the sun was not  directly on the deck and condo, as it was quite warm and yet we saw the beautiful sun and sun set. Loved the rocking chairs.  A wonderful place to stay, hopefully again.!

We felt at home immediately upon entering the unit.  The pictures of the unit are very accurate; however, do not do it justice.  The lanai has the most breathtaking view I have ever had the privilege of experiencing.  Sherry and Shane were more than accommodating and made the arrival extremely easy.  They have everything you could think of needing at your finger tips.   They go above and beyond for their guests.  They respond immediately if you have an inquiry, and they have a homemade binder full of detailed information, including points of interests and restaurants to dine at. 
My husband and I are humbled by their graciousness as hosts. We could not be more content with our stay here!!
Mahalo!
This private home is amazing! Leaving the door open so the strong wind would come through the whole room was to die for! The view was magnificent! Amazing! I would definitely come back!

Sherry & Shane's condo was very clean and welcoming. It had all aminities for a perfect beach vacation including recommendation for restaurants, beach chairs etc..They were great hosts with clear and quick communication. The condo had spectacular view of the ocean and its proximity to the ocean gave us advantage to wake up with the sound of the crashing waves in the morning and amazing sunsets. We highly recommend this place!!!
This is a jewel of a place to stay-the views, the convenient location, and everything you need for a beach vacation-all in one spot! Thanks Sherry and Shane!
Loved this place! Beautiful beach front lot, caring hosts, and a really clean condo. I would recommend!

This is an awesome airbnb! By far the most stocked one I have ever stayed in. Sherry provided everything that we could have needed. Great portable beach chairs, cooler and towels. The kitchen was very prepared for major cooking endeavours. There were even spices and some cooking oils. Plenty of towels, pillows and blankets. All the things that you would hope there might be but sometimes aren't. The view from the room is perfect. You can hear the waves crashing and the view from the bed is directly into the blue of the ocean. We enjoyed the condo so much there were several days we didn't leave. So the perfect relaxing holiday we needed. We will definitely stay here again when we come back to Maui.
Nice comfortable spot. Great communication.

We can only endorse all the wonderfully positive comments others have made about their experiences staying in this very comfortable, well-appointed condo.  We just knew from our communications with Sherry and Shane and their thoughtful attention to detail that we were being hosted by very generous and caring people.  We can’t thank you enough.

We loved our stay, and I would totally come back. The view was awesome. Close to food, shopping, beaches. Everything we needed was provided and our host checked in on us because of road closures, that was very nice. It was awesome!

Amazing! First time AB&B user and would have to say will be doing this again! Experience was nothing short of spectacular. Sherry's hospitality and attention to detail were phenomenal and the condo was immaculate and very cozy. Everything you needed to enjoy a great vacation was there. The accommodations were simply fantastic and would like to recommend this place to anyone who wants a stress-free, smooth and quiet environment. Location was key and Sherry's place makes you feel right at home! Will stay here again the next time we come to Maui...for sure! Thank you.
Drop dead views, nice beach. Condo has everything you need and more. Sherry is great hostess.

Our stay in paradise (Maui) was brought to perfection by Sherry's and Shane's fantastic condo. The photos you can see on Airbnb are very accurate, though they cannot fully capture the breathtaking reality of staying at this accommodation. In this apartment you will fall asleep and wake up to the sound of the waves of the Pacific ocean. You can enjoy an unobstructed view of the setting sun from the balcony while enjoying your dinner and/or a glass of wine/beer/whatever. You can go for a spontaneous swim in the sea, which is only a few steps away from your room.  Sometimes you can even see sea turtles in the water in front of the condo.

The apartment is perfectly equipped. You'll find everything you need for cooking, doing your laundry, going to the beach (beach towels, beach bags, a cool bag, beach chairs, etc.) and more.

We will definitely return to Maui in the near future and we hope that we can stay at Sherry's and Shane's condo again. We strongly recommend staying at their condo!

Fantastic stay. The apartment was perfect for the two of us, and having meals overlooking the ocean was certainly a highlight. The place was incredibly priced, very clean, and well-equipped. We continued to say throughout our time that we couldn't believe how great the place was. Thanks!!
Cozy place with a breath taking view

name: Habitación indiv con cama extra
summary: Acogedora habitacion doble con posibilidad de una cama extra en el barrio de gracia en un tipico piso modernista. Situado en pleno centro geografico de Barcelona y todos sus distritos. zona tranquila y bien comunicada por metro y bus.
interaction: I live here, i am happy to help and point you in the right direction. I  can recommend lots of good places to eat and drink.
houseRules: This is a quite neighbourhood and building, people is really respectfull, just collaborate to maintain it and not to create noisy or disrespectful situations.  The apartment is clean and tidy. Feel free to use the space to stay comfortable but leave the things as you found them taking care of them and cleaning all you use.

host.about: Hola me llamo txus trabajo en el mundo de las terapias como osteopata y llevo 12 años viviendo en barcelona , me encanta esta ciudad y en especial el barrio de gracia , tranquilo y animado al mismo tiempo . Como viajero me gusta conocer gente de culturas diferentes y si lo necesitan ayudar a conocer esta maravillosa ciudad

reviews.txt: Ottima persona , sempre disponibile per qualsiasi cosa! La casa è stata accogliente e situata in una buona posizione per spostarsi in metro, ben collegata e vicino alla Sagrada Familia! Consigliata !

Nous avons été très bien reçus par Txus. Il vit dans un appartement qui est typiquement espagnol et c'est vraiment plaisant pour nous qui sommes touristes de voir ce type de logement. Il était très gentil et nous étions bien dans la chambre. Merci Txus!!
The apartment of Txus is perfect, we loved to stay here. I think the next time I'll go to Barcelona, I'll go there again if the apartment is free.

The apartment was better then expected! It is really cute and I love the tiled floor.
It was easy to find and a walk from town. Everyone was really friendly in the house and the kitchen had everything we needed :)
Relatively straightforward to get to from the airport, although luggage in the underground is a nightmare as there are often no escalators!
Would highly recommend this place!
Very nice and helpful. He waited for us until 2am, because we our airplane had a delayed. In the morning he cooked coffee and gave us all the neccesary information that we asked. Really nice staying.
Bien, amable y correcto
Txus was very friendly and accommodating. His place was walkable to attractions and comfortable. Would certainly recommend.

It was great! Txus's apartment is located in a quiet area that is close to some of the major tourist attractions (15min walk to Sagrada Familia, 15 min to Casa Milà, 20min to Park Güell) and has several metro stations nearby if one is feeling lazy. It is basically a shared flat where you can use the room appointed, living room (with a balcony), kitchen and bathroom. Everything was very clean and nice (way better that in the pictures). The room we stayed in was not very big, but it had everything we needed. Txus is very nice and helpful and made us feel really welcomed. Would totally recommend!

Txus is a very nice guy, hè was very welkomming, even though hè had been waiting for us for more than a hour.
Nice clean room, comfortable bed. Clean shared bathroom, good shower.
Nearby metrostation, safe area. Would reccomend!

Top! Txus is very kind and helpful. He's a lovely and careful person. The house is very clean, the room is minimal but comfortable, i liked it. Close to the house there r bus stations and metro stations.

Very good stay by Txus who is a very nice thoughtful guy, ans very helpful and welcoming. His shared appartement is relaxing, each person is respectful. The area ist very calm, I loved this quarter. I recommand his place.
Txus is very kind, helpful and welcoming host! The beds were comfy and the bathroom was nice and clean. All you really need!

Txus is very kind and gentle. We arrived at 1:00Am and he is patient to wait us. and everyday and night he would chat with us. Haha. And my friend says he is sooooo handsome hahaha.The house is in the center of Barcelona. It's convenient to go Park Guell and beach also. We enjoyed live in Txus ' place.
We spent to months in the apartment. Everything was good and clean. Txus was very kind. Very good stay!

Txus was an incredible host. He offered any help we needed, gave us a city map, provided suggestions, and gave us a very clean and welcoming home to stay in. The location was perfect for seeing Gaudi's works and catching the metro to the city center by the beach. We loved it.
Good location, good and flexible host, basic accommodation but good value. Recommended!
Great place, very friendly host who keeps in good contact
Texus est un super hôte très serviable, il prend le temps de vous conseiller sur les lieux à visiter à barcelone. Le séjour c'est très bien passé.

Txus is the perfect host, hospitable and nice. He gave us advice on places to visit and always take a moment to talk with us.
The room is convenient and the flat is in the center of the city, next to the sagrada familia and parc güell, bus and subway station. I recommend this accomodation without hesitation.
Very supportive host. Everything was clear and the place is close to the public transport. We had great time at Txus's place.

name: Sydney Hyde Park City Apartment (checkin from 6am)
summary: Our city apartment is a bright, comfortable 1 bedroom with 24hr front-desk access. It is conveniently located directly across from Hyde Park and within walking distance of delightful cafes, restaurants, parks, major city attractions and public transport, including Museum Station which has a direct connection to Sydney Airport.
interaction: MY AVAILABILITY I am easily contactable at anytime. If I am unable to welcome you personally I will leave the keys to the apartment and any further information marked for your attention at the front desk.
houseRules: GENERAL HOUSE RULES: That guests have good behaviour, are responsible for any damage caused and leave the apartment clean and tidy.  That the apartment is only used for 2 guests  and not to be used for parties or events.  That guests are mindful of our neighbours, and adhere to safety and security rules of the building and staff.  Check-in : 2PM Check-out : 10AM EARLY CHECK-IN/CHECK-OUT:  If would like to change your check-in/check-out time, please let us know this information when making your booking.  We will make every effort to accommodate your request, however this may not always be possible as we have the cleaners, fresh linen drops and maintenance scheduled. LOST KEYS AND SECURITY TAG: In the unlikely event that the keys and security-tag are lost or stolen, for security reasons we will need to replace the lock, keys and security-tag. For this reason there is an additional charge of $450.  If you are in this unusual situation please contact me immediately so that I can ensure you

host.about:
At the centre of my life is my beautiful family...home is wherever my family is.

I enjoy filling my life with positive experiences and love to travel and experience new cultures, to meet new people, to read and just enjoy the beauty and wonders of the 'littlest' things in the world around me and my family.

reviews.txt: Friendly, helpful and welcoming hosts. Beautiful and comfortable apartment. Located opposite beautiful Hyde Park and close to Sydney's main attractions and public transport. We enjoyed having Sydney on our doorstep and exploring the city. Can't wait to visit again! Thank you Desiree and Julian.

Desiree's Airbnb was perfectly appointed. The space is incredibly clean and welcoming. She had everything I needed for work and relaxation. She also provided helpful instructions and was easy to contact for whatever I needed. The location is great - coffee, grocery, dry cleaning, bars, shopping all within minutes. Love this location!
The place is perfect for that single or couple who is on a getaway. Great location.  Not to mention your Hostess is impeccable.

Desireé the host was very friendly and replied quickly to any questions. The apartment was a little noisy from the road outside but it wasn't a big issue. It has obviously been recently renovated and is very clean. There was tea/coffee and milk which was a convenient touch. I would recommend this Airbnb.

If you are looking for room with have the best location and the most comfortable room condition, Desireé's room is just what you looking for. It's exactly same as the pictures, super clean, large enough for 1 or 2 person and you need only 3 mins walk from the Museum Station. It's also close to the mart, convenience store and easy to take a taxi. What I love the most is that it's just near the Hyde Park. It means that you could walk there every morning and night with beautiful view. And comfortable bed, clean and large shower booth, big screen TV with Samsung Smart-hub, big dinning table... everything in room was ready for your perfect trip. In addition, Desireé is really kind, good-hearted host. I couldn't meet her but she always answer kindly to my messages and give help everytime :D Don't miss this room!!

Desirée is an excellent host. Quick to respond to questions and most helpful. The accommodation itself is spacious and exceedingly clean/tidy. The location is excellent - near to the Museum train station (direct connection to airport in only 15min) and a very pleasant 15min stroll, via Hyde Park, to Martin's place. I would definitely recommend the accommodation to both business travelers and tourists.
A lovely, clean and spacious apartment right on Hyde Park. We loved the apartment and the little touches - a hand written note and fresh flowers. Thanks for having us, Desiree

My daughter and I came to Sydney for her medical school interview.  Desiree was an outstanding host - providing detailed instructions on every stage of our stay, including our last day where she kindly offered for us to check out later than the arranged time.  The apartment was immaculate and really did provide a home away from home. You could seriously just turn up at his place as everything is provided for the guest's use. Desiree thought of all the little special touches - from fresh fruit and sparkling water to chocolates and flowers.  The location is fantastic - walking distance to all that Sydney has to offer.   Her guide book and restaurant recommendations were wonderful.  Highly recommended  - better than any hotel stay!  We  will be back again!  Many thanks Desiree
Wow my best Airbnb experience by far. Great location very clean and comfortable. Desireé is a wonderful host and her apartment is just fantastic.

Really lovely apartment in a really convenient location. The apartment was really well equipped and beautifully maintained. Probably one of the best Airbnb locations we have ever stayed in…thank you so much for everything Desiree!!
Absolutely divine! Lovely spotless apartment in a fabulous location.

Everything is perfect! Location is great. House was very clean and tidy. Desireé is a very kind, helpful and responsible. Our communication are very smooth, no problem at all. It must be one of my favourite airbnb stay! Thank you for the lovely flowers and chocolates. Highly recommend to stay in Desireé 's place for your next accommodation!

Hi
We had such a great time staying with Desiree.  The flat is perfect and centrally located. We couldn't recommend a better host.
Steve and Lucy

What an amazing apartment! I would highly recommend this apartment! I stayed here with my partner and we had plenty of space. It was in a perfect location right across from Hyde park. I did not use the pool but the apartment does have a roof top heated pool which looked great. Apartment was clean and the bed was comfy. Desireé was a wonderful host and had some lovely touches such as stocking the fridge with beers and provided snacks, fruit and milk etc. the bathroom was also stocked with products and didn't even need to use my own shampoo etc. We also were allowed an early check in and a late check out which was just amazing. I will be staying here again on my next visit.

This was a sensational experience from start to finish. Desireé was exceptionally communicative and helpful, across arrival instructions and helpful hints, to being extremely flexible with my check in and departure times from the property. She was wonderfully generous with items left in the fridge for me to help myself to, and even some lovely fresh flowers for me on arrival. It's a gorgeous apartment right in the hub of the city BUT with the bedroom double glazed I had some of the best nights sleeps here I've had in ages. Terrific stay. Best part? Uber wide screen Tv and free NETFLIX! I loved this apartment. Don't hesitate to book.

Desiree certainly knows how to make her guests feel welcome. Fresh flowers and chocolates on arrival is an example. Her attention to detail was very much appreciated and one of my best airbnb experiences to date. She was also quick to respond to all queries. The apartment is as shown in the photos and immaculately clean. Dont hesitate to stay here!

Todo ha sido perfecto! La comodidad del apartamento es aún mejor en vivo que en las fotos. Los detalles y amabilidad de Desiree son grandiosos. Sin duda aconsejo por ubicación y comodidades este apartamento para conocer la preciosa Sydney es perfecto!

Our host Desiree is fantastic she had everything ready for us.  It was so easy we just turned the key and everything was there.  She kept in contact with me to make sure everything was ok which was very thoughtful.  There was fresh roses in the apartment really lovely touch also lots of groceries like tea bags, coffee, milk etc. which was great after a long flight.  There are even bath robes and lovely fluffy towels The apartment is beautiful very luxurious, we loved it.  It's spotlessly clean, great TV, WIFI, everything you need and more. It's a great location. Very easy to walk around from and also Museum station is right on the door step. It was our first visit to Sydney and should we go back I would love to stay here again.  I can't thank Desiree enough. We were absolutely thrilled with it. Truly 5 star.
A lovely, comfortable, well decorated apartment in a great location. Very friendly host. I can't wait to stay again.

Where do we begin? Desireé is a wonderfully thoughtful host that made our stay so special. The apartment looks exactly as pictured - modern, comfortable and clean. The location is fabulous and central to everything! This apartment does not disappoint! Our only regret is that we didn't stay for longer. We will certainly be back the next time we are in Sydney! Thank you Desireé!

name: Very special island bed and brunch
summary: A  new exquisite guest bathroom for you to enjoy, a king sized heated waterbed, air conditioning or heating or 3/4 single bed with innersprung mattress.  Both beds have sheepskin overlays - cosy or cool - your choice.   Experience the Hawkesbury River first hand. Hire a tinny, orwith a licence, a  fishing boat.  Bed, shower, brunch $140 per night, per person. This includes a lavish Brunch, with local fare, provided by the owner, who stays to look after you.   Customer happiness is paramount!
interaction: I offer English lessons by the hour - conversation, cooking or formal English by arrangement.  I am a highly qualified and experienced teacher.   It's a great location for sketching and photography.  Beautiful sunsets.   Guests caVn be as quiet as they like, play music, darts or dvds or chat with us - it's their holiday!  So they choose. Get up when they like, go to bed when they like.
houseRules: We want you to enjoy the fresh air, so no smoking in the house or garden please.  Occasionally there are mozzies.  There is a net over your bed in this case. You are welcome to read the books and magazines, just replace them when you are done.

host.location: Dangar Island, New South Wales, Australia
host.about: We are used to international travellers as my husband was a well known opera singer in Europe, so feel assured that any special needs will be catered for.  Looking forward to meeting you. Ann

reviews.txt: My overall experience on Dangar Island was wonderful. Ann created a sense of being cared for, in a relaxed environment. Ann is a wonderful and interesting host with great historical knowledge of the local area. Meal time was fun; some of the food picked from the garden, the rest fresh, delicious and made to suit my individual requirements. Eating breakfast overlooking a pretty garden and watching the river made a pleasurable start to each day. My bed was comfortable and as promised by my host, big soft towels to use in the shared bathroom. The house itself is as interesting as its gracious host and well worth the short ferry ride to visit and stay in for a night or two. Most enjoyable!

We had a wonderful time staying with Ann at her amazing, historic and endlessly fascinating house. She even cooked Korean food for Minji, making her own version of KimChi! Her attention to detail and desire to ensure her guests have a great time makes Ann the consummate host. We thoroughly recommend a visit to this hidden treasure only 55min north of Sydney.

Upon disembarking the adorable wooden ferry on Dangar Island, the charm of the island operates… boat shacks and pontoons line the shore, houses hide away among the luxuriant greenery… We are met by wonderful Ann at the cafe, and while she takes us to the house telling us all about the island, we already feel looked after and start winding down. The heritage house, very well loved by the owners, is all at once comfortable/cosy, charming and full of wonders… some delicious like: fresh herbs, lemon/orange trees growing in the garden. The'Platypus" bedroom with its timber walls, vintage lacy mosquito net, clean bed linen & soft towels, made us feel very snug. Ann had even placed some fresh lavender stems on our pillows! We explored the island during the day, hanged at the beach… It felt like the time had stopped for a while. Then, coming back to the house, we were welcomed at night by Ann cooking up a FEAST, literally. She put so much thoughts into the menu and what would please us! The dinner with Ann and her husband was lovely and very much fun. Needless to say that we slept like babies. The next day morning brunch was another delicious meal served on the sunny balcony overlooking the vegetation and the river. We left shortly after and felt we could have stayed for a few more days of true pampering!

We couldn't have hoped for a more peaceful, beautiful setting for a weekend out of the city. Ann was a very warm and generous host who went out of her way to accommodate our interests including researching a suitable track in ku ring gai national park, and cooking a bevy of delicious vegetarian meals (complete with home grown herbs, veggies and chili!).

Dangar island itself houses a warm and friendly community and it was very special to have a host who is so proud and knowledgeable about her corner of the world. We look forward to our next stay!
Ann and her family were the most gracious of hosts, sharing their house, gorgeous food & (mostly bad) jokes to make me feel a part of the family.

Ann is a great host. We felt welcome. She is a local historian and gave us a great insight into the island. 
The place and location are good. We felt at home. We were very warm at night and it was quite romantic for us. 
We were on the island for other reasons and would recommend it to others, although I would say that it is fully priced.

Ann was a very welcoming a thoughtful host. Also a great local historian who shared stories of the early days of the island. The hot breakfast with ham, cheese, fresh fruit and croissants and a perfect egg was a particular highlight. 

Highly recommended! A++

The island itself is small and delightful, with the ferry ride across at dusk just lovely. We also highly recommend hiring a tinnie from Brooklyn to explore the river.

We had a lovely time at Ann's place. Ann and her husband are very interesting and considerate hosts. Lots of lively conversation. A lovely brunch.  Both rooms made up for us nicely. Great communication through the booking process.

Ann and her husband met us at the ferry and upon arrival I was presented with a surprise birthday cake! How fabulous. Gluten free too for me - very thoughtful indeed. A lovely birthday card too left on the dresser. It's personal touches like this that make for a great stay.

So nice to know a bit about the history of where you're staying. Ann does a great talk on the history of the island.

If you think you'll need a little sleep in, take earplugs as the local birds get excited in the morning. A wonderful symphony to wake up to, but if you're trying to sleep...  

Dangar Island is just wonderful - we keep coming back. It is a truly special place.

We'll  come again - both to the island and would happily stay here again.

Ann and Robert are charming hosts! From preparing our favourite foods to allowing us free range of the house and garden and sharing a lovely glass of wine over great conversation, we were made to feel really at home, yet really special. Both the house and the hosts are fascinating—Ann is a font of local history knowledge and Robert's collection of classical music is breathtaking. Beautiful artistic touches are everywhere, making this a truly magical and unique place to stay.

We had a lovely time at Ann and Robert's on Dangar Island. Ann and Robert are both extraordinary people - fascinating and inspiring! We listened to Robert's opera CD on our way home! Ann made the most beautiful brunch for us. Their historic home is warm and inviting. Thankyou for a lovely time :)
Ann was a gracious host and a fantastic cook. She was very good company and her place is ideally located - very near the wharf, cafe, and bowling club as well as just a short walk to the beach.
Thanks so much Ann for being such a perfect hostess - I loved your cooking and was inspired by your garden. Maree

A cultural experience to be enjoyed and treasured. Definitely to be on the bucket list of anyone who enjoys diversity and appreciates the finer things in life such as being entertained by a knowledgeable hostess who can share the wonders of permaculture, the arts and history. loved and appreciated every second thank you Ann for opening your home and loving us so dearly.

Ann was the perfect host.  From the welcome smile, to the beautiful breakfast and the awesome surroundings, we were not disappointed.  Dangar island is beautiful and the weekend was made even more special by how well Ann looked after us.  Everything was as described and this place is full of history.  Definitely worth a visit
Gorgeous little treasure Dangar is! Ann is generous in sharing her little paradise, her amazing knowledge and stories. We will be back.
A charming B&B with lots of history and character. Ann took care of us and spoilt us with a lovely breakfast each morning. Not great for young families, but lovely for a couple.
Heritage house with a lovely host!

Ann's place is unique, historical and a memorable place to stay.  We enjoyed the history of the house, the stories told by Ann and the very genuine concern for our comfort on what was a 41 degree day.  Breakfast was delicious and tailored to our needs.  Thanks Ann for a lovely stay.
Lovely hosts on a beautiful island

We booked online through Air BNB for two adults and one infant.  Unfortunately, soon after we arrived, Ann told us there had been a billing error and asked for more money, stating we had not booked correctly online and had only paid half of what we should have. 
We showed her our booking confirmation to prove we had booked correctly, and she “let us stay”. We had booked and paid correctly, it appears there may have been a problem with the Air BNB site. However, from this point on staying there became very uncomfortable.
Over the next couple of days there were more problems. She could not tell us the wifi password, so we were unable to use the wifi. She told us we could not use the air conditioning. Finally, she refused us access to the kitchen to heat up our dinner, and told us we could not eat in the house, so we ended up eating cold pies in the garden at night. 
It was so uncomfortable we decided to leave early, and did not stay the last night.

name: Museum Mile 1 BR - Madison Ave
summary: Welcome to our Madison Ave apartment. You will find this listing so charming, and well located. The apartment has a queen bedroom, balcony off the living room, and a spacious living room with a sleep sofa, and desk.
interaction: We are here to help you throughout the booking process, and your stay. Whether you need a restaurant recommendation, or help with something during your stay, we've got you covered.
houseRules: 1) All reservations must be for full calendar month's (move-in date on the first of the month, and move-out date on the last day of the month). If the apartment vacancy is mid month, then the move in date should be on that date, and move out date on the last day of the month. WE CAN NOT ACCOMMODATE PARTIAL MONTH STAYS.  2) We reserve the right to show the unit to prospective renters during your stay. This will only be done on Monday-Friday between 12-5 pm. We will also give you one days advance notice.   3) The minimum stay is one month. This applies to all guests that may occupy the apartment.   4) Utilities are included in the rental rate. However, there is a $250 monthly utility cap. If your utilities exceed this amount, then the tenant must pay the difference.

reviews.txt:
I stayed at USA Stay's apartment for a little over 2 months while I was on a business trip in New York. Excellent location if you prefer a quiet neighborhood. There is quite a number of restaurants and shops close by and it is only two blocks away to Central Park. Public transportation is within walkable distance too. 
Please note that you will need to buy some necessities such as trash bags, shampoos and so on as this is not an apartment that someone currently lives in (more of a hotel style with an empty furnished room). Also the streets could be a little loud at night because it faces to Madison Avenue. The service calls were handled promptly. Check in and out were easy. 
Overall I enjoyed my stay at this apartment and would recommend it to anyone who prefers a convenient location but not right into midtown where the traffics are.

This apartment is perfect for one person or couples staying in NYC for a long period and looking to experience the real Upper East Side, with its beautiful residences, shops and restaurants. The location is prime, very easy to hop on a bus or subway and make it anywhere. Nightlife is not big around, it's actually quiet and nice at night. Dave from USA Stay was super nice and helped solving certain issues that came up. The communication was great. There's a little market and cleaners downstairs, which is super convenient, and a Duane Read/Walgreens a couple of blocks away. You'll be 1 block from Central Park and the apt itself is incredibly cozy. You'll feel at home. Thank you!

The location and service was outstanding. However, be aware that the apartment is old and therefore not well isolated. You hear traffic from Madison Avenue, your neighbours and noisy radiators. Sometimes the water will never get hot, forcing you to take cold showers. Radiators may not work on cold days.
We stayed for two months in a nice location but the apartment disappointed us, especially when we considered the high price of our 2 months stay.

The apartment is located at UES, one block from Central Park and within close proximity within several museums (The Met, Guggenheim, Copper Hewitt). Nearest subway station is on either 96th street (6 train) or 86th street (4,5,6 trains).

The apartment is on the third floor of the building. The neighbourhood is generally quiet with the exception of traffic noises and bus noises (there's a bus stop right below) but apart from that it's generally quiet at night. 

It's a cosy apartment, and has everything you would typically need. The small refrigerator works well, however do note that the freezer section doesn't work, so avoid purchasing items that require freezing. Wifi and cable TV works well too.

I had no problems with the hot water in the shower, but do note that it does take a few minutes for it to get hot. 

Communication was great and the host, he was always quick to respond to questions or any problems. I found them incredibly communicative and helpful. 

I stayed for a period of two months. I am seldom around during the day as I am at work, and am usually only around at night. 

Overall I am satisfied with the apartment and my stay. 

Thank you very much!

We do NOT recommend to stay in this apartment for several reasons. First, there are cockroaches. First thing we saw upon entering were cockroaches in the kitchen area - without even having any food around or cooking. This was not properly disclosed before arrival. Although they sent somebody over who laid out baits, the roaches did not disappear. Second, (at least) two times there were unannounced strangers entering the apartment in order to look at it or to even take pictures. We know because we were at the apartment at this time. Third, the apartment faces Madison Ave, so it is rather loud. In addition, the windows are not well sealed so it gets cold/hot easily. Overall, considering what you get, the apartment is overpriced. In addition to get the key, you have to travel across the city to pick it up - very inconveniently.

El sitio me pareció inmejorable, ni muy céntrico, ni muy alejado, y muy buenos transportes públicos, metro a 10 min. y autobus a piede casa.
El edificio es antiguo, escalera de madera y sin ascensor, pero muy bonito y con balconcillo, tipo Friends. Yo mismo vivo en un edificio antiguo.el apartamento estaba limpio excepto por la nevera, que tuvimos que limpiarla a fondo
Calefacción y aire acondicionado. Muy necesarios los dos porque las temperaturas son un poco extremas.
WiFi muy bueno, Potente (llegaba hasta la parada del autobús) y muy veloz. Televisión con múltiples canales
Los quince primeros días estuvimos cuatro personas (mis dos hijos) y estuvimos un poco justos (sofá-cama) pero después una pareja, y perfecto.
Le vendría bien al apartamento una mano de pintura.
Es tuvimos mes y medio y NYC es maravilloso, el sitio y el apartamento me encanto, salvo pequeñas cosas, y el anfitrion fue muy amable ya que nos dejó hacer el check out a la 1:00 pm.
La comunicación fue siempre por email
Good location & vintage interior

name: Cheerful new renovated central apt
summary: The full equipped apartment located in the heritage district of Istanbul, colorful Tarlabaşı. If you are looking for a place where you really want to taste the chaos with harmony like a real Istanbuller you are very welcome to stay in my apartment.
interaction: I will always respect your privacy. If you book the entire apartment I will bring you the keys on the day of your arrival and will take them from you on the day you leave or you can leave them at home on the table:)  However, if it is possible for both of us, we can always have a walk or drink coffee/tea/beer. For any sort of problem like technical or just a trip advise you can always call and ask for help.
houseRules: • Please lock the doors and close the windows when you leave the flat. • Please don´t change the heat controller settings. • Please be respectful to the neighbors regarding noise levels. • If you are a smoker please smoke by the window  or at the balcony Welcome to your home!

host.about: My name is Aybike. I love to travel, to discover new places and to meet new people. I will be glad to hosting you in Istanbul at my place. My apartment is newly renovated, clean, cosy, comfortable, large enough for 8 people and is situated literally at the heart of Istanbul. As a traveller my wish is to make you feel at home; drink your morning coffee while listening to the sound of Istanbul then take your map, jump into the street with friendly neighbourhood,  and enjoy the city with walking, exploring, watching, reading and hearing. I know how it is important to be able to feel the city you are visiting from my experiences. So if you are looking for a place where you really want to taste the chaos with harmony like a real Istanbuller you are very welcome to stay in my apartment.

reviews.txt:
We rented Aybike's apartment as a group of four. We were met by Aybike on arrival, she is a great host, very welcoming, responsive and attentive. We even got some sweets prepared by her mother, which was extremely sweet. Even though we only were the first guests for her, I am sure Aybike will be a great host. 
The apartment itself is cozy and bright. Although more people could potentially stay there we felt that it was perfect for four. It is fully equipped with everything necessary. We couldn't think of anything we would need that was missing. The location is great close to Istiklal street and a walking distance to many major attrcations. 
We can warmly recommend Aybike and her apartment!
Best regards,
Oksana, Victor, Liuda, Stas

The apartment was the cutest thing and so comfortable, Aybike was extremely prepared with everything and she's really nice, the apartment had everything we needed. Good location, it has a very friendly restaurant right in front of it, that is open 24/7. We had such a great experience!
Het appartement ligt in een goede buurt, dicht bij alles. Aybike is zeer gastvrij en leuk. Appartement zelf had ook alles.

We had an great time staying in Aybike's flat, it was the perfect flat in the perfect location for us. There was three of us staying in this flat and it was just right for us. The flat was clean and tidy, it had everything we need, plenty towels and bedding available for us. The flat is situated in the perfect location for you to get the real sense of Istanbul with its locals and the culture. It's so central, 2 mins walk away from Istikal Street, 10 mins walk away Galata and Cihangir and 10 mins on the public transport to Old City. 
Aybike was great she was very attentive to all our needs and very friendly and warm, any problem she was there. We had a lot of fun this flat it was great!!

We had a really wonderful time at Aybike's apartment- it was very well equipped with everything we needed (and more!) and was a great base from which to explore the city. It's in a busy and fun area but still quiet enough at night for good sleep. Aybike was a brilliant host- very accommodating and warm. We'd come back in a heartbeat!

Aybike made us feel very welcome, she was very nice and as our flight was changed to a later flight she waited in the apartement for us, thanks again! The apartement is equiped with everything you need, the bars outside and the hole area was always with a lot of people, we never felt unsafe at night walking in the streets.  we can recommend it!

Aybike was the nicest host you can imagine. She provided us with maps from Istambul and recommended some sightseeing points. She let us use her metro card during our stay. Her flat is clean, tidy and within a walkable distance from Taksim Square, where you can move to any part of the city. I definitely recommend her for your stay in Istambul.

We rented Aybike's appartment for 6 adults and 3 children! we easily fitted to this cosy flat. It had enough sleeping places for all of us. The flat is realy well equipted with everything needed for travelers and even some food left for the first snack. The location is good, near Istiklal street. Aybike was quick responcive. We had problems with hot water but it was solved quickly. Her mother was very polite and met us with  homemade sweet cookies. Every person were provided with set of towels for face and body. They were new, soft and clean. The streets are very nosy but when tired it doesn't metter :). I would like to come again and highly recommend it. Good luck and thank you Aybike!

Aybike's apartment truly is at the heart of Istanbul. We were able to walk to Taksim Street in minutes and use that find transport anywhere else. Shops and a 24-hour local eatery were seconds away. Her apartment was clean, cosy, and packed with everything one would need - all kinds of household items, maps and tourist guides, Internet, snacks, etc. We were five adults, including 2 elderly. Aybike catered to all of us wonderfully, even dropping off a fan when we mentioned that the elders were feeling a bit hot. Throughout our stay she was always responsive on (Hidden by Airbnb) and regularly gave advice regarding our Istanbul adventures. Even after we left, she informed us of an item we had left behind, and offered to help send it to us. Please visit us in Dhaka, Aybike!

We love that Place, just 3 min. walk to Istiklal street, 1 min. to Bus stataion and 5 to 10 min. to Shishane subway station, so I really cant think of a better location.
Aybike is a very professional Host and helped us all the way at everything we needed, starting from basic orientation to arranging Transfer to Airport, we loved the Apt. and really felt Home and will always stay there when we visit Istanbul Again.
Thank you Aybike

My boyfriend, dad, and I had a great time at this apartment! It is close to all the major tourist locations and close to shops, cafes, and galleries. Really a great location. The apartment is beautiful and the bed and pillows are super comfortable. Also the high speed internet works great and the AC was a nice bonus! I would definitely stay here again!

Amazing location, love the Apt# 
this is my 2nd stay and will always stay there.
Aybike and Fatima ( her mother ) are very kind and friendly Hosts.

This is our second stay at Aybike's apartment! We liked it so much at the beginning of our road trip all over turkey so we stayed here when we came back! 
My dad, boyfriend, and I were very comfortable here. It is close by to the main shopping and movie theater in Taxim, and close to all transportation, plus easy access to the airport via shuttle or taxi. 
Aybike has great communication skills and was always available for our arrival and advice. Highly recommend!

Aybike was very kind and attentive with communications, suggesting some nice things to do in Istabul. The apartment was in a great location, walkable to everything we wanted to do. The front room was light and airy, with an eclectic design. Both the bedrooms however have little natural light, so if this is important to you it might not be your best choice. There were some plumbing issues which were frustrating.  Aybike was quick to respond to concerns, though nothing could be done right away. Hopefully issues will be resolved quickly for the next guest.

We'd like to thanks Aybike for everything she did for us, it was nice trip to Istanbul, we have faced some problems, but we solved as well.
A suitable place for a certain number of people (between 1 to 4 persons), and all supplies are available in place.
the house was comfortable and close to Taksim square about ten minutes walking, and the house was very well equipped, the hosts welcomed us really nicely.

오자마자 식탁에 있는 쿠키와 과자들, 그리고 반갑게 맞아주는 주인분 어머니와 주인분.
그분들의 친절때문에 잘지낼 수 있었습니다.
거리,청결,와이파이,화장실,침실 등 하나하나 모든게 다 좋았습니다.
강추합니다.
여기서 지내시면 더 재미있게 이스탄불 여행을 하실 수 있으실 것입니다:)

I cannot speak negatively at all. Beautiful apartment, well located, great hospitality. 

We were recieved by Aybike's mom, Fatima, which is a great person. Explained everything thing, showed us where everything is and offered us some nice pastries. Aybike, although she was not physically available, she was always reachable via phone and Airbnb communication. 

the apartment is a few minutes away from Istiklal st. and nearby many restaurants and grocery stores.

I recommend staying here.
I loved the apartment. Very cozy & clean. Temperature was very good. Beds are comfy and sheets are clean. Bathroom was awsum, loved taking showers. Perfect stay.

Me and my friend love aybike apartment soo much! we were traveling during winter time and Istanbul quite cold soo after all day long walking in the cold arriving in aybike apartment feels like heaven. Warm and comfortable. 

Very nice and cute apartment, good location, very good wifi connection, very near to istiqlal street. we are 7 people and the apartment has enough space for us. 

Thank you soo much!

name: Mike's House- Uilani Room
summary: Our home is a 4bd older style home that has been in the family since 1935. Private room, with full size bed and partial bathroom. We are 7-10 walking distance to Paia town with lots to see and eat. There is off street parking and WIFI.
interaction: I do live on the property and can easily be reached via phone, text, or email.  There is a phone in the house you can use with my contact information
houseRules: No Smoking in House or on lanai’s (You are welcome to smoke outside, please dispose of cigarette butts in the trash) All guests are to park in their designated onsite parking areas provided to them prior to there arrival.  No Loud House parties or gatherings at the house.  House slippers okay in house  Quiet hours  from 9pm - 7am during which time the noise shall not unreasonably disturb adjacent neighbors and other guests staying in the house. No sleepovers of unregistered guests Please rinse sand off before entering house. It clogs our pipes and creates  plumbing problems Please unplug all small appliances in the kitchen when not in use such as  coffee maker, toaster, etc. Coin operated Laundry facility is available on the premises. Please make sure  you shake the sand out of all clothes and towels before putting them into the  washing machine. Do not overload the machine. If there is anything you find lacking in the HOUSE, let us know and we will try to accommodate you. All suggesti

host.about: We are born and raised in Hawaii; and part Hawaiian.  My husband was born and raised in Maui all his life.  I was born on Oahu and raised there and the Big Island before moving to Maui about 30 years ago.  We love and treasure our beautiful Hawaiian Islands. Our family includes our 3 beautiful children; Maikala, Nainoa, and Iwalani.  We love our life and never take for granted for what we have.  Live life to the fullest because life is precious and should be appreciated everyday!!!

reviews.txt: Mike's house is a great and budget friendly place to stay, very close to the cool and relaxed downtown of Paia, away from any resort and big tourism area. Best of all Rina is a very nice person who helps you with any question and makes you really feel at home! She helped a lot for our children with many toys and stroller. Now as we are gone our daughter wants to go back to the lanai with the toys. Thanks Rina for everything!

We stayed one week in Mike's House and really enjoyed every second of it. Our room was spacious and nice and the balcony was perfect to have breakfast in the Hawaiian sun. 
The location is great for all kind of trips, and Paia downtown is in walking distance.
Rina provided us with everything we needed, including towels, guides and even a barbecue :)

Thanks again, Rina!!
Rina is wonderful. it is a beautiful place in Paia. It`s the best house to make holiday. Price and service is top!

Our 3-night stay at Mike's House to end our trip in Maui was perfect. Rina is very kind and helping, and the location is great, especially if you want to see the big waves of the north shore or drive the road to Hana. The restaurants and shops of Paia are a short walk away. Our room was well equipped and clean. Thanks Rina!

My husband and I enjoyed 3 nights at Mike's House.  We highly recommend staying there as it was clean, affordable, and walking distance to the beach, shops and restaurants.  Most importantly, however, was the Aloha Spirit that we felt from Rina.  Thanks for a great stay.  We'll be back!

Rina was simply a great host. Like supplying some of the little items that make a big difference when traveling. In our case beach towels, beach chairs, back pack, and bag cooler.

The house was clean and well looked after. The friendly atmosphere was also a plus.

Paia is centrally located and close to the airport. It is a young vibrant area.

The only con I can think of was the bed was a double bed and we are used to something bigger.

Bruce and Shelley

Rina was an excellent host and provided everything I needed, and so was the place, great location, plenty of space and all the amenities I needed. Will definitely come to Rina again when back in Paia.

It was very nice to stay at Mike`s House. Rina is very friendly and she does so much that the people feel well at her place. 
I would definitely come back to this place… 
Thank you so much for everything Rina

Der 6 tägige Aufenthalt in Mike's House war sehr angenehm. Wir würden jederzeit wieder dort wohnen. Das Zimmer war sauber und kann jedem weiter empfohlen werden, sofern einem kleinere Lärmbelastungen nicht stören (z.B. krähender Hahn).

Rina war eine sehr nette und hilfsbereite Gastgeberin. Bei unserem Trip auf den Haleakala stellte sie uns sogar Fliesdecken zur Verfügung.

Unser Zimmer verfügte über eine eigene Toilette, Lavabo, Kühlschrank und Mikrowelle. Die Dusche befand sich in einem Gemeinschaftsbad. 

Nebst Badetüchern und Strandstühlen waren auch Shampoo und Douche bereitgestellt.

Für Dollar 1.50 konnte man die Maschmaschine inkl. Maschmittel benützen. Gedeckter Parkplatz vorhanden. 5-minütiger Fussmarsch bis ins Zentrum von Paia.

It was nice.  It would have been nice to have an air conditioner in the room though.  It gets very hot in Maui, even at night, starting in early May and on.  The rooster in the neighbors yard woke us up in the morning.  If we had an AC we could have shut the door instead of leave it open for the breeze.

But Rina was great and super helpful.  They had a big fridge in the common kitchen we could use, tons of cookware and stuff.  They also left us some beach towels and picnic bags we used for our trips.  That was super helpful!

Staying at Rina's place was very nice. We loved Paia with the little shops, supermarket and restaurants. Especially that you can walk to these places from home is very good.
The double bed we had was a little too small for two adults so we shared the bed with our daughter. 
Rina was very helpfull with tips and every day we saw her in case we had any questions.
Ho'okipa was our favorite beach were green sea turtles coma ashore almost every day to rest.
Mike's House is a really great place to stay. Rina was very friendly and helpful. The  location of the house is really good to travel around the island. I recommend it :)

We really much enjoyed staying at Rinas place! The room was clean and Rina provided us with everthing we needed. They helped us with everything we needed help with and even when our car broke down Rina and her husband were more than helpful! Paia is a cute little town, everything is within walking distance (grocery, restaurants, beach, yoga...) Thank you very much for the late check out end everything, we would definetely stay here again!

très bonne adresse, pas loin à pieds du centre de paia et de sa jolie plage.
chambres propres et fonctionnelles, cuisine bien équipé, internet efficace.
rina est extrêmement gentille et hospitalière.
encore une fois, une très bonne adresse.
Hoku is a very thoughtful and kind host. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at his/her place.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Rina, qui est aux petits soins avec ses visiteurs. La chambre est agréable et l'emplacement idéal pour accéder  Paia à pied, tout en étant à l'écart de la circulation.

Rina is a great host and we enjoyed our stay there. The location is very easy to find and has everything we need. The house itself is an old one but the rooms are relatively clean, great value for the money.
매우 깨끗하고 모든게 잘 갖춰져있는 집이였어요~ 호스트도 매우 친절하고 기쁘게 맞이해주었습니다!

Rina was an amazing host, she did everything to help me with clear indications to find the bnb. The house was very very clean, she work's hard! I had such a great time there and talking with her.
The house is very well located, close from the boutiques, Mana grocery which is great, beaches, restaurants. 
Felt very safe in the place too and it was calm and cozy :-)
Wish I will be able to go back!

Everything you need to feel at home. Our room had a half bathroom (toilet) and sink. Big room and a private patio to boot. Hoku had everything ready and the communication was excellent. 

The house is located in the small town of Paia, a small little place with food a quick walk down the street. Paia is in the middle of the island so equally convenient to get to Lahaina or Hana.

Amenities for everything you can need. Full kitchen, clean towels, coolers, etc 

Great value and comfy living. Thanks Hoku!

name: Hut Amazigh at Desert Camp Chraika
summary: This beautiful one bedroom one bathroom cottage is completely brand new and is kept immaculate. Tile floors throughout, granite counter tops in the progressive yet traditional fully appointed kitchen and state of the art appliances.
interaction: As both hosts work full time, guests do have access to hosts although it is limited.
houseRules: We are contained within a family neighborhood. We ask that guests are respectful of the family neighborhood atmosphere

reviews.txt: Loved staying here! My first time to Hawaii and Maui Island so I really didn't have much of an idea where everything was apart from approximations using a map. The location is perfect! Right near the ocean/ beach, key spot to get to the airport or other parts of the island. Additionally, Samantha thought of everything right down to ensuring there is a hookup for a hose off the driveway so you can wash the sand off your feet. I will definitely stay here again!
Hibiscus Hideaway is a great place to stay. It's very well located and it has everything you need for a pleasant stay in Maui. Aloha.

In a few words perfect, in a great location and reasonably priced.  The pictures do not do it justice.   It is truly an oasis. Before you enter at the cottage, there is a beautiful stamped concrete patio complete with outdoor dining area and separate sitting area for relaxing with your morning coffee or afternoon cocktail.    There is a very nice feeling of privacy provided by a privacy wall and a line of small palm trees that separates the property from the property next-door. There is a full kitchen, a beautiful bathroom, separate bedroom, and living room with flatscreen television and pull out couch.    They provided boogie boards, a cooler, two beach chairs, a Sunbrella,. Everything was clean, even the barbecue.   I would certainly stay there again if I had the opportunity to return.
We had a very pleasant stay in this apartment. Very comfortable. Convenient location. We loved it!

Samantha's little hideaway is fantastic!  Very cozy!  The place has been updated with all of the amenities you need.  Plus, all of the little touches make it a great say.  From the island magazines to help find good recommendations to the island map sitting out to help you find your way, Samantha put a lot of effort to make the stay very welcoming.  The place is on a small side street in north Kihei which is out little outside of the main town area, perfect for what we were looking for.  A short walk from the beach where you can see the sunset, but also very central on the island to get around.  Definitely would stay here again.

Mahalo!

This place was absolutely perfect! Everything was just as shown in the pictures. The cottage is very clean and comfortable. All that you could need was provided (towels, beach chairs, washer/dryer, kitchen items, etc.) The neighborhood is very peaceful and I enjoyed having breakfast on the private patio. On my last day I went to the big beach in Makena that was recommended by Samantha and it was wonderful. I would definitely stay here again!
Good place to stay.
Perfect location. Beautiful place, excellent host.
Great place in a beautiful location

It was our first visit to Maui, Hibiscus hideaway is an excellent place as pictured, with everything thought of as mentioned in other reviews and conveniently located to all places in Maui. Despite last minute booking the place was ready and Samantha responded within few minutes to all clarifications.

name: Privately Gated Oceanfront Estate
summary: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). A Piece of Maui Paradise HAWAII TAX ID is #W(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) We do not rent for weddings or large gatherings but we are happy to make suggestions to our booked guests (URL HIDDEN)
interaction: Our office is on Maui and we are available 24/7 to help with any issues or requests
houseRules: PLEASE REMEMBER THIS IS A SHOE FREE HOME, LIKE MOST IN HAWAII ☺ ON YOUR ARRIVAL HAVE A LOOK AROUND AND IF YOU FIND ANYTHING UNSATISFACTORY PLEASE INFORM ME IN THE FIRST 24 HOURS OF YOUR STAY WITH US.  WE WILL WANT TO RECTIFY IT IMMEDIATELY SO YOU CAN ENJOY YOUR STAY. CHECK OUT TIME IS 11AM LATE CHECK OUTS CAN BE ARRANGED FOR A ½ DAY RATE CHARGE, JUST ASK US. IT WOULD ALLOW YOU TO RELAX AND STAY UNTIL YOUR FLIGHT WHATEVER TIME THAT MAY BE. PLEASE WASH YOUR SANDY FEET WITH ONE OF THE HOSES OUTSIDE BEFORE ENTERING THE HOUSE.  PLEASE DON’T PUT DIRTY FEET ON THE SOFA MASTER BATHROOM LOCKS BY LIFTING THE HANDLE UP, YOU CANT TELL FROM INSIDE ITS LOCKED BUT IT IS. DO NOT LEAVE THE HOME UNLOCKED WHEN YOU ARE NOT HOME. WE ASK THAT YOU LEAVE OUR HOME IN SIMILAR CONDITION AS DELIVERED All dishes, pots, pans, silverware and glasses returned to their places All opened food discarded, items in sealed containers may be left All trash is taken out to the trash bins.  	All air conditioners are turned of

reviews.txt: Amazing property.  Could not be happier with this stay.  The house is beautiful, the surrounding front and back outdoor area is very spacious, interior is tastefully decorated, and the ocean is just yards away.  This was a perfect stay for our 2 yr old daughter who had lots of room to run around and absolutely loved the outside trampoline. The location is central to driving to Kihei, Lahaina, Paia or Kahalui. One of the best places my family has stayed.  There are charming ducks and chickens roaming around on the property - the only slight downside was the great amount of duck poop on the porch every morning but it was an easy cleanup with the outside hose.  It was a small thing compared to our wonderful stay.

Despite the fact that there is not that much in the walking distance (yes, there is a beach and some small stores), this location is a great one as you are in the central position of the island and nothing is more than 20 minutes away. Property itself looks even better than in the pictures and it is quite large. House is very nice and you will probably find everything you need even though if you plan to cook every day you might be somewhat limited. Biggest problem we encountered is something that looked cool at the beginning - ducks walking around the property. They would constantly poop at the front deck and the deck would quickly become disgusting and unusable. Even if you wash it out with the hose, it will take them no time to make the mess again. However, somehow they decided to leave the back (ocean side) deck alone so we were able to truly enjoy the beautiful view.  I would recommend the place to couples or families with older children - not babies or small kids as the bedrooms are awkwardly placed (one is right at the entrance door) so you have to walk through the whole house to get to second bedroom. The host vas very helpful and responded quickly to all our questions.
Awesome place! Rented as two couples and had a blast.

This house is amazing. The view, style and amenities suited our family of four for relaxation, cooking, and fun. All in a great location. The Ma'alaea General Store nearby, which Kristine also owns, is a great stop for food, smoothies and basic supplies. The only downside is the duck poop on the front porch, but everything else well made up for that small detail. We had a great time and would do it again.
Absolutely beautiful property.   Even on an extremely cold and stormy day, the house was a beautiful place to relax.  Communication with Kristine was great.  We had a wonderful stay.

A beautiful quiet and relaxing home away from the crowds and walking distance to the beach. A perfect home for our family of 4.  We all enjoyed the in ground trampoline, the resident ducks, and the turtles swimming along the shore. We hope to return soon! ❤️

The home is perfect, exactly what I dreamed of from every aspect. Central location, right on the water, great areas to hang out from hammocks to daybeds to loungers and couches. Incredible open kitchen has everything a chef needs with a great floor plan that keeps you part of the action in the house and still connected to the ocean. 
The bedding was exquisitely comfortable, especially with the sound of the oceans outside the window.
Very tastefully decorated with old and new, laid back and luxury touches. The outdoor direct entryway to the shower is a genius idea. 

We will be back!

This home is spectacular in every way. The view, the space, the amenities and surprises, the proximity to attractions, the privacy, and the adorable ducks! We saw sea turtles from the bay right in the backyard. We snorkeled, kayaked, grilled out, relaxed in the hot tub (we also rented the guest house on the property) and hammocks, and cooked in the gourmet kitchen. It was heartbreaking to leave. Many great memories were made! Thanks Kristine!

Elegant.
Tranquil.
Little piece of heaven.
This home is a must stay for for anyone thinking about traveling during whale watching season. We saw tons of whales in the bay. Great location too close drive to the airport as while as many other must see sights.
Waking up to watch the sunrise every morning with tea on the deck overlooking the ocean was the most wonderful highlight of our stay here.
You will be greeted by the birds on the property every morning they are so friendly and will come right up to you.
Kristine is an amazing and thoughtful host they have thought of everything and have a binder filled with info about the house places to visit and places to eat be sure to look thru it because it sent us some amazing places we never would have thought about otherwise.
There are tons of amenities for the water on the back deck, a cooler cane in handed for day trips to the beach, aloe and aftersun lotion for those sunburn recovery days, all bathroom amenities you could ever need of vacation. The bed were so cozy and bathrooms were pristine. This is one of the best and most accurate Airbnb ever and I highly recommend staying here. 
To put a little icing on the cake communication with our host was prompt and very helpful they really want your stay to be the best possible!

This place was amaxing!! My fiancee and I had the pleasure of staying here for our enganment. From the fresh flowers to the extremely accomadating host Kristine, this experience could not have been better. Everything was truly perfect!

Great place, very beautiful home. I really loved hanging bad outside of the house. Home has ducks and chickens, my girlfriend had great time feeding them. Location is great as well. Very good house, amazing ocean view. Great place!
This house is a wonderful place to experience the luxury Maui life.

One of the most beautiful places I have ever stayed - the location is perfect, with the beach 2 mins away and turtles feeding in the water right next to the property!

The house itself is stunning, with lots of little extra touches like sunscreen and snorkel gear and kayaks available to borrow. Oh and there are adorable pet ducks and a trampoline!! A truly idyllic location for a vacation.
One of the most beautiful homes and locations. I’d definitely recommend this for anyone visiting Maui. Very classy and picturesque.
This was an amazing place to stay. Pictures do not do justice, you have to be there!!! We will definitely stay here again. It is a 5+ star for sure.
This house is beautiful.  The pictures are accurate.  The place looks even better in person.  We enjoyed every minute of our stay in paradise and are planning to go again in the future.
This place is flawless really offering an amazing experience that only supplements the beauty of Maui! Came here for our honeymoon and we can't wait to be back again!
We had an excellent stay.  The photographs were accurate and Kristine was very responsive to our questions and requests.  Highly recommend.

The view, the house and the surrounding property is truly beautiful. In addition to the view, we also loved the large yard with lush green grass, beautiful tropical plants & trees, a bunch of large hammocks on the property and a huge trampoline to play with. The ducks and chickens were a fun addition to the property (though they did poop all over the entryway). 

Unfortunately, there were some difficulties that were hard to overlook particularly at this price point. The general house cleanliness was quite poor.. floors were super dusty and needed a good mopping. Some of the kitchenware had crusty dust or rust on them. Other things were broken.. kitchen/scissors/blenders/glassware/kitchen gas downdraft. Also, only the living room ac worked, the bedrooms got rather hot. We really weren't expecting these issues at this price point hence the 3* review. 

The house had a lot of geckos. We expected these outside or on the deck- but we spotted these just about everywhere you don't want to see one... in the bathroom, on our towels, on our clothes, on the chair, on the bed.

This place is heaven!   We stayed for 9 days and I think it may be my favorite place to stay ever.  The place is so much better than the pictures.   You can jump in the water if you walk down the rocks and we used the kayaks.   The outside bed is amazing and the upstairs sun deck is cool.  The location is good- the town is meh (no good restaurants), but you are right in the middle of Kihei and Wailea- both are 15 minutes away.  The kitchen is perfect for cooking and is well stocked.  It says it has a hot tub and it does, but it is attached to the other unit on the property and we felt weird as their outdoor shower is right there.  I was concerned about the other unit on the property as we didn’t rent it, but we never saw anyone (just their car)- and it is a huge property so you don’t even realize it is there.  

Honestly if you are looking for a beautiful home right on the water- this place is more than perfect.

name: Cosy penthouse close to Barra beach
summary: This explendid penthouse has 4.400 ft2, with 5 cosy bedrooms, sauna, pool, parking for 6 cars and is located at one of the best points of the Barra da Tijuca beach, with the best restaurants and bars of the neighborhood (subway station 15 minutes walk)
interaction: Whenever you need help or suggestions for a city tour, never mind in calling me.
houseRules: No loud noises can be created, specially after 10 PM, in order to not disturb neighbors.

reviews.txt: Close to the metro (Jardim Oceanico, 1.2km, 15-20 walk). Really nice, 2-level brand new penthouse in a quiet residential area, just one block from the beach.  Various good restaurants nearby and a convenient supermarket on the corner.  Accommodates 12 persons (adults only, apartment is not exactly child friendly because of the 2 levels and the swimming pool on the 2 floor) with more than enough space to relax and feel like in a spa environment.

name: sunny 2 bedroom close to Bosphorus
summary: The apartment is located at the very best location in Arnavutköy, not so close to the noise on the seaside but a bit inside. The building has a terrace for many uses.
interaction: We'll be friends, housemates, you're not a customer. It's just that the place has an expense and a value so I should cover it, no?
houseRules: There is a cat in the house. You aren't allowed to hurt it. And also, you need to be careful with the doors&windows, not letting the cat out.

host.about:
Başar Family

Gülder (mother): Owner of ARBA Food. Ltd. Co., Ankara. Graduate: Management, Middle East Technical University
Arda (son): Unemployed. Graduate: Civil Engineering, Boğaziçi University
Aras (son): Works at The Princeton Review, Ankara. Graduate: Civil Engineering, İstanbul Technical University-State University of New York
Fırat (father): Co-owner of ARBA Food Co. Ltd. Graduate: English Language and Literature, Hacettepe University


We have together and individually traveled to a lot of countries all around the world. We love interacting with locals for local foods, traditions, music etc. to further understand ourselves and import new meanings to our own lives, which, in turn, enriches everybody around us.

We have hosted wonderful people. None caused big issues, and none had issues with us. We are more prone to sharing experiences, rather than doing business, because, I guess we are early adopters of Airbnb. Our house is not like an hotel room. With us generally around, you will make the most out of the neighborhood, perhaps İstanbul and maybe even Turkey.

We are also very understanding guests with usually basic needs; but with the taste of certain sociocultural rules, mixed with a certain amount of humor. We basically expect what is written on your page to be correct; because then, we will be aware of the shortcomings as well, and act accordingly.

reviews.txt: The district was very calm, and there were two supermarkets within a minute of walking which can provide whatever you lack. Arda was very kind and helpful, and the house has everything you may need during your accomodation. My only concern was the cat, but she ignores you unless you call her :)
Tek kelimeyle mükemmel diyebilirim, evin toplu taşımaya ve sahile yakın oluşu çok büyük bir avantaj.
A silent room near the Bosphorus. Aras very helpful person. Thank you Aras.

name: Conveniently Located, Sunny Brooklyn Heights!
summary: Perfect for visiting family stays. Monthly sublets available. Can comfortably accommodate couples and single people. Very convenient to subways (one black away) and Montague Street shopping. Walk to end of block and stroll along the promenade. No pets !
interaction: Only if they need something to make their stay more comfortable. Otherwise, I'm hands-off.
houseRules: Please respect my neighbors and try to be quiet after 10pm as they have small children. Please respect my space. Otherwise, its a great neighborhood, and beautiful building, enjoy !

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: photographer / artist

reviews.txt:
Really beautiful apartment with stunning views of the city. The place was immaculate, brand new, felt barely touched. Loved being by the water. We were only a few blocks from the L train, which is one stop from the city making it pretty convenient - though we ended up cabbing it most of the time.
