Willy, the host, was great, very easy to communicate with and everything was super smooth. No complaints. Hope to stay there again sometime. If you are a TV junky, do be aware there isn't one in the apartment, but we spied one in the common area you may be able to take advantage of.
Overall, 5 stars without a doubt!

We loved our stay in Brooklyn. 
The location could not have been better...
 contrast the quietness of this East River highrise  and then, within a few minutes  walk to the subway, we were in  Manhattan!!
The view from  the 14th floor was magnificent.
The place was neat and clean, fresh and new.
State of the art modern minimalism.
The door men were very nice and welcoming.
Great neighborhood, great building, airy and light decor, and all just a short walk away from the promenade!  Willy is a blessing....thank you for providing an accomodation so close to family!!

Willy is a wonderful host. Very helpful and flexible. Place is just great - very bright, clean room with calm, diffused light coming from big windows (so many of them!). Superb neighbourhood. Thank you Willy once more!

I would highly recommend all those reading this review to book this apartment. My girlfriend and I had a fantastic stay in Willy's apartment and we wish we could return.

We booked this place almost last minute as I had to move to New York to start a job and look at apartments. We're glad we went with this one. It is half a block away from the R and only a few blocks from basically every other subway line worth having in Brooklyn. We could be in Manhattan in a minute's notice. 

It is only a few blocks away from Montague St, the short shopping street in the middle of Brooklyn Heights, and a little farther away from Court St, the main shopping street this side of the Gowanus Canal. In short, the location is ideal. Don't pass this place up.

The apartment itself is spacious and light. The main room/bed room has two windows on three of its four walls and is constantly filled with light. The girl who lives there is a photographer, and it is obvious that she cares about the quality of the light in the room. To top it off, the apartment is appropriately accented with a few mirrors, which brightens the space even more. The bed, with its foam and vinyl mattress, is an absolute pleasure to sleep on. 

Those who come to New York fearing about grime and pests need not be afraid of this apartment. It is kept immaculately clean, and we stayed there ten days without seeing even a single fly. 

Sheets and towels are provided, as well as a mostly empty closet and lots of reading material. The internet in the apartment has its ups and downs, but is mostly and unfortunately fairly slow.

Again, you would be a fool to pass this place up, especially at this price.

Nice, clean and quiet apartment in one of the most beautiful neighborhoods in NY. Lots of natural light and windows in the room.
Very convenient access to trains/Manhattan and very close to the Promenade.

Willy was extremely accommodating despite last minute changes on my part due to travel problems and I would happily recommend her place.

Great location in downtown Brooklyn.  2 minutes from several Subway lines to Manhattan and close to shops, restaurants etc.  HUGE private studio apartment that is very bright and open.  

Would recommend any couple of individual to stay here.
Lovely appartment, very clean, excellent location, safe street, close to subway and easy to get to Manhattan, also accomodating host.

Willy was great, and always available! The place is FULL of light, great location and super close to the metro. It was my first time to NY and it was a great experience. I highly recommend staying at her apartment and would love to stay there again! Thanks Willy!

Willy is adorable, she was attentive and we received it in good humor and kindness.
She did everything to make us comfortable and we lacked nothing. She contacted us several times.
The apartment is beautiful, very bright and clean.
I recommend this great apartment.
It is very very good, all the subways in range.
The area is very good, the street is very pretty and the people of Brooklyn Heights are very nice.

I recommend this apartment, we definitely go back!

We loved the light airy feel to the apartment, and the neighborhood is beautiful and quiet.  It was close to everything, even Starbucks a block away!  Everything was sufficient for the time we were there.  If you stay longer than a week, you may need a few more amenities in the kitchen...but for our 5 days, it was fine, as we were out every day.  The bed was very comfortable, with views to roof gardens.

I will definitely go back!  Thanks Willy!
Great location that was super convenient to everywhere you need to go. Would definitely stay here again!
Excelente apartamento, bairro muito bonito. Tivemos uma maravilhosa estadia. A Willamain foi muito atenciosa. Gostamos de tudo. Obrigada.

First of all, we loved the neighborhood.  It was very close to several subway lines and shops, not to mention the river, from which there is such a beautiful view.  

Second, the apartment is a lovely alternative to getting a hotel.  While there were a couple of quirks, they weren't substantial in any way and the price was more than 50% less than nearby hotels.  The lighting in the place is stunning and the building tends to be very quiet.  Getting the keys was not a problem.  We had a bit of trouble getting in to the building a couple of times, but that was resolved with the help of a friendly neighbor who was our designated contact since the host is away.  The door to the apartment was a difficult to unlock as well, but that may have been my error.

Overall, I would very highly recommend staying at Willy's place.  It's comfortable, inexpensive, especially compared to other nearby options, and charming.  We would like to come back soon!
Nice appartment, clean, plenty of light. Highly recommended. Excellent neighbourhood, near to subways,shops, supermarket. Thank you for giving the place to all my family!
Willy's apartment is phenomenal -- the location can't be beat (heart of Brooklyn Heights), the space is charming, and Willy's a wonderful host. Highly recommended!
Lovely apartment just as we had hoped.  Great location.
Great Host!!, Always in comunication.  We loved the apt, the building and the neighborhood. Was a great experience and a great trip.

I spent a delightful week at Willy's hideaway apartment. I call it hideaway because the apt. faces the back of the building and you hear nothing except birds chirping, no street noise. The apartment is very small: essentially the large, airy and lovely bedroom you see in the photo and then a tiny kitchen and bathroom. But it is the perfect setup and the PERFECT location if you want to be in the heart of Brooklyn Heights. There is a desk in the bedroom and an Internet connection (not perfect, but mostly worked) so I was able to get some work done too.  Willy was delightful to interact with - accommodating and prompt. After exchanging mobile numbers, we were able to text back and forth, which is very efficient. The bathroom sink turned out to be completely clogged but Willy got a plumber to fix it the next day. She met the plumber there and dealt with the situation, so it was no trouble at all for us. Definitely recommend.
Nice apartment, Great location. Good host. Would return.

name: Tamarama Penthouse apartment
summary: If you want to be close by Tamarama and Bondi, this is the Beach Pad for you. Tucked away in a quiet cul-de-sac and only a stone's throw to the beach they call "Glamarama" and minutes walk away from Bondi and Bronte Beaches.
interaction: I am happy to assist you during your stay. Just give me a hola on the mobile should you need anything.
houseRules: Respect our neighbours (no parties or loud music late at night), smoking on only the balcony only and keep the apartment clean and tidy. Treat the place as if it were your own.

host.about: I am a Executive Producer based in Sydney that works in advertising and cross-media entertainment.

reviews.txt: Lizzy's Tamarama pad is a truly outstanding property.  It's amazingly well equipped, spacious, with stunning outlook (from an enormous terrace) and its beautifully maintained.  Lizzy is an absolute pleasure to deal with.  This is a unique property with a wonderful relaxed feel to it.  Also a perfect place to get some serious work done - its quite inspiring.

Lizzy was the best host, and we fell in love with her beautiful home in the best spot in Sydney.  
Her home is beautifully equipped with everything you need for a beach holiday, and Lizzy is just downstairs if you need anything. Tamarama beach is literally a 2 minute walk, and our kids spent a lot of time playing in the grassy patch if they weren't catching waves! We have had the best holiday and will definitely be back.

What a place!! What a host!! It s a dream, watching the beach earing the see lying on a dayboat bed. The place is huge and very close to amazing beaches and beautiful costal promenades... lizzie was a super host, very helpfull and carefull about us having a good time. 
The terrasse is superb
This place is marvellous!! We had a fantastic family time there we wont forgett

The big question for me is would I want to stay here again, and the answer is yes - in a heartbeat.

To watch the sun rise over Tamarama beach from the comfort of all the cushions in the 'boat' in the sitting room was a delight. Not an early riser? Don't worry, the lorikeets will have you up in plenty of time....!
Set between Bondi beach and Bronte beach which are easy to walk to. Superb local beach for family and easy to grab an uber to the city. really enjoyed the location and weather.

This place is pure magic! I had the most wonderful time with family and we had everything we needed in the house. The location the quiet and friiendly neighbourhood and the spectacular view of the ocean day and night makes this place a MUST to experience. Add to that a gracious host to welcone you and who is always around to assist. Highly recommended for families!

We had an fantastic stay in Lizzy's apartment. The location was excellent and Lizzy was so helpful and accommodating (making sure we had some breakfast provisions after we arrived late at night which was so very much appreciated). The apartment was more than spacious enough for our family of 5. The worst thing about this apartment was having to leave those amazing views behind when we left! I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone else and would stay here again.

Great place right on Tamara Beach. Very cosy and great host who kept in contact prior and through our visit making it very comfortable for us. Easy check in, nice walking areas & very close to cafe's Bondi and surrounding beaches, Bondi Junction for shopping and an easy drive to City. Big spacious apartment with beautiful views and good entertaining areas. And a nice day bed (boat) overlooking beach for the perfect afternoon nap.

We could have really beautiful time with my family in Lizzy's apartment.
The view was so wonderful that we enjoyed day and night at balcony.
For my 3 years old baby,everything is perfect. We wanna be back someday.
We really appreciate Lizzy's kindness and helpfulness.
Thank you for everything.

This is a fantastic apartment. The view is to die for. It’s very large. It has great facilities. And Lizzy is really helpful. We couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay. We came with 2 very small kids looking for a chilled out holiday in a cool area - this was perfect. Can’t wait to come back.
Lizzy's place is fantastic! Beautiful view of Tamarama beach and only minutes walk from lots of shops and restaurants on Bondi road. Apartment is full of beautiful touches. Highly recommended!

Great host, hospitality and place to stay at. We had a group of 5 and there was plenty of room. Would definitely recommend for anyone looking to visit Sydney and the eastern beaches.
Thanks Lizzy!

If you’re looking for a truly magical stay in Tama this is the place. During our week long stay we never wanted to leave the apartment that was peaceful and zen like. We enjoyed our mornings checking the surf from the balcony and then walking barefoot to the beach for multiple swims. 

Truly it’s a slice of heaven.

Lizzys house is an amazing spot in sydney.
Tamarama is so nice and close to bronte pool that i personally lovee
Also lizZy have alot of details with us. She is always responding in a small time!
The house is just perfect!
We are looking forward to come back
I really love this place and fully recomend it!!!!

Such a wonderful stay! Lizzy’s apartment is the best place to  stay in the Eastern Suburbs. Convenient, very clean, perfect for families and just above the beach! Last but not least, Lizzy is a great host, making sure we had all what we needed and very responsive. Thank you again for a wonderful stay!

This apartment is excellent - location is a stone's throw to the beach, coastal walk and great cafes, fantastic view, and a really well kept, comfortable and complete apartment for a family.  Thoroughly recommended

Lizzy's place is just perfect! It is beautifully decorated and has a lovely calm and airy atmosphere. Very well appointed with everything you would need and a lovely balcony and day bed boat over looking the beach to chill. We took our two small children and it is a very baby/child friendly space. We were very comfortable and I would definitely recommend Lizzy's place and should we be in Sydney again we would definitely stay there.
The house was beautiful and Lizzy was the most attentive host. The view from the house was heavenly and the neighborhood was perfect. Highly recommend!
Lizzy is a wonderful and kind host,  her plac is walking-distane to a great park and beach, fifteen minute to bondi beach as well
We loved staying at Lizzy’s place!  The location was fantastic!  The view from the apartment was spectacular!  Super cool Home and we especially loved the boat “couch” in the living room!

name: IPANEMA LUXURY PENTHOUSE with MAID
summary: IPANEMA Penthouse is located in the most famous and trendy area of Rio de Janeiro. It has a unbreathtake view of the Lake, Redimer Christ, Pedra da Gavea and 2 Irmãos mountains. Great for 2 people! If 4 (we can put 2 inflate coushion at the floor)
interaction: I simply love receiving people and I use to host personally my guests and then leave them apreciate and relaxing with exclusivity their own private area of the apartment.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Eu sou Designer, adoro viajar e adoro os finais de tarde na praia em Ipanema. 
Sejam bem vindos ao Rio de Janeiro.

I am objects designer and plastic artist and love travelling. I simply love hosting people! Welcome in Rio!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Cesar goes well above and beyond to make his guests feel comfortable. He personally greeted me, recommended some restaurants (I went to one and had amazing sushi) and showed patiently how the pool and refrigerator work. The apartment looks even better than on the pictures. I especially loved the rooftop with 360 view. I really had a good chance to relax and unwind in Cesars place. One thing to mention is that the apartment has a great energy all round, I would highly recommend it to anyone.

This is my second time staying at Cesars place, this time for about a week. The reason I came back is because besides marvelous view and the setup the place has this amazing energy which is especially rejuvenating after a stressful work period back in NYC. Wherever you are in the apartment your eyes are almost constantly facing the green if the trees, water and the Christo statue in the background which is very relaxing. 

During my starving was around 35C in Rio so I spend a good time in the pool which is very deep, clean and enjoyable. Tivesse so good I barely went to the gym which is literally minutes away. 

Cesar was super kind, he is definitely not your regular Airbnb host. As he knows I like to cook potatoes he showed me how to cook Mandioca Brazilian potatoes with shrimps. It was an unforgettable cooking and gastronomic experience. 

I will certainly come back again next time I am in Ipanema.

Excelente localização, seguro e tranquilo. O apto é maravilhoso. Excelente vista e as fotos correspondem fielmente ao local! O anfitrião é muito atencioso, pontual e tudo muito bem detalhado! Vale a pena mesmo!
Muito obrigado!

O apartamento do Cesar é um sonho carioca! Com o Corcovado, o morro dois irmãos, a mesa do imperador e a lagoa todos no seu campo de visão! A recepção foi primorosa, a Patricia é uma assistente que nos ajudou em tudo além de preparar um delicioso café da manhã! (Voltar da Sapucai cansado e ter um café fresquinho com um pão de queijo quentinho te esperando não tem preço!!!) Recomendo fortemente e iremos voltar com certeza! Simplesmente sem pontos negativos! Obrigado Cesar e Patrícia!

Cesar é super tranquilo, educado e simpático.  Fez de tudo para tornar a hospedagem agradável. O apartamento é incrível! Super de bom gosto e com uma das vistas mais lindas que já vi no Rio. Super recomendo!!!

O espaço do Cesar é incrível.
* Bem localizado, com facil acesso a Lagoa / praia / restaurantes.
* Seguro (rua sem saida).
* Tem uma vista vista da Lagoa / Cristo Redentor que é única
* Bem decorado
* Reservado (voce fecha a porta da cozinha e tem o apartamento todo pra voce)
* O café da manhã da Patricia torna a experiencia ainda mais exclusiva.
* O Cesar é super atencioso e disponível, possui diversas dicas do bairro e do RJ que nos ajudaram no passeio.

Voltarei, com certeza!

Very nice and well decorated appartment with a speechless view of Rio! We didnt have the chance to meet Cesar but he was very available and helpful by phone and (Hidden by Airbnb) . He is for sure a super host!

Was an excellent experience right from the start. Cesar was very attentive and took care of our well-being more than he needed to: he offered breakfast and even supper during our stay. He was also giving great recommendations to restaurants. Would go back again!

This was a great apartment in Rio waking up every morning to a great view.  Great location close to the nightlife but just far enough away to avoid the noise.  I highly recommend this apartment to anyone.  The pool was a nice touch on hot days.

Ceaser's place is very much a rooftop penthouse. Beautiful original art pieces and wonderful furniture. Great to hangout on the roof or in the pool. Best of all though is the service his housekeeper offers. Breakfast every morning. Laundry items. And ceaser even cooked us a meal one day. Lovely place. Luxury living! We will be back
A estadia foi otima e nós só temos a agradecer ao Cesar pela simpatia e hospitalidade. O apartamento é incrível e super bem localizado. Foi uma ótima experiência e esperamos poder repetir em breve.
Cesar esteve sempre disponível, disponibilizou alguns itens extras, que tornaram nossa estadia ainda mais agradável. O espaço é maravilhoso, com uma vista incrível.

Cesar was an amazing host and his place was great! He was super helpful with suggestions and very accessible any time we needed anything. We ended up trying all the restaurants he recommended and weren’t disappointed! The place is fantastic and we made daily use of the pool and rooftop patio, both which had amazing views and were kept very well. We would definitely stay there next visits to Rio!

Cesar’s place was fantastic.  The views could not have been better. The apartment is designed beautifully and located on a quiet tree lined street. Ana, the maid, made us a wonderful breakfast every morning. Wonderful Airbnb!

Demorei bastante tempo a encontrar um hotel/apartamento  onde ficar no Rio de Janeiro. 
E não podia estar mais satisfeita com a escolha que fiz. 
O apartamento é exactamente o que se vê nas fotografias, super cool, num bairro bastante acessível e charmoso de Ipanema, rodeado de boas ofertas. E claro, a mencionar a vista indescritível para a Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas. Saudade!
O Cesar elevou a fasquia de Airbnb ao incluir pequeno-almoço diário na estadia. Um acto que muda a experiência e de uma simpatia irrepreensível.
Obrigada Cesar e anseio voltar muito em breve!   
Abraço, 
Mariana Colaço
Absolutely loved it - stunning place, superb amenities, great location and incredible views. Cesar is a great host - would love to stay again!

The view is FANTASTIC
The host is very very sweet
The pool and location is very nice.
thank you

Este lugar é único! O apartamento é muito confortável e tem uma vista incrível para o Rio de Janeiro. Fotos não fazem justiça. O café da manhã também é de primeira. A convivência com o Cesar é tranquilíssima e ele fez questão de que estívessemos sempre confortáveis. As dicas de restaurantes e turismo dele foram excelentes. Ele e a Ana também foram muito flexíveis com nossos horários.

My husband and I had a wonderful time at Cesar’s place. The location and condo are unique and the views are amazing. The condo is on a beautiful quiet street but within a short walk to beaches, restaurants, shopping, running paths and more. 

Cesar was a great host! He provided us with tons of helpful tips about the city, activities, and restaurants. He was easy to communicate with and always available for any questions we had. He definitely made us feel welcome, making us a great little meal when we arrived. 

To top it off, Anna, his maid, made us a traditional Brazilian breakfast in the mornings. 

Can’t say enough good things about our experience.

name: CHARMING PRACTICAL RELAXING IPANEMA
summary: CHARMING QUIET SAFE PRACTICAL 1 double bed + 1 single mattress if needed  WIFI - TV - Air Conditioning - Fans in all rooms - Washing machine American equipped kitchen 5 min of the Beach and the Lagoon Restaurants,Bus and Metro nearby walking!
interaction: You can count on me for an effective  comunication by E-Mail, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) or (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) or personally (if I'm in Rio), to guide you in all your practicall needs or touristic questions.
houseRules: Prendre soin de l apartement bien sûr ( c est chez moi, pas un hotel!). Eviter d´inviter des inconnus. Laisser le sable à la mer (robinet en bas pour les pieds...)... Maintenir la bonne énergie, bonne humeur!

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Native from north of France, Life leads me to Brasil 21 years ago and have been "Carioca" since 2001 - Living in the Marvellous City of Rio de Janeiro 
I evoluated from Computer Engineering to Yoga Teacher and now Conferencist,  Self Realization Mediation and Energetic Balancing & ThetaHealing Therapist.
Like nature, movement, dance contact, music (singer), Photography and cooking...
Each time more invested in balancing Body Mind and Soul, in everyday life!
I like receiving people at home and sharing what I like, and looking for making my guest feeling well in my apartment to enjoy their stay in a cool and secure way.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Christine was a great host from beginning; good communication, flexible checkin, answered any questions. Her apartment was a very peaceful oasis in a beautiful area of Ipanema. Apartment was larger than I expected, clean, comfortable bed, a/c and fans, wood floors, overall nice vibe and surrounded by Ganesha images. One direction was a few blocks to the beach, another to nice shopping in Leblon or for a jog around the lagoon. I did not need to take taxi anywhere, subway station was a few blocks away and everything I needed was within walking distance. I would highly recommend to a respectful guest looking for tranquility and a quality stay in Rio De Janeiro.
Absolutely no complaints. Very well kept, clean and nice apartment in a very good location. The area is very safe as well, and only about a 10 minute walk from Ipanema beach. I highly recommend it!
Great location in Ipanema, very safe too. Christine is very sweet and helpful.
On a guarded residence, pleasant apartment comfy and really well located,  very close to Ipanema beach and the lagoon. Kind of place that make you feel like home.

Muy buena & tranquila ubicación en el barrio de Ipanema, el apartamento es lindo y tal y como aparece en las fotos con todo lo que uno necesita para pasar unos días. Christine es muy simpática, flexible y disponible.

O apartamento é igual às fotografias do anúncio. Muito bem decorado e bem localizado em Ipanema, numa rua super tranquila.
A Cristiane foi muito atenciosa connosco, Recomendo a todos os hóspedes este apartamento.

L'appartamento e comodissimo e molto accogliente. Si trova in una strada alberata e silenziosa, vicino a ristoranti, negozi e molto vicino alla spiaggia di Ipanema. La zona é molto sicura. Christine é stata gentile, disponibile e solerte nelle risposte. Un' opzione raccomandabile.

Pasamos una muy linda estadía en el departamento de christine. Es muy limpio y comodo, tal cual se ve en las fotos.
Su ubicación es muy conveniente ya que esta a pocas cuadras de la playa de ipanema y también de la de copacabana y cerca de la estación de metro.
Christine fue muy amable, se adapto a nuestro horario de llegada y nos dio el departamento en perfectas condiciones.
Con respecto a Rio me gustaría conocer la ciudad fuera de la época de carnaval también, seguramente sea una experiencia totalmente diferente.

Our trip in Rio was really good, the city is amazing snd the Olympic atmosphere increased is beauty. The place is very well located on a backroad in Ipanema, which in my opinion is the best area to stay in Rio.

Regarding the flat location and value for money are the critical success factor. It was a really good deal seeing the prices durong the Games. The flat itself is decent, nothing fancy. It has some lacks here and there, but it's still good for a short time when you are travelling and spending most of the time outside.

Christine is really nice and helpful. She makes sure everything is alright and the communication with her is really easy and efficient.

Christine was an amazing host for us. We went to Rio for the Games and hence had HEAPS of questions about getting around, security etc. and she was very helpful in answering those. We arrived at midnight and had no trouble find the unit or getting in. Communication with Christine was fast and easy. The unit is lovely and very comfortable. GREAT location. Easy walk to shops, cafes, restaurants, the beach, subway etc. Ipanema is a lovely neighbourhood and felt very safe while we were there (and the people very friendly and helpful).

Great flat in a great location! The beach is a short walk away and Ipanema has a good choice of restaurants and is always very lively. It is also a great place to go all around Rio with the metro. 

Christine is a great host and suggested a number of nice places to go to!
Muy lindo apartamento, cómodo, cerca del metro y la playa.

A nice cozy apartment perfect for short stays in Ipanema.  I chose affordability over luxury and all my expectations were met.  Christine is very friendly and helped resolve a small issue I encountered in the apartment even though she was away on a trip.

Cést un trés bonne choix. Le appartement a resulté plus grand que sur les fotos et trés comfortable por nous. La cuisine est parfaitement compléte. Nous avons aimé le quartier parce que tout est proche, mais dans un environment vraiment tranquille. Christine n'etait pas à Rio ces jours-la, mais on nous communiquait tout le temps. Je recomende!


This is a good choice! The appartement is really bigger than in photos and has resulted súper comfy for us. The kitchen is fully equiped por enthusiastic chefs. We loved the neighboorhood because  is close to everything but in a really calm environment. Christine wasn´t at Río during our stay but we were communicated all the time.
Nice place to be hosted at. Cozy and practical.

name: The Porto Concierge - White Martin
summary: Totally renewed and fully equipped apartment two minutes ahead the Metro Station (Estação S. Bento) entrance. Excellent location to visit Porto by any means! Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay. Free luggage storage at The Porto Concierge - Welcome Center.
interaction: When you arrive you will be met by The Porto Concierge Service that will receive you for check-in and share with you tips about where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun. This service will be available for you 24/7.
houseRules: Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment. Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out. We request that guests leave the dishes and the kitchen clean and empty out the trash, there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. The apartment is cleaned prior to each arrival. Please, keep the apartment tidy and clean as reasonably possible during all the time of your occupancy. If you require extra cleaning during your stay, please contact us - we will arrange it. PLEASE TAKE CARE of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment's equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment's appliances and equipment please call. The neighbors appreciate some peace and quiet as do our guest, please keep the noise level to a minimum between 22h and 8h. Use the place as if it were your own. Check out time is at 11h. The person that made the reservation will be responsible for any issues dur

host.about: The Porto Concierge ajuda os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.The Porto Concierge ajuda os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.

reviews.txt: We've been lucky to be the first ones to use the apartment!! All is new, great quality as per photos. Excellent location, really in city heart. We loved it and hope to come back soon. Thanks!

Cet appartement était vraiment superbe, très propre et très bien équipé! Beaucoup de lumière également! L'emplacement est vraiment idéal pour visiter. Il est très central donc tout se fait à pieds.
Merci pour tout!

Hi. The apartment is very nice as in the pics and situated in the perfect area - close to everything. It does not have heating as it states however as soon as we asked we were told they would bring us a heater asap. We were greeted nicely and introduced to the house and area. All in all very recommendable
Great communication with clean and neat apartment right in a great location. Thank you for everything!

We had a great time in Oporto. The apartment is in the centre and very easy to walk to all sites as well as just explore the streets. It is well furnished, comfortable bed, very clean and everything you need for a comfortable stay. A relaxing space to recoup after a big day and a nice perspective of the city from the small balcony. We will come again. Thanks.

The apartment is beautiful, immaculate and well located, a short walk from Sao Bento station and walking distance from most sights in Porto and the riverfront.  The welcome gift was appreciated, the kitchen was well equipped (although we ate out and didn't need to use it) and the apartment was exactly as described.  Isabel was a gracious host who kept in good communication.  There was a small issue with check-in (the concierge was late to drop off our keys) and if you are a light sleeper you may want to bring earplugs as noise from the upstairs neighbours tended to reverberate through the floorboards.  Overall, it was an excellent base for our short stay in Porto (far more authentic and beautiful than a hotel room) and we would be happy to return. Thank you.

The apartment is absolutely awesome, as you can see on the pics. It is in a great location to visit Porto. It was clean, the bed very comfortable and there is everything you need for a perfect stay. I would be definitely happy to return! 
Thanks Vania for being so kind and welcoming!
So far the place was great. It's well located, renovated decor, spacious and comfortable. It's also pretty well equipped. I'd definitely recommend that place for those looking for a cozy home.

Nice apartment with good location, we had a great stay there.
Be aware that there is no parking with the apartment, and we ended up spending  a lot of money on a parking garage. We recommend comparing prices for parking.

Tout à fait conforme à a description!Isabel a répondu à toutes mes questions avant notre voyage.
Séjour super.
Emplacement très pratique pour visiter Porto.
Très bel appartement, lumineux, bien décoré, propre, confortable.
Nous avons apprécier qu'Isabel mette à notre disposition un lit parapluie pour notre fils.
Petit bémol: le bruit de la rue! mais je crois que tous les appartements de Porto ne sont pas équipés du double vitrage.
Si je devais revenir à Porto, je retournerai sans hésitation dans cet appartement.

The apartment is just like the photos show. Very clean, confortable and bright. The location is perfect for visiting porto. The concierge who did the checkin was very nice and flexible for the meeting time. I recommend this apartment.

Our trip to Porto was great. The flat was in an amazing location that was very central. It was beautiful and very clean and the concierge service was wonderful at checkin. We very much appreciated the restaurant tips!

It was really nice! The apartament is in the city center and it's beautiful. It has everything you need and it's really new.
We stayed a weekend at Porto and we enjoyed it a lot. Such a beautiful city whith a big culture offer.
Although, it was really helpful the información about the city that fue agent told us.
Logement neuf. Nickel. Petit cadeau d'arrivée. Rue au coeur de la ville, animée, donc un peu bruyant parfois la nuit mais ça fait partie de cette vie de quartier. Très lumineux.
Apartamento muy bien situado, amplio, muy luminoso, limpio, bien equipado y perfecto para disfrutar Oporto. Tanto el recibimiento como la estancia fueron perfectas. 100% recomendable.

Our stay was very pleasant. The apartment was spacious and well equipped with fridge freezer, washing machine, hair dryer and kettle. The apartment was clean and located 3-5 minute walk from Sao Bento Railway station and 10 minute walk to the bus station. It is near all the major sites and a 15 minute walk to The Riberia with restaurants, boat trips and Port caves. 
The only suggestion would be for the concierge management, in that we were booked for a 15:30 check- in and were left waiting outside until 16:20 on the footpath/sidewalk until Louisa from the management company arrived, I understand traffic can be a problem, but would have appreciated a text or phone call as to the delay. I had to message the management service to find out any information and was only told someone was on the way - but no time indication.
We asked where would we find a grocery store and again Louisa did not have this information, nor recommendations. 
The door to the apartment jammed and she could not get it opened, luckily my husband was able to 'pound' on the door to help us get in. When we tested the door to get out of the apartment again, she was unable to open the door. If my husband had not been with me, I or any women would not be able to get in or out of the apartment. Louisa said she would report this problem and hopefully, it will be resolved before the next people arrive. 
I would recommend this apartment when visiting Porto for location, and general facilities in the apartment.

Isabella and her team are very professional and provided us any support and help.
The apartment is very nice and located in in center of Porto .

We had a pleasant stay and warm welcoming t the city by a nice reception, a city map and gifts. 
The street is a little bit noisy, you should make a compromise between quietness and distance to the city center trade off!

There are only two points that you should notice before choosing this apartment: check-in is flexible, but after 14:00. 
2. Under the house rules, the host requests to empty out the trash. It has been indicated that there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. We could not find it, on your check-in do not forget to ask the reception to show it to you!
We had a very nice stay. The apartment is very spacious, clean and comfortabel. We were friendly welcomed and the apartment is in a very central location.

Great location really close to the station and in the middle of town. Based on previous reviews i was expecting a noisy street outside but after 10pm or so it's pretty quiet in that respect. One thing not mentioned in previous reviews however is the noisy floorboards of the upstairs neighbours. Being wooden and bare (the floorboards) we were hearing (and feeling the vibrations of) the neighbours very clearly and they stayed up till around 2am every night we were there.

name: Near Airport private room, 2 bedroom granny flat**
summary: Private room in a newly renovated 2 Bedroom granny flat with its own side entry, large bedrooms, tiled flooring, internal laundry and plenty of on street parking. Located on the border of Wolli Creek and Arncliffe its only a 10mins walk away from Wolli Creek train station, 1.2km walk to the Sydney International Airport and a short stroll to buses . Also close to supermarket, parks, water and Domestic Airport. Book a room for yourself or Book both bedrooms for family and friends.
interaction: I work shift work on a 24hr roster so if im not home or available to accept your calls please call my co-host/mum (Fen). Her English is limited but she will try to assist to the best of her ability. My family and i live on the upper floor and have been in the area for the past 15 years, so if you need any help with anything to make your stay more enjoyable please let us know.
houseRules: - Please keep the common area clean - Keep the noise to a minimum after 10pm - Please be considerate to other guests

reviews.txt: Very close to airport, comfortable bed
Shuang's place was great. It had everything I needed for the Stay and was very clean. I had a small problem with the iron but Shuang had it fixed within minutes! Would definitely recommend.

Very clean and calm. We had one of the two rooms and shared kitchen and bathroom with another traveller (second room). Quiet nice place. Only a 15 minutes walk to the airport. Next time again :-) Thank you very much!
Shuang was very helpful and was very quick with his responses to any questions i had. Was clean and had all the things i needed to have a comfortable stay.

Shuang is a very organised and helpful host. all our questions had been answered quickly and accurate before our arrival. the room was spacious and clean with all the needs for our short stay. 
the location is near the airport and took us about 25min to walk there with heavy backpacks - easy!

definitely recommend Shuang!
Shuang was a helpful and kind host. The property was accurately described and very close to the airport. My stay was very short, but was perfect for my needs. Thanks Shuang!
It was a very pleasant stay. Thank you Shuang for your hospitality!
Beautiful home, cute little room perfect for resting your head for the night while traveling. Only $8 Uber ride from here to the airport.
Great!
It's very comfortable to live in this place.The bed is soft and clean.Shuang is a very kind and helpful person and i really appreaciate all his help for us.

Shuang's place was perfect for our overnight layover in and out of Sydney airport. It's easy to get to and a short walk from the train station which took us right downtown. It was clean and comfortable. Definitely recommend.

This was a quiet, extremely clean, and cozy place to stay after a 11 hr. flight, and was only 10 min. away from the Sydney airport (about $18 taxi fair). I found everything I needed from internet code printed with local maps. I had to wait for my ride to arrive and I was able to wait in the common room and was even given coffee. I highly recommend this very nice and private granny flat. Thank you for the welcoming hospitality! I will stay again if come back to NSW, Australia.

Shuang was very helpful in providing instructions and tips to getting to his place. The room itself is very clean, spacious, and modern. The neighborhood is pretty quiet and the person/people I shared the kitchen and bathroom with were very considerate and quiet. Getting around was pretty easy as it was only a 12 minute walk from Wolli Creek station and shorter walk to a few bus routes that will take you to Sydney or surrounding suburbs. My stay was very short as I was heading to the airport, and it's a relatively easy walk to the airport if you don't have too much luggage. Otherwise, it's an inexpensive taxi ride or short bus trip to the airport, which works just as well. Would definitely try to stay here again if I'm ever in the area again.
It was one of the best places that I have stayed in and I couldn't have asked for a better place and shuang was a wonderful host

The flat was very modern and we'll equipped, I only stayed for one night but it was a pleasant experience. Only downside was the bathroom wasn't that clean, maybe due to sharing with another airbnb guest, because the room was spotless. Thanks for having me to stay!
Very comfortable and clean room. Close to food shops and airport. Was a nice experience. I'd love to stay there again. Very lovely host. Thank u very much.

We stayed just for a short night but enjoyed our stay.
Very clean, tidy and modern apartment. A few minutes from the airport, around 15$ by taxi.
Thanks again
Very nice stay.  Shuang's room allows you to go in and out on your own schedule and is perfect for short or overnight stays.  Highly recommended!
Shuang's place was convenient, clean and tidy. We enjoyed our stay. Thanks, Shuang!

My girlfriend and I had an okay stay. the bed was clean and comfortable but there was no heat and Sydney was pretty chilly at night (~15C). everything was newly renovated but we still felt uncomfortable using the appliances.

name: Cute apt in artist's home
summary: We are renting a private basement apartment in our home. The apartment space is totally private, nothing shared. It has a separate bedroom, bathroom and kitchenette with mini fridge and coffee maker (there is no stove for cooking).  You will have use of a hair dryer. There are small windows in the bedroom and kitchenette area. The bathroom and kitchenette are all newly built. Full size bed sleeps 2 people. We cannot accommodate more than 2 people, sorry!
interaction: I live and work only a block away so I am almost always immediately available to meet your needs. I live upstairs in the building adjacent to the gallery spaces and my sculpture studio is a short block away.
houseRules: No smoking inside; please smoke outside only. Check in before 10pm. Try to be quiet with the front doors. Ask before using the laundry machines and plan to provide your own detergent. Separate recycling from your trash: paper and cardboard are separate from plastic, glass and metal. We appreciate if you take your trash outside in the bins provided. Please do have packages or mail sent to our house. Enjoy your stay!

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: While my wife Silvia and I have managed our airbnb rentals for several years together, I will now be the main contact in order to give her a break. So here is a little about me. I'm a metal sculptor, assemblage artist with a degree in Biochemistry, I love to make art, surf and play with my two young kids, eat good food and travel. But now that I'm a Dad, I don't  travel as much, so I let we the travelers come to me. The kids and I love going to the beach at Rockaway, art openings and going to cafes. You might spot my kids and I racing down the sidewalks in Bushwick on our skateboards.

reviews.txt: We really enjoyed our stay.  The apartment was nice and clean.  It was nice to have a little more space to settle into since we were staying for five days.  Silvia was very helpful and able to recommend great places to eat and visit.  The location is great as it is in a fun neighborhood and an easy ride to the city.

Silvia was a great host.  She provides a map of the Bushwick area and is very knowledgeable concerning the neighborhood.  She's always around in case of emergencies but leaves you alone to do your thing.  Would rent again.

We had a great time in New York.  Thanks for putting us up Sylvia!  The apartment is cute, and as advertised and access to the L and JMZ was very convenient.  Sylvia provided us a great map of local things to do--we only wish we had more time to enjoy everything.  Tea each night, a little light reading from "Broken Land" and the comfortable accommodations were the perfect respite after long days of sightseeing. We'd stay there again!

We stayed six nights and I would not choose it again. The apartment really is in the basement, it is pretty dark, you never know what the weather is like until you leave the house, the concrete floors make the apartment uncomfortable (bring slippers), there is no closet to hang-up your clothes and I found the place smaller than it appears on the pictures. We did not enjoy staying there. Silvia is very nice and helpful.

The accommodation was exactly as described. Really conveniently located to several different subways line stations which makes getting around really easy. Bushwick is a really interesting and safe place that Sylvia is lucky enough to call home and that my partner and I were lucky to call home for just over 2 weeks. There were hangers for coats etc and a large chest of drawers for other clothes. The place was really well heated. Sylvia & Ty were extremely helpful and gave us an insight into the local happenings. We would definitely stay here again.
We enjoyed our stay very much. Silvia was very responsive and helpful, the bed was comfy. Thanks!

We had a great time in Silvia's cute basement apartment.  The space is small but cozy, and the neighborhood is colorful and convenient to other parts of Brooklyn and Manhattan.  Silvia provided us with a map of restaurants, shops and art galleries in the neighborhood, and she even gave us directions over the phone when we got lost trying to find the Brooklyn Flea.  We enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay with Silvia again.

We stayed at Silvia's place for a weekend, she was very kind and responsive. The basement is cute and has a character. We didn't spend much time exploring the area, but there are plenty of choices for food and drinks and Silvia has prepared a list of them.  
Thank you Silvia.

I had a Wonderful stay!!!
Very sweet people who I like alot!!!
This was a great way to have meet 2 wonderful new friends!!
Thanks again!!!
Crews

Staying with Silvia was very nice.  I felt quite comfortable and safe.  The apartment was very clean and nicely furnished.  We didn't have a chance to spend time with Silvia and her husband, but they were very welcoming and Silvia gave us lots of tips for things to do in the area.  I would stay there again for sure.

My girlfriend and I had a very pleasant stay at Silvia's.  All of my expectations were met or exceeded.

She was friendly and helpful - available if we needed anything but also gave us privacy.  

The place was cozy and clean.  There was no air conditioning downstairs, but there are windows near the ceiling that can be opened for fresh air. 

I would definitely consider staying with Silvia again.  Thank you!

Silvia was very nice, as was her apartment. I will say that Bushwick has an edgy-ness that was a bit surprising at first but when you look a little closer there is a lot to love. I had an amazing time in the area and Sivila's apt was very central.

Thank you Silvia!

Keith

Just one word to describe my bnb experience with Silvia: Easy! From the beginning, she was available and friendly. The place is fairly close to Manhattan (15min metro distance) and safer than it looks at the first sight. I have slept like a baby. I would have liked to stay longer. Thanks Silvia!
I truly ejoyed my stay. Silvia gave me my privacy and the apt was well kept. If I had to come back I would not mind staying there. I recommend her.
We had a great stay at Silvia's! She's a gracious host, and the place was clean and cozy, thanks!

Hi, I stayed at Silvia's place in Brooklyn, it was great. I had never done a airbnb stay before and the place met all our needs. The water pipes were a tad loud at night, but I am a light sleeper. She also has a very cute daughter. Thanks Silvia! I will be sure to stay again next time.

Cosy, comfortable and convenient. The place is small, but private and quiet (well, very little street noise but bring earplugs if you're a light sleeper because of the pipes). Close to both the L and the M so very easy to get in or out of midtown or downtown Manhattan, or hipster Williamsburg, etc. A very good find, and we're thankful to Silvia for hosting us!

This basement apartment is exactly as it appears in the pictures. The place was clean and private with fully functioning facilities. Silvia was a great host to me and my boyfriend and was available before and during our stay to answer any questions or concerns. She was really helpful getting us acquainted with the area and provided a map of all the nearby restaurants and attractions. I highly recommend this place for a single person or a couple who seeks an affordable, private place in a cool, diverse, Brooklyn neighborhood.

Silvia was a gracious host, very easy to work with.  The apartment was clean and private. The hot shower was a blessing after long days of trekking around Manhattan and Brooklyn.  The only problem we had was with the neighborhood.  We heard a terrible street fight late on Saturday night, and we didn't feel very comfortable exploring the area during the day.  Other than that, I would recommend Silvia's place if you are looking to stay around the Brooklyn area.
Great place in a very convenient location. Would definitely recommend to anyone. Particularly pleasant on really hot days because it stays very cool. Hope to stay again next time I am in Brooklyn.

name: Charming apartment in Santa Teresa
summary: Recently refurbished 3 bedroom apartment in the bohemian neighbourhood of Santa Teresa in Rio de Janeiro. This airy and light apartment is close to many trendy bars, restaurants and cafes and has a supermarket 5 minutes walk away.
interaction: I'll be contactable through Airbnb at any time if you have any questions though please note I am based in the UK.
houseRules: No pets. No smoking.

host.about: I am a Brazilian/Italian national who has lived in London for the last 30 years. I speak English, Portuguese, Italian and Spanish fluently and like the rest of the world, I love travelling and meeting people from different parts of the world. Other interests include foreign film, reading, astrology and working out (pilates and yoga).

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: El departamento es muy acogedor, su decoración es cálida y bonita. Cuenta con 4 dormitorios y  camas para 5 personas, tiene una buena pieza de cocina y artefactos  para preparar comidas (aunque sólo tomamos desayuno ahí) , un baño bueno y un medio baño (WC) que es un apoyo, pero requiere cierta ventilación directa, que hoy día no tiene.

Fantastic, spacious, warm, comfortable and centrally located apartment.  With excellent bars and cafes just around the corner, we loved the location.  A short easy stroll to the main restaurant area and tourist shops. We didn't use the local supermarket as purchased stuff down by the metro and took a taxi up the hill.  The photos are very good and show just what the apartment is like.  Branca and Tereza were very helpful and responsive to questions.  Would definitely stay again if we ever get the chance.  Thank you.

Eu amei muito a estadia no apartamento de Branca! Super lindo, a decoração maravilhosa, super limpo e com uma vista maravilhosa! Branca foi uma ótima anfitriã, sua amiga Tereza também, que nos deu um ótimo suporte, dicas de passeios e nos tratou super bem. Recomendo muito e espero voltar outras vezes.

Branca's flat is great! It's in a wonderful around up in the Bohemian neighborhood of Santa Teresa. We were there during carnival- it had great proximity to the blocos without being right in them. The flat had plenty of space and Branca and Wanderley made sure we had everything we needed at all times. Would recommend 100%!!

Branca's apartment is very well located in charming Santa Teresa, with incredible views of the city. Everything is very clean and well-organized. Wanderley, the apartment manager, is super friendly and responsive. He sat down with me at check-in and helped orient me on the map. We had a lovely time here and would certainly come back!
El mejor apartamento en el mejor barrio administrados por los mejores anfitriones. Todo 10 puntos!

El apartamento es un sueño:  ambientes amplios, exquisita decoración y preciosa vista a la ciudad, gracias a su ubicación en el mejor barrio de Río: Santa Teresa! Banca y Wanderley fueron excelentes anfitriones y respondieron a todas nuestras inquietudes e hicieron nuestra estadía allí perfecta. Muchas gracias por todo!

name: Tente Glamping du Desert 3
summary: This spacious one bedroom apartment has a bonus space with two extra beds as well as a fold out sofa.  Close to the park, the subway, museums and restaurants.  This apartment is the perfect quiet getaway in the middle of Manhattan.
interaction: We are not usually around and you'll have the place to yourselves.  We are available by phone and email all the time if you ever have questions or concerns.
houseRules: All the facilities are included ( cleaning , towels , bed linen , heating , WIFI) . Limited to two adult guests only.

host.about: We live in San Francisco and spend time in New York as well.  We also have another place in Northern California in the country we spend time at.  I'm a private pilot and Paul is quite an accomplished ceramicist, though he does non-profit management consulting by profession. I run a retreat center ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) and am a computer consultant some of the time and real estate investor other times.  We have a cat who stays at our house here in San Francisco when we travel.  She is very, very affectionate and easy to care for.

reviews.txt: We stayed in the brownstone for 4 nights and had a lovely time.  The apartment was spacious enough for us (a family of four) and the location was amazing.  You are steps to Central Park and to the 86th subway.  There are wonderful restaurants and shopping nearby if you need that but the small kitchen is fine for quick snacks and breakfast.  It was especially nice to sit on the little patio to eat my toast and tea and even with the NYC humming around you it is lovely to have an outdoor space.  Chas answered all my many questions with great patience and care...he really wanted us to have a wonderful time and went beyond the call of duty by even sending us links to good places to watch big soccer matches.  The apartment was clean when we arrived and had the basic things we needed such as towels and extra sheets.  While not the cheapest option on BNB it gave us all a wonderful bed to sleep in, space to spread out in when needed, and a fantastic location!  We even found street parking for the full 5 days!  Picking up the keys was a breeze and we left a few basic things for the next guests to enjoy from the corner store.   It is a gorgeous street to stay on and felt very safe. Thank you so much Chas!  We hope to return one day soon.

Our stay in New York at this apartment was vastly superior to staying at a hotel.  The location is perfect particularly for those wanting access to Central Park and the museum mile (Guggenheim etc) but it was also a revelation to explore that end of Broadway.  The apartment is lovely and has everything.  We especially appreciated the study nook and ability to use our laptop with wifi access and the well equipped kitchen for easy prep for meals (and deli close by makes it so easy to stock up).  The lounge, bedroom and bathroom are all in good, comfortable condition.  The little balconies and view of the courtyard topped it off.  A great experience and thoroughly recommend.

After a small glitch with the house keys, which was straightened out straight away, our stay was perfect. The apartment is lovely, in a great neighborhood and right by the subway. Even my husband. who is very picky, gave it a two thumbs up ! Our hosts were attentive and gracious over the emails and the whole thing was easy and pleasant. We'd definitaly book again.

It's hard to imagine a more authentic and enjoyable NYC experience than the one we had staying in this UWS apartment. There are so many details -- from the art on the walls to the spices in the kitchen -- that make it feel like a home away from home. The apartment is small but imminently comfortable with high ceilings and patios that make it feel spacious. The unit is off the street (on a courtyard)  so it was very quiet (that  and the comfortable bed made for great nights of sleeping). It's a beautiful street, just off Central Park and just around the corner from the subway. There are abundant restaurants within a 5 minute walk and the best coffee in NY (Joe's) is only about two blocks away. Chas was a great host who was quick to answer all our questions and make our stay as enjoyable as possible. We had our two sons with us (ages 10 and 12) and the living arrangements were ideal for a family our size. Thanks, Chas!

We just spent Christmas week at the apartment with our two daughters (aged 2.5 and 1). The space was well stocked and furnished and the location was perfect. It's not a huge apartment but the lofted ceilings give it a nice, open feel. Central Park, the subway, a convenience store, a wine store, and Starbucks are all within a block or two. When I first booked the reservation I was unsure about the process to get the keys, but it turns out I had no reason to be worried whatsoever. It was very easy and worked out well. Chas answered questions promptly and is a great host. We hope to be back soon!

A great experience - Chas was a good communicator so picking up the key went exactly as planned (a good thing for a first timer!), the apartment was just what we needed and the location (and quiet street) really were fabulous.

I don't think we could of asked for the most perfect spot to stay at while visiting NYC. This home is close to everything we wanted to experience while being in the city.... the park, museums, great places to eat at, major subway lines to take you to midtown and lower Manhattan, etc, etc,.  The apartment was so nice, quiet, comfortable, and cool to come back to after being out and about ( we had a couple of days during our stay where it was very warm ) and that was a plus !  Both Paul and Chas were quickly responsive and accommodating to any questions or needs we had. All in all, if you really want to get a great NYC experience, this beautiful UWS retreat is the way to go.  Thank you Chas and Paul !!

My Mum and I recently spent 11 nights at Chas' Upper West Side apartment. We had not used AirBnB before, but the whole process ran very smoothly. Both Chas and Paul were quick at answering emails and provided us with plenty of information re local grocery shops etc. The pick-up of the keys was also very simple. 
The apartment is in a great location, half a block from Central Park and close to several subway lines. Only up one flight of stairs, which was good because there are no lifts! 
The apartment was very well equipped with everything you need for a stay away from home - bedding, towels, full kitchen etc. It was a bit smaller than it appears in the photos and could do with a lick of paint, but was very clean and had plenty of storage. Also, keep in mind that the beds in the loft may provide a bit of a problem for some guests - definitely best for kids. 
Overall, we had a great time at Chas' apartment and would definitely recommend it to anyone wanting to visit New York!
We had a great time in the apartment! Location was great with just steps to Central Park and the subway right around the corner. Would stay here again for sure! Thanks!

Our stay in the apartment on 87th St was really wonderful. The neighborhood was cosy and felt safe, the subway was only steps away and it was close both to the park and to the shops and restaurants on Amsterdam and Broadway. It couldn't have been better. The apartment itself was nice and roomy for being in New York, and had everything we needed. The kitchen was small but well equipped and the beds were comfortable. Chas was very helpful and answered all our questions very quickly. Overall, it was a really wonderful stay!

We're grateful to Chas and Paul being were flexible and accommodating with our arrival / departure times and our queries over the first day or so.  
The description and pictures were accurate and the apartment was well-maintained and very neat and clean.  The mezzanine floor is best suited for storage or sleeping arrangements for children or understanding teens or adults.
The upper West Side felt very safe at all times and the apartment was on the same block for the subway stops for B and C trains and a short walk to restaurants / cafes on Columbus and Amsterdam.  Overall, the apartment offered a genuine feeling of how it would be to live as a New Yorker, rather than a hotel tourist.  Highly recommended.
The reservation was canceled 46 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We felt like home during a wonderful week in October. I have been to NY repeatedly and I was always reluctant to return because of the hotels which I didn't like at all. Now there is a reason to come back again: the cozy apartment, the lovely neighborhood, close to Central Park and subway made our stay just perfect. Thank you very much!
Clean well maintained apartment in an excellent location. Good restaurants close by and subway one block away.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment was perfect for my first visit to New York and as a first-time Airbnb user. Chas was always quick to respond and very helpful. The images of the apartment are accurate and the Upper West Side area was great - close to Central Park, a heap of stores and restaurants, away from the noise. The first floor does have a low ceiling which is ideal for smaller children. The apartment was always warm so it was a treat to come back home after a long day out in the cold. Would definitely consider staying here again.

Mil gracias Chas por dejarnos compartir tu hermoso apto. Nos hemos sentido como en casa. Muy comodo y confortable, con todo lo necesario para sentirse a gusto. A pesar de las extremas temperaturas que nos tocaron, la calefaccion estuvo excelente. Y una mension especial a la ubicacion, a pasos del Central Park y al Subway. Esta demas decir que volveremos siempre y cuando no permitan. Nos sentimos unos perfectos Neoyorquinos!!!!

The apartment was exactly how we imagined it to be: cosy, but spacious by New York standards. The heating is excellent and the building is very quiet with almost no ambient noise whatsoever; again, a rarity in New York. The apartment is located in a beautiful street lined with old Brownstones, so would be perfect for those who prefer a genteel New York neighbourhood rather than an urban, grungy one. It is located a few minutes' walk from the subway and a block back from Central Park. Great spot, and the owners were easy to arrange accommodation with.
Our host was wonderful.  Everything was easy, the apartment was beautiful and the location is perfect.  We LOVED it.
A perfect spot 1 minute walk to Central Park and underground!! Highly recommended!! The location is very quite!!

name: Renovated Modern Apartment with Cathedral Views
summary: Sit with an espresso in the extensive open living space and take in the city through floor-to-ceiling balcony doors. The quiet, sunny flat boasts modern furnishings and sits on the corner of the building with cathedral views.
interaction: Я буду очень рада помочь Вам с вашей поездкой. Могу подсказать интересные места, рестораны и т.д.
houseRules: Dear future guests, Let me know your arrival time as soon as possible so that I may arrange a smooth check-in. Check-in time is from 17:00/5pm; in case of early arrival we will try to store your luggage (depending on availability of cleaning staff and prior groups). Check-out is at 11:00/11am. For your ease, I will meet you directly at the property. There is an additional fee of 20EUR for check-ins after 20:00/8pm; 30EUR for check-ins after 22:00/10pm and 50EUR fee for check-ins after 24:00/12pm (paid in cash). I ask you to treat this place the exact same way that you would want a guest to treat your own home! HOUSE RULES -	I do not host groups who are all 25 years of age or younger. If your group is 25 years of age or younger, please do not place a reservation without written pre-approval from me. Failure to do so will result in termination of your reservation and full charge of your security deposit. -	All guests entering the apartment at any point during the time of your reservation

reviews.txt: Sophie was an amazing guest. We were her first guests ever and her apartment in Barcelona could not have been any better. It was very clean and in a great location. She was incredibly flexible with check in and check out times. We couldn't have asked for a better place to stay.

A generous and warm welcome from Sophie. The apartment is newly furnished and decorated, light and airy, comfortable and spacious. The kitchen is well-equipped (even a Nespresso machine!) and beds very comfortable. It has some great views of the old city and is perfectly situated for exploring Barcelona - if only we had stayed longer!  Next time...

Appartement fantastique en plein centre de Barcelone, à proximité de la Sagrada Família. L'appartement est vraiment conforme à la description et nous y étions vraiment à l'aise avec deux enfants, dont un en bas âge. Grâce à la réactivité de Sophie, nous avons pu organiser notre voyage en moins de 48 heures. Sophie à aussi été très prompte à régler un petit problème de chauffe eau en quelques heures. Communication vraiment facile. Séjour sans encombres. 

Les jouets, les livres pour enfants, ainsi que le mobilier pour bébé (chaise haute, baignoire, lit parapluie) ont vraiment été la bonne surprise qui nous a permis d'organiser notre séjour en toute simplicité.

Nous recommandons chaudement cet appartement pour une famille. L'appartement était suffisamment grand pour deux enfants/personnes supplémentaires. Nous y retournerons sûrement!

Sophie was very quick with responding and made us feel very welcome. The appartement was fantastic: bright and sunny, very clean and complete. Good beds, enough towels, nice kitchen. Very nice for us, a family with 3 children. The locating was also very good: close to a metro station and the Sagrada Familia. Nice neighbourhood with lots of shops and nice small parks.

Sophie was an impeccable host, and her apartment is by far the nicest I've ever stayed in in Barcelona. It's large, light, well equipped, beautifully decorated and very well located. Sophie also went the extra mile, ensuring that the apartment had a cot and high chair for a our son, and even letting us take the travel cot with us for a couple of nights, as we still needed it. Such amazing hosting! Highly recommended.
Sophie's apartment was a lovely spacious and very clean place with great soft towels! Perfectly situated for walking to the Sagrada and with metro stops nearby a good base for exploring Barcelona.

Спасибо, София! Ваша квартира нам очень понравилась. Бронирование было очень оперативным.
Также отдельная благодарность за то, что когда мы забыли ключи в квартире, София очень быстро приехала и помогла нам. Ресторан который вы нам порекомендовали так же оставил отличные впечатления. Мы с радостью вернёмся в Барселону ещё раз и остановимся в вашей квартире!

Огромное спасибо, София!

Notre séjour à Barcelone s'est très bien passé. L'appartement de Sophie est très bien situé et très agréable. Il ne manque rien. Sophie nous a beaucoup aidé à organiser notre arrivée (parking...). Je recommande vivement ce logement à d'autres voyageurs.
The place was very nice. Spacious and it had all the things we needed in an apartment. Definitely somewhere I wanna stay again

A estadia no apartamento da Sophie foi ótima!
O apartamento era exatamente igual às fotografias e a cozinha estava muito bem equipada.
A Sophie é uma anfitriã muito disponível e atenciosa. Ajudou nos com a reserva de estacionamento para o nosso carro durante a estadia.
Aconselhamos vivamente! 
Obrigada por tudo :)

The first thing to note about this apartment is just how impressive it is on first entry. The current photos really do not do it justice. It’s large, filled with sunlight in the day and extremely comfortable. Sophie has decorated it tastefully and with a lot of thought, providing a lovely selection of art and deign oriented coffee table books for you to peruse. 

Location wise it’s perfect, being a 5 min walk from the Sagrada Familia and there are a number of nice bars and restaurants in the direct vicinity of the apartment. It is also within easy reach of two central metro lines although we never once used public transport instead opting to rent bikes from a nearby rental shop (Barcelona is simply one of the best cities to ride in with you pretty much never having having to ride on the road ever!). In any case the main sites of the city are all within easy reach on foot. Its’s a 20 min walk to Place de Catalunya and Gothic Quarters and we very much enjoyed our gentle stroll’s home after a night of eating and drinking. 
 
Sophie herself could not have been more accommodating. She’s was great to communicate with on the lead up to our stay and welcoming on our arrival. We didn’t want for anything on the trip at all. 

If you book this apartment you will not be disappointed!
Good food, great sites. Location had a beautiful view. Clean. Large space.

Lovely apartment in a great location in Eixample, very close to the Sagrada Familia, Girona metro and good bars and restaurants. Great host who was really friendly and helpful with us getting to know the city. Thank you Sophie!

Je recommande vivement ce logement !
L'appartement est superbe, spacieux et confortable.
Sophie est très sympathique, et nous a donné de précieux conseils sur Barcelone.

Excellent location in Barcelona
Spacious apartment with great view
Guests are greeted promptly
Refrigerator has staples left from previous guests which prevents the need to buy sugar, salt etc. for a short stay

Sophie was an amazing host. We was firstly met by Inna who invited us on behalf of Sophie. She was very helpful and welcoming. We received a customised booklet before our arrival which pretty much had everything we needed such as all the local restaurants and so on. All our needs and more was catered for. The location was also perfect and a 10 minute walk to Sagrada familia. I would highly recommend Sophie's spacious apartment.  

A very happy Airbnb'er :)

Absolutely wonderful apartment with the most quaint view of an old church right out the window. Very well appointed, clean, organized. Sophie went above and beyond with an informative packet of how, where, and what to do. Wish we could have stayed longer. Thank you Sophie and Inna!
Einfach nur großartig!

The apartment is spacious and very well kept. It was great for our family , with a large parents room and two double bedrooms for the kids. Being close to the metro makes it very convenient to go everywhere

name: Jardim Botânico Gourmet 2 bdroom
summary: Very comfortable, well located (in the safest neighborhood), 2 bedroom (1 double bed, 3 single bed), 2 bathrooms, wifi, tv, fully kitchen, remodeled with lot of style. The gourmet kitchen is modern and very well equiped! A spacious balcony is a plus in this great place to stay!
interaction: Estou disponível 24h, indico guias especializados, roteiros de charme, assistência para crianças pequenas, motoristas etc.
houseRules: Respeitar vizinhos e horário de silêncio.  ->>>>>>Desligar ar condicionado e luzes ao sair.  ->>>>>>Qualquer objeto quebrado, manchado ou avariado deve ser comunicado IMEDIATAMENTE ao anfitrião ou através do AIRbnb. • Cuidado com as malas de rodinhas a fim de não arranhar o piso. • SEMPRE usar tábua de corte para não arranhar a bancada da pia! • O número de hóspedes na reserva deve ser respeitado. Não são permitidos convidados ou visitas.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Trabalho com locações de imóveis mobiliados há 7 anos e AMO ser HOST. 
Valorizo o conforto acima de tudo e tenho satisfação em buscar meus hóspedes no aeroporto, ajudar com pequenas mudanças; indicar restaurantes ou planejar passeios. Posso ajudar no que for preciso! 
Além de produtora de locações e mãe, faço trabalhos como curadora de arte e produzo a Organização Socio Cultural “VAGALUME O VERDE  - VOV” cujo BLOCO de CARNAVAL desfila há 14 anos na Rua Jardim Botânico, sempre às terças-feiras de carnaval. 
O VOV  nasceu no Horto Florestal e tem a sustentabilidade e preservação ambiental como diretrizes. Estudamos e pesquisamos diariamente como usar de maneira responsável o que a Natureza nos proporciona e deixar um LEGADO para gerações futuras. 
Além de equipe de coleta seletiva, plantio de mudas para neutralização do impacto gerado pelo desfile (compensação ambiental), mão de obra local e reutilização de materiais, 
em 2013 Implementamos a norma de certificação da “ISO 20121- Gestão em Eventos Sustentáveis”. 
Em 2015, recebemos o prêmio Serpentina de Ouro, por melhor organização. Em 2019 vamos estrear nosso novo maestro com uma bateria inovadora e arrepiante. Vem!

reviews.txt: Nice apartment! We needed an apartment during carnival and this was perfect. Good bed, bedroom had good AC. Two bathrooms. Big kitchen with huge fridge. Very big balcony. Nice common swimming pool. The neighborhood was even nicer than expected. Right next to the Jardim Botanico, many restaurants in this street and in the Rua Pacheco Leao. The Zona Sul, an upmarket supermarket indeed around the corner (corner Rua Jardim Botanico and Rua Pacheco Leao). We very much liked La Biciclette for breakfast, it is a French bakery on the corner of Rua Pacheco Leao and Rua Von Martius. Also we liked the restaurant SOBE in the Rua Pacheco Leao. Good starters, great view on the Christ as it is partly an open-air restaurant. Roberta and her sister were very nice for us.

Roberta muito atenciosa,  disponível, tranquila e sensata, aceita conselhos, e isso para mim conta muito...Apartamento super confortável no Jardim Botânico que eu amo, e a posição do apartamento é maravilhoso, tem o que precisamos dentro de uma casa... rua  tranquila. perto de tudo. Espero de voltar logo, e com certeza para o mesmo lugar . Obrigada Roberta pelo carinho e atenção . Bacio

Obrigada Roberta sempre pela hospitalidade e carinho que você cura seus hospedes. Como sempre muito gentil e totalmente disponível com seus clientes, segunda vez que retorno pode acreditar agora será minha segunda casa no Brasil na minha Cidade Maravilhosa, meu ponto de referencia . Apartamento perfeito localização DEZ. Beijo enorme...
Everything as described. Nice location, felt very safe. Everything you need is close. Wifi was a little bit spotty at times, but wasn't a big deal.

Apto super bem localizado em um dos meus pontos preferidos do Rio. Bairro super seguro com acesso a mercados e comércio em geral. Do lado do Jd Botânico, perto da Lagoa e Vista Chinesa. Fácil acesso aos outros pontos da cidade. Da lavanderia vc tem vista ao Cristo Redentor, uma inspiração.
O ap é grande e arejado. Cozinha equipada com vários utensílios. 
Gostei mto e recomendo.
The apartment was in a great location & a friendly neighbourhood with lots of great places to eat.

Cantinho super agradável e fofo no Jardim Botânico! Localização muito segura e de fácil locomoção, além de vários bares e restaurantes descolados no entorno.
Anfitriã muito hospitaleira e prestativa. 
Foi nossa primeira experiência com o Airbnb e adoramos a diferença entre hotel e uma casinha!!! =)

We enjoyed our 4-day stay at this apartment, while we were moving house in Rio. The apartment is cute and stocked with everything you need to actually live in it, which I appreciated - good kitchen. Roberta was responsive and accessible. If you're visiting Rio, it's a great base, in a lovely neighbourhood. Two things to keep in mind - it's really quite a small space (standard for Rio, but perhaps a surprise for guests who arrive from outside Brazil) and you hear a lot of street noise, so it's perhaps not ideal for light sleepers. We would stay here again!

O apartamento entrega tudo aquilo que promete embora seja um pouco barulhento por conta do ônibus que passa na porta. Mas esse é o preço pela localização maravilhosa.O playground é ótimo , com direito a piscina.

name: SUPERHOST-LARGE&CLEAN-Near Pierloti
summary: You will never forget this holiday. If you want really enjoyable holiday you should choose my home. At first read reviews and ask me all questions what you want to learn about Istanbul I'll help you all your travel. ADVANTAGES: 1-Safe place-metro-bus every 6 minutes 2-24 Hour help desk 3-Istanbulcard for transportation 4-Pick up from airport,taxi drivers cant cheat 5-Unlimited wifi, Big kitchen and living room for you 6-Breakfast, fruits, tea, coffee, deserts, nuts all free 7. Towels, shampoo
interaction: Every night i make black tea or rosehip tea or coffee. You can eat fruits, regional Turkish foods, desert  free !!
houseRules: You can smoke and drink everywhere

host.about:
I'm from İstanbul.I'm industrial engineer at Istanbul Technical University. I like meeting with new people from different countries so I believe that sharing my apartment with my guest is a good opportunity to know more people all around the world. I like travelling. (I visited Sevilla, Granada, Madrid, Barselona, Athens, Skopje, Sofia, Beograd, Budapest, Prag, Moscow, Krakow, Sarajevo, Chisinau, Lisbon, Napels, Amsterdam, Wienna, Milano, Foggia, Rome, Frenze, Venice, Thaossaloniki, Kavala, Thassos, Beirut, Lviv, Gent, Brussels)
You will never forget this holiday. If you want really enjoyable holiday you should choose my home. At first read my all reviews and ask me all questions what you want to learn about Istanbul and other things. I'll help you all your travel.
