reviews.txt: Kubilay K. est une personne tres aimable vous etes chez lui bien plus que chez vous. Cette experience a ete un vrai plaisir et je repartirais chez lui des que possible. Il prend soin de vous sur tous les plans. En plus le logement est dans un quartier tres vivant et anime. Ce sejour a ete une reussite et je me demande comment voyager sans airbnb. Si vous venez a Istanbul allez chez Kubilay et vous toucherez du doigt cette realite.

Kubilay is now my best friend in Turkey :) I can't exagerate for his hospitibilty. Despite of my insistance he paid for my dinner, dessert a nice tea afterward and paid for the minibus to the shisha place. Frankly, it might have exceeded the rent I paid. I wanted to go to Kurdistan but non of information was available in English he called the bus company for me and then he came with me to the bus terminal then he barganed on my behalf and I got a cheaper ticket as the result. He didn't leave until he made sure I went on my bus safely. In my return also his friend came with me to Taksim to make sure that I'm getting the right bus to Sabiha airport. I highly recommand him if you want a host who is also your tour guide and freind. Also the prices in the shops are considerably cheaper near his place rather than touristic area like Taksim and you are a 2 TL away from Taksim, so his place is ideal in any sense.

Большое спасибо Кубилаю от всей нашей семьи за тёплый радушный приём, удивительную прогулку по Стамбулу, щедрость, внимательность и гостеприимство! Мы очень хорошо отдохнули в его чистой, светлой квартире. Если получится, с радостью приедем ещё раз.

Kubilay. Thank you very much from all of my family for the warm welcome, amazing trip through Istanbul, generosity, care and hospitality! We really enjoyed our time in your clean and cozy apartment. If this works out, happy to come again.

Oleg, Alena and Egor.

Kubilay est un hote tres agreabe, qui se soucie de vous, vous donne de bon conseil. Il nous avait prevu le petit dejeuner et tous les soirs nous etions acceuillis par du the et des fruits secs.
il est tres facile de se rendre dans les differents lieux interessants de la ville.
a ce prix la, nous ne pouvions rever mieux. n hesitez pas a le contacter.

If you choose an apartment Kubilay - you heard right!
Kubilay a wonderful person with a big heart!
Our little son really loved it!
He has prepared for us a wonderful breakfast! :) Helped us to find the way to the historic center of Istanbul, gave us IstanbulKart to travel around the city.
In his apartment, we feel at home :)

We stayed at Kubilay's home for 3 nights with my boyfriend.
Kubilay has been a great host, very kind and helpful, he made us tea, breakfast and we even had dinner with (so we could discover some delicious specialities).
It's a very nice person and he makes his best to make you enjoy your stay.
The room is very clean and tidy, the bathroom too, nothing to complain about.
The flat is not in the center of the city, so you'll have to take the bus for 15/20 minuts to get to Sultanahmet, but it's worth it because Kubilay's neighborhood is nice, not turistic it's more like a typical turkish area, so you can taste real turkish food (and it's really, really cheap, and delicious).

We really enjoyed our stay in Istanbul, don't hesitate and book this room!

Woooooowww!!! Kubilay is the best host you can find in Istambul, we spend a great time in his house and in the city. He´s so kind, attentive and you can talk any topic with him. Also his breakfast and teas are the best, considering we went in winter. We ask a lot of things and he always  help and response us what we need. We highly recommend 100 % to stay with him. Kubilay, the best experiencie,  thanks for everything!!!!

W (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) wwww!!! Kubilay es el mejor anfitrion que puedes tener en Estambul, pasamos un agradable tiempo en su casa y en la ciudad. Es muy amable, atento y ouedes hablar de cualquier cosa con el. Sus desayunos y sus tes son lo mejor, considerando que fuimos en invierno. Le preguntamos un monton de cosas y siempre nos ayudo y nos respondio lo que necesitabamos. Recomendamos 100% alojarse con Kubilay, la mejor experiencia! Gracias por todo!!!

Kubilay is really good host! Welcoming, gentle and polite. Our baby loves to play with him!:) The apartment itself is clean and calm. It takes a bit time to get to the city centre (Taksim or Eminonu) but it's ok for us. I definitely would recommend everyone to stay with Kubilay.

anyone going to instanbul and looking for a beautiful place to stay at and make a friend then please stay at kubilay HIGHLY RECOMEND
EVERYONE to stay at his place thanks a lot kubilay u r the best if u ever come to visit punjab please stay with us

The stay at Kubilays place was very nice. Everything was clean and the check in worked very good. Kubilay is very nice and helpful. A perfect opportunity to visit a non touristic part of Istanbul. Thank you.

Host: Kubilay is an easy-going & really nice guy! That translates to a host that's pretty much as relaxed & helpful as u want him to be. And he gives u space if u want it too.

House and room: Kubilay pretty much opened the house to u. Room is basic.

Location: a good suburb about 30-40mins bus ride away from Taksim, depending on traffic. Pretty convenient; 1 direct bus to the Spice Bazaar. 1 direct bus to Taksim.

Highly recommended to those who wants to experience local living.
Kulibalay it's a very good Guy and i have spent a very good travel in this apartment. If You have some question kulibalay can explain you how discover the city.
Very nice room in a good location. Kubilay is also very accommodating. Would stay here again

Kubilay is a very warm, friendly guy that you will feel confortable to get along with. The apartment is well equiped and in good transport connection to hot spots in Istanbul. It's my first time to stay in a host family but honestly this experience is very impressive and I think his hospitality will never fail you. 
在房主請求下寫中文給華人朋友作為參考哈
房主非常友好 warm而且樂於助人 剛來到伊斯坦布爾有什麽不懂的都可以請教他 住宿條件不錯 位置雖然離市中心有一段距離但是交通非常便利 家門口就有兩路巴士直達市中心和景點區不用轉車他還會提供交通卡給你使用 他還會請你喝土耳其的茶還有土耳其特色的早餐 去旅遊有當地人熱情幫助感覺非常棒 你可以跟他用英語交流 還可以問他一些日常的土耳其語怎麼講 在你下一次還去他那裡住的話 他還會給你特別的優惠 我下次再去土耳其還會選擇他的住宿 這是一次非常棒的體驗

Kubilay is a really sweet guy and a great host. He pointed out landmarks on our way to the apartment so we wouldn't get lost when we ventured out on our own.  He answered a thousand questions about Turkish politics and life in Istanbul.  He is really considerate of guests with maps, keys to the apartment and  an Instalbulkart  in the guestroom.  The apartment is really clean and is in a great location. Everything you need is nearby. The bus is close by and is easy because the stop is one end of the line and Emminou is the last stop at the other end.  It's a very nice place to come home to after a day of being a tourist.

It was a pleasure to stay at his. He helped me out with busticket, brought me for dinner and then tea with his mate. The room is ok and the flat is clean and peaceful. I would highly recommend stay at Kubilay's.

I and my wife stayed at Kubilay's for 4 nights and are really glad we did. Kubilay is a wonderful guy who'd go extra mile to make sure you are comfortable. He gave us Istanbul kart (public transport card in Istanbul). He even woke up at 4 in the morning to make sure our early morning Taxi has arrived on time. He provided pointers for places to visit and eat. He recommended a restaurant nearby and we had the best Iskinder kebab there!

Gaziosmanpasa bus stand is few minutes walk from Kubilay's place. Gaziosmanpasa has direct buses to Taxim Square and Eminönü (all the main tourist destinations are near this stop). 

If you want to stay in a non-touristy place, eat best food, want to do some shopping at local price, want to experience Turkish hospitality definitely stay at Kubilay's.

Thanks for wonderful time Kubilay!

I had a great time here! Kubilay is a really great host who provides you with a nice room, great company, and great conversation. The apartment is also nicely located in a place where Taksim and Eminonu are just a bus ride away, respectively. I stayed for 5 nights.

Kubilay is a helpful and caring host. He gave us clear instructions on how to get from the airport, met us at the metro station and took home. A nice variety of fruit and nuts was offered for breakfast. He provided my mum and her friend with a nice room with two single beds, they had also had a choice to sleep in separate rooms. The accommodation is clean with everything you need. It's quite close to the city center and cheap to get there with a transport card that Kubilay provides. Kubilay is an open-minded well-travelled person who will give you all necessary information on sightseeing and not only. Though my mum doesn't speak English, he managed to explain to her where to find traditional hammam and massage so she and her friend were very happy. Thanks for a great stay, Kubilay!

Замечательный заботливый хозяин! Четко объяснил, как проехать к нему от аэропорта, встретил у метро, был все время на связи. Комнаты чистые со всем необходимым. Кубилай предоставил моей маме и ее подруге выбор: спать в одной комнате с 2-мя кроватями или в разных комнатах. Несмотря на то, что моя мама не говорит по-английски, Кубилай сумел объяснить ей, где находится хамам и массаж, чем она была очень довольна! Расположение квартиры удобное, добираться до центра легко и недорого с транспортной картой, которую предоставляет Кубилай. На завтрак Кубилай предложил нам фрукты, орехи, сыр и вкусный чай со сладостями. Спасибо ему большое за радушный прием, информационную поддержку и готовность помочь в любую минуту!

We couldnt have asked for a better host! It was our first time in Turkey and we were pretty nervous esspecially since our flight arrived at 1 am. Kubilay met us at the Mcdonalds nearby and walked us to the apartment. We felt very safe. We wished we could have stayed longer. Kubilay is a great guy!

name: Bright, sunny quite room Bushwick
summary: A bright, sunny quite room in the heart of bushwick/ridgewood border.  7 min walk form the Jefferson L train which brings you directly into the Manhattan in about 20 min including 14th St Union Square stop.
interaction: We can let you know great spots around the neighborhood to eat and drink and recommend things to do in the city too! We've lived here for 5 years so know a thing or two about local spots and attractions.
houseRules: respectful of our neighbors and our space

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: young responsible adult

reviews.txt:
had a wonderfull airbnb experience stayin at louise place, she wasn't there but her sister eleanor is absolutely nice! it's a quiet house with a real room! louise is sharing her own room and it was the best bed i ever slept in through airbnb!! 
you really feel at home and eleanor let you all the privacy you need! the place is 5mn walk from the train bar & pubs and there's a deli and a laundry 1bloc away the neighborhood is quiet and you have an amazing view on manhattan's skyscrappers!
will definetely recommand this place and will be back there, if needed! 
thanks!

Elle, Louise's sister who rented out the room, was more than accommodating during my stay!

The apartment was beautiful and I wish I could stay there forever. The room is in the back and extremely bright and sunny as well as quiet and private.

name: Quaint Polynesian Style Cabin on a Working Farm
summary: This adorable cabin includes a cute bathroom complete with shower/toilet/vanity.  The walk-in closet is a nice touch to store away personals. There is a sitting area, the sleeping area, the outdoor kitchen and a shaded patio that serves as an outdoor living room.  Views of the ocean, the Hawi windfarm, Maui all set on a working farm just a short walk from downtown Hawi!  The décor is set in a Polynesian style, bright, cheerful, and peace filled.  Wifi enabled.  Created with Pure Aloha!
interaction: We are knowledgeable about things to do, and places to visit.  We have provided a full array of literature depicting the best of adventures and wildlife interests.  Where to go and how to enjoy our island is totally left up to the imagination of our guests.   We stay out of your business unless help or assistance becomes necessary.  Staff is available from 7 am to 9 pm daily.
houseRules: - Medical Cannibas Compliant - No wheelchair access - No Housekeeping Services under 7 day stay - Kona Blend Coffee and Coffee Maker provided - Please leave unit in the condition found, including furniture placement. Sweep and mop floors with the supplies provided to aid us in keeping our costs and fees down for everyone. Wash all dishes, pots, pans, and serving utensils, strip the beds and place linens and used towels on the bathroom floor.  - No visitors without prior approval from management. - This is a working farm.  Farm machinery may begin at 8:00 am and ends by 6:30 PM daily (should complete quiet become an issue please note that this farm is surrounded by farms on all sides and we have no control over the hours of their machinery use.  No local codes require such.  Farming can be a 24hr affair!  YIKES!) - No covered parking - Quiet time after 10pm.

reviews.txt: A very clean cottage in a secluded farm. We got fresh eggs and muffins from the owner. If you're not afraid of 'water beattles', it's perfect ;)

Stay here if you want a relaxing, beautiful, and unique Hawaiian escape. Wonderful quant town with plenty of nearby beaches and great sight seeing. The farm is lush and absolutely beautiful and everyone is wonderfully hospitable. it made seriously consider moving here.

I had a wonderful peaceful stay, Loved the cute little town about a mile away. Everything was great. I will definitely go back there on future visits and highly recommend this as an alternative to an expensive resort stay.

Great place! As someone who has backpacked Europe and traveled all over the US, I can say this place is outstanding. Affordable price and it still feels like a hotel. You get your own cabin, so nice privacy. Everything feels like brand new, very clean. Les worked hard to attend my necessities and communication was never an issue. Beware that it's a very rainy place, so I'd recommend bringing your umbrella. Location is not prime, so you will need a car... But I kinda enjoyed being away from all the madness. Overall, you will get your money worth it.

L'emplacement était parfait, un petit chez soi sur une ferme. Rev. Lev. nous a très bien accuilli avec des fruits frais et des oeufs. Le village de Hawi est a quelques minutes à pieds et on peut y trouver des belles petites boutiques et de très bons restaurents.

The place is really lovely. The sleeping area is clean and comfortable and the outdoor kitchen and lounging area made it possible to spend much of the time enjoying the fresh air and beautiful landscape. It's a little ways to town but a nice walk. I forgot an item there and they were very helpful in arranging to get it back.
beauiful setting,outside kitchen,lover our stay there

What a treat to have found Rev. Les' cabin... arriving there after a long day of solo travel in planes and cars I felt like I found a sanctuary. 
The cabin is very tidy, and everything is new and well maintained. The bed firm and very comfortable, I slept very well the three nights I was there. 
Although Rev Les informed me of possible daytime farm equipment noises, I never heard them as I was gone most of the days. The nights were quiet except for occasional rains when windows must be closed, there is a fan that keeps things cool and air circulating. This area of the Big Island is lush and tropical and with that beauty comes an abundance of life, so attention must be taken when preparing or storing any kind of food, as the ants will be quick to make an appearance. Sweet Hawi town is nearby with all its charms, and has a lovely Saturday farmer's market under the shade of a massive banyon tree. The fresh organic farm eggs Rev Les left for me were so appreciated, and the kitchen did provide for all I needed to fry them up for a delicious (Website hidden by Airbnb) were the kind and helpful communications I received from Rev Les. Mahalo for a delightful first stay on the Big Island! c:

Situated on a small farm, it is very convenient to Hawi.  Only about a mile, so you can walk to town if you like.  There are a few roosters in the area but otherwise was quiet and peaceful.  I'd never used an outdoor kitchen before but it worked great.  Patio furniture and table on the lawn in front of the cottage provides lots of outdoor living. The bathroom is small but clean and like new.  We'll be back.
Great place to stay, enjoyed the view from our room.

I highly recommend staying here if you want a peaceful and tranquil stay.  The farm Les lives on is full of fresh fruit and the sound of the trees moving in the fast wind is therapeutic. I will definitely be back for some more paradise.
Great place on a working farm, nice & peaceful, with a nice outdoor kitchen area with all the utensils & cookware you'll need. But bring your own food.  Would definitely stay again.  :-)
Highly recommend. Very private and comfortable

Rev. Les''s place is super, its a working farm and you have plenty of privacy at your own little cabin, there are a few on the property.  Everyone is so nice and its a great starting point to explore Hawi and Pololu valley.

The cottage is very neat and clean, like new actually.  It is quiet and yet close to Hawi town.  Nice yard with comfy outdoor furniture and shade awning.  This was our 2nd stay with Rev. Les.  Great communication and he is very quick to respond to any need.
This little cabin was perfect. It was super clean, the bed was great, and the bathroom was nicely renovated.
Rent this place!  If you are looking to explore the North Kohala coast there is so much to do, or not.  And Rev's cottage is perfect for both.

Rev. Les was a great host, greeting us upon arrival and available when needed. Communication throughout was great. The place was super clean and cozy. We would always come back and explore more of the northern part of the island.
Nice spot, beautiful birds and quiet. In a lovely town with lots to do.

My fiancee and I visited Hawi and staying at Rev. Les's gave us a great home base for exploring the surrounding area. The property is nice and felt secure with the gated entrance. The cabin was super cozy and felt like home while we were there with plenty of space and a very comfy bed. 
Rev. Les was responsive and a pleasure to talk to when we met him. We will look back fondly on our stay in Hawi and would love to come back!

name: Chic 2BR in Festival Quarter by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the beautiful panoramic windows, sleek decor, and fully-equipped kitchen. Located in the Quartier des Spectacles, known for the renowned Contemporary Art museum - Place-des-Arts, you're close to an array of wonderful local shops and restaurants.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
houseRules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

host.about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

reviews.txt: Great experience, treated us well
Perfect location had a little Hiccup  with finding which apt was mine wasn't listed in guest details other than that I enjoyed my stay super clean neat .....I want a condo now haha

Location of the codo is very convenient for the seekers of "hub of attraction"
The condo is as perfect as shown in the pics and even better.
Flatbook made the stay very pleasant because of their 24/7 prompt responses and assistance.
Very well recommeded.
Our stay was great. Access codes were emailed to us before arrival, location was very convenient and the apartment was clean and well furnished. Wish every Airbnb was this easy.

We loved staying at this condo! The condo was clean, spacious and in a great location. The host responded to our questions within minutes and provided us with everything we asked for. We definitely want to stay at this condo again the next time that we are in Montreal.

Logement parfaitement conforme à la description. Tres bien situé et tres bien desservi. Communication très facile avec le propriétaire. Je recommande fortement cet appartement pour decourvrir Montreal.
Tout était comme nous l'attendions

Close to downtown Montreal. Had a wonderful stay at this location! Brand new condo, extremely clean! We had a great time at this air bnb!
Will definitely stay here next time we are in time.
Super easy check-in/check-out process. Great spot and location, very clean, everything necessary for a good stay.

The Sondra group replied to any questions I had promptly and thoroughly.  The apt had all the amenities you could want, great wifi, and great suggestions for what to do and see in Montreal.  
The location was perfect as it was in walking distance to Old Montreal, downtown and Rue St Dennis.
They even left a nice gift for my birthday in the apt for when I arrived!  I highly recommend them for your stay in Montreal!
Mike White
We received lots of info prior to our stay and everything is well thought out. Location was great and the space was exactly what we were after.  Great!
Great location and nice unit.

Lovely condo that looks true to the photos and is in excellent condition. Kitchen was well appointed with the basic things we needed. Beds are a bit noisy and bedding is nice to look at but cheap quality so not very comfortable. Note that it is a great, central location though is on a somewhat seedier block of Ste. Catherine so you will see homeless people hanging around the church across the street from the condo often. We didn't have any issues though. As well, the smoke detector was off the wall and not working when we arrived, but I received a prompt reply via email from Sonder with an offer to fix it ASAP. Overall a good place to stay in downtown Montreal.

하얏트 호텔과 1.5블럭 정도 거리, 번화가와 가까운편
시설 깔끔하고 수건 등의 요구사항도 잘 들어줌

We enjoyed our stay in Sonder's place. The check in was easy and the apartment is really well located to get around the city. You can walk both to the Plateau area and the Old Town. 

The apartment also had everything we needed for our stay and we where able to eat some evenings at home when we did not have the energy to go out. One of the beds squeaked quite a bit so if you are a light sleeper it could be a bit hard. I would recommend a stay at the apartment.

Incredibly inflexible and unhelpful. Had to cancel a trip due to an illness. Very much understand no refund being made available as it was a last minute change. That being said, I did not expect to be charged cleaning fees for an unused apartment that had been cleaned prior to our arrival. 

AVOID

Great location close to everything! Only a few short blocks to the Just For Laughs festival and Place des Arts. Walking distance to the entertainment area of Rue Saint-Denis, Old Montreal and numerous other attractions.
Condo was new, very bright, very clean and modern in a secure building. Easy access instructions. Easy and great communication with the folks at Sonder. 
Hope to stay here again someday.

Horrible time entire family had to shower at ymca
Spent more time on the phone being passed around from rep to rep and low ball offers of compensation
Disgusted

This apartment is really well located! Super easy check in and check out. The apartment is so nicely decorated, super well furnished and extremely clean. I wish there was a little more of lights in the rooms.

name: Allotja't en un elegant i lluminós pis modernista al costat de Passeig de Gràcia
summary: Deixa't seduir per l'encant dels paviments de mosaic i els alts sostres artesonats d'aquest elegant i lluminós apartament modernista  ubicat en un edifici classic rehabilitat i  a tant sols 30 metres del Passeig de Gracia
interaction: Check in done by ourselves or by our friends of barnacheckin Restaurants and cafes recomendations Barcelona information.  NEED TO KNOW: If you arrive at the evening there is aLate check in fee:   >19.55 10€.   >21.55 20€.   >23.55 30€. >1.00 ask for availability Tourist tax to be paid at arrival (2,48€/person/night,  people older than 16) Due to some bad experience we reserve the right of admission to groups of boys or girls of less than 30 years without good references.
houseRules: Please take care of apartment like yours In the apartment you will find some instructions on using electrical appliances. Do not throw towels, napkins etc ... in the toilet Smoking is NOT allowed in the apartment. Please respect the hours of rest of the neighbors (22.00 to 8.00) Private parties NOT allowed Help us save energy. Turn out the lights and AC when you are not in the apartment. Decorative fireplace, forbidden to light fires Tourist city tax to be paid on arrival day: 2,25€/person/night.  People older than 16 Thank you En el apartamento encontrarás unas instruciones sobre el uso de los electrodomesticos. No esta permitido fumar en el apartamento. Por favor respeta las horas de descanso de los vecinos ( 22.00 a 8.00) Fiestas privadas NO permitidas Ayudanos a ahorrar energia.Apaga las luces y el AC cuando no estes en el apartamento No tirar toallitas, compresas etc... en el WC! Chimenea decorativa, prohibido encender fuego. gracias

host.about: Hi we are Lluis and Lali, we have rehabilitated this luminous apartment at heart of Barcelona. If you come to our city, this is a fantastic option, premium located, to enjoy your stay. See you at BCN :)

reviews.txt:
The appartment is situated near the public transport and the great shopping street "Passeig de Gràcia" with a lot of shops, cafés and restaurants.
 
Due to the central proximity the appartement is perfect for a sightseeing trip in Barcelona (10 min to walk to Plaça Catalunya, 2 min walk to the taxis and the bus stops).
 
The appartment is newly renovated, with modern furniture and a beautiful old tiled floor and stucco work in some of the rooms.
 
The automatic air conditioning for manual temperatur setting is very comfortable.
The conservatory (winter garden) is a additional room with a view in the courtyard (the view is not very spectacular but it is very comfortable there). Since the appartment is in the city center there is no fabulos view from none of the windows - but this does not matter at all.
 
There is also a Nespresso coffee machine in the modern kitchen (bring the capsules by your one or there is a Nespresso shop 100m away).
 
We can fully recomand this special appartment and Lluis as perfect host in this wunderful city.
Muchos gracias Lluis!!
 
Marcella and familiy

 *   * 



Das Appartment ist in unmittelbarer Nähe vom öffentlichen Verkehr und der grossen Einkaufsstrasse "Passeig de Gràcia" mit unzähligen Läden, Cafes und Restaurants.




Ideal für einen Sightseeing-Aufenthalt in Barcelona, da zentral gelegen (ca. 10 min zu Fuss zur Plaça Catalunya, 2 min zum Taxi-Stand und Bus-Haltestellen).


Wir waren zu 5. für drei Tage in Lluis Wohnung und haben uns sofort sehr wohl gefühlt. Lluis war bei der Schlüsselübergabe bereits vor Ort und hat uns gute Tipps für Barcelona gegeben. 



Die Wohnung ist neu renoviert, modern eingerichtet und hat wunderschöne alte Böden und Stuckaturen in manchen Zimmern.

Es hat eine automatische Lüftung: Die Temperatur kann manuell eingestellt werden (sehr angenehm).

Der verglaste Raum („Wintergarten“) ist ein zusätzlicher Raum mit Aussicht auf den Innenhof (die Aussicht ist jetzt nicht wirklich atemberaubend, aber es ist sehr gemütlich). Eine schöne Aussicht gibt es von keinem Fenster aus, da sich die Wohnung Mitten in der Stadt befindet - Stört aber nicht.

Es hat eine Nespresso-Kaffee-Maschine (Kapseln selber mitbringen oder 100m von der Wohnung gibt’s einen Nespresso-Shop).


Wir können die Wohnung und Lluis als Gastgeber nur weiterempfehlen.

Muchos gracias Lluis!!!


Marcella and familiy

Apartment´s location is top, just off Passeig de Gràcia. The apartment has a good & simple restauration preserving the original modernist floors & ceilings yet with modern kitchen and bathrooms.
Lluis was a great helpful host & proved to be very professional. 
Highly recommended.

Lluis is the perfect host, with great communication beforehand and a very warm welcome, he was also really flexible and understanding at check out too.

The apartment is really well located and as shown in the pictures very clean, tidy and stylish.

The apartment has great facilities, the kitchen is fully stocked (not the we needed to use it with so many great restaurants) and the shower was fantastic.

The beds are really comfortable, and the rooms very quiet (if you have the windows closed) and there is air con.

I would definitely book this place again and look forward to returning.
Huge thanks!
Very nice place to live...

The apartment is perfect. Great location, close to the metro station on ‘Passeig de Garcia’. 5-10 min. walking distance to many attractions such as Gaudi’s casa mila, Plaça Catalunya, Rambla st. and more.
The apartment is very big with all the needed facilities. It’s just been renovated and it’s clean and comfortable. 
Lluis was a great host. Help us with all our needs, even with ticket to Barcelona FC game. He was very flexible with our check-in and check-out times, and gave us tip for good restaurants in the area. 
Highly recommended. I’m sure you’ll enjoy its as we did.

Lluis' place was clean, well equipped and perfect for our four day stay in Barcelona.
The location of the apartment is fabulous and dealing with Lluis was seamless.
The photos and descriptions match reality to the T.
Thank you Lluis for having us.

Lluis is great. He was very responsive and accommodating. His apartment is even better than pictured. It is in a lovely area with many good restaurants near by (paco meralgo for example). Morning and evening coffees from his nespresso machine in the gallery were a treat. I would stay there again. Perfect for up to 6 people.

Lluis is a perfect host in every respect.
The apartment is lovely furnished with an eye on detail and good quality. You will find everything you could possibly need in there, starting from equipment (wlan, hairdryer, kitchen equipment etc.) to things like guides and books of Barcelona and Gaudi (in spanish) as well as  brochures on tourist attractions.

Lluis is very attentive and provides you with all kind of information.
Thank you as well for the flexible check-in/out.
The 6 of us were all happy to have chosen this apartment for our weekend-trip.
We can highly recommend it!

Me and my friends had a wonderful time at Lluis' apartment. The place was neat and clean, spacious and comfortable. A nice surprise was that the 'gallery' is really a balcony when you open the outside doors, so you can enjoy the afternoon sun. Lluis is a straightforward and very friendly host. The location is perfect for a weekend trip and I would definitely recommend this apartment to parties of 4-6.

I traveled to Barcelona with 3 other adults and my 2 young girls. The house was fantastic (as was Lluis); I would gladly stay here again. Everything was great, the only thing I would warn you about is the Master Bedroom being loud at night as it faces the main street (noise of cars driving by etc.).

We loved staying at this amazingly located, clean, spacious and hip apartment. We travel often and are very picky so trust this review. They thought of all the details and amenities and the kitchen was very well equipped (they even thought of paper towels, tin foil, plastic wrap) and all appliances were new. The beds were very comfortable and the bathrooms roomy for Europe. Our hosts were friendly and willing to help in any way to make our trip enjoyable. Two of our children got ill and the host even made an appointment for us with their pediatrician and emailed to check up on how the kids were feeling after. Now, that's service! Our only regret was that we didn't stay longer...

We were warmly welcomed by our host on arrival even though it was quite late at night.  The apartment was well set out, clean, tidy and large enough to accommodate 5 adults. Our host emailed us with suggestions for day trips.  The maps provided about local restaurants and nearby supermarkets were appreciated. This apartment is in a great location in Barcelona, although a little noisy some nights. Barcelona is a wonderful city to visit and we can recommend taking the time to venture further out of the city.

Lluis was a great host and very helpful! He met us as soon as we arrived, and showed us around the apartment, which was exactly as seen in the pictures. During our week's stay he e-mailed me info on local restaurants to visit, as well as was responsive to questions I had about the city. We traveled with our 6 month old, and he helped provide us with a crib on request. All in all, a great place to stay with a great host!

Thank you for having us again Lluis.
As on our previous visit, everything ran smoothly and we very much enjoyed your beautiful apartment, hospitality and flexibility with our late departure.
See you in Barcelona sometime soon.

Nous avons très bien été reçu par Lluis, le quartier est vraiment très sympa. L'appartement est vraiment très bien décrit et très agréable.
Lluis est vraiment très disponible et très gentil.
Nous avons passé un très bon moment.

Lluis is very prompt in providing information and responding to questions.  We were not urged or required to check in at any certain time, he is very patient and understandable.  There are more amenities than other places, We really did not expect the nespresso, made us feel very welcome!

La experencia ha sido fantastica, la casa esta muy bien situada, muy limpia y muy bien amueblada, no le falta ni un detalle. Lluis se ha portado muy bien con nosotras, ha sido muy hospitalario y muy atento.

Lluis and his wife are very nice hosts.The apart is stylish and cosy,very clean.Another advantage is perfect location.Just one thing to know it was a bit noisy at night from the street.But it couldn't change our impression from the stay!Next time we will choose the same apart!

Lluis' lejlighed er meget hyggelig og rar at være i. Lejligheden indeholder alt, hvad man har brug for - og lidt til :-) Beskrivelsen af lejligheden stemmer overens med virkeligheden. Lluis tager godt imod sine gæster og sørger for relevant information om lejligheden og omgivelserne.
Vi kan varmt anbefale andre at bo i lejligheden.

We had a wonderful time in this modern and clean apartment which is perfectly centrally located, nice shops in the neighborhood. The beds were very good. We liked the rain shower and the bath. Everything was very good and we would like to come back one time. Lluis is very helpful.

name: ☼☼ Lovely Colorful Studio ☼☼ Tsim Sha Tsui
summary: My Lovely Colorful Studio is in the center of the popular district Tsim Sha Tsui. There are many Yummy restaurants and shops, it's a very good location, It's the real Hong Kong. With 200 sqft and good design you will feel like home. It's located in a walk up building (2nd floor), right in the center of TST, less than 2min by walk from Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station. ★★★ Don't forget to add the listing in your Wishlist ★★★
interaction: We can communicate through Airbnb, if you need information, you can contact me. If you book my studio, i will send you an email with all the information you need to know, and contact information.
houseRules: . Earliest Check in time is 2 pm and latest Check out time is 10 am, not negotiable due to cleaning schedule. If needed, I will let you know all luggage storage options near my building. . Remember that you are staying in someone’s home, not hotel, so please take care of the apartment as it was your own apartment. . Be respectful of the place and quiet as I let my own apartment to travelers when I’m away, and I don’t want to have any trouble with neighborhood. . If smoking, please open windows, or turn on ventilation in the bathroom. . For shower, water heater, need to turn ON red button at entrance of the bathroom, then wait 10 min before shower. . Leave dehumidifier ON as often as you can, to avoid humidity in the apartment. . ALWAYS close the entrance gate door of the studio. . TURN OFF AIR CONDITION and LIGHTS EACH TIME YOU LEAVE THE APARTMENT.

host.about:
Hello i'm Hester, i'm from Hong Kong, I love my country and i hope you will like it!

I listed my studio in Airbnb cause i'm not often in Hong Kong as i work as an translator assistant, i have to travel in different place in the world. 

I love to travel, my favorite destination is Italy, I've been to Rome, Milan.. I love the food there.
I also often go to Singapore, i also live there, few weeks a month, it's amazing there..

reviews.txt: 房东很nice,屋子很舒服,交通位置非常便利｡

Amazing room in the center of Hong Kong. It was perfect for my stay. Hester and her friends were very responsive. I had issues entering the room at first, and Hester immediately took care of it. I'll choose this place again on my next visit.
第一次体验民宿感觉非常棒,房间也很好,很干净整洁,就是稍微小了点,不过性价比还是很高,位置去哪里都很方便
是来到香港之前做的最好的准备之一!很棒的体验!房子地段很好,就在尖沙咀的闹市里,是很有香港味道的地方,房间很干净,很新,各种设备也都很齐全,周围吃的东西也很多,茶餐厅,小吃,离便利店隔地铁都不远!房东人也很nice,帮了我们很多!下次还有机会来香港还会来这里!

It's a small but clean and comfortable studio. Convenient to public transportation and easy access to local restaurants. The owner gave us clean instructions to get here and replied quickly on any question. But if you have big luggage, it's a bit different to climb the narrow stairs as there is no elevator.

Very good communication and directions.
Bed so comfy after a long flight as was good hot shower.
Apartment air conditioned if needed, and quiet.
Enjoyed exploring the area very much, big variety of shops, cafes and walks etc.

Very central location easy to get to by A21 bus from the airport, stop at Kimberley rd. Place is small, Hong Kong standards, very clean, good shower and large flat screen. I definitly recommend this place.
入住前沟通很顺畅,房东和她朋友介绍指引耐心到位,房间干净安静,周围交通方便!
It is a very good
Good! 좁지만아늑한공간이었습니다
干净舒服
房间很干净,地理位置不错,步行5分钟不到可以到达地铁站,设施都很齐全 就是热水器不是很会用,其他都是满意的｡退房时间十点也太早了｡总体来说还是不错的,就是楼道没有电梯｡搬行李非常不方便｡
This is a wonderful experiences stayed at here! Hosted made everything simple and easy to do and respond very fast!highly recommended
Room was clean, located at the heart of TST, just nice for 2pax.
地点还蛮容易找的,而且也很方便,在尖沙驵的闹市里,楼下就有很多茶餐厅,商店等｡房间虽然麻雀虽小但五脏俱全而且很干净,就只是冲凉房的花洒坏了,须要用手握着｡退房时间还真的太早了,而且还蛮准时的｡｡嘻嘻｡｡｡整体上其实还蛮不错的,会推荐给朋友｡｡
Studio agréable, propre et fonctionnel. Bonne communication avec notre hôte.
The directions and information to our room was very accurate and we were kept informed the whole time.

It was a great stay! The room is very nice and clean.  Small size but the space is comfortable and enough for 2 persons. The location of the spartment is highlight, super easy to access to MTR subway, there are many restaurants surrounding and also cosmetic shops. I will stay there again for the next HK trip.
房間很乾淨,而且地理位置也很好,離地鐵走路差不多5分鐘,感謝您的房間讓我們有了一次愉快的香港旅行體驗!

Location and price made this the ideal spot. We were able to get to all the tourist stops and hidden gems within minutes. The MRT is around the corner making transportation a breeze. Rooms small, but it's a room with a bed so what else do you need?

If you're on a budget and are looking for a "local" feel in the heart of Hong Kong, this is it.

name: Stylish, spacious, central, shared rooftop terrace
summary: Stylish, spacious two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment, located in the central Eixample neighbourhood, just a short walk from the Old City and from the gorgeous Art Nouveau district. Elegant contemporary design, high ceilings and parquet flooring are combined with modern comforts: Wi-Fi, satellite TV, and a fully-equipped kitchen. The apartment is decorated with bright colours and is full of natural light. A shared rooftop terrace is open to all guests and offers great views over Barcelona.
interaction: Our team will be there for you whenever you need it. You can give us a call 24/7. If necessary, a member of our team will come straight to the apartment in order to help you with your questions.

host.about:
I live in Barcelona, a city that has captivated me from the start for its culture, history and beauty. I work as a full-time host for Aspasios and couldn’t think of a better job: at Aspasios we love to make our guests feel at home. A big part of our job is listening carefully to our visitors: we learn so much from them every day. We enjoy meeting each and every person who comes to stay with us, and want them to come back because of us. We pride ourselves on being professional and friendly at the same time. At Aspasios, we are passionate about hospitality.

My colleagues Jesus, Vanessa, Yenai, Paola and I are always on hand to help you make the most of your trip to Barcelona. We know this lovely city inside out, so can recommend plenty of restaurants, bars and activities that you might not find in the guide books!

reviews.txt: 喜欢来巴塞罗那的朋友可以考虑去他们家哦,干净､ 设施物品齐全､可以自己做简餐特别方便,附近有地铁站,或者步行到市区都很方便

시설도 위치도 모두 만족스러웠어요 
다음에 가면 또 갈꺼같아요
Great cozy apartment in a great location.  Easy access to Metro, restaurants, supermarkets and parking lot.

Great centrally located two bedroom apartment with lots of light. The second bedroom is quite tight, but for a weekend is no problem. The little enclosed balcony space is also very nice to sit in. We were also able to store our bags on site after checkout which was very useful. I'd stay again without hesitation.
Es un sitio perfecto para alojarse en Barcelona. Limpio, espacioso y bien conectado. El trato fantástico. Recomendable 100%
Great location. Modern interior, comfortable beds. This seems to be a property owned by a management company and not an individual. I could be mistaken, but I don't think so.
Convenient and centrally located appartment! can certainly recommended.
카탈루냐 광장에서 걸어서 10분 걸립니다 위치가 매우 좋았습니다 깨끗하고 안전합니다
Mas alla del alijamiento impecable y de la zona del departamento, queremos destacar la ayuda 24hs del anfitrion y su buena atencion en todo momento. Muy contentos de la eleccion
We loved this place. Great location, updated appliances, very clean. It's a beautiful apartment, but we hardly spent any time in it. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

A beautiful, clean, well equipped apartment in a fantastic location.  Exactly as described in the listing.  Check in was swift and efficient.  We were given plenty of tips and information by our host. Within 5-10 minutes walk of Plaza Catalunya. Plenty of shops and restaurants within a minutes walk of the apartment.  You must try the restaurant below the apartment if you stay - we had two excellent meals there.  Bring ear plugs if you are a light sleeper as there is a fair bit of road noise, as is typical for well appointed apartments in Barcelona centre.

Excellent location, very clean, modern amenities, and plenty of space. This is a perfect apartment for four people. We loved staying here. The apartment management was very helpful and allowed us to check in early. We loved exploring Barcelona from here. Almost everything is just a short walk away. It's also very close to a Metro station. We could not have been happier with this apartment

This beautiful apartment was the perfect home base for our family of four. In a very quiet neighborhood situated near wonderful restaurants and shops. Grocery store was also nearby. We had a perfect visit. Other reviews have mentioned corporate apartment. This may be the case but it did not take away from our experience. They responded quickly to all of our requests and arrange a taxi to the airport.

Location is perfect, you can reach a lot of sightseeings, shops, restaurants within 10 minutes. Host was very friendly, ready to help 24 hours a day. Apartments itself really clean and cozy, you can find everything you need. Hardly recommend!

This apartment is beautiful, with old-world detailing and modern amenities. The Metro is literally a block away and there are supermarkets, restaurants and bakeries on the same block. We were glad to have a dishwasher and washing machine as well! Highly recommend this convenient and beautiful location. As others have said, it is corporate-owned so does not have the personal feel at checkin-in but the people that helped us were are very friendly and helpful.

We were only able to stay in Barcelona for a quick 2 night, one day stay, and this Airbnb worked out perfect. It was in great location to get to where we needed to go, and most of it we could do by walking. They were very professional at check in and communication and the place was clean and had everything we needed for our quick stay.  Thanks again for everything!!
A great place to stay. Highly recommended.
Great flat, good communication. Helpful for parking too. I recommend this place.
Yaiza's place was beautiful and great for our group of girls. Towels and amenities were provided and the house was very comfortable. I'd love to stay here again!
Прекрасные апартаменты. Отличное место положение. Рекомендую для краткого пребывания в Барселоне.

name: cozy house and garden in the heart of Montréal
summary: House at the heart of Montréal. Cosy apartment, 2 bedrooms, one living room, calme street, close to Downtown, the Plateau-Mt Royal and Hochelaga. Métro, café and stores 10m away. A HUGE garden. Cat present! :)
interaction: I have placed a special written guide in order for you to feel at home. :)

host.about: Je suis originaire de Roumanie, maintenant à Montréal depuis 8 ans. Je suis infirmière, reconvertie après une mini-carrière dans les festivals de cinéma montréalais. J'aime partager et rencontrer de nouvelles personnes.

reviews.txt:
Teodora was a great host! She contacted me before we arrived to prepare us for the checking in process. She was very accommodating our rushed arrival (we had dinner res.!) and had a great printout regarding any questions we might have about her home. 

We really enjoyed her cat Tsitsou. I have a cat allergy but she was so friendly and hospitable that I even managed to give her a few good pats. Teodora's place is very clean, so my allergic reaction was minimal. 

The location is great. It's less than a 10 min walk to the Metro and very easy to find street parking. We enjoyed the garden space very much. We sat out there one late afternoon and felt as though we were truly Montreal residents!

One suggestion I make (which is NOT a deal breaker) is perhaps a small fan in the guest room. The windows are not very big, and we kept the door closed, to keep Tsitsou out, and it got stuffy pretty quickly. 

I will be giving Teodora a 10/10 and we hope to come back to visit soon!
On a eu un excellent séjour chez (Website hidden by Airbnb) maison est jolie et accueillante et elle a tout ce qu'on a besoin...en plus elle est proche de tout!

Teodora was very friendly and showed us around her home and garden. Her home was in the perfect spot and it was very easy to get around in her neighborhood. Her home was very clean and exceeded our expectations. It was the perfect place to stay for a few nights!
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Fantastic place and host, Teodora was very helpful listing some great places for us to checkout. Would certainly come back again! Tsi-Tsu was also adorable and great company

name: Sunny appartment on the Plateau
summary: Great apartment located in the heart the Plateau/Mile-end neighbourhood.  The perfect place to relax AND enjoy all of what Montreal has to offer :) !!  I look forward sharing with you my favorite spots and perspectives about this town and province!
interaction: I am around mostly in the evenings or later at night...  i  will be happy to share a meal or share with with you my favorite places in town :) Le français est ma langue maternelle Hablo espanol
houseRules: no smoking and no pets allowed

host.about: From Montreal, Sabrina works as a trainer and consultant with non-profit organisations. On a more personal level, she cultivate a secret passion for social change theatre, traveling, yoga, cycling, cooking, harmony and... social gatherings! Marc-André adores sciences but spend the majority of his free time cycling, travelling and enjoying what the city has to offer!

reviews.txt: Staying at Sabrina's place in the Plateau neigborhood was the best experience I've ever had as my second time visiting Montreal because she was resourceful and helpful in suggesting to my mother and I for us to go to such as trendy restaurants and places to see in Montreal but most of all her apartment was clean and had everything I needed. I would strongly recommend others to stay at her place. Thank you Sabrina for everything.

Sabrina was a very nice woman who was extremely helpful. Her apartment is in a very safe neighborhood and was close to shops restaurants. I was told I could choose a room. When we arrived she had placed us in the less apealing room, which was the guest room.  I was more then happy to be there as we were right next to the bathroom and I would have felt very odd taking over her bedroom.  She let us use her condiments which was greatly appreciated. We cooked a lot and she was very respectful of giving us space that we were seeking.  Overall the price was awesome the area was great Sabrina was very cool and so is her decor in her home!  Ten times better than a hotel. Home away from home!

This is a tidy and nice place in the Montreal downtown. The apartment is in a calm and quiet street. However by 5 minutes walking you can experience the French essence of Montreal, cafe bistros, restaurants, bars, etc. Sabrina is a great host, very friendly with a nice personality. I recommend staying in her place.

Sabrina is an AMAZING host! The apartment is clean and in a great neighborhood (it is very close to downtown, old montreal, etc.) She was very helpful in providing us with information about the city, places we can go, etc. Overall staying with Sabrina was hassle free and super easy which allowed us to enjoy the beautiful city of Montreal!

Sabrina was such an excellent and warm host! She was very helpful in giving us details of places to go, to eat, etc., and she even left a map for us to use. Her place is really clean and beautiful. It is near Park LaFointaine and the colorful and interesting stretch of Mont Royal. We really enjoyed our stay at her place and more than that, we really enjoyed meeting her! Merci beacoup Sabrina! : )

The apt is very comfortable. I have everything I need even the condiments. Sabrina is a passionate, inspiring host. With a art history degree and humain system invention degree, she has extend knowledge of cuture difference which is very helpful for a new immigrant to Quebec. Thank a lot Sabrina.

Foi excelente a minha hospedagem no apartamento de Sabrina, ela é bastante acolhedora e foi muito gentil, me apresentou um pouco da cidade e do bairro. Eu não conhecia Montreal e Sabrina me ajudou muito, passeando comigo em algumas ruas e me dando atenção e informações importantes!  
Recomendo a todos (as) hospedarem-se em seu apartamento, o qual é muito limpo e fica em uma rua tranquila.

Isabel Lima - BRASIL

Sabrina is an incredible hostess! Her apt is so lovely, really comfortable, super clean, and perfectly located in the best part of Montreal. Sabrina was incredibly friendly and helpful with suggesting wonderful things to do and places to go during our stay. She gave us a map with lots of highlighted spots of places to visit. We really enjoyed visiting with her and would love to come stay with her again! Thank you Sabrina for a wonderful Montreal experience!

Sabrina has a very pretty apartment. She takes good care of it, and the apartment was clean. She was very accommodating to us, giving us a big well-thought out list of everything we need to know and do. She sent out emails and reminder or how to get to the apartment, and gave us some helpful tips on places to eat and whatnot. She even provided us with a second clean pair of bed sheets and allowed us to use pans and spices to cook (as eating out can get quite expensive!) Everything was excellent, and I would definitely recommend anyone who stays in Montreal to stay with Sabrina!
The reservation was canceled 36 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Super endroit Sabrina est une hôte sympa et très gentille et l'appartement est très bien calme et bien situé
Stylish apartment in a good location! Perhaps the only downside was the smell of cigarette smoke that filtered into the apartment. Sabrina was friendly and made check in/out easy.
Accueil super sympa! Très belle appart!

Bonjour,

Pendant ces 4 nuits chez Sabrina, on se sentait vraiment chez nous. Quand elle était là, on avait possibilité de discuter et de nous informer sur plein de choses à Montréal. 
Elle nous a bien aidé à préparer notre année ici et nous a même convié à aller faire du sport avec elle!

Merci Sabrina,

Lauriane et Julien

Sabrina et sa colocataire sont vraiment sympathique.
La chambre est super confortable et l'appartement a tout le nécessaire.
Très bon séjour pour nous.

Super séjour chez Sabrina !

L'appartement est fantastique, la chambre est assez grande, confortable.
Sabrina a été une hôte très prévenante et grâce à ces indications j'ai trouvé l'appartement vraiment très facilement.
Il est très bien situé, et très accessible, à 15 min du métro en marchant et 5 min avec le bus 97 qui passe toutes les 10 minutes.
Tous commerces à proximité.

Je recommande !
This place is great! Perfect place to stay in Montreal. Thank you Sabrina!
Wonderful apartment - even better host!! Absolutely recommend!
My experience Sabrina Mc Fadden was awesome I really enjoy it. She is a great Host.

I have spent an all week at Sabrina's home. It was a wonderful time in Montreal for me. The flat is really looks like as at the photos, it is well connected to the city centre. The zone is amazing with all the beautiful stairs which you find at almost every building.
Sabrina was very kind and helpful, she answered all my "important" questions when she returned home at the evening, gave me some very valuable tips. A rainy day, she left me an umbrella, too!! :)I am sure if I have the opportunity to return to Montreal, I will choose this appartment again :-) Thank you very much again, Sabrina! Cheers ;)

name: Sydney Olympic Park High Level Stunning View Apt
summary: This brand new two-bedroom apartment with 2 bathroom at high level of the iconic Australia Tower in the heart of Sydney Olympic Park. Our place is welcoming. It contains 2 urban design bedrooms with buitl-in wardrobes. It could accommodate up to six adults, the ensuite room and the second room are both with band new Queen size bed can fit two people comfortably, the sofa bed in the living room can convert to Queen size bed, if necessary.
interaction: We are always contactable by mobile, SMS, E-mail or airbnb. Please feel free to get in touch with me, If you have any questions about where to eat, where to shopping etc.
houseRules: - - No parties, events or group gatherings. - -Check-in time is 3.30pm or earlier on request, if available - -Check-out time is 12pm, however we have a generous late checkout - - Policy which is subject to "next booking" availability. - - No pets are allowed at this property. - - Quiet Enjoyment Only - we ask that you remain respectful of our neighbours by keeping noise to a minimum, especially after 10:00pm - - Smoking - Smoking is only allowed outside of the apartment on the open balcony and the balcony doors must remain closed at all time if smoking occurs.

reviews.txt: Our crew stayed here for a business trip for Supanova Popculture event. It was great, spacious and walking distance to everything. Parking was a breeze, restaurants around the area and a convenience store. You even get 10% off at the restaurants when you mention your a resident.

Nicole was an amazing host. The apartment was perfect and even better than the pictures. Excellent location to see a show at Sydney Olympic Park. 
Highly recommended

From the first email to Nicole, it felt like I was talking to a friend. She was so welcoming and helpful, and responded quickly to every request. On arrival I was met at the elevator with a big smile and the key. My surprise when I walked in the door was immense! The apartment is beautifully appointed, fresh spotless linen, a bowl of fruit, chocolates, and even an array of teabags and biscuits to have with my coffee. Such a lovely surprise. It's a spacious apartment with two beautiful bathrooms and amazing views. Even a large balcony with deck chairs. This apartment truly had everything we needed. There was a chemist near the ground floor doors, and a convenience store as well; coffee shops and cafes are nearby, and an excellent DFO shopping centre nearby (within walking distance; 1.3km I think).  I recommend this apartment to you without hesitation. Thanks Nicole! We'll be back!

For a family of 5 the apartment was excellent with a fantastic view.   Everything you need is supplied and Nicole is a perfect host.  It is close to restaurants, public transport and sporting events. Highly recommend.
Really nice apartment - everything was clean & comfortable!

A great place to stay. Close to everything in Olympic Park (including being around the corner from the train station), and a phenomenal view. From the lounge room as well as both bedrooms and balcony you can clearly see every major sporting venue. And what's better is it's only roughly a 10 min walk to any one of them, making it incredibly easy to access any one of them with ease. 

The apartment itself was very clean, with a modern look and feel, and had everything we needed. And whilst we didn't actually meet Nicole, her communication was excellent and she was very accommodating when we had a couple of extra guests show up at late notice wanting to stay, and she allowed us to have a late checkout.

All of this for a great price.

Thanks Nicole. I would definitely stay there again.

We stayed in the apartment for an even held at Qudods Bank Arena. It was the perfect location, we were able to duck out for a quick shop to the DFOs and a quick easy walk to our event. 
The apartment was excellent the beds were really comfy and having 2x bathrooms suited us well.

Nice touches with fresh fruit, porridge and sweets.  Not set up with cooking ingredients or milk etc.  Lovely modern unit, far better than staying at one of the nearby expensive hotels.  Lots of restaurants in walking distance.  Host was easily contactable and understanding when we left the key in the wrong mailbox.
Was really good staying with Nicole, whe was very easy to conect with and her housr was very clear and organized with everything I needed and well located, super happy, thanks Nicole x

Good location but no supermarkets nearby - only expensive convenience stores. There was a fire alarm on one of the days which shut down the elevator all day requiring us to climb 18 flights of stairs. Other than that we had a good stay.
This is a lovely 2 bedroom apartment on the 11th floor overlooking Sydney's Olympic Park. Plenty of room and nice amenities.
Definitely a great place to stay, such a beautiful apartment. Thank you so much for ur kindly host Nicole :)

Really enjoyed our stay.  The apartment was clean and comfortable with great facilities and had everything we needed.  Very convenient location.  Host was easy to contact and deal with.  Will definitely be staying again when next in the area.
Great communication! Great location with great price! Thank you Nicole and Vicky!
Everything good^^

Nicole had fantastic communication leading up to and during our stay. The apartment was much bigger than represented in the photos and was in a perfect location accessing event venues around Olympic Park. Would easily recommend and stay again... Thanks for making our trip so easy Nicole !!

On entering the apartment we knew straight away we would have a great stay. There was fruit and chocolates in a little bowl, a large and after our journey from Adelaide and working out the train system to get to the apartment we were exhausted and instantly felt welcomed, exactly what we needed. We were there for the Australia Dance Festival which was exactly what Nicole had said just a short 10min walk, so fantastic for our needs. Perfect location with a couple of great places to eat a pharmacy and a convenience store just at the bottom of the apartment building.
We would definitely stay again when visiting Olympic Park.
Thanks Nicole!!

Loved arriving to a wonderful view, top notch apartment with everything you could need on hand. It was very well kept, immaculate and well stocked with tea, coffee, basic pantry items, bathroom and laundry products.  We were 2 families staying together and needed to co-ordinate our outings as there is only one car parking key, that is the only downside.

Apartment was really well positioned and nicely appointed. Could not fault anything during our stay and the nice touches like fresh fruit on arrival was appreciated. 
Thanks Nicole we will be back.
I would highly recommend this apartment. Clean, modern, comfortable and better than expected. Friendly host who spoilt us with biscuits and great communication at all time. We will be back!

name: Wander to the Beach from a Cozy Wailea Condo
summary: Mix a cocktail in the kitchenette at this studio-style apartment, decorated in warm, earthy tones. Sip it on the private deck as geckos scuttle around banana palms, or amid lush greenery at the complex’s shared poolside dining area with BBQ grills.
interaction: We live five minutes away from our condos so if you need anything we are here to help.
houseRules: 7 night minimum stay (14 night minimum over Holiday Season Dec 15-Jan 6) 14.42% state tax included in nightly rate $85 clean fee Cancellation policy: 60 days prior to arrival - full refund less $250 cancellation fee.  Less than 60 days - no refund unless unit is re-rented in which case refund will be made only for those days re-rented less the cancellation fee.

host.about: Tamara and Steve have lived on Maui since 1996 and our two young children were born and raised here. Steve is a Firefighter for Maui county and works at the Kihei fire station. Tamara is a stay-at-home mom and helps run our vacation rental business.  We have enjoyed owning our homes for their lovely tropical settings, great pool areas, and proximity to the wonderful beaches in Kihei and Wailea. We live five minutes from our properties and take great care to ensure our guests are happy. If you need anything while you are staying in our rentals we are here to help you. We hope to have you as our guests, The Farwig Family

reviews.txt: DO NOT TRUST THESE HOSTS. TERRIBLE RACISTS. We loved the location but the room was so small and smelt so bad. Room got no sunlight. The shower only ran cold water. The pools were all dirty and had lots of kids. Originally the post said "flexible checkout" but then it was changed randomly to 10am when the racist couple Steve and Tamara kicked us out on our last day in Maui. We had no where to go with our luggage and our flight back home was at 3pm
Great host

We absolutely LOVED this location and space. It was WAY better than we expected and the location is walking distance to the prettiest beaches, restaurants and yoga! We stayed in 4 airbnb's on Maui and this was our fave! Please drive to Makena and hang out at the gorgeous beach or take the boardwalk walks in front of the fancy hotels walking distance from Tamara and Steve's place:)
This Airbnb was absolutely perfect for us. Steve is very responsive and the flat is convenient and has everything needed for an amazing stay in Maui!
Loved the place! Amazing location! Short walk to the shops and some really nice beaches.
Great location and great home!  Highly recommend

Everything was great while staying at this cozy studio.  The condo was very clean and well kept.  There was also nice touches such as allowing us to borrow beach chairs, boogie board, etc.  And there is a washer/dryer in the condo which was great!  The complex is minutes away from the beach and a grocery store.  Pretty much everything you would need.

Our room was clean and very roomy. I greatly appreciated all the little extras that were available: beach chairs, blankets, umbrella, lunch box, ice packs, little packets of mustard for sandwiches, tupperwear, snacks, etc. We loved watching the little geckos scuttle around on the banana tree outside and listening to the birds in the morning/evening. Such a great little space, I would go back and stay there in a heart beat! (:

Amazing place to stay.  The "studio" is HUGE.  The lanai is in the back which makes it extremely private.  It was truly like having another room.  The front door also has a screen door which allows for a cross draft with the tradewinds.  The pool and grills are essentially across the driveway.   The grounds are beautifully landscaped.  The complex is extremely quiet.  The location was perfect for walking to Ulua Beach, the shops at Wailea, Wailea Center and Monkey Pod. Tamara and Steve are lightning fast to respond.  Loved staying here.

name: Cruisy apartment by the sea
summary: Self-contained studio apartment 3 minute walk from the best beach in Sydney, Bungan Beach. Open plan, north facing, so very well lit by natural light. Warm in winter, cool in summer. Ocean view, veggie garden, backyard for picnics etc.
interaction: The landlords upstairs are very relaxed and friendly and able to offer help and advice.
houseRules: Child friendly, no pets.

host.about: My name is Dean, I'm a musician who lives next to the ocean on the Northern Beaches of Sydney, Australia. I enjoy the company of genuine and unique people, the journeys and discoveries of adventuring, and the time I spend listening to and creating music.

reviews.txt: When we first arrived Leslie and Roy made us feel very welcome, explaining everything in detail so we had a really relaxed and smooth stay without any issues. Excellent access to the beach and local shops, highly recommended.

The hosts were absolutely amazing - dean's place is a perfect studio and everything exactly as promised in the listing. The communication was impeccable and everything was like new. Personally thought it was a little expensive but as long as the price is suitable for you, you can't go wrong with staying here. Honestly one of the best Airbnb's I've stayed at - the cleanliness, the treatment and communication from the hosts, the overall ambience of the place and the facilities offered - honestly fantastic.

name: ❤️SUPERHOST-Single Ensuite Room@ 1min MTR
summary: Newly-renovated Ensuite Single Bedroom is furnished with everything you need for a comfortable stay.  It is located at the heart of Kowloon; 1 minute walk to the Mongkok MTR station, 2 minutes to the airport bus station, and 3 mins to the “East Rail Line,” which will take you to Mainland China (Lo Wu and Futian) and the New Territories. Feel free to send me a message if you have any questions or requests. ★★★ Don't forget to add the listing in your Wishlist ★★★
interaction: You can message me anytime for any questions or inquiries. You can get in touch with me by phone or most messaging apps.
houseRules: No disturbance in the property

host.about:
I have lived and worked at many places around the world and nothing enhance my experience more than a comfortable home away from home; somewhere I can work, study, relax and recharge. This is why I aim to make my place a clean, safe, comfortable and convenient home for you. 

You can expect arrive to a clean, well maintained and equipped accommodation, where you can settle in right away. 

My accommodations are strategically located at heart of the city; it is minutes to major transportation like MTR and buses stations, shops, restaurants and supermarkets etc., which makes living and commuting so much more effortless. 

My accommodations are fairly new and have mostly been under long term rental, hence the relatively few reviews; however, you can see more guests experience with other accommodations that I have.

reviews.txt: Located in the heart of Mongkok, extremely convenient. Jack was very nice and prompt with his responses. Would recommend you to stay here, if you are looking for a economical spot in HK.

I really like this place it's cosy clean and has all the things you need around the neighbourhood, including being very close to Mongkok MTR which makes commuting really convenient. Jack is also a really helpful host who will go out of the way to ensure your stay is comfortable. Definitely recommend this room and Jack's services!

Jack was a fantastic host! The place was great, cleaned regularly, and if I ever had a question or concern Jack would reply in mere minutes! He was hospitable, friendly, and made a genuine effort to make you feel welcome. Everything was efficient and made transitioning to Hong Kong a lot easier. Highly recommend having him as your next host!

Jack’s place is perfect. Not spacious as most HK rooms but contains everything you may need. The room is clean and new.
The location is perfect for shopping lovers. It is at the centre of Mongkok, a few steps to mall, food and MTR. However, totally avoid the noise of the street.
The flat is fully equipped with cooking, washing and drying facilities.
Very good living experience.
Jack was an amazing host! Great location - the heart of Mong Kok

name: 1+1 (4 PERSON) Flat in Central İstanbul
summary: Clean and useful flat. Center of Kocamustafapaşa. Near to Taksim-Beyoğlu, Eminönü, Beyazıt, Sultanahmet, Sirkeci, Bosprous.  5 minutes to walk sea and hospital. 24 hours taxi bus Taksim - Kocamustafapaşa  (end of the our Street),
interaction: i can help about your istanbul travel plan. For see, food, night club, island tours. you can bring the flag of your country as a gift :)
houseRules: you have to wash the dishes and throw away the trash before going.

host.about: I am 29 years old. 112 emergency service ambulance driver. Laptop technical service owner. Likes to travel by motorcycle

reviews.txt: Le logement est bien équipé. .Proche de tous bus corniche  le marché. ..endroit très calme et stratégique pour les courses et les autres stations de transport. ..C'est 2mn pour les bus et 25mn pour arriver au tramway  à (Website hidden by Airbnb) la famille  de Mehmet très gentille. ..
La estancia con Mehmet fue muy buena! Mis amigas y yo disfrutamos del lugar, es bueno tener el departamento solo y el transporte público está a tan solo 2 minutos caminando. Lo recomendamos!

Mehmet's flat is very comfortable for living in Istanbul. It is located close center of Istanbul. If you go to Istanbul to see main places this flat is best option. Living in this flat you can get on a bus and go to Ayasofya in 25-30 minutes for example. There are many good place for eating and shopping near the house.
When we arrived in Istanbul Mehmet's parents met us and show the apartament. They live in this house on the next floor and they are very nice people. 
I advice you to choose Mehmet's fat if you will go to Istanbul.

name: ➳ Logement  4 1/2 Rosemont ❤️
summary: Chers Glob-trotteurs, travailleurs, vacanciers ou qui que vous soyez :)  Notre demeure est au dernier étage d’un petit immeuble (3 étages), situé à 20 min du centre ville.   L’appartement possède un salon double avec chambre ,balcon donnant sur une rue passante, deux chambres dont une fermée, une salle de bain ainsi qu’une cuisine avec un second balcon donnant cette fois sur une vue panoramique.  Les rues Beaubien et Masson regorgent de petits cafés, restaurants et commerces en tout genre !
interaction: Aucun. Nous sommes en vacances hors de la ville mais vous pouvez communiquer avec nous par -télephone : (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ou (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  ainsi que  notre ami : Clément : (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  -mail : (Email hidden by Airbnb) (Email hidden by Airbnb)
houseRules: Fumeur autorisée uniquement sur les balcons.

reviews.txt:
Nous n'avons pas rencontré Rebekah, c'est un ami à elle qui nous a donné et repris les clés. Nous étions une famille de 4 (un bébé et un enfant de 4 ans).
Nous avons aimé : la proximité des commerces (supermarché, pharmacie, fruiterie, le chaleureux Rose Café), le bus au pied de l'immeuble, la taille de l'appartement confortable pour 4, 
Nous avons moins aimé : l'appartement pas très propre (odeur de cigarette, cendrier pas vidé, mégot dans la chambre - pour un logement non fumeur !!- le parquet qui noircit les genoux de notre fille à quatre pattes, le frigo pas vidé, la poussière sous les coussins des canapés ... et j'en passe), le manque d'équipement (balai, aspirateur, vaisselle pour préparer à manger), la machine à laver défectueuse (elle est tombée en panne après 2 utilisations, nous avons du aller en laverie), les lumières cassées dans les 2 chambres (que nous avons réparées), la TV qui est en fait un écran pour regarder des DVD, le couchage pour la 3e personne dans la petite chambre fermée est en fait un canapé non convertible de 1 mètre de long (notre fils de 4 ans ne pouvait pas dormir dessus ...). Rebekah nous a donc fait passer un matelas gonflable.
C'est un appartement à moindre cout, certes, mais pas conforme à la description. Bien pour un couple qui aime manger à l’extérieur.

name: Renovated Classic Design Studio with Sun Room
summary: Take in the regal elegance of this classic design studio set in a renovated former piano academy and factory. Discover a downtown getaway featuring original ornate finishes, custom made furniture, colorful decor, and a sun room.
interaction: Your hosts are available 24/7 at you convenience for any assistance and help over the phone, email, chat or text message. We will greet you at arrival at the door and  will be more than happy to help you with information and tips to discover the best of Porto and surroundings.
houseRules: - Check in is at 3 pm. There is a $30 fee for late check out (when available). - Please keep documents and valuable items in the safety box located in the closet. - The house is not responsible for lost valuable items left outside the Safety Deposit box. - 85 Euros fee in case Keys are lost, in cash, at check out. - Please close all doors and windows every time you go out. - A First Aid Kit is provided, located under the Bathroom sink. - Hair blow dryer is located under the bathroom sink. - Please dispose of garbage in plastic bags at the public garbage bins located in the street around the corner to the left when exiting the building.  - Please make sure all small electrical appliances and water fixtures are turned off every time you exit the apartment. - Check in time is at 15:00pm (3:00 pm) Check out time is at: 12:00 midday.  For early check in or late check out cost is 30 Euro (when available) and must be paid before check out. If the apartment is available check in/out time is fl

host.about:
I worked for an international airline for many years, where I learned about customer satisfaction while traveling all over the world.
Over the last few years I have been renovating, decorating and equipping historic and modern homes in different countries.  I am very attentive to detail. With care and passion, the apartments are based on my experience as a landlord, host and traveler and they have everything you will need to feel at home.

reviews.txt: Very warm welcome from Hector. Took the time to tell us about things to do and about the city. The appartment has recently been beautifully renovated, absolutely stunning! We even pondered staying there an additionnal day just for the wonderful appartment. High end towels and ameneties. Close to a metro station, quiet neighborhood, simply perfect. Hector even took the time to order us a taxi for our early departure. Would ABSOLUTELY RETURN OR RECOMMEND!!
Genial la estancia. Todo perfecto.
I would highly recommend this flat for a long or short stay in Porto. It is well located and it is really tastefully decorated! Hugo was also really helpful and gave us loads of info on the city.

Todo era perfecto.  El apartamento es precioso, coincide con las fotos.  Hugo, quién nos recibió, nos ofreció todo tipo de información y su predisposición para que en nuestra estancia no nos faltara de nada fue total.
Amazing decorated apartment! Well situated. The owner gave us incredible and tasty addresses to enjoy our trip in Porto! I would highly recommend this apartment without any hesitations

Very nice & clean flat , with available and helpful hosts. 
I highly recommend this apartment for a citytrip in Porto !
We absolutely loved our stay in Porto. Our host Hugo was very welcoming and helpful . The apartment was very clean and comfortable and felt like home. Thank you so much for a fantastic stay.
Very pleasant stay. Close parking nearby, modern comfortable place, easy walk to the tourist center but far enough away to be separate from the crowds. Thank you!

O apartamento é muito confortável e acolhedor: 5*
Está muito bem localizado, junto a restaurantes, supermercados e transportes públicos.
Apesar de estar numa zona calma e agradável, fica a poucos minutos, a pé, do centro histórico.
Beautiful apartment in a great location. Quiet safe neighborhood yet still very close to most of the major sites.
Great location and easy to park nearby. The apartment is just as you see in the pictures. Highly recommended.

La propreté  agencement avec goût idéal pour un couple
Géographique  proche des 2 gares et du métro proche de la veille ville  le soir si fatigue
Un restaurant sur la place a 150 mètres super

El apartamento es muy bonito en un edificio antiguo manteniendo su esencia, pero perfectamente reformado y muy acogedor. Tiene muchos detalles (amenities de baño, cafetera y cápsulas nescafe, barra de sonido para poner tu música con el móvil y Netflix) y está en muy buena zona.
