Aunque en el anuncio ponga que tiene aparcamiento, no es así, pero por la zona se aparca muy bien, eso sí, de lunes a viernes es zona de pago.

Beautifully designed flat in a quiet residential area but so easy to walk to the main attractions. Paid parking is easy to find just right outside the building and free on the weekend which is a plus. I didn't get to meet Maribel but she was extremely responsive with her communication. On the day of check in, Boris was so kind and he ensured we were able to find the flat and even waited outside the building for us (as the Airbnb direction was incorrect- please be sure to use the address provided by your host). Boris provided suggestions on where to go and places to eat. While there is no washer in the unit, overall a wonderful stay in magical Porto. Btw, there is a really delicious sandwich shop around the neighborhood that serves up cheap but yummy pork sandwiches right by the park. You won't miss it as there's always a long line.
Very nice and quiet place to stay in Porto. Very convenient location to visit the center and also move further with the metro 4 mm walk from the flat! I recommend.

Great place with lots of room - felt so luxurious. Wonderful bed, plenty of hangers & closet space & outstanding bathroom really added to comfort. Great value & host very responsive.
I recommend Casa de Tortas a few blocks away as a really great breakfast spot, with yummy food & wifi.

The host was very nice and helpful. The apartment was nice and clean. But I think it's to expensive for what it offers. The size is not as big as it looks on the pics and the real location of the apartment is about 4 blocks more far away form the city center. The apartment doesn't have a laundry (I could see it on the pictures of the listing). You have to use and external laundry which costs 7.- Euro each time. Long story short: It's nice but too expensive for what it really offers.

O apartamento é de muito bom gosto nos mínimos detalhes, roupas de cama e banho impecáveis . É muito confortável e tem todos os itens necessários e até o que não pensei, 2 guarda chuvas para o caso de frio. Maribel foi muito atenciosa durante a nossa estadia.  O local é bem silencioso para uma boa noite de sono. Tem transporte público e todas as comodidades necessárias.  Super Recomendo.
Importante q os faciliten la dirección por correo con anterioridad. Yo tarde un ratito en encontrarlo

El alojamiento tiene muy buen nivel. Muy bien equipado, con detalles y con gusto. La acogida es muy cálida. La disponibilidad de los anfitriones es máxima, se esfuerzan en ayudarte, lo pudimos comprobar. La zona es tranquila pero es que además dentro de la casa no se oye nada del exterior. Muy recomendable.

name: Breathtaking Ocean Beach Condo Kaanapali , Maui!
summary: An incredible ocean front breathtaking one bedroom Ocean Beach condo steps from the beach! Granite Kitchen Two TV's Very private  See the islands of Lana'i & Molokai from our lanai & living room! Watch whales and turtles from our deck! Amazing sunsets! Top Floor Beach Condo, very private! 3rd story, no elevator w/ amazing ocean views!! Enjoy our private beaches, surf, snorkel-relaxing pool! Tennis court, putting Green, ping pong & shuffle Board -wonderful intimate Resort! laundry on 1st Floor!
interaction: We are local and live on Maui!

reviews.txt: Ken was very responsive, and answered all our questions. The condo is in a great location, and an amazing  value compared to all the resorts around the area. Loved the privacy and resort amenities.

Although we did not meet Ken in person, he was very responsive to any and all questions. The condo was very easy to find and looks exactly like the pictures. It is close enough to the beaches and downtown lahina. The only thing we didn't prepare for was how hott is was and this unit only had ceiling fans and no AC. We were pretty hot at night. Other than that we were SO happy with our condo and hope to come back sometime soon
Thanks Ken, was really a really nice spot and we really enjoyed our time here.

My partner and I stayed here and we had a really awesome experience. The complex is absolutely stunning with beautiful well maintained grounds and the pool area and views were absolutely gorgeous. The apartment was clean, well equipped and comfortable.  The only downside was that the bedroom is near the front of the unit and the traffic noise was quite loud, making it difficult to fall asleep. This is probably due to the fact the one of the window fixture in the bedroom is an open blind, offering great air flow but not much in noise reduction. However, this probably wouldn't bother a heavy sleeper or could be easily be minisimed with earplugs. On the whole we would definitely recommend!

Great place, amazing view, very clean. No wifi and short drive to main shops and restaurants probably the only down side. Would definitely stay again. Make sure you are good with stairs as it's at the top of a three story complex but makes for an amazing view all day of the ocean!

This was the perfect rental for my husband and I. This is our first AirB&B rental and we were pleasantly surprised! The views of the ocean were amazing, the resort is well kept and the landscaping is beautiful. Turtles were in the ocean at the edge of the property every morning, and we were usually able to scurry down with coffee or a mimosa and watch them swim and come up for air. The pool was rarely, if ever, used during our stay, so you could have it all to yourself. The BBQ are was clean and well-kept. This condo is on the third floor with stairs up, so if you have physical limitations it might be a struggle. However, the third floor placement allows for extremely quieter accommodations and an unparrelleled view of the ocean. The bedroom is on the street side, so road noise does creep in during the evenings. We easily slept and the noise didn't bother us at all. The fans and open windows kept us cool during the evenings with no need for AC (this unit does not have it). Although we didn't meet Ken in person, he provided us with all the information we needed to enjoy the condo without worry. This place is well stocked, clean and convenient. Highly recommended.

I was struck upon entering the condo by the immediately visible beautiful view of the Pacific from the lanai. That alone would have made staying here worth it, but on top of that, Keneke has stocked the condo chock-full of kitchen supplies and extra beach towels. Two advisories: the condo is on the small side for more than two people, although it can technically sleep four (two in the real bed and two on the pullout couch), and careful with parking here because other guests and owners can get a bit possessive, especially if they have large cars. Also, you definitely should have a car if you stay here because while a few markets/delis and shops are walkable, the town of Lahaina is not. I heartily recommend this wonderful clean condo!

Great view, better than the pictures. The grounds are beautiful and private. We did see turtles on the beach and whales from the lanai. Preferred the location much better than Kihei as it feels more quaint, but still has all the amenities.

Great place to stay. Sad to leave. 

Keep in mind, this condo unit is on the third floor and is not accessible. There's no elevator or escalator.
Great view, excellent facilities and a great location. Will  book this again when we return to Maui
Nice one bedroom condo with a beautiful ocean view, and easy access to the pool.  We never met the owner, but he was most responsive to us, and access to the space was easy.

Great condo with spectacular views and beach access. Do try snorkeling with the turtles in the rocky area. You probably won't find such giant turtles even on most commercial snorkeling tours. It's conveniently located close to super market, farmers market and restaurants. 
Bedroom could be a bit noisy in the day time with traffic but not a problem during the night. No Wifi in condo but we had our own cellular wifi device. 
Overall it's a great deal and highly recommend this place.
Good suite with amazing views in a quiet building. Close to all amenities, as well as a sem-private beach. Well worth the price.

Nice facilities, lovely private beach, the cleanest BBQ grills ever for guest use, very pleasant garden with putting green, tennis court (very well maintained, no cracks), and best of all.....amazing TURTLES! More turtles than even the snorkel boat that went to Turtle City. Access to the water was superb, there was even a ladder from the property for easy access into the ocean.

No wifi.  No air conditioning.  Love the condo but not this particular unit.  Not the cleanliest.  The condo has a great view, pool and private beach.  Would recommend staying in another unit.  Love the sunsets there!

This is a great location for “jumping off” from. Restaurants, coffee shops, etc are walkable. Easy to get in and out of. 
The place is small, as stated, but I wouldn’t want more than 2 people here. 
The 3 flights of stairs are difficult when hauling suitcases and groceries, and we’re in our mid 40’s and decent shape. 
Washer and dryer in the unit don’t work and appear that they haven’t for some time, there are pay laundry machines on site, but it’s not convenient, much nicer to have in suite working, who wants to spend their vacation on a laundry room? 
The lack of air conditioning doesn’t make it awful, but keeps it muggy and uncomfortable to sleep even with the fans going and windows open.
The complex is beautifully kept and clean, we would stay on this property again, but would chose a different unit. 
There is no lack of beautiful view or sea turtle sightings, they are everywhere, so cool to see them right on the beach out front.

The views can’t be beat! Loved the breathtaking ocean view from private balcony. Sea turtles galore! Peaceful and meticulous landscaping surrounds this place. Great beach to snorkel and very private. Swim with the turtles and plenty of variety of fish to enjoy. Walking distance to park, coffee, markets and shops. Everything you need to make you comfortable. Clean sheets, towels, pillows and comfortable bed. Will definitely stay here again.
Great location and views. The amenities are great! We will definitely come back. Mahalo ken

I found this place to be very much worth it. The location is just steps away from clear waters filled with sea turtles. We were able to cook from the home and it was equipped with the necessary amenities.  Local stores and markets are within walking distance. No a/ c however the fans made it comfortable. Well supplied unit - and Karlos is very responsive. We recommend this spot for a welcomed get away. Mahalo.

This place was perfect. A private beach outside your backdoor but don’t stay there. Maui is an island to explore so make sure you gas up the car and go. This condo is a great landing space after your adventures. It was very clean and had everything you need. Shops are close so you can cook at home if you desire. Enjoy a cup of coffee on the balcony or walk down and watch the turtles eating off the rocks. Nothing negative to say about my stay here. A wise choice if you decide to pick this for your Maui trip.

name: 3 Quartos Ipanema c/Piscina
summary: Apartamento de luxo com três quartos localizado na área mais famosa de Ipanema, próximo da praia, Lagoa e dos melhores bares e restaurantes da cidade.
interaction: A minha interação com os hóspedes dependerá integralmente deles. Inicialmente eu só irei me encontrar com os hóspedes no dia da chegada e da partida, porém sempre estarei disponível para sanar qualquer dúvida e resolver qualquer problema. Além disso, será um prazer dar dicas sobre o Rio e acompanha-los em passeios turísticos.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: The apartment is very comfortable and has excellent facilities in the building. On top of that the location is amazing and you can go walking to the beach, stores, supermarket, bars, etc. Lucas was an amazing host, very easy to connect with and always ready to help. I will definitely come back!
Muy buen departamento con todos los servicios, a 4 cuadras de la playa y a 2 del centro. La atención del anfitrión excelente y de destacar !!! Muy recomendable !!!

O apartamento é extremamente bem localizado, confortável e possui tudo que é necessário para uma estadia plena. O Lucas foi desde o começo super solícito e prestativo. Eu e minhas amigas adoramos o período que passamos no apartamento e já queremos voltar!
Todo muy bien
Great place and perfect location!

name: great Terrace&lift city center
summary: Bright, calm, quiet, comfortable, terrace, balcony gas heater, air conditioning, hot water, elevator, our dream, Heritage, walking distance to most important hot spots. Pedestrian streets, lively squares, modernism, Gaudi.....
interaction: If you want to interact are more than welcome going out and doing local plans...
houseRules: no parties allowed. please leave rubbish on rubbish been at the street. keep house as it was yours. Enjoy and have fun ;-) parking has a cost of 18 euros per day  Please take note that that late check in fees apply: 20 h, 20 EUR 22 h, 30 EUR 24 h, 35 EUR

host.about:
I'm Corius, traveller, friendly, sportive...
My best destination ever Papua
I like ride horses, sailing,running,skiing,scuba dive...

reviews.txt:
Patricia is very easy to communicate and a helpfull host!
The appartment is in a perfect area, quite and safe but very nice and easy to get everywere. We stayed 4 days and had all we need.
If its hot its great to have the little Terrace.
We recommend to take bikes, its real fun.
Thank you Patricia Jeanette and Nils

Patricia was a wonderful and very helpful host, she showed us where to go for groceries and good food and helped us book taxi's when the language barrier became a problem!

The apartment itself was beautiful, very centrally located, well kept and clean. We had plenty of space and the apartment had two terraces and a lovely kitchen.

Gracia is a beautiful part of Barcelona, thank you for making our stay so lovely!

Divya and Yvette
Quartere fantastico, Casa accogliente, tutti molto disponibili.

My wife and I stayed at Patricia's apartment in Gracia with our 9 months old son and we had a fantastic stay. 

Gracia is our new favourite area of Barcelona and the apartment is close to everything. We especially enjoyed the fantastic sushi place right next door that allows you to do take away which is perfect whenn travelling with a small child and the city square just 30 meters away. 

Patricia is a fabulous host and she even provided us with a baby cot and a baby chair for our son, so we didnt have to worry about that. That made the trip a lot more relaxing. 

If you plan to do more cooking, the kitchen could need a bit more equipment and we could for example only find 2 wine glasses and a limited number of kitchen utensils, but we nevertheless managed. 

All in all we really enjoyed our stay and we recommend Patricia as a great host. 

Best, Thomas, Mette and Theodor.

Hemos estado muy agusto en este piso! Estamos muy gratamente sorprendidos!
El barrio no puede tener mas encanto, centrico, con mucha vidilla, cerca de todo, en fin ideal para unos dias en barcelona. 
El piso es muy mono pero ademas muy muy comodo. 
Los anfitriones un encanto que se han volcado con nosotros 
Yo les doy un 10!

I stayed with my family (husband and daughter) in Patricia' apartment.  We were specifically looking for a quiet place not far from the center.  And we realized that it was quite difficult to find such place in Barcelona.  But Patricia's apartment was exactly what we were looking for.  It's located in Gracia disctrict which is 5 minutes walk from Passage de Gracia (one of the main streets of Barcelona which brings you to the Cataloniya square).  But at the same time it's a district where local people leave and it has a charm old Barcelona - historical buildings, nice cosy squares full of life, plenty of food shops and even market with fresh sea food, vegetables and Spanish specialities.  This is exactly the place where you can feel the real, not turistic Barcelona.  We felt very comfortable and safe there.  The apartment is simple but has everything you need - 2 big comfortable bads, kitchen with oven, microwave and all the necessary utensils.  There is also washing machine but we did not use it.  In one of sleeping rooms there is a small cosy balcony where you can enjoy your glass of wine or breakfest.  Due to the fact that both sleeping-rooms windows looks to the patio, it's absolutely quiet at night.  And you can only hear a sound of old clock which goes from the clocktower on the neighboring square which is the main square of Gracia district.  That gives you a wonderfull feeling of being in another century.  So, we got all we have expected and even more:).  And Patricia was also great as host.  We had only one problem with wi-fi in the first day which she fixed immediately that day.  It was very easy and comfortable for us to communicate with Patricia.  So, we would recommend her appartment to those who want to enjoy real Barcelona in a comfortable and quiet way:).

Patricia was a great communicator - no waiting for answers - everything went smoothly. Unit was clean and had plenty of room - we loved its location very close to a beautiful old square full of locals - lucky enough to see one of their traditional parades. It was a metro ride away from the Gothic and Born areas of Barcelona - very easy to get to these places. Not far from Gaudi's Cathedral. We liked the fact we were away from the crowds of tourists. Streets around are narrow and quiet. Unit was very good value.

What an amazing stay we had at Patricia's charming little aptt! It was clean, with all the amenities. It was just as mentioned in the listing. She welcomed us and also gave us some useful tips to navigate Barcelona. The Kabuki Sushi restt right below the Aptt was recommended by her and it was absolutely amazing. It was a safe and in one of the most desirable neighborhood's (Garcia) of Barcelona. Supermarket and a few bars were all within walking distance.
We loved both Patricia and her apartment. We could not have been better cared for and will definitely use them again next time!
Patricia and her friend were very cooperative and helpfull. the flat was really nice and clean - a good place to explore barcelona. we had a good time and can recommend this place.

I stayed with my mum there, and Patricias flat was perfect for us two! She gave us a lot of informations and even recommended us her favourite restaurants - so kind and helpful! 
The appartment was clean and in a lovely neighbourhood, I'd love to come back!

My parents and I had a really lovely stay at Patricia's apartment. It is in a fantastic neighborhood in Barcelona, far from tourists and very local but still relatively close to everything we wanted to do. There is a great market right nearby and a lovely square with a few nice cafés and a dynamite charcuteria. The apartment itself is very comfortable, with a nice terrace. Be aware that the lift is up a few steps from the entrance. 

Patricia was great to work with as well. We didn't meet her (her boyfriend let us in), but she was ready and happy to accommodate a short-notice extra person who almost joined us there.

We had a great stay at Patricia's flat! It was very comfortable for 4 people. The beds were comfortable and the kitchen wad very well-equipped for people who like to cook, like me! We really loved sitting on the terrace in the morning to drink our coffee. The place wad also really clean and it wad nice to have the option of air conditioning or windows open, as it can sometimes be very hot in Barcelona at night. Patricia was very welcoming and offered to order a taxi to pick us up at the airport. I love the neighborhood of Gracia. There are many interesting shops, restaurants and bars, not to mention 4 plaças and 2 great food markets. It is a quick metro ride to the rest of the city, but with a lot to offer in itself! To sum up, a perfectly located place to explore Barcelona! I recommend anyone to stay here.
Patricia and Jorge are extremely accommodating and helpful. We enjoyed every minute of our stay. The apartment is very comfortable and has everything you need. I highly recommend!

Patricia was lovely and friendly over email and then meeting her. The apartment is a lovely, spacious place to stay in the best area. A square with restaurants, ham and cheese delis, bakery and markets right on your doorstep! Would definitely stay there again

Patricia was a wonderful host.  Our flight had arrived way earlier than the scheduled check in time. And she was more than accommodating to letting us check in sooner. She was very helpful with tips and a map ready for us to go explore the town! The flat is exactly as pictured and described! She came in with new linens and glassware.
Super clean  and in a great location. Neighborhood was nice. It was great to get an authentic feel of a real Barcelona neighborhood away from all the tourist stuff.
Very nice appartement. Many thanks, Patricia!

I enjoyed life in Varcelona.  Nice clean place with children. You can use free wifi and clean kitchen. Traffic is also good and you can find many nice restaurant.  George and Patricia are very kind and helpful^^.

The flat was as described and comfortable. Patricia was very kind and accommodating. She went out of her way to help us. We did have some trouble with the washing machine not working properly but she rushed over quickly to help us resolve the problem.
Barrio Gracia was everthing we thought it would be and some.......great address,walking distance from the mayor attractions in Barcelona!!! Supermarkets are nearby and also good Restaurants.

name: Bondi Beach Dreaming 3-Bed House
summary: This peaceful house in North Bondi is 300m to the beach and a minute's walk to cafes and bars. With 3 bedrooms, (can sleep up to 8) it is perfect for families, friends and pets. The kitchen was recently renovated and a new lounge and chairs installed. The house has a peaceful, airy, laidback vibe  - a perfect beach retreat. Longer-term bookings encouraged. Parking for one car. A parking permit for a second car can also be obtained on request.
interaction: The house is offered as a whole. I won't be around after I've checked you in but the neighbours have my phone number and will call me (or knock on the door politely) if there is loud music or a party that is disturbing them. Please note if guests don't consider neighbours they will he asked to leave.
houseRules: Guests should have Airbnb verification at time of booking. We expect guests to be respectful of our lovely neighbours and keep the noise down, especially after 10pm at night. No loud music at any time of day. That means no parties, move all social gatherings into the house after 10pm. No smoking inside the house. Pets welcome.

host.about: I like furry friends and stylish surrounds.

reviews.txt: Great House. Only there for two nights. Conveniently located good vibe

Our stay at Bondi was lovely. Cat welcomed me, was friendly and helpful. The house was very comfy. Close to the beach, coffee shops & cafes. Unfortunately the mozzies were a bother in the only bedroom without nets but this was overcome with extra spray.  And parking is a bother but that is how it is in Bondi. I can recommend and would stay there again.

We loved staying in this house. We had 4 sisters and our mother for a relaxing 5 night stay. There were two bathrooms which was perfect and the house was cosy and clean. Great little backyard for a few wines in the sun. Thank you.
Great house and location. Peaceful and comfortable - and close to the beach and Bondi buzz. Cat was welcoming and helpful. Fresh coffee and milk in fridge was a nice touch.
Great pad in the heart of Bondi. A Feeling of absolute calm when you walk in. Great proximity to the beach, cafes and bars. House has everything you need for a short or long stay.

It was great time at Cat's place. Very close to bondi beach about 5 mins walk. And quiet and relax beautiful place. I love to stay again when my next visit. My family was happy too:)
Thanks again Cat:)
Cats place is a very relaxing environment. Perfectly situated, close to the beach and shops. She's very helpful and always replies to your requests. You couldn't ask for a better house/host.

Cat's flat was ideal for our needs -- three generations visiting North Bondi together. Two bathrooms felt like luxury (as did the king size bed), and the flat was super convenient to great restaurants (Mamasan and Avila were both tasty in their own ways, and right around the corner) and the beach. Shopping and tasty gelato (our kids were staunch advocates for the Messina Gelato) were only a slight stone's throw further away on Hall St. 

Having coffee available in the morning was a particular treat (thank you again, Cat), and there were ample cookbooks to review if we had had the time to really use the kitchen. Communications with Cat were easy for checking in and out; we didn't need to trouble her during our visit because the replacement light bulbs were easy to find when one fixture burnt out. We would definitely consider staying here again.

Had a great weekend away with friends. Great house and location walking distance to cafes and the beach. Amenities were good and Cat also provided beach towels for us to use. Would definitely come back.

Cat was a great host. The house is lovely, very close to the beach, a great organic bakery and restaurants. The kitchen was well stocked with basic essentials and some cookbooks. Cat was very quick to help out when I couldn't find the water heater switch. Would definitely recommend this house for anybody who wants to stay at Bondi.

Myself and 5 friends stayed in the house for 4 nights and had a great time. The house is an amazing beach house. Good room sizes and lounge area. 3min walk to the beach and a wide range of cafes near by. 10/10!
The house is near the Bondi Beach,about 15minutes drive to City｡Nice house…

Cat was very flexible allowing us to check in early & leave our bags until later in the day when checking out. The house was great, it had everything we needed & Cat was very prompt with dropping over a hair dryer when we needed one! Such a relaxing space & so close to everything! Perfect for our girls trip. Would love to return in winter to make use of the great fireplace!

Wow! Cat's place is amazing, well located, lot of shops, coffees (Jed's is a dream) around, a perfect beach house! I'd love to come back very soon!! Cat was very flexible with the chek-out, we had an extra afternoon at beach.
Cat was extremely attentive in providing for my families needs. She was flexible with check in times and the house was well presented and very much as described. A lovely experience.

Spacious beautiful Australian home. Its location couldn't have been any better; the beach, bus stop, and grocery store were only a short walk away. Cat was very accommodating, had a well kept home, and fast internet. Our only regret was that we couldn't stay longer.

The place was beautiful and so so close to the beach and cafes! It was the perfect girls weekend away and we all left feeling super relaxed! The place is exactly like the pictures. I've already recommended Cat's place to many friends. Thanks Cat.

Cat made us feel really welcome, the house was clean and tidy, great facilities and great location, close to the beach but not on a busy road.  The house was ideal for us, two families and our mother in the 'annex'. We would definitely recommend the property and would return.
Relaxed vibe, perfect for families or couples, fabulous location, close to great shops, restaurants and iconic Bondi Beach.

From start to finish, our stay at Bondi Beach Dreaming was enjoyable.  It was homely and comfortable and kitted out with just about everything you could possibly need.  Will definitely book again here.  It is a short walk to Bondi beach, and shops, bars and cafes.  It felt safe, secure and private.  The beds and linen were comfortable and high quality, and the overall feel, was like being at our "home away from home".

name: Cosy rooms close to the metro and the River
summary: Welcome to your little pied-à-terre, let you enjoy the beauty of Montreal for a night or even a week. You are looking for rooms VERY well located, clean, close to the subway ? You found! Bike path and rest guaranteed :) 2 rooms closed with 1 queen bed in each of them :)
interaction: We are always available to talk and give more information if needed . Knowing usually how long you stay , we give ideas of best places to eat/ visit We provide à metro map you can keep and write on, in addition with soap, shampoo , conditioner and towels ! We love talking to guest but stay aside when wanted

host.about:
Hi everyone, 

We are a couple of French people, living in Montreal for now more than two years. I am an assistant manager in a clothing store and Denis is an IT/electronic engineer.

We are clean, very lively, open minded and we like to meet new people from all over the world to share our experiences :)

Hope to see you soon !

reviews.txt: It was a very nice and warm stay. Alexia gave me detailed instruction in advance of my arrival. Denis welcomed me with a lot of information on the region. The location is very convenient pretty close to the River with a quite park and beautiful view. Room is cozy, clean with a lovely bookcase and quite a few French books to choose from. Overall a great stay. Alexia was so nice to arrange a pick up as I left the phone charger in the room. Really lovely hosts highly recommend!!

Alexia and Denis were very helpful from the beginning. Their house is located close to Verdun Metro and Wellington street so, eateries and shops are very close. The waterfront is about 4 blocks away and you can have a relaxing walk every evening. I wish I could have socialized more with Alexia and Denis. The stay was wonderful and I would recommend their place to my friends.

Alexia & Denis are awesome !  They made our Montreal trip very enjoyable. Denis gave all the travel information we need when we arrived. This location is very close to the subway station and BIXI, so we did not have to drive the car and had no trouble to get around the city. Highly recommended ~
Great hosts who were very accommodating and kept in touch. Nice apartment with on street parking and great local shops.
Very nice hosts. Denis gave us plenty of recommendations not only for our stay at their place but for our trip. The two rooms are spacious and beds quite comfortable. thanks for hosting us!

Dennis met us outside  when we arrived. He and his wife were very helpful in telling us the best places to eat, check out and visit, and also in helping us find our way around. They even got us a metro map to help us maneuver the city.  They provided toiletries and also allowed us to do a load of laundry even though that wasn't in the description.  The apartment was very clean  and comfortable. The apartment is about a half mile from the nearest subway station but the walk is very beautiful and filled with delicious restaurants and cafés. A must stay.
Very nice host! Thank you! We had a great time in your place.

Denis was very kind and helpful with everything! He made us feel right at home, and helped make us an itinerary for our stay in Montreal. The neighborhood was nice and quiet, and the house was about 10 blocks away from the metro station.
Alexia et Denis nous ont très bien accueilli. La chambre correspond bien aux photos et le quartier est sympa. Denis nous a bien conseillé pour la suite de notre séjour. Une adresse que je recommande.

Alexia et Denis sont très accueillant, nous avons passé une très bonne soirée! Merci à vous!
Je recommande!
The host canceled this reservation 60 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
A spotless apartment, and you barely know the hosts are there. There is only one bathroom, which we all shared. But there was never any issue.

It was my 3rd time staying at Alexia&Denis' place and they're not only hosts but truly good friends that you want to make. They're friendly and you'll never get bored when u have a conversation with them. They provide lots of suggestions and advice if you don't know where to go. The bedroom is nice and clean and backyard is awesome. We had a great supper time with A&D in their backyard and we made BBQ! The apartment is located near the water and park is beautiful. The area is quiet and neighborhood is pretty nice. It's 10 mins away from Metro(subway) by feet and we didn't have any hard time traveling around downtown by taking the train. I can't wait to see them again next time!

L'appartement est dans un quartier verdoyant et tres reposant. Les 2 chambres sont grandes et les lits confortables.  Alexia nous a accueilli et nous a fait sentir tres a l'aise chez elle. Elle a été tres accomodante pour l'heure d'arrivée et de départ et nous a même aidé à trouver un endroit pour imprimer nos billets. Je recommande!

Alexia and Denis were very accommodating and easygoing hosts - I really could not have asked for better representatives of Montreal! We had gone into the city not really knowing what to do, and Denis sat with us for a good 15 minutes describing in detail some of his favorite places and the best times to go. Both Alexia and Denis were fluent in English and French, and we would engage in lively discussions on anything from politics to vegetarian recipes to Mario Kart (be warned: Alexia is prepared to defend her championship title on the last one!) On the flip side, they are also perfectly fine giving you space whenever you wish to rest or simply avoid social interaction.
As for the listing itself, parking was readily available on the street and the location was an easy 10 minute walk to the nearest subway station. Bathroom and bedrooms were clean, and the wifi connection was good. The apartment is in a quiet residential neighborhood with no traffic noise, and there are no pets in case any guests might have allergies. I will definitely be recommending this listing to any friends or family visiting Montreal!
Loved the stay ! Will definitely recommend this place. The hosts are extremely friendly. They guided us to local favorites. Will visit them again !
Great value; Denis was a very helpful host! Exactly what you need for a short getaway.

Nice location. Good cafe nearby  called st.lo. bagels. Keep in mind check-in for first say around 6pm. Stay the next day then out by 9am the next  day.  That's two days accommodation which I thought was a bit inconvenient. Beds are fairly hard futon style. My travel buddy got very little sleep in other room. Host helpful with places of interest. Has recently installed new shower. Woken up by noisy traffic both days as close to busy road. Honest review . Nice hosts but probably look for something more comfortable next time. If you're looking for something on a budget this would be a good option.
Nice and quiet place!  Alexia and Denis are very friendly. We stay for one night.
Great place to stay

name: City center private room with bed
summary: House is located 5mins walk from Sham Shui Po and Prince Edward MTR. The private room has a single bed and a big closet, with window. You can enjoy the living area, kitchen and bathroom.  Speaks great Eng, Mandarin & Cantonese.Lots of restaurant here
interaction: A phone card of unlimited data will be provided during the stay, and phone call can also be made by the card. We have 3 bedrooms in the house and 2 are occupied by us,  lots of Hong Kong traveling tips will be provided and also simple local tour if time is allowed.
houseRules: 1. 禁止吸煙, 只限女生入住 (除得到批准) No smoking and only female is allowed   2.熱水爐是儲水式, 不能長開, 用後請關上 The water heater cannot be turned on overnight, it will keep boiling water, thus, turn it off after use. 3. 不收清潔費,請保持房間及客廳清潔, 用過之碗筷需即日自行清洗 No cleaning fee is charged, thus, Please keep all the places including your room and living room clean and tidy, and make sure the dishes are washed after cooking on the same day. 4. 將收取港幣$1000為按金, 退房時將會歸還 (除故意破壞物品) Deposit of HKD$1000 will be charged and will return back when check out if nothing is damaged. 5. 房人將得到1條大門 1條鐵閘 及1條房鎖匙, 遺失需扣除$50 配匙費 1 main door key, 1 gate key and 1 private room key will be given at check in, $50 will be charged if lost. 6.洗髮後請必須將掉出來的頭髮拾起丟到垃圾桶或廁所,以免堵塞渠口 After washing hair, Please pick up your own hair and throw them in rubbish bin or toilet bowl, to avoid blocking the drain.

host.about:
Hi, this is Yi from Hong Kong, nice to meet you.

你好!我是來自香港的Yi .

address.street: Hong Kong , 九龍, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: The location of the apartment is easily accessible - right in the heart of kowloon. The host is really nice and the apartment is clean and neat. The district has much to offer: Strolling through the stalls and shops selling local delicacy, cheap clothes, souvenirs, Chinese herb tea and computer hardware/tech product is an amazing opportunity to experience the Grass-root live of Hong Kong people. Highly recommended!

Vikki (the host) so considerate, transparent and generous. She was very professional yet it felt like I was travelling with home to HongKong. Her home is fully equipped and at the heart of HK, close to nearly most places and the price is fair. 

Can't thank her enough from waiting and welcoming me on the street, touring me in the area, getting me sim card for 3g internet, or taking me hiking in an astounding places. 

Highly recommended if you wanna have a unique experience in HK.
房东是个很nice,而且是个很漂亮的姐姐哦,房间干净,设备齐全,但是跟酒店不一样,在这里有温馨的感觉!价格很经济了｡住处很容易找到,楼下吃喝都应有尽有,而且有特色的点心铺哦,每次经过都很多人排队呢~有机会,下次还会再来,谢谢房东,保重身体喔
房東姐姐人不僅漂亮還非常nice!東西都準備得很齊全,牙刷牙膏,甚至是喝水的杯子和潤膚乳都準備好了!住得非常開心!房子的地段也很好,離太子地鐵站和深水埗地鐵站都不遠,交通方便!下次去香港還想住在這裡!
So nice to meet Vicky! She is pretty and helpful!
location is really foos..the hoat is really nice..!

I could had amazing experiense from great hot's hospitality! The appartment is located in super convenient place, I always go to main district just by walking. And bus stop is just nearby so you can came here from Apt whenever. Vicky gave me special treatment. Had a 飲茶, ane she helped me to buy phone haha
Anyways I strongly recommed this great place to explore Hongkong local stayle!
Yi is very nice. My friend have good time here. And many thanks too for the phone card :-)
She is friendly. She is tidy. She is beautiful. It is unforgettable to me thanks to her gift haejun memories of Hong Kong.

Yi was a great great host! This was my first time in Sham Shui Po District of Hong Kong and I wasn't really sure what to expect.  The unit is small but this is pretty standard for Hong Kong. Location was excellent . Right across the street from the MTR or bus station(walk about 5 mins). Good eating spots close by as well as a grocery store across the street. Highly recommended to all of you.
她很热情,住宿附近也蛮安全,物有所值吧^-^
Awesome spot with two super friendly, warm, helpful hosts! Cozy and comfortable, small but totally fine. Great location. Highly recommended for a visit to Hong Kong!
The place is between two mtr stations, super convenient!! Yi is very accommodating and I had a wonderful stay :)) hope to stay again next time!
位置很赞!房东人很好

it's easy to find!
she helped me a lot!
anyways thx a bunch!
Great hospitality and communication skills. I felt really welcomed. Thank you!
Very nice and sweet hosts! No wifi :(
Actually I met Yi' sister but she was so cool. I enjoyed staying there. Nice location & reasonable price.
Yi - one of the most friendly host I ever met , very cheerful - top class hospitality . Location is quite convenient too - you have big supermarket, restaurants, market, train station all nearby.
Wonderful host who's friendly, helpful, and easy to talk to. Convenient location with plenty of public transit within easy walking distance.

name: Newly renovated + Explore like local
summary: ** Special discount for booking more than 60 days, please ask** Our apartment is located at North Point  which is very close to Fortress Hill MTR Station, 24 hours Convenience stores, restaurants,Bars, Supermarkets, grocery stores, pharmacies, laundry, massage salons, cafes, bakeries, bus stops & tram stop. Easy access to everything you may need in the neighborhood.
interaction: I will greet you all personally ... in the apartment!!

host.about:
Hi !! I'm Wilson from Hong Kong, a young entrepreneur currently managing a serviced apartments group in HK for more than 5 years!

I am an experienced traveler which have explored over 30+ cities !! 

Looking forward to meeting you soon!

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt:
It has been pleasant for all of us.  Close to variety choices of restaurants, convenient stores and public transportation. 
The shower cubicle is a little too tiny, limited by the available space but overall, its a great place.

The Host has been very helpful and courteous to make sure that we are comfortable with our stay.  

Thank you Wilson.

The apartment is very clean and spacious.   It has everything we need.   The location is also very convenient and close to all types of public transport and great variety eatting places.   The host Wilson is very friendly and helpful.   Highly recommended.   Will book again at my next visit to HK.

10/10 would recommend to all tourists interested in shopping, sight seeing, eating food and the nightlife. With the station right outside the apartment and central being only ten minutes away, all the major areas of Hong Kong were accessible and within reach . I stayed here with 3 other friends and the space could easily fit all four of us. Wilson himself was a very accommodating host and provided us with all the necessities and information to make our trip go smoothly. Overall the stay here was essential to our wonderful experience in Hong Kong!

Great location, friendly host, will definitely recommend. Host kindly agreed to great us in person even though our arrival time is 11pm. He waited for us till 1 am cause our flight was delayed. Space is clean and spacious, very convenient stores and transport at your doorstep. Only concern was the size of the shower it’s only 4 tiles big so quite tiny, it wasnt a big concern for us.

Great property, especially if you would like to experience Hong Kong like a local!! Great for business travellers as well. Check-in was a breeze - Wilson was personally there to help settle down. Apartment was exactly as described. Good size for HK standards. Fantastic location - MTR, tram and cabs were just outside! Nice local, Asian and international restaurants within walking distance. Several grocery stores, fruit marts, etc within a block! You get a bit of traffic noise as it is on the main road, but well worth the convenience of the amazing location!
Good 2BR apartment in a great location. The air conditioning is powerful (nice for hot/humid days). Host is very fast at responding to messages. Thanks Wilson!

name: Copacabana Apartment Posto 6
summary: The Apartment has a living room, toilet, bedroom (suite) and American kitchen. Well located, on the Copacabana beach block a 05 Min. walk from Ipanema beach (Arpoador). Internet wifi, cable tv, air conditioning in the bedroom, ceiling fans in the bedroom and living room, kitchen with microwave, cooker, Blender, dishes, cutlery and service area with fridge, washing machine, clothesline for drying clothes and closet with several utensils for use.  The property boasts 45 m2.
interaction: Contact telephone numbers if needed: Valeria ((PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) (URL HIDDEN) ((PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) cell phone (URL HIDDEN) (021) mobile/(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) José (URL HIDDEN)Concierge support; Fernando (caretaker boss) business hours.
houseRules: Entreguem o imóvel conforme receberam e respeitem as regras do condomínio para não serem incomodados.  Não danificar os utensílios e tudo que se refere as boas condições referentes ao mesmo . Não fazer barulho após às 22:00  até às 8:00. Usar entrada de serviço se estiver molhado voltando da praia.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about: Professora de Educação Física formada pela universidade Gama Filho.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
Bom, foi uma experiencia incrível com a Ana e seu apartamento. Primeiramente ressalto a grande hospitalidade e prestatividade da anfitriã, na residência não tinha ferro de passar roupa solicitei e a mesma imediatamente comprou, deixou uns brindes na geladeira como água e cerveja, excelente tratamento.
Sobre o apartamento, muito bem localizado e bem arrumado, camas bem confortáveis e tudo funcionando corretamente.
Obrigado Ana, espero poder me hospedar em breve no seu ap.

abraços

Perfect location for Rio,very secure & very close to Copacabana and Ipanema beaches, the apartment is clean and very comfortable, all the equipment are included.
The host Ana its so nice, it was always available for us to help us for anything in the city, I would definitely recommend her place and i will stay there again if I have the chance !

I had an amazing time at Valeria's flat. 
The flat is great!!! Very very clean.
The location is perfect!
And on top of everything Valeria and her husband are fantastic host.
I highly recommend it.

Ana y José hicieron que nos sintiéramos en casa desde el primer momento (nos recibieron con cervecitas fresquitas), siempre pendientes de lo que podíamos necesitar y muy predispuestos para dar consejos y ayuda. Muy preocupados por que el apartamento estuviera en perfectas condiciones.
El Departamento es excelente, muy bien ubicado, ya que abajo hay un supermercado y en frente un Bradesco. Además muy completo, No nos faltó nada.
Si volvemos a Río seguro pararemos nuevamente con Ana y José.

Local muito agradavel proximo do Mercado Zona Sul - padaria e comercio. Localizado a 1 quadra da praia. Ambiente agradavel host bem prestativa e muito educada. Recomendo a todos que queiram conhecer melhor o Rio!
Excelente anfitrion siempre estuvo pendiente de lo que necesitabamos. El departamento es muy comodo limpio, y muy bien ubicado.

todo fue como estaba en la descripcion, inclusive tanto en toallas como ropa de cama habia de mas para cambiar, muy satisfecho por todo, ubicasion, internet, tv, comodidades y la atencion de ana, que estuvo siempre dispuesta a atendernos, inclusive dejando un celular para urgencias, colmo nuestras espectatibas

The location is perfect, ideal and safe walking distance to Ipanema and Copacabana, including Arpoador just 800 metres away; cheap for Uber to nearby attractions too. I even walked to Leblon from there in under 40 minutes. 

The hosts met me up front and helped me with my luggage. They don't speak English, but are very charming and helpful, so we communicated via (Hidden by Airbnb) Translate, using (Hidden by Airbnb) .

The building is slightly older. One day there was no water in the building due to maintenance. The hosts warned me about this, there was nothing they could do and I was prepared. Only issue is that after the water came back, because of the older pipes, it was brown for a little while, just have to let the taps run for several minutes. 

The bed isn't the most comfortable for an extended stay (I was there for eight nights), but for short durations it's fine. 

There is a washing machine in the apartment, it works great, I dried my clothes by hanging them on chairs, hooks, etc. 

The WiFi is strong and reliable. 

There is a grocery store and a couple of reasonably priced restaurants on the block, as well as two different banks. Excellent for visitors. A drug store is also available on the next block at the corner. 

Overall the inconveniences were small and the positives of this location was great.

Ana and Jose were wonderful hosts.  They were there when we arrived and showed us everything.  They provided a cell phone for us to use to be in contact with them and were very patient with our lack of technological experience. They were always helpful and accommodating. The apt. was very comfortable and convenient.  I highly recommend this place.  Ana speaks Portuguese and understands Spanish.  If you speak English, she has friends who can help with the translation.
A localização e excelente com tudo pertinho. Um supermercado ao lado assim como uma padaria e uma lanchonete.  Tinham muito bons restaurantes nas redondezas, inclusive um 24 horas.

A anfitriã Ana Valéria é ótima, simpática, super atenciosa, sempre pronta a ajudar. O ap e os utensílios da casa são super limpos, o banho é ótimo e a cama super confortável. A localização é perfeita. Pretendo voltar!

Ana Valéria e seu esposo foram extremamente atenciosos e prestativos. Nos receberam extremamente bem. Nos sentimos em casa. O imóvel é realmente o que aparece nas fotos. Muito bem localizado, limpo e funcional. Excelente.

Ana is an amazing host, she was very accommodating with check-in time and was very easily reached with any problems, even though none transpired. The apartment is about 1.5 blocks away from the beach with banks, restaurants, and a super market within a 10 minute walk. Would highly recommend staying with Ana to anybody wanting to see Rio.

Muito boa estadia. A Valéria foi ótima. Super atenciosa e prestativa. Localização é ótima. Acesso fácil às praia de copa e Ipanema. Muitos restaurantes, mercado....
Local limpo. Eu recomendo.

El departamento es genial, aireado, luminoso y muy bien equipado (aunque necesitarìa una mesa) La zona de Copacabana que habìamos elegido, muy conectado con Ipanema, y a pocas cuadras del metro (Gdor. Osorio) 
Anfitriones atentos y dispuestos. Nos encantò !!
A anfitriã e seu marido são muito simpáticos , apartamento ideal para um casal , localização fantástica , gostei muito .

Este departamento está a una cuadra de la playa, muy bien ubicado, en plena zona comercial y turística de Copacabana.  Al lado de la puerta de entrada había un supermercado con buenos precios y hay muchas tiendas de diferentes tipos alrededor.
El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos, muy acogedor y para nada caluroso. Hay un ventilador de techo en el living para la cama que está allí y un ventilador y aire acondicionado para la cama de dos plazas en la habitación. El departamento estaba muy limpio apenas llegamos, con todo en su lugar. Teníamos todo a nuestra disposición, todo bien ordenado.
Valeria nos recibió en la entrada y nos entregó las llaves en mano, nos explicó todo paso a paso del departamento. Su llavero tenía una tarjeta de descuento para el supermercado, ella nos lo prestó y nos sirvió mucho para hacer las compras. Valeria fue de gran ayuda en todo momento. Previo a llegar se contactó conmigo, también durante la estadía por si necesitábamos algo y previo a nuestra partida. Cuando la contactábamos, teníamos respuesta rápida. Eso nos hizo sentir muy cómodos y nos ayudó.
Tanto el departamento como la anfitriona hicieron que tuvieramos una gran estadía en Copacabana.

Ana Valéria é uma hospedeira muito legal! O apartamento dela é ótimo com todas as coisas do que você precisa. Super confortável e super bem localizado com um mercado ao lado.
Não tem como reclamar, tudo é perfeito!!!
Era como estaba en el anuncio de airbnb
Excelente estadía en el departamento de valeria. La ubicación es inmejorable y es muy cómodo. Ella y su esposo muy atentos y dispuestos a ayudar en todo momento. Sin duda lo recomiendo

name: Single private room(Gray)
summary: This private room is located on 1st floor in a shared flat. Flats location is a few steps away from main Istiklal Street surrounded by historical atmosphere of local attractions.
interaction: I am living in the 3rd floor of the same building, so I am reachable in case of any need. If I am not around, you can email me, or text me via SMS & social media anytime you need help.
houseRules: Please pay attention to these simple rules to make life better in our flat ; 1. Please ask permission of your current (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) to invite more than 1-2 guests of yours, especially at late hours. Please do not invite dozens of people without asking other people, if you're in urge to do that, please do it with the permission of others at reasonable hours. 2. Please lock the flat door while you're leaving, also please keep your rooms locked when you're away to prevent any problematic situation. 3. Please pay attention to prevent loud noise after 23.00, there are lots of other people in the building who are waking up early and local people in nearby apartments as well. 4. Please do not smoke in the living room, if you're a smoker please try to choose your own room to smoke. Also please do not throw cigarettes into the garden. 5. 2 times per month a cleaning lady comes to clean the entire flat, but please be helpful to your (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) about cleaning of sha

host.about:
Greetings traveller!

I'm 38 years old freelancer, graduated from graphic design. Currently running my own business, renovating and renting private rooms & flats in the heart of Istanbul mostly for incoming visitors since 2010.

I will be glad if I can help for your accommodation need, and if i can make you feel at home!

reviews.txt:
I just booked a room for a night, before taking my flight. So I can't fully describe Dama's House. However, I can say Ali is a very very nice guy, he welcomed me very well. The room was clean, small but pretty and well arranged. Idem for the bathroom. About the location, it's nearby Karakoy's port (from there, you can go to Uskudar etc.) and nearby Istikal, a famous shopping street going to Taksim (a center place to take a bus and to go to the airport for example).
Finally I can recommend Ali and Dama's House ;)

I stayed two terrific nights at Dama's House.  It is in a wonderful location with shops and transportation in close proximity.  The common spaces (i.e. sitting room, kitchen and bathroom) of the house were clean, and my private room was larger than I expected.  Access to the washing machine was a very helpful amenity.

Great place to stay for a short or long term, international people, really comfortable furniture and very polite landlord. I can really recommend this accommodation. Thanks Ali, for make my stay so special in your house.

Dama's House is the perfect location if you want to discover Istanbul on your holidays or if you are there for Erasmus studies. The neighbourhood is really safe and central and the room is clean. But most of all, Ali is a great host who is helpful no matter what you need: a cab, recommendations for food and drinks, just anything!

I stayed for 4 weeks in the Gray Room in Dama's House and loved this place. The flat is very central (next street to Istiklal Caddesi), very clean and comfortable. Ali was was a great and cooperative host. Thank you very much!! :)

Ali was very communicative before I arrived in Istanbul, gave very clear directions to the apartment, and was welcoming and accessible throughout my stay.  The room itself--the grey room--was simple and lovely, in an apartment ideally located in Beyoglu within easy walking distance of everything I needed.  Perfect.  Ali also arranged reliable early morning transport to Ataturk airport for me on the day of my departure.  It was a really great place to stay, private and simple and friendly.  Strongly recommended.
Perfect location and very very nice people. Only problem was that the bed is not very good, my back was hurting when I woke up.

Ali was a great host. Very friendly and helpful. I stayed a week in the Grey Room. After a warm welcome, Ali gave me a street map of Istanbul and a nice present. The Location is just two minutes away from Istiklal Cad., very cool! Thank you Ali, for sharing your place.

Ali was a great host, so welcoming and helpful, he will make you feel at home.
he is ready to help in any situation, I had an argument with the taxi driver who was taking me to Ali's place and even before I meet with Ali in person, I called him to talk to the driver in Turkish since the communications in English was useless, Ali was ready to help and he solved the problem with the Taxi driver.
For the room its good size room, I had a stay in the Indian room as well, You will met nice people in Ali's apartment, the diversity of the guests will leave a great chance for a culture-exchange, and if you're planing to stay for a long period of time, there will be a possibility of making good friends.
Location is just perfect, 3 minutes walking up the hill to Istiklal Street where you can see the Turkish modern lifestyle surrounded by historical buildings and unique gift boutiques, live music, good food and the best part is Galatasary tower just 7 minutes walking .
I also liked the fact that the building has elevator so you don't have to worry about lefting your luggage!
I definitely recommend Ali's place and the best thing about it is Ali himself.

I had a very good experience at Dama house during my holidays in Istanbul. It's very central and that allowed me to walk to almost everywhere. The house is in a quiet street and it has all the facilities, also Ali has been always very quick replying to any questions and very easy person to deal with. I will definitely stay again there in my next trip to Istanbul.

Ali was great and met me even though I arrived a few hours later than expected.  The room was just as advertised.  The other guests seemed very nice though I didn't have much of a chance to get to know them.  The location is excellent, near the Shish-hane Metro stop, at one end of Istiklal, the pedestrian mall that leads to Taksim Square, full of boutiques, restaurants, buskers, and the world's most flamboyant ice-cream merchant.  Be aware, however, that the neighborhood is full of very steep hills--I brought only sneakers and my feet suffered.

Ali fue un excelente anfitrión; me brindó la información necesaria antes de mi viaje para evitar contratiempos y durante mi estadía siempre estuvo disponible, sin importar la hora, para orientarme y ayudarme a vivir una experiencia maravillosa en Estambul. Su buena disposición superó mis expectativas.
El alojamiento es muy agradable y cómodo, es evidente el esmero de Ali por garantizar el confort de los huéspedes, está equipado con todo lo necesario para llevar la vida cotidiana como en casa y se nota que hace renovaciones permanentemente para que todo esté en muy buen estado. Con una excelente ubicación, situado a dos minutos de la avenida Istiklal  esta cerca de todo; en mi caso hice buena parte de las visitas desplazándome a pie. Para ir a otros lugares de interés, la estación del metro y de tramway están igualmente muy cerca, llegar a Santa Sofía o la mezquita azul toma sólo unos 15 minutos.
Las noches en el barrio Beyoglu son simplemente fantásticas, restaurantes, bares, cafés, centros comerciales, espectáculos callejeros, etc. me sentí en el corazón de Estambul.
Así mismo, Ali selecciona cuidadosamente sus huéspedes permitiendo disfrutar de una agradable compañía.
Sin duda Ali contribuyó a que mi primera visita a esta bella ciudad fuera inolvidable.

The Grey room is a quite small room in a very nice in a very nice location right next to Istiklal. I had a very good time sharing the flat with some nice people from all over the world, mostly also "longstayers". Ali was great and allways reachable when needed. The flat was clean and in a good condition. Absolutly nothing to complain about.

Ali was great from day one - gave me all the information and help I could've possibly wanted and welcomed me personally to the flat. He even went the extra step to ask me whether I needed anything on my day of departure such as a taxi to the airport. The room is just as described and perfect for a single person travelling for a short period of time. What made the experience especially special was meeting the other young people living in the flat who were great and with whom I had a fab weekend!

The house was very clean, Is stiuated in heart of the city center, close to evrything! All safe the building looked like! 

Anything i needed Ali arranged for me. 

Hopefully going there again !
Miguel

Ali was a most welcoming host. He responded to all questions within remarkable short time and willingness to answer all of them. He also provided all necessary information to comfortably arrive to the house.
I had a specific request that involved me not being there all nights and he was very open to make the situation fit to my needs.
I would definitely come back to him and his place.
It's a comfortable and really quite place. Location is great. Ali, the owner, is a real gentlemen who helps, facilitates your stay.  I recommend this place and I'll definitely come back again.

The room is in a central but quiet place close to Sishane Metro station where you can reach several points of interest from.
Ali is a helpful host welcoming you even in the late hours. He provides you with water (drinking tap water is not recommended) towels and soap.

Это была моя первая поездка в Стамбул, очень переживала за то, как все пройдет. Как оказалось, мои волнения были напрасны: Али замечательный хозяин, подробно ответил на все мои вопросы, объяснил как добраться от аэропорта до квартиры, без проблем встретил меня в 02:00 (я прилетела поздно ночью). Моя комната оказалась маленькой, но уютной с красивым окошком, выходящим в небольшой зеленый сад. Что касается удобств, то здесь достаточно скромно, но есть все необходимое: хорошее соотношение цены и качества. Сама квартира находится в очень хорошем месте: это небольшая спокойная улица всего в 2 минутах ходьбы от улицы Истикляль, где расположено великое множество магазинов, кафе и ресторанов на любой вкус и кошелек. Рядом метро и остановки общественного транспорта. Также неподалеку находится Галатская башня, музеи, рыбный рынок, можно легко добраться до района Фатих (пешком через Галатский мост всего за 15-20 минут). Мои соседи оказались очень приветливыми, дружелюбными и позитивными ребятами, мне было легко и приятно общаться в ними, даже не смотря на мой ужаснейший английский)) Подводя итог, хочу сказать, что моя поездка удалась на все 500%, и выбор данного места сыграл немаловажную роль: здесь можно с головой окунуться в атмосферу удивительного Стамбула, забыть о том, что ты турист и просто наслаждаться этим великолепным городом. Уже задумалась о моей следующей поездке в Стамбул!
Огромное спасибо, Али! Больше гостей и больше друзей в твоем доме :)

Ali is really an outstanding host. While it may be cliche to say that he responds to 'everything' Ali really cares about his  tenants/clients and responds to everything in a very timely and immediate fashion. Ali is always happy to help with anything. The location I stayed at was really cleanly kept, rules were fair and clear, and the price point is unbeatable for the location!  I strongly, strongly recommend Ali!

name: Cozy Nest, heart of the Plateau
summary: Come spend a few days (or weeks) in our beautiful and cozy apartment situated in the heart of Montreal's most happening neighborhood! You will share the space with me as, maybe another guest and probably a cute cat or kitten (I sometimes foster cute little furry balls). LGBTQ friendly :) Looking forward to meeting you!
interaction: I am discreet and respectful yet enjoy sharing out stories at the end of the day or advising guests on places to go or things to see!
houseRules: Hi Guest! Hope you will have an awesome stay at our place. Aside from keeping things clean and not screaming after midnight, we don't have many rules. Here are however the things you should pay attention to: 1 - Whenever you leave the house, please make sure the windows and back door are closed and locked. 2 - The front door can be a bit hard to shut so make sure to give it the extra push or pull so that it locks properly. 3 - There is a washer and dryer downstairs in the basement, which you can access through the living room. The basement light switches are on the pillar, situated at the bottom of the stairs on the left.  Our linen closet is filled with extra blankets and bed sheets. it is in the beige closet at the bottom of the basement stairs. 4 - If you use the microwave at the same time as the toaster or electric kettle, it will blow a fuse so try to remember not to do it. If it happens, no big deal, it can be switched back on through the electric panel in the basement. Voilà ! i

host.about:
Hello,
My name is Laura, I am a young and active professional living in Montreal and working for a concert promoter.
I've been living in this apartment for over 12 years now. It holds a very special place in my heart and I am glad to be opening the doors of my cosy nest to new guests!
You will also be sharing the common space with a cat or two as well as maybe another traveling guest.
Looking forward to meeting you and helping make your stay in our lovely city as comfortable as possible.
À bientôt !

reviews.txt: my stay in the comfy private double room was indeed comfy!   it´s not just conveniently in the middle of a great neighborhood, walkig distance from the mont royal and a bunch of nice cafes and bars but the hosts were very easy going, helpful and fun. i´d totally do it again!
An amazing and enormous room and a total bargain at the price. Nice backyard. Great neighbourhood. Friendly and accommodating host. I hereby have nothing bad to say!

I had a FABULOUS stay! The room was enormous and just as pictured. You really cannot beat the neighborhood - walking distance to a ton of great local bars/restaurants/parks and easy access to the bus and the subway. The hosts were so gracious and helpful. I'd stay here again in a heartbeat.
We had a wonderful stay! The host was very friendly and helpful, the room was exactly like the picture, and the location was perfect.
Lilou was a lovely host - communication was super smooth and she made me nice herbal tea before bed. The room is spacious, and you really couldn't ask for a better location in Montreal!
The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

L'accueil proposé par Laura et Lulu est chaleureux et très agréable. Le quartier est un des meilleurs de Montréal et l'appartement est idéalement située. La chambre est très grande et calme. 
Laura est une hôte remarquable, et très arrangeante ! Merci encore pour ce premier séjour a Montréal !

J'ai passé 5 jours chez Laura, l'appartement est grand et ressemble bien a ce que l'on peut voir sur les photos. La chambre est elle aussi très grande, et le lit très confortable. 
Pour ce qui est de Laura et de Anne, elles sont toutes les deux très sympas et mettent à l'aise tout de suite. En bref on se sent comme chez soit. 
Au final, un super début de séjour à Montréal, encore merci à Laura et Anne.

If I had to describe my stay at Laura's in one word it would be 'AMAZING'! Luckily, I have more space. 

The room is just as the pictures display: huge, clean, and comfy! There's a 2persons bed, a build-in closet, another closet with drawers, a book case, a big desk, and a comfy sofa to relax on. Although the room offers more space than you probably need, you can also just hang out in the cozy living room. But the best place has to be the back yard, which Laura turned in a little green oasis. It's the ideal spot to relax after a long day, enjoy the sun, or have a home dinner. And no need to feel lonely as Lulu - a.k.a. the most adorable cat ever - and his buddies from the block are always around somewhere (especially if you give them some of your ham sandwich or sushi). 

I've stayed at Laura's for several months and I've never felt so at home in another person's house. Laura went above and beyond to make my stay as pleasant as possible. I was new to Montreal (actually I was new to Canada) and didn't know any people other than a few colleagues. Laura embraced me as a friend and made sure I never had to feel alone or get bored, while also giving me all the privacy I wanted. 

The neighbourhood has everything you need. The house is near  shops, supermarkets, cafe's, restaurants, parks (including the Mont Royal), several busstops, 2 metro stations (Laurier & Mont Royal; both 10 min walking distance), and there's and there's always some fun - often free - festival around the corner in the summer. Despite all this the street is actually really quiet and is very safe!

Laura was a brilliant host. The key pick up was well-organized and I felt immediately welcomed into the home. Essentials/amenities were provided for which made it much easier.

She also gave us great advice on where to go and eat. Overall Laura was just an awesome host.

I stayed here for a week during one of the many festivals in Montreal. Communication before arrival was great and when I checked in there was a lovely hand written welcome letter with instructions as the host was at work.

The room was as pictured in the listing, clean and bright and the double bed was super comfy ( i slept really well). Location was also great right next to St.Laurent with cafes and restaurants near by and a large supermarket. 

Laura and her housemates made me feel super welcome in their home and would stay here again.
Super cute apartment, with a great room! Laura was super welcoming and made my stay very enjoyable. I would definitely recommend this place! I had a great time!

Our stay with Laura was wonderful! The room was clean and homey and the location was very central and interesting. Lilou was great at communicating with us about arrival and departure and very friendly - providing us with some tips about what to do in the city. She really went above and beyond to accommodate us... I'd definitely recommend staying here!

Laura was awesome to stay with! Her place is in the BEST location, in the artistic area of Montrèal, very close to a bus station, grocery store, coffee shops, music bars and very good restaurants. The bedroom was so beautiful, clean, cosy and comfortable! I went to Montrèal on my own and I couldn't choose a better flat/area in the city. As a woman you can walk wherver you want feeling so confident and safe!!! 

The whole apartment is so clean and beautiful! I got there just in time for good weather, and Laura was so nice to me, ready to answer to any question of myne, every time I needed, by phone and in person. We also had a lovely chat together in her fantastic courtyard and she invited me to her tasty birthday party introducing me all her friends. She has been great to me!
If you want to go to Montrèal, you absolutely have to go in her place!
Die Lage ist super, die Gastgeberin sehr herzlich und nett. Absolute Empfehlung! :)

The room was spacious and clean. Lucy was very welcoming and great to have a chat with! Our stay was only 3 days so Lucy suggested some great places to eat and things to do. Close to some great places to eat and shops.

Laura est une hôte très chaleureuse, accueillante et communicative.
Le logement est dans un quartier très agréable, la chambre est spacieuse et conforme aux photos. 
Son chat Lulu est mignon tout plein et très calme. 
Nous recommandons fortement après les deux belles journées passées à Montréal.

Such a lovely space and host! Arrival was very easy, and the apartment and room I was staying in (the front room) were clean and well decorated. The backyard was an great place to chill out - very relaxing and private. 

The host, Laura, was very friendly and laid-back. The resident kitty was possibly even more friendly than Laura, and will monopolize your whole stay with her adorableness if you let her. 

The area is very close to bus routes, as well as some small coffee shops and restaurants, and of course the beautiful Mont Royale. The Mile-End neighborhood is eclectic and cute, with lots to see even if you're just wandering. 

I would absolutely stay here again and recommend it to friends headed to Montreal.

Fantastic experience. Laura was incredibly friendly and accommodating. The room was comfortable and everything we needed for our week in Montreal. It was perfectly located to easily get anywhere we wanted to go into the city easily. Would highly recommend and would definitely stay again next time I come to Montreal.

I loved the neighbourhood - pretty houses and cool cafes and lots of young people on bikes. I really appreciate the simple but tasteful way that Laura has furnished her house. 
Laura is super warm and lovely, helpful, kind and also gives you space you need. 

The bed is very comfortable with lovely fluffy pillows. The room is really big and lovely.

I just can't fault this accommodation. It's a fabulous inexpensive option.

name: listing_id: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) THE BEST LOCATION IN LEBLON
summary: 3 bedrooms, living room, kitchen, 1 Suite, 100m2, next to the best shopping malls, restaurants and 600m from the beach. UNBEATABLE! Equipped with cutting-edge TV, WiFi and cable TV, Nespresso coffee maker, full kitchen and service of PERSONAL CHEF under agreement.
interaction: Guests can contact me via email or (Hidden by Airbnb) anytime during your stay.
houseRules: Trata-se de prédio residencial familiar, de modo que não é permitido festas e barulho, especialmente no período noturno. Não é permitido fumar no interior do apartamento.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: A Patrícia esteve sempre disponível para nos ajudar, com muito carinho. O apartamento tem localização excelente, perto de shoppings, teatro, ótimos restaurantes e supermercado. Tudo no apartamento estava muito limpo. Enfim, foi uma ótima estadia!

Já é a segunda vez que alugo apto para passar férias em julho com minha família e cada vez gosto mais. A localização é perfeita, o apto super bem conservado e limpo, além de muito bem equipado. Não poderia ser mais adequado às Minhas necessidades.

Very nice place to stay!!!!

Patrícia recebeu minha família de forma muito simpática!!!! O apartamento estava em plena ordem e limpo. Os quartos têm camas confortáveis, com armários. A região é muito tranquila, numa rua particular muito perto da Lagoa e da praia... Recomendo com certeza !!!
A Patrícia, anfitriã, foi muito gentil e atenciosa. Lugar excelente!! Localização maravilhosa! Voltaremos, com certeza!! Recomendo!!

A estadia foi ótima , o apartamento é exatamente como as fotos mostram . E limpo , arejado e muito bem localizado .
A Patrícia é muito gentil e atenciosa.
Excelente!

Agradecida por la hospitaludad, que nos brindo cumplio con todo lo esperado, el dpto esta completo para venir en familia , el lugar muy tranquilo, es amplio el espacio y cuenta con todo en cocina y lavadora, camas muy comodas, es como dice el anuncio tal cual , todo cerca playa, shoping , super , taxi y tranquilidad. 
Me retito muy contenta en mi estadia y regreso pronto a mi pais Chileno.

Apto em ótima localização, limpo e confortável para 6 pessoas.
Patricia é muito atenciosa.
Adoramos a estadia!

Great location near Shopping Leblon, Leblon beach, Ipanaema beach and Lagoa. Felt quite safe there day and night. Leafy streets well lit at night. Spacious apartment for 6 people. View of the Christ Redeemer out of one of the bedroom windows. Master bedroom bed very comforatble. Other double room bed rather old and not so comfortble. Aircons noisy in that room too but fan also available. Kitchen well equipped and good washing machine and drying racks. Lounge had good comfortable furniture and large dining table. Wi-fi worked well. Only issue we had was part of the tiling in the kitchen spontaneously cracked and broke leaving the doorway into the kitchen with a very uneven entrance. Host provided a tarpaulin and offered us two free extra nights which made up for the inconvenience, an offer we were able to take up. Communication with host was through (Hidden by Airbnb) .

A Patrícia é muito gentil, prestativa e carinhosa. Nós nos sentimos muito a vontade, o apartamento era exatamente como o anuncio, super bem localizado com tudo o que era necessário, limpeza impecável. Adoramos a nossa estadia!!!

Nossa estadia foi maravilhosa! Apto limpo, confortável, seguro e bem localizado, o que nos permitiu fazer a maioria das coisas a pé. 
Recomendo!

name: Tent for 2 (promotion:breakfast+dinner)
summary: Do you need a well-deserved break? Come experience our little piece of Hawaiian paradise! Our beautiful, recently-renovated oceanfront condo has everything you need for a perfect vacation in Lahaina, Maui. Right on the ocean, you can fall asleep listening to the sound of the waves, and awaken to see marine life, the island of Lanai and sailboats moored offshore.  Just north of Lahaina town, the condo is within walking distance of a multitude of shops, restaurants, art galleries and more.
interaction: Always available by telephone, text or email On-island Management Company  ChasenRainbows
houseRules: - Rental rules and regulations will be emailed to prospective guests to be signed upon acceptance of terms.

host.about:
Aloha,
I love to do yoga, sail, kayak, walk and travel.  I have two gorgeous granddaughters who live in Vienna, Austria.  They love to visit our place in Lahaina. I have another grandchild on the way in San Francisco.
Though I am currently on a quest to see the world, my travels always bring me back to Maui, which is truly Paradise!
Kerry

reviews.txt: The condo was lovely and exactly as described. The location is unbeatable. Kerry made sure that checkin/checkout was very straightforward and made us feel very welcome.

Kerry's place was perfect for us! We loved the incredible ocean view, the pool for our 4 yr old (and us!), and the quiet community. From the condo, you can walk to to the beach, the grocery store, and a few restaurants. Downtown Lahaina is about one mile south. We appreciated the boogie boards, pool noodles, and beach chairs. Loved having the washer and drier in the unit, too. Very comfortable, convenient, and lovely! Kerry's place is a gem!

Kerry was a WONDERFUL host. She consistently responded to each message quickly and left us with everything we needed. Her condo is adorable, comfortable, clean, and well equiped.  We felt very lucky to have the opportunity to stay in such a beautiful place in paradise. Kerry's condo is literally right on the ocean! The sound of the waves, the sea turtles, the boats, island views, stars at night are just a  few things we enjoyed while staying in her Lahaina condo. We had everything we needed to relax and create wonderful memories in Maui!! 

Mahalo Kerry for sharing your place in paradise with us! We would love to return in the future and will recommend your condo to our loved ones!
Perfect Place in Lahaina, everything in walking distance, beautiful condo, well furnished, safe place, exciting view

Ideal location for the single female traveler!

I didn't even rent a car, took an economical shuttle (Robert's) from the airport and used the city bus (a couple blocks away) to get to other parts of the island. Max $4/day for unlimited bus rides and no parking hassles what-so-ever!  (Read reviews for car rental at OGG and you'll find another great reason for going car-free! Not recommended, however, if you wish to do inner island sight-seeing such as Haleakala or Road to Hana.) There is parking under the building.

Safeway is 2 blocks away and fabulous Baby Beach is a 10 minute walk. BTW, Baby Beach is spectacular. Easily the clearest water I've ever snorkeled in.
