Swim between circular coral outcroppings to see tropical fish and sea turtles. At low tide, wade out hundreds of yards and the water is not even waist high.  Kaanapali Beach - miles of sand, waves and tiki bars is just a half hour walk north or 12 minute bus ride. Easy to get to Black Rock for more superior snorkeling.

Comfortable Murphy bed in the living room lets you sleep to gentle breezes and the sound of the ocean. Nice (and very clean) pool area overlooking the ocean is the perfect spot to see sea turtles feeding at dawn and dusk. Very helpful manager on site who will take you out snorkeling, if you just ask.

Every appliance and amenity you need for a relaxing vacation.  Can't wait to go back!

An outstanding place to enjoy Maui! Spacious comfortable condo with a pool and an amazing waterfront view— including sea turtles, if you’re lucky. Located close to Lahaina town shops and restaurants, as well as Baby Beach. We got around easily  without a car. Would stay here again any time.

The condo is right on the water with ocean view everyday; all day. Honu(turtles) say good morning from balcony, almost every day. The beds are comfortable. The ice maker is perfect. Kitchen is fully functional. The ocean breeze all night is refreshing. No AC though. The distance to Old Lahaina is perfect! We went for breakfast, lunch and dinner without any problem. The washer and dryer helped to dry out our wet towels. I loved looking at Lanai every morning too as was my honeymooners island. Easy ferry over to Lanai too. Perfect for family of 3-4. Place perfect for sunsets too.
Great location,close to everything. Highly recommend. The pool is a bonus. My family had great time there.
Great views, great location to everything. Very cute condo. You’ll love the sound of the waves.

Thank you Kerry your place was fantastic! The location was great the amenities were wonderful and the view was unbeatable. Absolutely will stay here again when we come back to Maui! Cannot thank you enough!
What a great place! The view is amazing. We spent our days watching the sea turtles, dolphins and lots of whales. You are practically on the water-probably one of the best views on the island.

name: Big, glamorous, 4BR, 3-story house
summary: Our 4-bedroom, 3-story beautiful Brooklyn townhouse is a great place to stay for your NYC trip.   Located in Fort Greene, right in the heart of Brownstone Brooklyn's Arts District and only 10 minutes by Subway to Manhattan.
interaction: Contacts – Next door neighbors (to the right if you are facing our front door) are Martin (pronounced Mar-teen) and Pam.

host.about: We are a family of five with three grade school age children.   We are living out of the US for a couple of years and are happy to rent out our house when we are gone.   Fort Greene is an incredible neighborhood and we always love being able to give our guests a taste of "real life" in NYC.

reviews.txt:
We stayed here for 14 days in August 2013. When we arrived we immediately felt at home. The house is very spacious and cosy, with all modern comfort.
It is located in a quiet street in a very nice and lively neighbourhood with plenty of good restaurants. It is very conveniently situated close to the most important subway lines.
In short, we were very happy to have booked this place !

We enjoyed our stay in Jon's home for 10 days during August 2013.  It was a very clean, well kept, spacious, and beautiful 3 floor townhouse.  It was definitely worth staying there given that sometimes we needed to accomodate more people, and have a nice space for visitors to come over.  Jon was out of town, but he was quite responsive to my emails.

Jons und Lisas sehr schönes und gemütliches Brownstonehouse liegt in Fort Greene in Brooklyn. Wir mochten die Umgebung sehr und haben die vielen kleinen Cafes und die tollen Restaurants sehr genossen. Vor allem WALTERS in der Dekalb Ave.
Im Haus in der St Felix Street haben wir uns von der ersten Sekunde an wohl gefühlt und haben unsere Wahl in den neun Tagen unseres Aufenthalts kein einziges mal bereut. Jon hat uns im Vorfeld sehr viele gute Tips die Gegend betreffend gegeben und hat uns den Schlüssel sogar per FedEx nach Berlin geschickt.
Im Haus selber ist genug Platz, wenn man zu viert anreist hat jeder ein eigenes Schlafzimmer, es ist aufgeräumt und sauber, das Internet funktioniert einwandfrei und in der Küche macht es großen Spaß zu kochen...
all thumbs up!!!

We had a really nice stay in Jon and Lisa's house in Ft Greene (Brooklyn) during the Spring holidays, April 2014  The house is spacious (we were 7 adults) and nicely decorated. You feel as if you were staying in a friend's  house, that's really enjoyable While being a bit away from the busiest and noisiest places in New York, the house is well located as the numerous subway lines can take you to any place in Manhattan or other places in New York quite fast. We  just had a short chat with Lisa as we were leaving and she was just arriving, she is a really nice person.  I can recommend the place quite warmly.  Pierre B , from Belgium

We needed a house for the summer while we renovated our nearby house. Jon's house was perfect. Jon was a great host, very helpful and great communicator. The house was perfect for our family, lots of toys and kids books. 

Everything in the house is exactly as the listing, all the rooms are good size, lots of light and with A/C.  We had a great time and would definitely recommend the house to anyone else.

The neighborhood is truly amazing! The restaurants and parks in Fort Greene are really great. Jon is super-helpful, very friendly, and always available to answer a question. The house is perfect for a family with kids. They have an amazing collection of books, games, and toys. Great living room/dining area. There is a little bit of construction nearby, but it didn't really bother us. We loved our stay here and would definitely return in a heartbeat!

Our family stayed in Jon and Lisa's house for our son's wedding. They have a lovely, comfortable, clean home. It accommodated our family of 8 very nicely. The location is wonderful, near restaurants, subways, and shopping. We will cherish the memories we made while 
staying there. We would definitely stay there again.  
We thank Jon and Lisa for sharing their home with us. 
Linda

We secured the property way before the arrival date as we thought it was a perfect match to our needs - a large group of adults and three kids - , and the property stayed to our expectations, in fact I would say exceed them probably a bit. The pictures were very accurate, so they were no surprises there. This part of Brooklyn is what New York is all about, a real mix, I would recommend it to anyone that is deciding between staying in  Manhattan or elsewhere outside the big apple. Jon has been very responsive throughout the period we secure the property. Even when his oven stopped working - which was a big deal for us - he told us in advance and managed to secure an alternative, which we finally decided not to use (hope that's ok Jon). My only comment that I think could improve anyone's stay in the future is a mini map of the house pointing to where the basics are, what to use and what not to. It is almost self intuitive, but for someone that was using the service for the first time, I had lots of questions at the very beginning. Can I use this?, do you mind if we eat that?, in any case as I said Jon was always very responsive despite being away in the busiest annual holiday of the year.

Overall a terrific experience.  House is very nice and spacious and conveniently located to Ft. Greene shops/park, downtown Brooklyn and transportation.  Jon was  a terrific host -- very responsive and attentive throughout.
Jon was great and very accommodating and a very nice guy.  He went out of his way to make our check in easy and the place was great!

Wonderful hosts and amazing home! The location is perfect for anyone who wants to get to know Brooklyn like a local. Communication and coordination with Jon was smooth and easy. Definitely looking forward to staying again!

We had a wonderful stay at Jon and Lisa's house.  It's a perfect family home, in a fantastic neighbourhood with very easy links to Manhattan.  We travelled with our young son, and loved being able to enjoy Jon and Lisa's very spacious, well equipped and clean home, which also has a great garden.  There are plenty of shops, restaurants and green spaces all within walking distance.  Jon and Lisa were great hosts and provided all the information we needed.  Check-in and out was very easy.  We would definitely recommend staying here.

Perfect house for our family and friends. We stayed there for Labor Day weekend and couldn't have made a better choice. 
The backyard is great for barbecues and the house is not only charming but also completely set up for anything you might need.
Rooms are spacious and the bathrooms look brand new!
The neighborhood is awesome, too. Fort Greene Park is really close and you can find great food on a walking distance. 
Would definitely come back.

I stayed at Jon's house with three colleagues for 5 days on a work trip. The house is very comfortable and clean, and being able to use the outside space as well is a real luxury. We all felt at home and had a much more enjoyable stay than we would have had in a Manhattan hotel!

A fabulous house that was perfect for our family of 4 (2 young kids) and babysit. Close to everything yet quiet, and wonderful character while being clean and well appointed. Jon was very responsive, helpful and easy to deal this. We'd love to stay here again on our next NYC visit!
We had an amazing time!  The location was perfect & Jon was a fantastic host.  His instructions are easy to understand and the house is exactly what you think of when you think NYC.

Everything was as presented and as expected.  We found the subways to be very close, affordable, and quick method of transportation.  Neat delis and restaurants nearby.  We had three adults, two teenagers and two children and found the home to be very roomy and adequate for our group.  Having the washer and dryer available proved to be a welcomed item.  We will definitely consider staying there again when in New York.

Jon is an excellent host. My family stayed here for my wedding weekend. I informed Jon that my 95-year-old grandmother would be staying here and he answered all of my questions without delay. His home is stunning, and perfect to share with family and friends.

Jon's house was the perfect place to stay for myself and my colleagues. The house itself is spacious, clean, comfortable and conveniently set out. It is positioned perfectly for local amenities - shops, subway, food options, the park. Jon himself was a fantastic communicator and a great host. We'd all come back to the house again!

We had a great stay in this house. Jon communicated very well and made us feel welcome. The house is very spaceous and everything is in place. We can definitely recommand this house when you visit New York. It's location is a good starting point to get te know Brooklyn en the subway is nearby so you can get easy to Manhattan.

name: Thriving city location, dining hub
summary: Step out of this 2 bed apartment into the thriving city suburb of Pyrmont. Short walk to the harbour side restaurant precinct and beautiful bay foreshore walks. Walk to Glebe, City Centre and local fine dining, bars, clubs and tourist destinations.
interaction: You'll have the full support of the team at MadeComfy, a Sydney company helping hosts provide the best quality stay even whilst they are away from their home. A team member will organise your arrival and will continue to provide any assistance during your stay.
houseRules: You are staying at a friendly and peaceful neighbourhood area. Your help in keeping noise to a minimum is much appreciated between 10pm-8am. Excessive noise such as amplified music, vocals will cause neighbours to complain to the Building Manager or Council Rangers or Police. This could lead to an on-the-spot AUD200 fine and/or eviction of the property. This can all happen very quickly so your cooperation is very much appreciated. Please treat our home with the same love and care you treat yours. We have the following house rules whilst you stay with us: 1. Please be mindful of sound levels after 10:00PM to avoid neighbour complaints. 2. If you break something please let us know to replace it. Please leave your beds unmade Kindly clean up your dishes and put them away In case you have rearranged furniture, please put it back to the original location We would highly appreciate if you could take out the trash Please ensure all appliances and lights are off and doors and windows are close

reviews.txt: Sabrinas place was very spacious, located conveniently and mostly well equipped. It was perfect for exploring the city since it's connected well to public transport and you could also take a walk into the cbd. The only downside is the missing Wifi (which I was unaware when booking) but I guess this will be fixed soon since they just recently renovated the apartment. The apartment was very clean (only the windows and mirrors not 100%- not so important) Communication with Sabrina was easy and pleasant. Would recommend to stay here, especially a larger group of people or a family!
Lovely accommodation and great location.

Location was convenient to CBD (short cab ride about $10 or nice walk across Darling Harbor Bridge 15 min walk if you stop to watch people and the sites).  Several restaurants are close by along with a larger Coles grocery market and liquor store right across the way.

Great communication from Sabrina about the location, features and checking in.  Sabrina reached out several times during the stay to confirm our stay was meeting our expectations.

Apartment was very comfortable, well appointed and supplied.
I stayed at Sabrina's house with my girlfriend, sister and brother-in-law. Her apartment was spacious, modern and in a great location! Would highly recommend to anybody.

Stayed at Sabrina's place for almost a week.  As I need to checked in early due to young kids, Sabrina was helpful in granting early check-in :) 
The place was neat and clean upon check-in. Initially there was only one heater and request to have extra heaters were met on the same day. Sabrina bought two new heaters and I am very thankful for that.  Another good thing that happened was the new wifi installed ;) 
Location wise is very good. Minutes walk to Darling Harbour and the Central Station Light Rail. Bus 389 is round the corner to take you to the Sydney CBD which is only one stop away. 
Generally we enjoyed Sabrina's place and will go back again.
Fantastic apartment with a great location, a very helpful host, and everything was provided. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

El apartamento es hermoso, es muy cómodo y amplio, tiene una decoración muy moderna. La ubicación es excelente, cercana a todos los puntos de interés de Sydney. Sabrina fue muy atenta y amable, y siempre estaba dispuesta a ayudarnos y brindarnos información para que nuestra estadía fuera inolvidable. Definitivamente volveríamos a alojarnos en este apartamento.

Great host, offered us with late check out, and late check in 1000pm, very professional, easy going and flexible, great location, 10mins to 20 mins walking distance to fish market, darling harbour, China town, with free parking onsite. Highly recommend and will be returned for our next trip to Sydney.

Sabrina was responsive to our questions and very helpful when we met; tea, coffee and milk had been made available on our arrival which was a really nice touch
We arrived by car and they have a private parking bay underneath the apartments which was invaluable and made things so easy 
This is a great location and the description of the apartment and amenities are very accurate and of high quality and we could not fault anything
When next in Sydney I will look to see if this apartment is available as a first choice

Location of apartment was fantastic. Walking distance to The Star, Fish Market and Darling Harbour. The apartment was also very organised and clean. Loved that there was ample sunlight that passed through the apartment. Parking space was a little tight. Recommend to get a smaller car if you intend to rent one. There are certain things to take note, response from host was not very prompt. Asked for late check out several times and only managed to receive a reply after 3 texts and emails. Parking garage was renovating the day I arrived but was not informed earlier and had to pay for parking several hours. Overall, a good experience.
Very welcome
Good location.
So close to harbor & city great place to stay!

The apartment is in the middle of everything in Sydney, full of dining and shopping options, close to transportation and excursion stops. We have small children and they very much enjoyed the area, as well as the apartment itself. The apartment is very clean, pleasant, and amenities for travellars are all ready to be used. Sabrina answered all of our questions promptly. Thanks so much!

Great, spacious and clean apartment in an awesome location. My only suggestion would be two sets of keys, as myself and my colleague with whom I was staying had different dinner plans and had to coordinate to meet up in the city somewhere so we could return home at the same time. Would stay again, thanks.

Excellent welcoming with clear instructions to secure a soft landing in a very clean apartment in a great location. All comfort and convenience, we did not lack of anything related to kitchen, bathrooms, laundry, ... as well as wifi, board games, "connected" TV ready for enjoyable moments spent inside.

This apartment is run (and owned?) by a management company. It clearly isn't actually anyone's home and has the clinical, impersonal feel of a hotel. But it's well equipped for a stay in the centre of Sydney and the location is very convenient for Darling Harbour. I never met the named host; I was 'checked in' (their words) by someone else who was clearly in a tearing hurry. Beforehand I was just told I would be met, I didn't know where this would be but I couldn't get into the building and had to wait outside in the street. 
There is no hairdryer or air conditioning (this will make it v hot in the height of summer) and the oven is complicated to work. The design of the building means the apartment overlooks and is overlooked by other apartments and there was some noise at night from neighbours as the units are close together. There is also traffic noise. We were only given one set of keys which was extremely inconvenient. On the plus side the apartment building has a small pool and gym.
Accoglienza buona.posizione ottima. Apt. Gradevolissimo
Very professional Airbnb host. Recommend!

Sabrina was a great host
Everything went well, apartment is very nice.

name: Executive Luxury design Apartment
summary: 84 Queen St has an eclectic countryside feel and features neutral sisal carpets, ceramic tiles, a stainless steel kitchen, warm walls throughout and an Italian marble bathroom. There is natural light throughout, including a skylight in the kitchen
interaction: If you need more ... let me know.   Want a chef to cook an onsite meal for a special occasion - no problem.   Fully stocked fridge pre arrival - no problem.  Roses throughout for your special person - no problem.  Anything you want - dream it and we will create it.  (small print - yeah of course there is a charge - lets talk about what you need and go from there - happy to make your stay enjoyable!)
houseRules: Smoking and pets are not permitted.  We are a quite and friendly neighbourhood so please no large groups and noise.    Due to the stair access we are unfortunately not wheelchair or child friendly

reviews.txt: This apartment is absolutely exquisite. The fittings and furnishings are very high quality and comfortable.  The place is like a beautiful parisian retreat.  The location is close to great cafes, shops and Centennial Park, 10 mins from city and beaches.  It truly is a home away from home.  We are originally from Sydney so we know our areas which is why we chose to stay here.  We used to always stay in hotels but NOW we will endeavour to stay here whenever we come to Sydney.  Louise was wonderful, extremely helpful and timely with all our questions.

An amazing place situated in the heart of Woolahra, it was just perfect for the night of our wedding. Louise was unbelievably  accommodating, allowing us to drop off some things the day before our stay, setting up candles and flowers, leaving us a fruit platter and great provisions for breaky the next morning and responding to a 12am locked out call! She is a gem - thanks again Louise! The French provincial/art deco styled apartment was luxurious with a super comfy bed, relaxed atmosphere and situated 2 mins walk from Queen street's yummy cafes and delis! We would definitely recommend this place to anyone interested, it is worth every cent and we look forward to staying here again!

My daughter and I stayed at Louise's apartment. It is absolutely fantastic. Great location, nice little cafes and most of what you could need. Perfectly clean and comfortable. A beautiful shaded veranda great bathroom and kitchen. I would recommend this apartment to anyone.

In a word WOW! We loved it here. It had all the comforts of home and more as well as welcoming touches such as fruit and fresh bread.   The amenities were everything you could want and more. The quality of everything was outstanding. We could easily live here and not want for anything. 

Well done Louise on a fabulous abode! Stunning! We will definitely stay here whenever we are in Sydney.

Thank you!

Perfect! Perfect! Perfect! From the time you walk up the stairs to this beautiful, fully stocked terrace you feel right at home! The pictures can't even begin to describe the warmth and and comfort of this immaculately furnished, fully equipped 2 bedroom apartment! With on site parking, a laundry, the most comfortable bedding I have ever slept in, an amazingly sunlight filled kitchen and in one of Sydney cutest suburbs this place was perfect for anyone wanting to visit Sydney! Close to shops, cafés and restaurants and only minutes drive from the cbd staying here was one of the best decisions I have made when visiting Sydney! Louise is wonderful and caters to your every need and is easy to contact! I highly recommend staying here to anyone who is wanting to visit Sydney for any period of time!! :)

Louise's apartment is simply beautiful - the only hesitation I have about recommending it is that it will become so popular I won't be able to stay there again! My colleague and I stayed there for two nights whilst on business and it was so much nicer that the normal corporate apartment - but still had all the small touches you expect (bath robes, toiletries, hair dryer, etc...). It would also be a perfect place to stay for a pleasure. The location is great - right in the Woollahra village - and close to the city. Louise has exquisite taste and the apartment is decorated with a lot of style and panache.  She was an excellent host who communicated with me swiftly and effectively - our check-in was completely hassle free - and we were welcomed with fresh bread, fruit, and milk. We will definitely look to stay here again and highly recommend it to the airbnb community.

Louise's apartment exceeded all expectations!! Fantastic location, spacious and so tastefully decorated. The most comfortable bed in the world and the bathroom...where do I stop.The welcome bottles of wine, the fruit, movie pass, Louise you are so special. I will stay here every time I come to Sydney. Must agree with another reviewer though, this should be kept a secret as everyone will want to come! Thankyou Louise.

I love staying in this apartment, it really is the perfect position in Sydney, its always spotless and beautifully presented. 
I almost don't want to share a review, just in case its not available in the future..

Queen Street is a terrific location with a vibrant village atmosphere, cafes, specialty food stores, boutiques and more. The apartment is full of delightful surprises and charm. So much more than any hotel room. Louise's 5 star hospitality includes sharing her designer furnishings and collectibles with you, the immaculate presentation of the apartment, her warm communication style and her attention to detail to ensure you enjoy every moment of your stay.

Apartment exceeded our expectations. Spacious, clean and with every convenience you might need. Milk, bread and fruit on arrival was an amazing bonus as well as the offer to check out late. Perfect location, easy walk to shops, park, markets and transport. Communication was friendly and prompt. Will stay again when in Sydney.

What an amazing place! Highly recommend. Even nicer than the photos. We were left a welcome fruit bowl and so forth. Couldnt have asked for more. ! Would definitely stay here, (i'm glad we didnt book the Hughenden nearby, as for the same price this place was incredible) . The spare sunroom with its own bed for one was perfect for the 2rd person staying, and the fact there was wifi, a balcony, amazing location , what more could one ask for. Thanks Louise!

LOVED IT! Such an amazing apartment in a great location.
The host was great- we arrived to a fruit bowl and muesli. I could not recommend it more highly.
The listing was accurate, although the pictures were nice they don't reveal how lovely this place really is. Great location, friendly host, I would love to stay again.
Another lovely stay. Thanks Louise.

We loved our stay. The  apartment is super-stylish, quiet, relaxing and really well appointed with all the bits and pieces required to make it feel like a home from home (a superb bed AND fast wifi). The "welcome pack" of fruit, bread, milk and eggs with tea and coffee (Nespresso - thank you Louise!) were more than welcome for a couple of weary travellers. The apartment's location is perfect - smack-bang in the middle of Woollahra village with it's lovely shops, pubs and coffee places and a hop, skip and a jump into the CBD. It is perfectly located if you are planning to spend some time in the Eastern suburbs of Sydney.  To top it all off, Louise was very responsive and really helpful. Thanks a lot Louise, if you'll have us, we will be back the next time we are in Sydney.

We had a great stay in Woolahra. we enjoyed the beautifully designed flat and the convenience of living in walking distance of Queen Street and Centenial Park. Louise was a great host, meeting is on arrival, going through all the practicalities and popping by just when we left as well. The flat is well equipped, clean and comfortable.

Where do I start? The apartment was just lovely and the pictures really don't do it justice. Very spacious, plenty of luxurious little extras, spotlessly clean, comfy lounge and bed, great leafy secure courtyard with parking and a private sunny balcony. We had absolutely everything there that we could possibly want and really felt completely at home... which is saying a lot coming from a couple of fussy individuals like us. In addition, the thoughtful food items waiting for us was a pleasure and Louise's communication and consideration for us was really appreciated. It is just so nice to deal with someone that is so well organised and on top of things. Lastly, the location was just great. So surprisingly quiet... and we found some lovely restaurants and boutiques at our doorstep. I would love to come back sometime and stay a week to just relax and enjoy exploring the neighbourhood. Thanks Louise :)

It's been a lovely stay at Louise apartment. It is conveniently located with bus stops just a few blocks away, 20~30 mins to city centre and bondi beach. It's also very nice of Louise to offer the welcome pack full of fruits and bread and milk. The apartment is just as shown on the pictures, very spacious and stylish vintage furnitures. The area is quiet and safe, with very nice neighborhood. I already look forward to another stay at Louise apartment.

An incredible apartment. Imacculately presented, with stunning furniture and design throughout. A welcome pack including fridge essentials and fresh bread was provided, as well as bathroom shampoo, soap etc. Beautifully light-filled, my bridesmaids and I felt like royalty getting ready and the photos are sure to be amazing. Thanks for your hospitality, would recommend to any visitors to Sydney!!

I can not speak highly enough of Louise's apartment. If you are after the quintessential eastern suburbs stay and experience- this is it. Fabulous, roomy apartment in great location. Louise went out of her way to accomodate us at last minute and made us feel very welcome. Loved it. Robyn

name: Tent for 2 (promotion:breakfast+dinner)
summary: Stunning secluded bay at the end of our road in a quiet area. 10 miles from Paia and 6 miles from Haiku. Close enough to town but far enough that you can enjoy the country jungle life. We share everything from our farm with our guests seasonally available liliko, coconuts, fruit trees, bananas, and Avocado. This area that reminds you of what Hawaii once was. The Cottage is situated to capture tradewinds keeping things cool. Perfect location where you won't deal tourists crowds.
interaction: I am available throughout your stay, living on property with my family. Being a busy family you might see us at home often or not see us at all; depending on our schedule and your schedule during your visit. However I will be available if you need anything, messaging me via airbnb is best way to reach me. If we see you we will happily chat and "talk story". There seems to be no rhyme or reason to our level of guest interactions some of our guests have joined us for dinner, or just sunset drinks on our Lanai, and some of your guests we never meet face to face. We are very easy going and follow our guests lead regarding interaction. Truly I believe it all depends on guests schedule and our schedule during that particular visit.
houseRules: 1. The premises are to be used only as a private vacation residence for Tenant(s). Tenant will provide the owner with a complete list of all occupants of premises. Tenant will not allow occupancy over that agreed upon in reservation. Tenants will not permit gueuts on peroperty at any time.   2. Reservations are limited to one infant.  3. 100% Smoke-Free Property. Tenant(s) or Tenant(s) Guests cannot smoke anywhere on the property ground inside our homes or outside. We do not rent to smokers. Please do not rent if you are a smoker, even if you plan on smoking off the property. Our daughter is allergic to smoke, and also the residue left on clothing and transferred to our belongings causes an allergic reaction. A $500 extra cleaning fee will be charged for smoking. 4. Please use beach towels at the beach and the bath towels to remain inside the unit. We have beach chairs and a cooler for your use.  5. Owner provides necessary household supplies, dishes, utensils, towels, sheets, And a st

host.about: Lucky we live Hawaii. Friends often describe me as eclectic. I am easy going. Love to play tennis, surf, & hike. I've traveled extensively, for short vacations and long periods of time. I've been know to stay at 5 diamond hotels, my tent, in the open air on my white water raft or in my 88 VW bus in the wilderness. I farm my own land for profit.  You won't find me sitting inside watching TV. I find my peace outside. "Wilderness is not a luxury but a necessity of the human spirit, and as vital to our lives as water and good bread."  Edward Abbey

reviews.txt:
This place was amazing
Kandy was so quick to respond and so accommodating -even when I was a little needy a couple of times (I needed a wine opener and I had one within the hour)
It's a hidden gem and just what we needed to reset life
It had every modern luxury while being tucked away in the jungle and right next to the bay
Thank you Kandy so much for having us
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay

From the moment I entered the property I felt at peace, lots of light, tastefully decorated and clean. The place was very quiet and private,and so was the neighborhood , a short walk takes you to an amazing cliff view of the ocean. The steady breeze at night and the fragrent smell of flowers was great . The beds were high quality and comfortable. I enjoyed getting up in the morning and picking oranges from the trees on the property for some fresh squeezed juice.  Our host Kandy was available to help with any needs and made you feel welcome. I would definitely rent this place again on a return trip to Maui .
Kandy and her husband were amazing hosts. I felt like we were part of there family on their property. Would recommend this place to my mother. We will be back.

Ce logement privatif est très bien placé pour se rendre à tous les points de l'île. De plus il possède tout le confort qu'on peut espérer avoir chez soi (cuisine tout équipée, grande chambre, etc.). 
Kandy est une personne sympathique et accomodante avec laquelle vous n'aurez aucun mal pour arranger votre départ/arrivée mais aussi poser vos questions.
Amazing place, very clean and great hosts. It has everything you want and more.

The cottage is in a beautiful and quiet street , in the north shore of the island .
Its for people who want to get away.
If you need food and grocery Paia is not too far . (15-20 min)
We met our host , and she explain us about the property.
That's a beautiful property with verity of trees, and fruits around .
In the morning we enjoyed fresh orenge juice directly from the trees . 
the cottage is very nice and well equipmened .
There is everything you need there .
Towels, beach chairs , cooler and more . 
The place was pretty clean.
All tough it was kind of hard to reach our host.
I text Kandy asking about place to see around, but I got a late response and not much information,
In general , the experience was very nice and we all enjoyed it .

We went to Kandy's for our honeymoon and had the worst airbnb experience we have ever had (and we use airbnb a lot).  She stopped communicating with us and then tried to lock us out of the house one night when we went back. Thankfully we found an open window, got in, evacuated our belongings immediately and had to pay for a hotel for the rest of the honeymoon. Completely outrageous.

Beyond that, the place was disappointing. It smells like mildew and she doesn't have screens on many windows so you're stuck in a mildewy sauna. I would not recommend it and would advise people to be extremely careful with Kandy.
This place was an amazing experience!  you're deep in the jungle but still close to Paia. Extremely family-friendly our kids loved it! I will most definitely visit again

Kandy was very accommodating, and provided such a lovely place to stay. She responded quickly if we had questions, and is very much a professional in the world of home away from homes. The house is quiet, cozy, and worked well for a family with teenagers.

Thank you Kandy, It was a great trip!

We enjoyed our time at the cottage so much, we didn't want to leave! As Airbnb hosts ourselves, we love to be the 'guests' when we can, and Kandy was a wonderful host. She communicated excellently with us leading up to, during, and after our stay, with quick answers to our questions and suggestions for how to best enjoy the property and surrounding areas. We found both a fresh chicken egg and several avocados to enjoy within moments of our arrival - yum! The cottage was very clean, comfortable, and incredibly relaxing. We would certainly recommend!

My family loved this 2 bdrm cottage.  It's located on an incredibly beautiful piece of land, quiet and away from the hustle--a perfect place to stay when exploring the road to Hana.   The place is tastefully decorated and extremely comfortable.  We particularly liked lounging in the screened porch room. It's a little far from town, but sometimes that's necessary to fully unwind! The only thing I would change about our stay is the number of nights.... We should have stayed a week at least!

Our stay at Kandy's place was great! Throughout the course of our vacation she was very helpful. The location is quiet and beautiful. The backyard provides fresh fruit, truly making you feel the island vibe. Our stay consisted of 5 people for 2 weeks; the house had plenty of room for everyone to feel comfortable. We will definitely consider staying here again in the future.

Jungle relaxation, just what we needed after a week of hectic ocean front resort land visiting. Fruit everywhere, evening winds cooling breeze, even some nighttime rain tip tapping on the roof. The house is charming, comfortable, and more than enough room for 7 of us.  Kandy and her family are lovely, kind, and generous and made us feel like guests, not just visitors.  I would recommend this property to anyone wanting a respite from the heat and traffic of the oceanfront and easy hop up to road to Hana or upcountry explorations.  Oh, and the outdoor shower- bliss under a night sky filled with stars and moonlight.

5 of us stayed here and there was plenty of room.  The house is very clean and spacious.  We had a vegan Thanksgiving dinner on the huge screened-in porch and one of Kandy's very friendly chickens was our guest of honor!  My personal favorite was the outdoor toilet and shower - cleaner than many indoor bathrooms I have used :)  I would definitely stay here again.
We loved staying in this Private Paradise! My kids enjoyed the yard and it was relaxing and very pleasant.
Beautiful place with an amazing outside living room. Kandy was very helpful.

I have read Mark Twains descriptions of his time in Maui. Guess what my time at this house made me think of those descriptions. A beautiful property with lush vegetation and fruit trees of many kinds which you can partake of. Just down the road is a path that has an absolutely stunning view of the Maui coast with a path to a beautiful rocky beach. The house is comfortable and cool and is a great place to relax and rest after exploration. Every amenity you could want or need is there for you. We enjoyed the barbecue very much and loved that we had the washer and dryer. In short I will attempt to stay here any time I visit Maui this place is an outstanding value. Lastly Kandi is a very responsive host and obviously wants her guests to be impressed, we were, thanks a bunch.

Kandy is a great host. The location is quiet, spacious and equipped with almost everything we need during our stay. 

The house is located in a peaceful jungle area, with very localized decoration and furniture, it has variety of facilities and cultural props to play with while we stayed there.

Kandy is also very responsive and helpful to answer our questions. We'd definitely recommend this place to whoever visit Maui.

Do not stay there!!!! The house is not bad first floor but the secobd bedroom is an attic with a chipped beam and my mother hit her head eneterung it as one side is too low. The host will make you strip the bed and wants money and the gusests to to do zero all the cleaning after. She exaggerated the dishes are dirty as my eldery mother must have forgot to wash afork or two. Crazy many requirements for someone with excellent airbnb re iews and years of use so far. Pay more and get a better host. Greefy lady harassing the guests. The house has some paint chip.issues inside.  Very isoleted yet you can see all the neoghbours in the complex.

Great place. Looks better than the photos. Very well designed, very comfortable, cool furniture. Fully stocked kitchen with everything you might need for a great meal. 

My only issues were the lack of drinkable water provided with the house. I was not aware of this prior. Also a bit buggy, but didn't bother us very much.

name: Ribeira Smart Flat
summary: Cosy flat in the Historic Center of Porto, very close to the Douro river and 5 minutes walking from Sao Bento station.
interaction: We enjoy sharing tips about interesting activities and events that take place in Porto and show our guests nice and unusual places of this charming city. You will find a guide with a map in the apartment. We have also created a guide on Airbnb: look for the "Guide of Mathieu" on the Airbnb app.  There are amazing place to discover.
houseRules: En accord avec la réglementation locale, nous vous demanderons de nous envoyer quelques informations d'identifications. Ces informations sont demandées par le Service aux Frontières Portugais. Fumeur: seulement sur le balcon Les animaux ne sont pas autorisés. Frais supplémentaire de 20 eur pour check in après 22h00. PAS DE CHECK IN APRÈS 00H00 Nous demandons aux hôtes de laisser l'appartement propre et de ne pas faire de bruit après 22h par respect pour le voisinage.

host.about:
Originally from France, I have always been keen to discover new countries and cultures. I lived 2 years in Australia where I studied at the University of Southern Queensland. After that I headed back to Paris, thinking to settle down there. After some times I decided to change my life and landed in Porto. I have been living here since 2010.
Since then, I did not manage to get back and got in love with Porto. The seagulls, the Douro and the amazing color of the sun set, will without a doubt, make you also fall in love with this beautiful city.
Make sure that you check out the little guide! There is some nice place to visit!

reviews.txt:
4 amis et moi avons loué l'appartement de Mathieu et y avons passé de très bons moments. Les chambres étaient propres et agréables. J'avais des doutes sur le bruit, mais la chambre dans laquelle j'étais étais super calme donc j'ai pu bien dormir. Quant à Mathieu, un hôte super sympa avec d'excellentes adresses (Adega Viuva pour un dîner et la capela incomun pour le reste de la soirée, notamment). 
Un grand merci et je n'hésiterai pas à revenir chez toi!
Mathieu has been very welcoming and adviced us about some restaurants around. The flat was perfectly clean and well located. I do recommend Mathieu and his flat.

Conversation with Mathieu was always quick and helpful. We didn't meet him during our stay but his friend Ana more than made up for that. Friendly welcome, lots of useful tips and she even brought us the world's most delicious lemon tart for Easter.
The rooms are small, but cosy and clean. Kitchen supplies are basic, but who wants to cook when there are authentic restaurants just around the corner. Biggest bonus of the flat is its location in the historic center. So close to everything you want to do and see in Porto. With a bit of luck and Ana's guidance we found free parking close by and then just walked every day.
Rainy days in March can be quite cold, so the electric heater in the flat was appreciated.

Nous avons passer un superbe séjour à Porto dans cet appartement très bien situé, parfait pour découvrir la ville à pied sans avoir besoin d'utiliser les transports en commun.
Mathieu nous a très bien accueilli. Il a été très arrangeant et nous a donné de nombreux conseils sur les visites et les restaurants.
A recommander!

L'appartement est bien situé, on peut tout visiter à pied, La rue est calme, les chambres sont claires et propres, la salle de bain est par contre assez petite. merci Mathieu pour les conseils et les adresses!

L'hôte a été très accueillant et très arrangeant.
L'appartement est très bien situé.
Je recommande.

En un mot PARFAIT ! Le logement correspondait aux photos, et à nos attentes : à savoir idéalement situé dans le centre de Porto, avec la possibilité de tout faire à pieds. Et en bonus, les conseils avisés de Mathieu qui ont tous fait mouche ! Merci encore !

Communication with Mathieu was super easy. We met Pierre who gave us the keys and he was incredibly helpful and friendly - he gave us lots of tips! He mentioned that the apartment had a few minor watch-outs: like unlocking the apartment door (however we had no issues at all) and you need to nudge the toilet bowl as it can get stuck (this was not a big deal). The beds were comfortable and the place was clean. The location of the apartment is perfect. The only downside is that there is construction work in front of the house and you can hear the neighbors - however this is not something that the host can fix :-) Thank you for letting us stay!
Very well located apartment in the centre of Porto, with welcoming hosts.

Mathieu's place was in a great location;  quiet street yet near the action.  The beds are very big and comfortable. Lots of rooms, big spaces (unlike the pictures), and still cheap. Great washing machine with balcony clothesline.  The  bathroom has a bathtub and a very nice sink. When we got there a friend of Mathieu's greeted us so don't worry if the profile pic doesn't match. He set us up with a map and local recommendations based on our needs and interests.

Mathieu ist ein sehr herzlicher und netter Gastgeber, auf jede Nachricht wurde sofort reagiert und die Schlüsselübergabe verlief reibungslos. Die Wohnung ist sehr schön und geschmackvoll eingerichtet und liegt direkt im Zentrum der Altstadt, so dass man sich gleich wie zu Hause fühlte. Super gerne wieder! Mathieu is a very nice and friendly host, in case of questions he response very quick and was very flexible and welcoming. His apartment is very nice and cozy and in the centre of the oldtown - it made me feel like home. Thank you again for making the short stay so great! :)

L'appartement est vraiment très bien situé au coeur du centre historique de Porto ce qui permet de presque tout visiter à pied. L'appartement est très joli, bien décoré, dans une rue très typique et charmante. Par contre, il est totalement insonorisé. Durant toute notre semaine de vacances, l'immeuble en face était en travaux. Tous les jours dès 8h du matin, nous avons eu le plaisir de partager le bruit des marteaux piqueurs et des marteaux. Ce fut très ennuyant et surtout très fatiguant. Autre petit bémol, si l'appartement est fait pour recevoir 6 personnes (3 lits 2 places), il est impossible de se réunir à 6 pour manger puisqu'il n'y a pas de table (à part une petite table en plastique pour 2 personnes). L'appartement est sinon bien exposé puisque le soleil donne sur le balcon une bonne partie de la journée.

This was a great place to stay. It's very roomie and comfortable. The apparent in general is great with modern rooms and a very modern kitchen, and the location is optimal for exploring the city with many restaurants and attractions within walking distance. Mathieu is great and was very quick to respond to any messages.
Great stay!

Appartement très bien situé au coeur de Ribeira, proche des principaux centres d'intérêt, des rues piétonnes, des restaurants etc. Il est situé dans une rue calme (malgré quelques travaux en face en ce moment).
L'appartement est conforme aux photos et propre. Nous y avons séjourné à 6 : les chambres et la pièce principale sont bien, cuisine et salle de bains sont un peu justes pour 6 personnes. Notamment, impossible de prendre un repas à 6 sur cette petite table et difficile de cuisiner (équipement minimal). Ceci dit, il est plus sympa de profiter des restaurants du quartier.
Mathieu nous a bien accueillis et nous a aidé à réserver un taxi pour notre départ.
Au final, bon séjour à Porto et bon souvenir de l'appartement.

We really enjoyed our stay in Porto. The apartment is within walking distance of the river , port caves, many restaurants, shops and Sao Bento train station. It is in a narrow cobbled street in the old part of the city where everything is either up or down hill so be prepared to walk everywhere which is the best way to discover all the hide local places. It is a short walk to get the bus # 500 to Matosinhos and the beaches on the Atlantic Ocean and the fresh fish restaurants where it is all cooked outside on the street.
The apartment was clean and comfortable and certainly adequate for our needs.
Nous avons passé un beau séjour à Porto dans l'appartement de Mathieu. Tout s'est déroulé comme prévu

Apartment is very well located in the heart of Porto and was comfortable. Construction outside is annoying, not an issue if you are out sightseeing all day but bring earplugs if you want to sleep in. Mathieu was easy to contact and resolved problems quickly.

Lovely apartment and the bedrooms are spread along a corridor which is nice for a feeling of privacy and space. Mathieu was very efficient and agreed to a late check-in at short notice which was much appreciated.

Logement très agréable, propre et très bien situé.
Matthieu est très sympathique et nous a bien renseignés.
Nous recommandons !

name: causeway bay MTR+Tidy Quad room&YT
summary: .Near the subway: causeway bay MTR station (exit E, 2-3 minutes walk; Each room specific independent toilet, hot and cold water bath, independent air-conditioning, enjoy free WIFI Internet bring their own computers, more passengers to provide shower gel, hand sanitizer, shampoo, bath towel. Convert plug, front desk has blown ram and convenient services, the hotel fire alarm, smoke hood detectors, fire extinguishers, fire escapes light fire equipment, etc.
interaction: Special clean the room every day we have to be responsible for the room, clean sanitation, to ensure that the guest every day clean and comfortable accommodation environment. Live in all Hong Kong hotel/hotel, room size/type bed size cannot be specific to each room type bed size/room size. But can give the reference value to each customer. If you have any special requirement, please contact online customer service to confirm. By special tips: many hotel owners and distributed across multiple floors, in which floors arranged by the hotel front desk on the day, to pay to accept
houseRules: No smoking, let we have good air environment; Prohibit party, please don't shout loudly, affect other passengers to rest; Ban altered painting on the wall; Let us together love family, make every hotel can enjoy clean comfortable comfortable!

host.about:
每次旅行都是一种到达别人家做客的体验｡自己有好几处单位,住不了那么多,多半出租,我是位非常好客的人,也是很喜欢旅行!不管你是商务出差还是旅游度假,来我家住吧,很高兴能和你成为好朋友!给你们的旅行一个安全干净舒适实惠的居住环境｡
P.S:如你订好,请留个言给我~O(∩_∩)O谢谢~(Complete payment, please leave a message ~)
During the period of stay: if you are not Chinese, please leave a message directly to me, you need to, immediately to make arrangements for your service
可以加我 (Hidden by Airbnb) (You can add me (Hidden by Airbnb) 
)ID: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

address.street: 铜锣湾, 香港岛, Hong Kong

reviews.txt:
Pro:
-great location & value
-quick response from the host and very adaptable 

Cons:
-hair and dust in bed
-pictures don't represent the actual apartment layout
-unstable Internet

地點離地鐵站很近,周邊的商圈非常熱鬧｡
集結所有交通條件｡真的是十分便利｡
住宿環境在這交通樞紐銅鑼灣市中心,是安靜的｡
安全性也很不錯,

房東也很熱情,服務不錯｡
彭先生是个很好沟通的房东,第一次到香港,不知道香港的房源这么小的｡总体还可以｡

please check careful who the true owner is. they always have different owner with the one they use in airbnb. even phone number, i had a bad experience about finding the owner about 30mins, no one take my phone until i found out they actually have different owner with different phone number.
算便宜啦
没有烧开水的壶 还是楼下大爷那里灌的
好!就是空调有点老化｡有点杂音
房间位于铜锣湾,一个房间隔出一个独立卫生间,麻雀虽小 五脏俱全,卫生也挺好的,洗脸台没有热水,房间空调噪音比较大,其他都很好
内地来的客户建议可以 (Hidden by Airbnb) 导航,更精准一些｡
与描述相符吧,和爸妈孩子去的,香港寸土寸金这样的不错了,我们是一家人去的地方小点相互克服下,一个淋浴间,全家就只有我洗漱需要比较久的时间所以还好不会赶,如果是朋友去玩的话建议两个两人间的可能会好点｡
整体还算不错的,还挺干净
房東人很好,很願意幫助房課解決問題;但在實際入住時遇到給錯地址,寄物規範資訊與airbnb上描述不同等問題,需再改善
他们屋里有点臭,而且并不能见到房东

不差钱的请绕行,其实房源不是民居,属于家庭旅馆,和屋主只有电话联系,负责的是手下一名菲佣,给老板打电话,张口就是boss(¯へ¯)｡交通便利,离铜锣湾地铁E口1分钟,属于商业区,没有热闹的夜市,但地铁站上方的SOGO有特别棒的大超市,shopping可以,体验香港风情就算了｡房间小的要命,相当于国内如家的标间放了两张大床,大行李箱打开几乎就没地方站人了,主要是经济,毕竟这里寸土寸金嘛,适合出门有地方住就好,不挑的人｡PS,网站预留的电话不是屋主BOSS的,是个深圳的电话,感觉像中介｡
太差了,小的不能再小了,噪音太大,第一天入住,热水器嗡嗡的声音响了一宿,第二天换了一个地方,屋里面的味道呛死人,一宿没睡,住的地方还有狗,还比不上北京的快捷酒店,总之是太差了,很失望的一次旅行

name: Twin Room With Window
summary: (2 sigle bed inside,n have bathroom inside,24h hot water,free wifi,Free luggage) All our rooms tidy n clean,free wifi,air-condition,shower room.
interaction: 本公司代訂各機票,澳門船票;出售機場巴士車票,八達通租借,主題公園門票(海洋公園,迪士尼樂園),山頂纜車+摩天塔,杜莎夫人,昂坪360觀光纜車,｡歡迎查詢!
houseRules: 晚上10點後請保持安靜(PLEASE BE QUITE AFTER 10.PM)

host.about:
我是一個熱情好客的人,歡迎與來自世界各地的人交流｡這個賓館是我用心裝修整理的,地理位置優越,臨近旺角地鐵站,購物方便,還有專門巴士去各處的主題公園｡藉助這個機會,更能為客人介紹香港的文化與人情味｡ 
I am the manager of Amigo Inn , my name is Jim, we have 23 rooms , so I guess  one of my rooms can fit your budget
Our inn located  in city center , MONGKOK where is most busiest area n transportation center to any where in hk, as u may know
  Subway/Mtr ---MONGKOK mtr n find the exit E2 which is the nearest exit to my hostel
We also provide discounted theme park  ticket like Disney park , ocean park n peak tram

reviews.txt: 房东人很好,住这非常方便,从地铁口出来5分钟就到,附近餐馆很多,小店也多,吃饭逛街太便利了｡房间虽小但是很干净卫生,性价比高,值得推荐
距离地铁站特别近,出行非常方便,宾馆的阿姨跟前台都特别的友好,给我们讲解路线还推荐美食,我们两个女生买了好多东西在要走的时候有一位宾馆的叔叔还特意帮我们把箱子给抬下去了,真的特别感谢!房间也很好我们特别满意!下次来香港还会订这里!很棒的一次旅行!
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

老板人真的很好｡
去香港大部分需要买的东西都可以在老板那里低价买到｡巴士票,迪士尼门票,手机卡,换港币都可以找老板搞定,而且老板也很乐意给大家很好的建议｡
老板很热心,位置也很好
我们在Jim的inn里住了3个晚上,头一个晚上因为房间空调有气味以及漏水睡得不是很好,不过次日Jim遍给我们提供了一个最好的双人套房,并且为我们免费提供水｡ 总体感觉不错｡
We had a great time here, thank you for your instruction about interesting place and food
Jim is always ready to answer your inquiries. Place is nice and comfy. Would definitely recommend this place
房東非常友善我離開嘅時候佢仲送我哋去車站非常感激下次再嚟我會選擇這裏
Jim's place is very convenience for everythings. Jim and his staffs are really helpful and friendly. I'm really sastified with the place.

located right smack in sneakers Street so it was super convenient, within 5mins walk to mongkok mtr as well. 

note that the elevator starts on the 2nd floor so you'll still have to climb up about 4 flights of stairs! 

overall decent room
地理位置优越,老板热情,走的时候还帮忙把箱子提下楼｡
谢谢前台热情的叔叔阿姨,还帮我们寄存行李｡房间虽然小但是打理得干净,五脏俱全,水壶洗漱用品拖鞋什么的问前台都有,还有公用冰箱｡位于旺角,交通购物吃饭超级方便｡不过晚上外面有时候会有飞车党有点吵,这也没事,戴耳塞就可以入睡了｡性价比很高,值得推荐｡

Jim and his staff were friendly and checking in and out was very easy.  Very well located in Mong Kok, close to the subway and lots of shops and (Website hidden by Airbnb) can be a bit loud if you're not used to sleeping with city sounds. A great place to stay in Hong Kong for the value and location

숙소는 몽콕 레이디스마켓에 위치해 있습니다. 다른 후기와는 다르게 시끄럽지 않았으며, 바퀴벌레도 나오지 않았습니다. 
2층부터 엘레베이터가 있기때문에 1층에서 올라가기엔 조금 힘들긴 합니다.
주인은 매우 친절하고, 짐도 잘 맡아주십니다.

Jim's place is great for traveling around, it is very near the MTR (about 5 mins away). There's also the ladies market and sneakers street nearby. The toilet has a bit of odour but overall, great stay and value for money. It was a pleasant stay for two girls. Thank you Jim and the rest like Margaret for your help and kind hospitality!
前台的叔叔阿姨人非常好 很乐于解答游客的问题 住的位置很好 方便购物和旅游吃饭 下次还会来香港还会选择这里的 赞!
好房东,值得信任,推荐住宿!^_^
老板人非常好非常热心 有什么问题就会很快的帮我们解决 房间虽然很小但是很干净
很满意

name: Catete's Colonial Big Hause Room B
summary: Old floor, intirely reformed, destined to receive people in a very harmonious and welcoming place. Located at Catete's neighborhood, with a very easy access to the metro station, a lot of bus lines, next to a excellent trade and things to do around.
interaction: Sou geógrafa, gosto de arte e cultura. Moro neste endereço (porém em outro espaço, que não o casarão) com meu companheiro Carlos Henrique, que é músico, farmacêutico e acupunturista, meus filhos Pedro, estudante do ensino médio e Estevão estudante de antropologia . Somos todos os três responsáveis pelas hospedagens e manutenção do Casarão. Sejam bem vindos! Estaremos com total disponibilidade para ajudá-los.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
A Beatriz foi bastante atenciosa e respondia as minhas dúvidas muito rapidamente antes da viagem. O bairro do Catete tem uma localização boa, conseguimos ir para a Lapa à pé e também para outros lugares como o aterro e a praia do Flamengo durante o carnaval. A estação de metrô também é perto e tem várias opções de alimentação muito próximas à casa. O layout da casa assemelha-se à um hostel, o quarto que eu fiquei tem tamanho excelente para 4 pessoas e tem ar condicionado, o que faz muita diferença com o calor que está no Rio de Janeiro. Existem 4 banheiros, que são suficientes para o número de pessoas que cabem na casa, entretanto durante todos os dias que passei lá, o banheiro não foi limpo nenhuma vez, por sorte os hóspedes estavam mantendo-o em condições de uso, mas seria importante limpar o banheiro de vez em quando. 
Outro ponto importante é que os quartos são ligados por uma porta que não tem fechadura e é bem fina, ou seja, a privacidade não é garantida e o barulho de um quarto pode ser ouvido perfeitamente no outro.
O preço é justo pelo que é oferecido, seria importante apenas melhorar a limpeza e verificar se é possível fechar a comunicação dos quartos.

name: Large 3 bedrooms apartment
summary: This favourite home offers a huge balcony, lots of space, easy life, all the comfort you need and a fantastic location! The beach is only 3 minutes away. Metro is 2 blocks away (starting august 2016).
interaction: During your stay, I'll be generally available if you have any questions - just call, text or email.
houseRules: -No smoking in the flat please, but you can smoke on the balcony!  - I would appreciate if you can treat it as your own place. - No parties allowed. - Be considerate of neighbours. - Please, turn off all ACs when leaving the house. - I will be as accommodating as possible for early check-ins or late check-outs. - All guests must be confirmed, and no additional guests are allowed.

host.about: Born in London, raised in Rio, living in Lisbon. Love to travel around the world, to meet new people and their culture.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Luísa é uma pessoa muito correta e preocupada com a boa estadia. Apartamento aconchegante e perto da praia.
Luísa é excelente pessoa muita atenciosa, seu apartamento é bem aconchegante e perto da praia. Voltarei em breve
Luísa é excelente pessoa, o apartamento é muito bem localizado e amplo.  E 01 quadra da praia.
Excelente imóvel, bem localizado e aconchegante e proprietária muito atenciosa. Voltarei
Ótimo imóvel, uma Quadra da praia e próximo de farmácia e supermercado.

Ótimo imóvel aconchegante e próximo do melhor ponto da orla.
A anfitriã é muito atenciosa, voltaria em outra oportunidade.

name: Private Room (2)  in Guest House at Coogee Beach
summary: Room 2  Private room in charming recently renovated federation guest house at Coogee Beach. Prices are per room for 2 People only. A queen  and a single bed. Not suitable for group booking All rooms have  TV, desk, wardrobe, beds, unlimited wifi 2 mins from the beach, cafes and transport. This is not a party house but a safe and clean place to stay. Share bathrooms and kitchen... All common areas are cleaned daily.
interaction: I am happy to provide advice on local restaurants and travel tips.
houseRules: Leave it as you found it! Clean :)

host.about: Welcoming host who wants you to enjoy the beautiful surrounds at Coogee Beach

reviews.txt: My stay at David's Coggee Beach house was excellent. It's a big house with 10 large bedrooms, and common livingroom and large kitchen, deck (super nice) and bathrooms (3 bathroom area with individual shower (nice one), sink and toilet). I met nice people who gave me good advices to get around Sydney. David, the host, is very responsible and responded on the post to my emails while I was there. Being large, the house is very quiet and no one really bother anyone else. A cleaner shows up everyday, they were two ladies when I was there. They do an amazing job keeping the place spotless, and they are also very sweet. Now, Coggee is an amazing place. The house is up the street from the beach- there is also a large green park next to the beach. It's really nice. I went swimming at the ladies bath (sometype of sea water swimming pool on the beach) the first morning despite being Winter: amazing! I find that the picture showing Coggee beach do not make justice. It is so much more beautiful. I can't wait to go back there. (details: bus are down the street, Sydney downtown is 25min away, the airport is 20 min away (35$ for a cab), Bondi beach is 2 beaches away :p (20min), and peroquees are all around:)

David introduced himself almost immediately on arrival and made me feel welcome. Place was exactly as posted. Other guests were interesting, courteous and helpful. Room was comfortable as was the bed. Large, easy share kitchen well organized and clean. The only negative (for me with recent hip replacement surgery) was all hand washing sinks except kitchen sink were one flight of stairs down. Immediate neighborhood pretty residential. Commerce and Coogee Beach just a short walk.
David was a very nice and hepful host, we loved it to stay in his Apartment :) it was always clean and tidy.
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

When I arrived at Sydney, I received David's message about our arrival time, and let us know the room is ready. The house of David is very easy to find. The house is big. The manager helped us to check in and introduced the use of the house in detail.The room is very big. The bed and storage space are large, The room is tidy and have a TV, even though our English is not very good, Johnny patiently explain for us.There are a lot of rooms. The kitchen has adequate facilities.The tenant from Brazil and France, and all people are very friendly, liking to chat. You can know many friends here, in addition to go out a few steps to reach the beach. The scenery is very beautiful.There are a lot of lines, bus station to attractions which is very convenient.Johnny is very keen to send us to the destination when we leave. The people are very good and here is a very worth to stay.David and Johnny are nice, and I hope I can come here again next time.

The house is a big house shared by usually long term tenants (months to years). All of them have been lovely and made me feel very welcome even if I was there for a short amount of time. 
The room was immense and everything was super clean. 
The location is perfect for access to Coogee beach and multiple food options. Many buses options also to go to CBD.
All in all probably one of the best air BnB I've been to.
great experience!

David’s place is full of really nice guests and very close to bars, cafes, shops, transport and beaches. We loved staying here, the place is well equipped with cooking and cleaning facilities. Only downside is the slow Wi-Fi but I believe David is already on the case! Would definitely recommend to anyone who wants to visit Sydney but wants to stay near the coast!

name: Lulapartment II
summary: Apartamento situado no centro histórico do Porto, paredes meias com a muralha Fernandina, em pleno bairro típico Portuense, com uma vista soberba!!! Recuperado e decorado com o objectivo de tornar confortável a estadia dos nossos hospedes.
interaction: Um dos nossos objectivos é receber bem, por conseguinte estamos disponíveis para qualquer necessidade ou eventualidade que possa surgir!
houseRules: Esperamos que os nossos hospedes respeitem a nossa casa! Que respeitem os nossos vizinhos, não fazendo ruído após as 22h. Que levem o lixo embora. Que não fumem dentro de casa (fumar nas varandas). Que deixem o apartamento como o encontraram!

host.about:
Olá!!! 
Somos um casal, pais de três crianças! Adoramos viajar!
Gostamos de viajar a dois, em família e com amigos.
Somos proprietários de dois apartamentos no centro do Porto, todos os requisitos que procuramos quando viajamos, temos nos nossos apartamentos, conforto, limpeza, baby friendly, e centralidade!
Esperemos que gostem!
Sejam bem-vindos!

reviews.txt: Apartamento muy bien situado en el centro de Oporto. Excelente relación calidad-precio.

Cristina´s apartment is great, very well located. The apartment is even better than the photos, very new with excellent decoration, with lots of natural light. Cristina was waiting for us with his husband and children. They were so friendly.  She also left us some typical portuguese cakes. I strongly recommend Cristina´s place.

El apartamento está situado en pleno centro del casco histórico de Oporto. Cerca de la torre de los Clérigos. Lugar privilegiado. 
Dejamos el coche los 3 días aparcado en la misma calle y andando a todos los.sitios 
Las vistas desde varias ventanas estupendas 
Todo el apartamento equipado, cuidado, recogido. 
La única pega es que es un cuarto sin ascensor

Un bel appartement bien placé, cosy et fonctionnel à proximité de l'emblème de la ville - la tour des Clérigos.
Rénovation récente et décoration sympa.
Equipement adapté à une famille (nous étions 5 et n'avons pas manqué de couverts par exemple).
Petite épicerie à 2 pas, bien pratique. Restaurants au pied de l'immeuble.
Cristina aux petits soins pour nous.

Tout c'est bien passé , Cristina était disponible pour nous !
Appartement très beau , bien placé proche Metro sao Bento ... N'hésitez pas à y aller!

The apartment was exactly like the pictures show. It was clean and really lovely decorated. Cristina was very fast in her replies via email. The apartment is in a great location, you can walk everywhere.
Nice and well located appartment.was perfect with our three children.
A localização é excelente e o apartamento é super aconchegante e confortável. Cristina é uma excelente anfitriã. Sem dúvida recomendarei o apartamento para os meus amigos e familiares.

Très bon séjour à Porto.
Accueil chaleureux.
Appartement très propre, fraîchement refait et bien situé.
Un délicieux restaurant de cuisine traditionnelle juste à l'angle de la rue, à seulement 20 mètres.
Pour ceux qui ont le sommeil léger, rue bruyante le samedi soir.
Je recommande sans hésitation !

Bel accueil de la part de Cristina qui était là à notre arrivée pour nous aider à nous installer et à découvrir cette très jolie ville qu'est Porto ... merci beaucoup ...
l'appartement est merveilleusement bien situé, et très bien équipé, parfois un peu bruyant mais c'est sans doute le prix à payer vu sa situation en ville
le quatrième étage sans ascenseur complète bien les dénivelés importants lors des balades dans Porto !!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans l'appartement de Christina. L'appartement est idéalement situé dans Porto, près de tout et de quartier sympas. Il est conforme aux images et à la description, lumineux, propre, et agréable. Christina et son mari nous ont très bien accueillis en dépit d'un petit raté sur l'horaire d'arrivée, on les remercie. Elle nous a offert tout ce qu'il fallait pour notre petit garçon: poussette, lit bébé, chaise haute, l'appartement est donc très bien équipé pour les enfants en bas âges (même si le notre à grandit vite entre la reservation et la venue, et n'a donc pas tout utilisé !).
Nous les remercions encore chaleureusement et conseillons ce pied à terre Porto.

Cristina's apartment was an oasis in the desert except the desert was the continuous rain in Porto. We were so grateful that there was space heaters so we'd be able to dry our clothes. 

The apartment location is exactly has advertised: close to everything. Another plus is the proximity of an underground parking garage (15€/day, ask the attendant for coupons). 

We were a family of 4 adults. We found the apartment very well equipped and very spacious. It was clean and everything was in good order. Showers were hot with plenty of pressure. There is a second WC and with 3 women in our group it's a bonus. 

Cristina was a joy to communicate with and she answered all of our questions very rapidly. She was waiting for us when we got there with a smile even though we were late getting there. 

We hope to return one day to Porto to experience it without the rain and we will be staying at Cristina's place again most certainly.

Thank you Cristina for welcoming us!

La gran ventaja del apartamento Lula II es su situación en pleno centro histórico. Es un apartamento luminoso acabado de reformar, las fotografías reflejan fielmente la realidad. Es un 4º piso sin ascensor, pero las escaleras se suben muy fácilmente y eso no fue ningún problema para nosotros. La entrega del piso fue cordial, un poco rápida porque nuestro avión llegó con más de 1 hora de retraso ...
 Es un apartamento muy práctico para pernoctar. 
Cristina contesta rápidamente a todas tus preguntas y cuestiones.
No horário marcado, fomos bem recebidos e tivemos ajuda para subir as escadas com as malas. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, organizado e bonito.

Accueillies à l'heure par le mari de Cristina, nous avons découvert un appartement tel qu'il était décrit : 2 chambres donnant sur la rue, une cuisine, un séjour.... Le tout avec une décoration actuelle ! Tout est propre, bien entretenu. Nous y avons bien dormi et étions ravies de retrouver "notre" appartement chaque fin de journée.
Le quartier est très sympa, à 2 pas de la Torre de los Clérigos et de nombreux petits restos traditionnels ! Nous vous conseillons le restaurant à tapas juste au pied de l'immeuble, en sortant à gauche.

The apartment was clean and comfortable. Housekeeping services were a great amenity providing fresh towels/sheets and cleaning weekly.Access to the trams and metro were nearby taking you to the beautiful sights all around Porto. We highly recommend this apartment!
Great location, the apartment was beyond adorable and spacious enough for 5-6 people.  Cristina was very friendly and welcoming and we had a fantastic time in Porto.
Everything went perfect, according to announcement. The apartment is very well located, very central but also quiet. Cristina is really really nice and easygoing. No complaints at all.
Muy amables y muchos detalles.
Very clean appartment, well located. Cristina is very welcoming and cares about all details to make her hosts feeling good ! I recommand this stay ! I hope to come back soon.

name: Midillis 202 (Double Room)
summary: A double room with its own ensuite shower and bathroom. One of four rooms in our premesis. We are located 5 minutes away from the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sofia at the center of Sultanahmet, Istanbul's major tourist area. From here you can easily take the tram to explore other areas of Istanbul.
interaction: We run a travel agent from the same premises so can offer you the best advice for how to see the sights of Istanbul, suggest tours and trips in Istanbul and farther afield. We also run a coffee shop from the premises.

reviews.txt: The house is really near to the main sightseeings of istanbul old city, with a nice terrace. The hosts are confortable and polite. I had really good time and was glad choosing Kamuran's flat.

Kamuran is very kind host. She gave us full information and support us all the way from airport to the end of our trip. Apartment looks smaller than on photo but it's very clean and light. Looks like new shower installed in the room.  Absolutely unbelievable  view from terrace: one side is Blue Mosque, another is seaside. This apartment lefts only positive emotion for us. Just 2 min walk and you are in the heart of the Old sity. Very suitable for peoples who first time in Istanbul. 
P.S. Be ready for morning praying  in the Blue  Mosque )

Nice and simple room. Good central location in Sultanahmad. Just a short walk to the blue mosque and Hajia Sofia through a nice bazar. The rooms facing the street side are a bit noisy from the street traffic, so if you want a quite room, get the ones facing the garden. There is a washer and a small kitchen upstairs that you can use, and it connects to a terrace. Kamuran welcomed us when we got there and showed us our room. She's usually in the travel agency office downstairs so you can reach her easily if you need anything and get some recommendations on what to do or where to go. Word of advice, don't use their airport transfer car because it's more expensive then just getting a taxi from the airport (taxis run about 50 TL to Sultanahmed and their car transfer is 20$ which is about 72 TL ). We also had to wait 30 minutes outside the airport for the driver to pick us up.

Все было круто, расположение отличное, единственное что полотенца за 3 дня ни разу не поменяли и дверь тонкая, что если кто то ночью ходил- я просыпался. А так за эти деньги просто супер, уютно было очень, все очень чисто, в ванной все выбелено было. Женщина очень приятная, разрешила багаж оставить у нее, пока мы полдня гуляли по городу. Спасибо ей огромное!)
Molt correcte! Hem estat molt cómodes. I el servici per part dels anfitrions ha estat mol amable. Habitació recomanable 100%

We booked this room for 5 days because we wanted to split our visit to Istanbul between the Sultanahmet area and the Taksim area. But as soon as we got here, we knew that this is where we wanna be and so extended our stay. The emplacement of this place is just PERFECT. We have walked all over from here, the metro stop is also close. There is a small kitchen and laundry place on the roof, which was great. Also the view is beautiful. ONE small inconvenience would be the morning noises from the street, but that didn't keep us from having a great stay here. I recommend it, and would certainly stay here again if I ever visit Istanbul again!

We had an amazing time at one of the rooms rented by Kamuran , when we saw the place for the first time we were surprise by the view on the blue mosque and the sea from the roof terrace ,we were having our breakfasts here and enjoying a beer/ wine in the night. The room was very clean we had everything ,even a shower gels and hairdryer, iron,washing machine,we could stuck over food in the fridge that was very useful. During our stay it was very hot in Istanbul so air-conditioning was a life saviour. For all the questions we had about where to go and how to get we got the most detailed explanation,me and my boyfriend couldn't imagine best host then that. All the problems you might possibly have with the room will be solved in a blink of an eye! Location was more then just great, Sultanahmet is the best district to have all the points of interest around you, Hagia Sofia 10min,Blue mosque 7 min ,tram station 8min,lots of place to eat around, only be weary Turkish people(sellers/restaurants) cheat the whole time ,don't order a beer in the restaurant without asking the price ,don't pick up a brush from the shoe cleaning man when he dropped it,in Istanbul is a lot of scam is going on!

Location is just awesome, it's really 2 min walk to Blue Mosque. Many shops, cafes, markets are nearby, which is so much convenient. Approximately 7-10 min walk to tram stop, also so cool. And it's a magnificent atmosphere there. We already miss this place. Host are so nice people, which will be glad to help you with everything. The view from the top is amazing. The room is small, but very clean and cozy. There are candles in rooms which make chill and warm atmosphere. Highly recommend to my friends and will definitely cone back again!
Great location. Easy to walk to many areas of Istanbul

Es war einfach richtig schön und vor allem richtig sauber!! 
Ich würde immer wieder dahin gehen. 
Auch in der Straße, die Menschen sind sehr Freundlich und man wird immer begrüßt wenn man aus dem Haus geht.
Wir hatten alles in der Nähe und konnten auch zu der Bahn in dem wir nur 3 minuten gelaufen sind.

It‘s location is very good, nice view, near to shops and restaurants and Sultanahmet (with a great view of this beautiful mosque). It’s rooftop is great! We loved it. Ardal, the man in the small café downstairs was really nice and kind and trying to help. 
It could be a great place to stay only if it becomes a bit cleaner. The walls need painting and a small repair, and the linens need to be changed!

All in all AMAZING!!
Super nice people welcoming you! Super central, but still quite. Super view. Super service. Just great. I recommend this place to everybody!

La vista de la habitación es espectacular!... y la ubicación es cercana a la estación del metro. 
la estacia fue bastante buena

It was amazing week in great accommodation - clean, cozy, great view from rooftop and very convenient location in the center of Istanbul. We had a great Blue Mosque view from window and it was fantastic and authentic experience.

Lovely lovely stay @ Kamurans!!! The place was clean and well stocked with necessities (everything exactly like in photos).
Istanbul was amazing but I think staying here made it all that much better. Great location, safe, exciting.  Everything was perfect.
The terrace is amazing, I will never forget the view.
这个离清真寺很近,出行特别方便,开始我开始是靠马路的房间,有点吵,跟房东说了,房东很贴心的帮我换了,我行李很沉,帮我提上提下,真的很感谢
Thanks you for everything, it was a perfect week end in Istanbul!
Clean and very nice hospitable hosts
Great place to stay!
This was an amazing stay. Clean, comfortable, and very close to Hagia Sophia and Blue mosque. Perfect!

name: Your spot in Copacabana
summary: Having a large airy living room. The apartment is well divided. Fully furnished and cozy. The building has a 24h doorman and camera services in the corridors. It is very well located, close to the beach, restaurants, pubs and several shops and supermarkets. And it offers a good mobility being close to the subway.
interaction: I am available to assist and answer questions regarding the use of the apartment and everything we can to make your stay a success!
houseRules: Espero que você sinta-se em casa, e cuide do meu apartamento como se fosse seu.  É proibido fumar, trazer animais de estimação, trazer pessoas não autorizadas( que não sejam os hóspedes previamente informados), fazer festinhas  e fazer barulho após as 22hs. Por motivo de segurança, desligue luz e ar condicionado sempre que sair do apartamento.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about: Tenho muito prazer em fazer novos amigos, com outras culturas, informações e vivências. Gosto de ser uma anfitriã atenciosa e disponível. O que estiver ao meu alcance tenha certeza que será feito, para tornar sua estadia no Rio inesquecível.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Fantastic apartment in a perfect location. Ana Lucia made us feel right at home with fresh fruit and snacks! The apt is blocks away from the beach, near tons of great food (Go to Amir and Galeto Sats, thank me later) and plenty of places to hang out with locals (Bip Bip). Highly recommend staying here for your visit to Copacabana.
Ana Lucia foi muito prestativa, nos recebeu super bem, apartamento bem equipado e bem localizado, próximo a praia, transporte público, restaurantes...superou todas as nossas expectativas!!
Ana Lúcia foi super atenciosa, rápida nas respostas e flexível com meus horários de check-in e check-out. O apartamento é ótimo e super bem localizado!
muito bom
Ana Lúcia nos atendeu muito bem e tirou todas as dúvidas da estadia, além de nos orientar em algumas questões. Parabéns pelo ótimo atendimento!
Adorei!
Ótimo apartamento, bem equipado e em ótima localização

Ótimo apartamento, bem equipado, limpo, confortável. Localização perfeita, muitos comércios na redondeza, perto da praia.
Fomos muito bem recebidos pela anfitriã que foi bem flexível com o horário de checkin.

name: 2BR, Walk to the Beach, 2 Lanais, Stunning Views!
summary: Come visit beautiful Kihei! We're located at the Maui Sunset, close to family-friendly activities, public transport, and Kihei nightlife. You’ll love the complex amenities, renovated kitchen, walking distance beach access and the open, airy and light decor.
