This 4th floor condo has 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (both with showers, no bath), wifi, and 2 lanais that are perfect for watching sunsets and sunrises. Great place for couples, friends who want a home away from home, and families (with kids).
interaction: Your keys will be waiting at the main office when you arrive. Check in time is 3pm, check out time is 11am. Our local property managers are available for any concerns that come up during your stay. I am available via AirBnb messenger at all times.
houseRules: - Check-in is after 3PM -Check-out is by 11am - Follow property rules - Quiet hours from 10PM (when pool closes) to 8AM - Do not remove bedding or supplies from unit

reviews.txt:
This condo was in a very convenient location, near shopping, beaches, and grocery stores. Very nice well-kept condo complex and a fantastic pool. Good AC that kept the condo comfortable.

This was our first visit to Maui and it was great! When we visit Maui again we would absolutely stay here again. Condo owner was very helpful with very quick replies to our questions.

Andrew was a very responsive and enthusiastic host!  He made us feel very welcome at the unit, which we appreciated.  He also replied very quickly to emails and checked in with us when we arrived and left.

The apartment itself is very well-stocked with kitchen appliances, cookware, dining essentials, and beach gear (e.g., boogie boards and beach towels).  We appreciated the convenience of the dishwasher and washer and dryer.  The grounds themselves are perfectly manicured and have many bbq grills which we used on several occasions.  The grounds are very clean and the bbq grills themselves are cleaned by the apartment complex's maintenance crew.  The grounds are right on the edge of a shore (not exactly a beach that one would go to for swimming and lounging) that provide stunning views of the water and sunset.

This apartment is a great value in that you are centrally located among different sights such as Wailea Beach and Lahaina (a 15-30 minute drive).  We would recommend renting a car so that you can drive around the island.  Very few sights would be easily accessible to you otherwise.  There are also a full bathroom for each bedroom, so you have a 2-bedroom, 2-bath apartment.  The master bedroom has a lanai the provides a good view of the island.  The second bedroom's window looks out into the dark hallway of the apartment floor though.  A free parking spot was provided for the unit, which was convenient for our rental car.  There is also a balcony off of the kitchen that provides you with a great view of the water.

Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this unit!

The listing is in a great location with an incredible pool and great place to watch the sunset. It is close to a grocery story, restaurants, etc. The listing was about as described. Bathrooms were both small but worked, and lots of towels and beach gear were provided.

Andrew is a fantastic host - he is a very active and quick communicator. His apartment in Kihei, Maui is beautiful: the location is ideal, the building complex even has a swimming pool and is right at the beach. The apartment itself is spacious, well maintained and gives of a holiday/aloha vibe. Andrew is a generous and flexible host and tried to accommodate wherever possible. We truly enjoyed our experience and stay on the island and I can only recommend his place if you are looking for a fantastic vacation!

Andrew is a perfect host ! I recommended this host to all ...
If all host was like im! That will be perfect
Great place for the money!! Nice beach and clean condo.  Andrew is VERY responsive and great to deal with!

Andrews condo home  is excellent but the check in at the front desk will be unexpected if early going in. It is not what I expected cuz I was told to check at the front desk and I will receive the keys  ASAP but she made us wait until 14:00hours... it was a bummer..

The condo is in a great location central to everything.   The place is well maintained.  My only complaint would be that you will not want to spend much time at this beach.   The ocean is very rocky and not good for any activities.  Also, no walk on the beach as have to go to Walea to do anytime of beach path walking.  The rooms were ok and everything was there that you needed.
Tons of cool beach gear available, very nice place. Road noise a little much, but quiet other than that. Beautiful sunsets & beach a 3 minute walk away.

Andrews place was PERFECT for our group in town for a family wedding.  VERY well stocked with all of the perfect amenities and even some extra touches for the beach, etc.  The condo is convenient to EVERYTHING around Kihei.  The sunsets were AMAZING!  We LOVED the pool.  Andrew was easy to work with, easy to reach and had all of the info we needed to enjoy our stay.  GREAT AirBnB experience
Great location, a lot of equipments for beach entertainment, very clean. We will definitely stay here again.

Andrew's condo in Kihei is steps from the ocean.  Tennis courts/gym/hot tub and pool will keep you entertained all day.   The condo is. Also stocked with everything needed for a smooth vacation.  After hours check is was a breeze and Andrew's timely responses made the vacation that much better.   Will definitely be back!
Andrew’s place was great!!! Has everything you could need. He was incredibly quick to answer any questions I had. We loved it. Thanks!
The host canceled this reservation 327 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The house has just about everything one would have at their own home! Very well stocked! Thanks.
Very nice place, excellent location!

name: Hip 2BR in Downtown Montréal by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the sleek decor, spacious living area, and beautiful kitchen with modern appliances. Located in downtown Montreal, known for its lively bars and delicious restaurants.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
houseRules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

host.about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

reviews.txt:
really good location, and the centre of downtown is in walk distance.
Room is marvelous, new and mordern decoration, except there's a little bit decoration odour.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Beautiful apartment right in the middle of all the action downtown Montreal! Very easy check in, responsive host service, and everything you need for a short stay! I would definitely want to stay here again for my next visit.
the place is very clean and things are accurately described.
Awesome apartment in the heart of the city. Close to everything. Would definitely stay again !
Very nice appartment, very well located. Only problem: buiding ventilation is very noisy. However, host provided ear plugs and was very quick to respond. Excellent customer service!
They were very helpful!
Bon endroit. Tres propre. Tres bon rapport qualite prix.
No keys required. Great location.
Great stay, host was easy to communicate with via (Hidden by Airbnb) messenger. They fixed a problem with the smoke detector in a timely manner. Would stay again.
Place is in a prime location downtown Montreal. Can walk right up Mt Royal and close to many bars and restaurants in the middle of the city. The place was exactly as it appeared in the pictures.
Great apartment great location
Great spot!

I stayed in this listing w/ a colleague on a business trip. It was perfect and the area is really nice too. Communication w/ Sonder is so incredibly fast and easy. Entry was via keypad so check-in was super easy.
Superbe appartement dans le centre-ville!
I really recommend this rental which was beyon expectations, well located and very clean and tidy.
Nice place!

We can't say enough great things about this host . Any question or concern we had he responded within minutes . The unit was clean and looked like the photos that were posted & all the details about the location were accurate . We would highly recommend this unit and host to anyone considering visiting downtown Montreal .

This apartment was very nice and we really enjoyed our stay. It looks like the pictures and was very quiet, though nearby to restaurants and shopping in the downtown area as well as Mont Royal. The kitchen had all the standard amenities. They provided shampoo/soap/conditioner and towels as well. I would stay in this apartment again. There were only 2 of us but it is large enough to hold a couple more people (though only has 1 bathroom).

Two things to note: as stated in the description, the building is currently under construction. It was very loud for 2 days of the trip but we didn't hear it at all on the 3rd day. Keep that in mind if you choose to book while the construction continues. Second, Sonder requires you to register on their website (with name, email address, and phone number) in order to rent an apartment from them.

The highlight of this place is its location. Easy to access shops, the metro, restaurants, etc. The amenities are good. The kitchen, dinning area, and living room have basic furniture that will work for most travelers. The beds are a little stiff but there are worse places to lay your head. The bedroom with the ball lamps on the side table is very bright while the other bedroom is wonderfully dark. Temperature control is challenging since the only AC unit is in the dining area. Water temp fluctuates without adjusting the nozzle/valve, but that's probably building-wide. During our stay there was construction on our balcony so we woke up each morning to those sounds. We were instructed not to open the windows to avoid dust coming in. On the morning of checkout the next client came in at 7 AM. That was awkward. In summary, it's a nice place but this wouldn't be my first choice for the next visit to MTL.

name: ★Cozy doble bedroom ★Nearby Christ the Redeemer★
summary: Stay in a quiet place with great location! Free wifi access throughout the house. Close to shops, restaurants, bakery, pharmacies, bus stops and subway. We're also close from the tram to the Christ the Redeemer! Situated on the South Zone of Rio de Janeiro, on the charming neighborhood of Laranjeiras, which lies between the city center and the beaches, the house is an ideal base to relax and explore this wonderful city.  Come see for yourself! ♡ LGBT+ guests are welcome! ♡
interaction: My co-host, Edson, lives on the first floor of the house. But it has a private entrance. I live nearby (2 minutes), but I'm always attentive to the messages and try to respond as quickly as possible. We like to respect each person's way of been. Also, this is your trip... We respect your privacy, but you can contact us when you need it. ☺
houseRules: ENGLISH / ESPAÑOL  / PORTUGUÊS • Feel free to smoke in our outdoor area, but never in any room inside the house. And remember to put  the buts of the cigarettes in the provided ashtrays. OK? • Parties are not allowed because we like to keep a quiet house. But visitors are welcome, they just cannot spend the night. • Please enjoy and respect the noise curfew between 10pm and 8am. • As the kitchen is for collective use, we ask that you help us to keep it clean and tidy. Please always wash what you use.  • Avoid leaving your personal belongings in the house´s common areas, please keep them in your room. • The refrigerator is at your disposal. But please, remove your food before you check-out or let us know that  and later we do it for you. • Please do not  throw toilet paper or any other sanitary products in the toilet. We have trash bins in all the bathrooms. • Please don't consuming food and drink in the bedrooms. Enjoy our dining room and our garden. • Please try to reduce electricity

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
※ENGLISH※ESPAÑOL※FRANÇAIS

Hi there!

I`m Rafaela, a professional actress who loves the arts.

I have a degree in Theater Theory from the Federal University of the State of Rio de Janeiro.

I started receiving people through AirBnB at the 2016 Olympics and since then Edson, my co-host, and I have welcomed more than 500 guests from over 29 countries across 5 continents.

Thanks to AirBnB I discovered a new passion beyond the arts and traveling. I discovered the pleasure of learning new languages and being able to communicate with people from different cultures.

Maybe I will greeting you in your language. Who Knows?

Rio is amazing! Come see for yourself!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
¡Hola!

Soy Rafaela, una actriz profesional que ama el arte.

Tengo un título en Teoría del Teatro de la Universidad Federal del Estado de Río de Janeiro.

Comencé a recibir huéspedes a través del AirBnB en los Juegos Olímpicos de 2016  y desde entonces, yo y Edson, mi coanfitrión, hemos dado la bienvenida a más de 500 huéspedes de 29 países de los 5 continentes.

Gracias a AirBnB, descubrí una nueva pasión más allá del arte y los viajes. Descubrí el placer de aprender nuevos idiomas y poder comunicarme con personas de diferentes culturas.

Tal vez te saludo en tu idioma. ¿Quién sabe?

Rio es increíble! ¡Ven a verlo tu mismo!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Salut!

Je suis Rafaela, une actrice professionnelle qui aime les arts.

J'ai un diplôme en théorie du théâtre de l'Université Fédérale de l'État de Rio de Janeiro.

J'ai commencé à recevoir des invités par le biais d'AirBnB aux Jeux Olympiques de 2016 et depuis, Edson, mon co-hôte, et moi-même avons accueilli plus de 500 invités de plus de 29 pays sur les 5 continents.

Grâce à AirBnB, j'ai découvert une nouvelle passion au-delà des arts et des voyages. J'ai découvert le plaisir d'apprendre de nouvelles langues et de pouvoir communiquer avec des personnes de cultures différentes.

Peut-être que je vais vous saluer dans votre langue. Qui sait?

Rio est incroyable! Venez voir par vous-même!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: One of our favourite airbnb stays. Rafaela and Edson are amazing hosts and made it a great stay. The house is quite tucked away and is really nice! The room was great, very clean and it had one of the best kitchens for guests to use that we've had. Overall, a fantastic stay with lovely hosts. 100% recommend.

Rafaela y Edson son los mejores anfitriones, tanto que me hicieron sentir parte de la familia. La casa es maravillosa, se nota que la arreglaron con todo el amor.

Tienes la opción de quedarte en un cuarto privado compartiendo baño como hice yo, o compartir cuarto o tener un cuarto con baño. Cualquiera de las opciones funciona muy bien.

Tiene cocina y un comedor súper acogedor donde pasamos noches conversando, en todos los idiomas posibles. 

La casa queda en un sector que a mi me gustó mucho, la estación más cercana del metro queda a 15 minutos caminando pero si no quieres caminar hay un bus que te lleva hasta el metro. Quedan cerca supermercados y restaurantes. Está a cuatro estaciones de metro de la playa de Copacabana. 

Para el objetivo que yo tenía funcionó de maravilla, estar todo el día fuera y llegar a dormir a un lugar tranquilo y acogedor.

Los recomiendo 100%, son amables, divertidos, serviciales. 

Conocerlos a ellos y a los otros huéspedes es lo que recordaré con más cariño de mi viaje a Rio!

A Rafaela preocupou-se em diferentes momentos em me tranquilizar quanto à estadia. Ao chegar tudo estava limpo e organizado. A cozinha foi colocada a minha disposição e estava muito bem equipada. O bairro é bem carioca. Possui padarias, mercados e é muito próximo à estação do metrô. Senti a região bem segura e muito bem frequentada.

Quem nos recebeu foi o Edson, que está de parabéns com sua simpatia, seu carisma, sempre pronto a ajudar, sempre alegre e comunicativo. Não nos faltou nada, um lugar agradável, saudável, limpo, bonito, moderno, colorido, eu diria que se eu tiver que voltar ao RJ não tem outra opção melhor! Obrigada Edson! Vc está de parabéns! :)

Our contact person was Edson. He was amazing! He went above and beyond during our stay. We could not have hoped for a better host.

The place is really nice. The private rooms are simple, good and clean. The common area is very nice and cozy. Every area of the place is clean. 

The area is complete safe even at night. Several supermarkeds and small cafes and restaurants close by. 

Its located 18 min. from the metro station, but there are busses 2 min from the place. 

We highly recommend this place! 
We would choose to stay here again if we return to Rio 

Thank you very, very much Edson!!!!

A casa é ótima, o espaço é excelente e tudo muito limpo e organizado! Está toda equipada e muito bem localizada em Laranjeiras: perto de bares, ponto de ônibus, mercado e farmácia. Edson é muito gentil e solícito.  Recomendo e certamente voltaria!
Os anfritriões foram muito atenciosos! O quarto estava muito bom só não gostei do chuveiro, sai pouca água. Muito bem localizado

Rafaela e Edson foram muito atenciosos em todos os momentos!! A casa é ótima e o quarto que ficamos também. A localização é ótima, conseguimos chegar a todo ponto turístico ou praia sempre em no máximo meia hora.

Rafaela no estaba por lo que todo el trato fue con Edson que fue súper amable y atento. La casa es hermosa, grande y cómoda. El barrio es muy tranquilo, con comercios cerca y líneas de colectivo que te conectan con toda la ciudad. Muy buena experiencia!!! Gracias Edson!!!

Só tenho a agradecer pelos 10 excelentes dias. O local é extremamente organizado e funcional, os anfitriões prestativos, flexíveis, a localização é excelente, próximo de padarias, lanchonetes, estação de metrô e com muitos ônibus. Adorei e super recomendo!
Excelente lugar, cómodo, higiénico y bien ambientado. Sin duda volvería a este alojamiento en una próxima oportunidad. Edson excelente anfitrión muy amable y respetuoso.
Fomos muito bem recebidos! A casa dispõe de ótima infraestrutura e está bem localizada. Quando voltarmos ao Rio, ja sabemos onde ficar :)
TUDO PERFEITO!

Rafaela and Edson have a really nice flat. It is a good and central area where you have a lot of supermarkets, bakerys, banks, busstations and restaurants.
Everywhere you want to go, it's easy to reach from that place even by walking. 
Rafaela and Edson are really pleasent people, asking for any needs to make the stay as comfortable as they can for you. The flat is really clean and has everything you need for cooking. I think I will prefer that one, when I come back to Rio

We couldn't have wished for a better accommodation in Rio! The house was big and super clean. Edson was a great host and always open to all our questions. 
Laranjeiras neighborhood is really nice and even though there are lots of bars and restaurants the house is located in a quiet area. You can reach all tourist attractions easily by public transport or Uber. 
We would definitively come back when in Rio again!!

Muito bom o local, toda ajuda que precisei para chegar nos locais o anfitrião me ajudou.
A casa é ótima super aconchegante. Amei o local que fica localizada, de fácil acesso para vários locais.
Acesso ao trenzinho que vai para o Cristo é possível ir à pé de tão bem localizado o local.

Ótimo lugar, confortável, muito bem limpo e organizado. Edson é muito atencioso e simpático, ajuda bastante com a locomoção, quais ônibus pegar etc. Lugar em si, é perto da maioria dos pontos turísticos, se não tiver ônibus que passe direto, tem o metrô que é a uns 15min de caminhada da casa. Preço super em conta pra um bairro tranquilo e com tudo perto. Recomendo!

O espaço de Rafaela tem um toque rústico bem acolhedor. Encontramos tudo organizado e limpo.
O Edson nos recebeu muito bem, sempre disponível para esclarecimentos e dicas.
O espaço fica muito bem localizado no Bairro de Laranjeiras. Ha uma padaria próxima para o café da manhã.
Nota 10. Pode reservar sem medo. Voltaremos outras vezes!

Nous avons passé trois nuits dans cette maison. Le quartier est vraiment top et plutôt bien situé dans la ville. La maison est très clean, spacieuse et agréable. Edson nous accueille chaleureusement. Rien à redire, on y retournera avec plaisir si l'occasion se présente.
Perfect place in a very nice area. A great room, very good facilities and very nice people. I very much enjoyed my stay there.

name: Artist Garden Duplex Ft. Greene - 2.5 Bedroom
summary: Beautifully renovated Brownstone garden duplex - BEST BLOCK in Ft. Greene (S Portland Ave). High end renovation: full kitchen, private entrance, master bedroom with Queen bed, glass partition, study (extra bed - the "half bedroom"), glass doors to patio/garden. Living room sofa opens to Queen. Cellar: TV room, extra sleep quarters (3 twins or  king), bath w shower . Perfect for 1 - 2 couples or families.  5 minutes to BAM, subways, restaurants, park, farmer's market. Superb base for NY vacation.
interaction: I'm happy to help either before you arrive or once you are here! I live upstairs and own the Brownstone.
houseRules: The house can't accept pets and no smoking except outside. No extra guests.

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt: Beautiful place, would definitely come back!

Great apartment, great location! The flat is newly remodeled and everything is brand new and clean. It is very spacious- perfect for our group of 2 adults, 2 small children. The location is a very safe neighborhood, beautiful block and very near restaurants, parks. Miriam was readily available and her list of restaurants, shops was helpful. The check in/out was seamless. We will definitely stay there again- hopefully for longer.
Our family of 4 enjoyed staying at Miriam's. Very close to subway or trains, it is a nice and calm location if you wants to visit NYC (20 mins from Wall St) and Brooklyn wich is a very nice aera.

Miriam was excellent. It was my first time using airbnb and it was for work colleagues of mine.  I can only go by what my colleagues said and it was  absolutely awesome. They were able to cook dinner and save us money instead of having them eat out everynight. They loved the space and wanted to stay longer.  It was nice and convienent to our marina on pier 5!

I used to live in the neighborhood and can attest Miriam's place is on a top notch street in an amazing location! She did a great job furnishing the apartment and making the place comfortable for a family stay. Miriam was also very accommodating and didn't hesitate to turn up the heat for our unseasonably cold visit. We'd love to stay here again on our next Brooklyn visit!

Miriam ha estat una bona amfitriona. La comunicació sempre ha estat immediata i positiva. Ha estat molt respectuosa amb la nostra intimitat i ens ha obsequiat amb diferents detalls.
L'apartament ocupa la part baixa d'una típica casa "Brownstone". Disposa d'un jardinet al darrer ideal per les èpoques de temperatura suau.
La ubicació és immillorable. Hi ha moltes línies de metro a tocar de l'apartament. En 20-25 minuts s'arriba a Manhattan. Està ubicat a un barri de Brooklyn molt ben situat. L'ambient és molt bo i està ple d'opcions al voltant.
Cal tenir en compte que disposa d'una habitació doble per allotjar a dues persones i que la resta s'hauran d'acomodar en un sofà llit i en uns futons a terra en el soterrani de l'habitatge. En el soterrani, sense finestres, s'ubica la sala de màquines, canonades, un traster i un petit bany.
A la penúltima nit hi va haver una inesperada fuita d'aigua al soterrani que Miriam i la seva família van resoldre molt ràpidament.

Hem estat 12 dies a l'apartament i, en general, ha estat molt positiu.

We had a wonderful stay at Miriam's apartment in Ft. Greene.  She made us feel perfectly welcomed from the beginning and throughout our stay.  The apartment was perfect for our family of 4 as it was clean, comfortable, and spacious. Miriam was also very flexible in allowing us to have a small celebration for my 40th birthday with friends and family at the apartment.  The apartment proved to be perfect for our gathering because of its amazing location (especially with its proximity to the park, playgrounds, and other local businesses) and its spaciousness and comfort.  We would happily stay at Miriam's apartment on future trips to Brooklyn and strongly recommend it to others.  Thank you Miriam!

Míriam is a marvelous host. 
Also her apartment is amazing! We rented there for 10 days. 
Everything is exactly what she described, and more. 
If you want to experience the Brooklyn life style, here you will have it!  Beautiful markets, facilities, subway, neighborhood.

We made this apartment our Christmas Central gathering spot. The kitchen is very well equipped for cooking as well as serving-dishes and glassware enough for our crowd. The little things were appreciated-enough hangers in the coat closet to stow our coats, dishwashing detergent under the sink, so we didn't have to buy that at the market. Really nice linens on the beds, plenty of towels, good lighting. Amazing main bathroom shower-we took pictures of it! 
Great closet space, again with coat hangers. Off of the main bedroom, there is an away space-office type room. My husband used it to meditate, but it'd be great for any kind of quiet space. We didn't use the courtyard, but it would be so nice to utilize in milder weather. 
We didn't see Miriam, but she was very good at communicating by email.
Great host and excellent communication.
Very modern, clean, comfortable. Bathroom drain did not work and Miriam addressed it immediately on a Saturday.

We had a great stay at Miriam's place. It was a great location, lots of fab restaurants close by & easy to get on the subway!
Miriam was a great host answering any questions. We would definitely recommend this apartment & hope to visit again!!!!
Plenty of room for my family. My 17 year old son loved the lower level space.  Great access to transportation and local restaurants.
Great location, family friendly had a wonderful time staying at Miriam's home
Beautiful home and very close to restaurants and night life activities, however there isn't much street parking!
The place was very warm and welcoming.  Miriam was very responsive and a great host.  We would stay there again with no hesitation.

This property exceeded our expectations.  We have spent a lot of time in New York City in the past and I was amazed at how quiet this place was.  It's on a lovely street in a very beautiful and safe area.  We traveled to Manhattan every day and the subways were close and convenient.  The property was so much more spacious than I expected and was perfect for our family of 4 .  There is close access to restaurants and markets.  We were impressed and would definitely stay again.  My only disappointment is that it wasn't the right time of year to enjoy the beautiful courtyard in the back.
très agréable logement très bon accueil de Myriam
Such a great place!  Fantastic location with comfortable beds and enough space for two couples to have their own areas.

The stay at Miriams home was very umcomplecated and friendly. The apartment was very clean and well-appointed. We loved cooking in the commodious kitchen or going to one of the restaurants recommended by Miriam (ecspecially the mexican one not far away from the house) .

name: A Casa Alegre é um apartamento T1.
summary: Para 2 pessoas. Vista de mar a 150 mts. Prédio com 2 elevadores. Tem: - quarto com roupeiro e cama de casal (colchão magnetizado); - cozinha: placa de discos, exaustor, frigorifico, micro-ondas e torradeira; casa de banho completa; - sala e varanda.
interaction: Terá à sua disposição um prospeto turístico da vila.
houseRules: Espero que tratem a minha casa bem, respeitando os objetos que ela contem e dos quais vão usufruir. Não fumar. Não são permitidas festas. Não se aceitam animais. Não é permitido fazer barulho depois das 23 horas e ate às 8 da manha.

host.about:
Sou uma pessoa que gosta de viajar, conhecer museus, visitar exposições e cinema.
Também gosto de passear pelas zonas históricas das cidades e contemplar as suas edificações.

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Manuela was a great host! She and her son even picked us up from the airport. Her son travelled with us in the subway to bring us to the apartment.  This was really welcoming. He showed us the apartment, which was perfectly clean and felt right away as a comfortable home. 
In the fridge Manuala left us milk and her husband picked out an outstanding local port! 
The ocean is less than a two minut walk and there are some great (fish) restaurants around the corner. 
Thank you for everything Manuela, when ever we come back to Portugal we will make sure to visit your lovely apartment!

Bom dia.... adorei o apartamento,o sítio... tudo foi bom.. a simpatia as comodidades tudo otimo... pretendo voltar a repetir. .. Obrigada por estes dias que foram maravilhosos.... atenciosamente. .. 
Até a próxima. ...

Manuela a été très accueillante, très attentionnée. Le logement répondait à toutes nos attentes. Très bien situé avec une belle vue sur la mer, commerces et restaurants à proximité.  Nous le recommandons.

Très bon accueil de Manuela.Elle est venue nous chercher ,avec son mari, à l'aéroport.L'appartement est semblable aux photos et description du site,il est rustique mais très propre.Balcon avec vue sur la mer dommage qu'il ne soit pas ensoleillé.Bouteilles de vin et porto en guise de bienvenue.Manuela a également jouer le rôle de guide pendant une après-midi dans la très jolie ville de Porto, nous la remercions encore pour ces explications éducatives et sa disponibilité.
Um muito obrigado a Sra Manuela pois nos recebeu com muita simpatia, estava tudo dentro das expectativas recomendo vivamente pois a paisagem é magnifica obrigado  mais uma vez.

Hieno huoneisto lähellä merta. Kauppa ja leipomo vastapäätä. Porton metroon pääsi kätevästi vartin kävelyllä.
Ja vieressä meri!

Apartamento bem localizado, funcional e limpo, tudo 5 estrelas. O único aspecto a melhor é a agua quente, que se escasseava rapidamente, mas nada de problemático. Realço a simpatia e disponibilidade da Manuela, que teve a amabilidade de nos deixar fazer o check-out mais tarde que o suposto. Recomendo vivamente!

Appartement propre, tres agréable et bien situé, Manuela est très accueillante.
Sylvie, Oscar
Recomendo vivamente este espaço tudo cinco estrelas.

Àppartement très propre fonctionnel. Bonne situation avec les commerces nécessaires pour le quotidient.
Merci à Manuela qui est super gentille et arrangeante..

Manuela ha sido una anfitriona encantadora, nos recibió en su casa de maravilla. El piso tiene una ubicación ideal para disfrutar de vila do conde, de la playa y de oporto... Una ciudad impresionante, que conocimos gracias a las recomendaciones de manuela! Tanto guille como yo quedamos encantados y esperamos volver algún día! Gracias por todo

name: Copacabana Studio -  5* Reviews, 5 mins to Beach
summary: IMPORTANT: CARNIVAL - MINIMUM BOOKING 4 NIGHTS. Great location/AirCon/Strong Wifi/24 hr Doormen/Breakfast Pack/5* Service Beautifully-designed studio 5 minutes walk to Copacabana beach in tree-lined residential street with personal touches and high quality finishes.   We really understand our guests' needs and will help you have a memorable experience.  You'll receive our detailed written guide to Rio, welcome food, benefit from our local knowledge and feel at home before you even arrive!
interaction: Before your finalise your reservation we are available to answer any questions you have, and then are in close contact helping you prepare your trip sharing all our local knowledge as you wish, and also sending our written guide which covers great places to eat and transfer arrangements etc.   Our welcomer is Hugo who is a close, multi-lingual friend of ours and we are always available at any time during your stay to help with questions.
houseRules: No visitors - the 24 hour doormen will not allow non-guests to enter the building.

host.about: We're a happily married Scottish couple who fell in love with Brazil when we lived in Sao Paulo a few years ago. We love Rio so much we decided to buy a little studio here so we could spend some months a year in Copacabana, working from here and enjoying the city.  We sometimes rent it out when we're not here.  We hope you enjoy Rio and living in our studio as much as we do.  We'll do as much as we can to make your stay easy and memorable.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
This is a great little apartment on a quiet tree-lined street about two and a half blocks from the beach.  It is close to everything including the Siqueira Campos Metro stop which is a big plus if you need to get to downtown Rio. There are parts of Copacabana that are quite a trek from the Metro. There are all sorts of restaurants within a block in all directions and of course the beach a 5-minute walk away.

Everything is brand new and the apartment feels modern and cozy at the same time. It is however quite small. I was there by myself for 4 nights and it was perfect. Great for a couple as well if you get along really well. I wouldn't try to put 3 people in this place. When the bed is unfolded there is very little floor space left. The little space there is actually feels a lot bigger because it is very organized. It is easy to keep tidy since there is really only one place to put each thing. The handy apartment guide shows you where things go, how to unfold the sofa into the various configurations, and has some tips on the area. 

There is both wired and wireless Internet which was fast and worked perfectly for me. There is a nice little flat screen TV with satellite channels and easily accessible hdmi ports so you can hook up your laptop and play your own content. Sometimes wall-mounted flat screens make it really hard to get to the hdmi ports, but not in this case.

Note that power outlets in Brazil come in about 4 different flavours and you can never really be sure whether it is 110V or 220V. So bring adapters and make sure anything you plug in won't be fried by being plugged into a 220V outlet. In this apartment all (and there are surprisingly many) the outlets are IEC-906-1 type plugs at 220V. It is 3-pronged but still 2-prong Europlug compatible so if you are coming from most of Europe you won't need adapters. If you are coming from North America, bring some regular US-Euro adapters.

The view of Cristo Redentor (Christ the Redeemer statue) is especially nice at sunset and in the evening when it is lit up. There is a shot of it at sunset taken from the window of the apartment here: (Website hidden by Airbnb) 

Alan and Catherine were lightning quick to respond and made the process extremely smooth.

All in all this was a perfect and relaxing 4 nights in Copacabana for me.

Hola a todos!! Estuvimos en el Studio Apartment de Catherine y Alan a fines de junio de 2011 con mi marido. Fue una excelente elección, gracias Alan y Catherine!!
La UBICACION del depto es ideal, ya que estás cerca de todo (queda en Capacabana) y te podés mover en omnibus a todos lados sin problema.
La ZONA es muy seguro, tranquila y con lugares para comer y comprar comida cerca. Siempre nos sentimos MUY seguros.
El DEPARTAMENTO está buenísimo! Es tal cual las fotos. Todo nuevo, impecable y con diseño- Está todo pensado hastá el mínimo detalle! Tiene todo lo necesario y más!  El wifi anda perfecto; la pantalla plana es GRANDE, no como dice el comentario de Marcus. El sillón camo es muy cómodo, tanto como sillón tanto como cama(más cómodo que muchas camas de hotel). El baño está impecable!!! El depto está buenísimo para ir con pareja o con un amigo.
Tiene SEGURIDAD LAS 24HS.
ALAN y CATHERINE son muy organizados y amables. Siempre contestaron rapidisimo y nos dieron datos para la llegada que nos sirvieron mucho,  MUCHAS GRACIAS POR COMPARTIR SU CASA EN RIO CON NOSOTROS!!!
LES RECOMENDAMOS a todos los que quieran conocer Rio, quedarse en el Studio Apartmente de Alan y Catherine!!!
Saludos,

 (Website hidden by Airbnb) Patricio & Mercedes

The studio is really nice and comfy, modern and well-equiped in a nice building, in a great area of Rio - its location, a few meters away from Copacabana beach, is really central and convenient. There are a lot of shops, coffee places, bakeries, restaurants etc. nearby, and the area is really safe.
Alan and Catherine have every thing prepared to make of your stay a great time - all you have to do is to enjoy!

Pase mucho tiempo buscando por AIRBNB algún lugar en el cual pudiera pasar mis vacaciones. En cuanto vi las fotos del Studio, me di cuenta que era un lugar agradable y acogedor. Cuando me puse en contacto con Alan & Catherine, me di cuenta que eran personas muy amables y atentas. Siempre se mostraron dispuestos a resolver mis dudas y ayudarme a encontrar sitios en Rio de janeiro. El Studio es muy bonito y muy comodo, me gusto la vista que se tiene del Cristo Redentor desde la ventana. Muy recomendalbe el Studio! muy simpatica Lelita y muy cordiales los Porteros! Rio es una ciudad magnifica su gente es muy agradable!

My rating is 5 out of 5!!!!! This studio is simply amazing!

Alan and Catherine's studio is a beautiful place to stay. The creative design and artistic details are inspiringly put together. It is also wonderful because it is situated in the heart of Copa. Very close to the shops, the beach, the metro, and major tourist attractions. Location and design are the perfect combo to make your stay comfortable and rewarding!

Alan is such a kind, polite and thoughtful person! I will not forget his kindness. He went above and beyond to make my stay a happy one. In fact, he went well and beyond my expectations of a land lord. He even helped me organise a taxi to leave and booked it for me. Alan also arranged to get the apartment cleaned mid-stay. I did not ask him to do this. In sum, you could not want nicer person to deal with! Alan is a rare gem! He responds to emails in a timely manner and is a generous, helpful and wonderful!  He thinks of everything to make your stay a happy one!

The apartment building is nice and the couple that work at the door and look after the cleaning are such warm, kind and beautiful Brazilian people!!! They helped me so much with many things. When I arrived my luggage was missing, so they rang the airport and even offered to drive me to the airport! They even helped me go shopping for electrical goods so I could use my computer. Outstanding kindness!!!  It was a joy to come and home and say hello to them on the way to the elevator. I will miss them very much!

The apartment is comfortable because every last detail has been very well considered. Coming from Australia, I found the internet speed very fast and easy to connect. The cable TV is excellent and nice to watch after a long day touring Rio! The kitchen is perfect and is a delightful place to make yummy breakfast etc. The bathroom is very well designed. While the living room and bedroom is a joy to be in due to the artwork and beautiful use of form and light. The use of colour in the studio is visually sophisticated and joyful. I really loved the use of design to create atmosphere and mixed with Brazilian art, this is a real treat to enjoy! Loved it!!!

I really enjoyed dealing with Alan and Catherine. They are perfect hosts and I will be coming back to stay again for sure! Thank you so much Alan and Catherine for letting me stay in your beautiful home. I had the best time and will always remember how lovely your home and your wonderful kindness! 

Thank you!!!!!!

The pictures really shows what you get: a modern and cozy studio. At first may look tight and small, however the decoration work done by the owners are very smart and find for every single free space an appropriate use. The location also could not be better. Just one remark: the street is very peaceful, but Rio de Janeiro is a very noisy place. And the studio is placed between two very busy streets. Finally, Alan,  Catherine (the owners) and Lelita (the maid) are extremely friendly and attentive. The will do whatever they could to help your stay to be the best.

Perfect ! The studio is a a Little gem In Copacabana In a quiet tree-lined street NeXT to The métro. Very tastefully decorated  
Communication with Alan and Catherine was great. They are perfect hosts. 
100% recomended

Pasamos una semana maravillosa en el studio de Alan y Catherine. Realmente han pensado en cada detalle para hacerlo funcional, cómodo... y muy bonito!! Tiene todo lo necesario para disfrutar al máximo. 
Además esta ubicado en el mejor rincón de Rio, en el centro de Copacabana, con todas sus tiendas, restaurantes, transporte y vida urbana, pero en una calle tranquila y silenciosa. Un lujo.
Comentamos varias veces durante nuestro viaje la suerte de haber encontrado este lugar para quedarnos. Alan y Catherine fueron siempre muy atentos y accesibles por mail, excelentes anfitriones a distancia. Recomendamos 100% este studio!!!!!

I had such a lovely experience here. Alan and Catherine were extremely helpful and quick to respond to any questions. Everything was IMMACULATE and looked exactly like it does in the photos. Although the space is small, the furniture and set-up made it very comfortable for two people. Such great use of the space. Loved the location...short walk to the beach. Neighborhood was friendly and felt very safe. Alan and Catherine provided suggestions for places to visit and also stocked some key items in the fridge. Amazing!  If I return to Rio I would love to stay here again and recommend it to everyone.

We stayed at Alan and Catherine's studio in November for 6 nights and had wondeful time.  From the point of booking, Alan and Catherine made sure that we were prepared for our stay in Rio.  They shared their thoughts and recommendations with us, this helped us enormously.  The studio is exactly as described, and the location is great. We are more than happy to recommend this studio to our friends and family and we will definitely stay again when we return to Rio.

tuvimos una excelente estadia. Alan y catherine han sido muyamables, nos han dejado el departamento super equipado con todo lo necesariopara disfrutar unos hermosos dias en rio. !muy cerca de laplayay del centro. excelente ubicacion

muchas gracias por todo!

Alan and Catherine entrusted me with their apartment for a whole month and I would not be too surprised if I were to learn that they had nightmares about this. I am a newcomer to this fantastic forum and had no recommendations or much detail in my profile while the apartment that Alan and Catherine entrusted me with truly is their home in Rio. It is a lovely designed little gem in Copa. It is amazing to see how much thought this couple spent in developing this small apartment into a little home where everything just fits perfectly. 

The apartment is light during day and the sofa transforms into a most comfortable bed at night. When I read the description of the apartment I initially had my doubts about the sleeper coach but chose this apartment as all other things just sounded perfect. Well, it turned out that the sleeper couch is as perfect as the apartment proved to be. The most comfortable sleeper I have ever experienced!

The apartment was recently totally renovated and is kept in such good shape that it still feels new. One of the apartment's big asset (apart from its beautiful furniture and interior) is the large shower! And of course the aircon for the hot Rio summer nights!

The apartment is nearby a vast range of fair, good and excellent restaurants and various supermarkets and shops.

The special treat is the welcome pack which allows you some time to study the wonderful recommendations and tips Allan and Catherine provide you with in a little info brochure to assist you in finding your own way in the surrounding area. Alan also offed a Kyle chat to assist me finding my way, but I found the info provided so detailed that this was not necessary.

As with most apartments in Rio, security is tops with a watchfull 24/7 door guard, who by the way is always keen to help where he can.

The Wifi is pleasantly fast and reliable! 

I can only recommend Alan's and Catherine's home in Rio. It is stable for short term, for long term, for business or for just visiting Copa (which, if i may stray off the point :) ) should be on everyones list of things to do while you still can!!!!!)

Thank Alan, thanks Catherine! Your apartment and I will meet gain :) !

A fantastically located, very neat and carefully designed studio!  

The location is excellent, very safe with extremely friendly door-men, lots of good eating and drinking places within easy reach of Copacabana beach (and nice walk to Ipanema beach) as well as the underground to get into central Rio.

The studio is very well designed, and makes excellent use of a small space with everything you could need; a comfortable bed, desk, a kitchenette including full fridge, good bathroom, good internet access and a wide range of TV channels including 3 in English.

Catherine and Alan are excellent hosts, have provided lots of useful information about their local area and its haunts, and have been prompt in all their dealings through Airbnb.

I cannot recommend this place strongly enough! Thanks Catherine and Alan.

The studio is fantastic and I had a great stay! Highly recommend to anyone going to Rio! Great location, in a quiet street and yet close to everything you need in Copacabana! The hosts Alan and Catherine are great and the communication was always clear and the are very attentive people! Thank you so much Alan and Catherine! Looking forward to staying with you again! 
**
O studio é fantástico , super bem localizado, numa rua tranquila, mas ao mesmo tempo perto de tudo em Copacabana. Recomendo a todos que vão ao Rio! O Alan e a Catherine são ótimos, a comunicação  super clara e eles muito atenciosos. Obrigada Alan e Catherine e espero me hospedar com vocês novamente!

Samba,Sun and  Rio Carnival!

Alan and Catherine were absolutely exceptional hosts who went above and beyond their responsibilities as hosts and we could not recommend them more highly. They were extremely fast in responding to our quires and we had a good few especially as it was over carnival (They even responded to out quires during our week in the apartment and helped us with a problem we were having booking flights to Iguazu falls). The studio is ideally situated in a very safe area (although we found nearly everywhere in Rio to be very safe) that is perfect for exploring Copacabana and the surrounding areas. The city itself can be somewhat overwhelming at first but Alan and Catherine’s starter and information packs gave us the confidence to venture all over they city without hesitation. Carnival is an amazing time to go and it is good to have somewhere private to go back to after a long day or night at a bloc party (which you will run into everywhere). As a first time couple using this site we could not have been more happy with the outcome and it really made our trip to Rio carnival one we will never forget. So all that’s left to say is go and in stay in Alan and Catherine’s beautiful apartment, don’t believe the negative things you hear about Rio and bring a wig or a hat for carnival as you wont see a local without one :)

Our experience with Alan and Catherine's apartment in Rio was a dream experience.  Our first time in Rio, we were faced with a 1:00 AM arrival at GIG.   Already wary of what I had read about airport taxi, I wondered how we were going to deal with this one.  No problem, everything was promptly arranged with their trusted driver who was at the airport promptly with our name and a reaonsable cost. 

The apartment is on a beautiful quaint street in the heart of Copacabana.  Building security is fantastic with trusted 24 hr porters,  restricted access to the floors.  We felt much safer than in a hotel -- but Rio  not to be construed as an unsafe city.  We felt fine everywhere we went.  The metro is clean and efficient.  

Everything in the apartment is well organized and works.  The high speed internet permitted flawless (Hidden by Airbnb) calls at all hours - a great stress reliever when you're on business.

Alan and Catherine responded immediately to al communications, offered tons of helpful information about the area, checked in frequently to see if anything needed.  Its just goes on and on.  In short, they "get it".   Its not about the apartment, rather the total experience. 

Put this on your A list and consider yourself lucky if it books..

Tom and Cecilia Kessler
Guadalajara, Mexico

We had a wonderful time in Rio! The studio is great! It is very well designed. Everything works perfectly well and Internet is faster than what we have in Switzerland! The location is great too! About 5 minutes walk to the beach of Copacabana, and located in a safe neighborhood. The bus station to go to the Sugar Loaf is about 10 minutes walk and the subway and the supermarket are only 3 minutes walking distance. Ipanema is only a 30 minute walk or you can take the subway (2 stations). Catherine and Alan were very helpful in helping us organize our trip. They were very patient with all our questions and fast in responding emails. They also helped us book our transportation to the apartment and all went very smoothly. We also loved the handbook loaded with all sorts of recommendations. We tried out a few restaurants and were not disappointed. We also went to Churrascaria Carretao (10 minutes walk) as my husband loves grilled meat (very touristy, get there early to avoid the tourist buses!). The hotel Othon has a restaurant on the top floor with a beautiful view of the beach of Copacabana. The food is rather pricey but the view is definitely worth it! The restaurant Colombo in the Fort of Copacabana is supposed to be good too, unfortunately we ran out of time! There are some very nice markets on Sundays. When heading to the hippie market in Ipanema stop at this very small market off Avenida Atlantica just before the Fort of Capacabana! They sell great pastels and the best caldos de cane! There is also an information center on Copacabana only a few minutes  towards Leme... And all this in short walking distance from the studio! 
We highly recommend this place!

Estuvimos en el estudio de Alan & Catherine por 5 días y todo fue perefecto. El estudio es precioso, en un ubicacion muy comoda, cerca de la playa, el metro y muchos buses para diferentes puntos de la ciudad.
Ellos fueron muy amables con nosotros, enviandonos recomendaciones de actividades cerca del estudio y en todo rio!
Fue nuestra primera experiencia con airbn y realmente nos fue muy bien!
De volver a Rio no dudaríamos en volver aqui!!! :)
...............

Were in the studio of Alan & Catherine for 5 days and everything was perefect. The studio is beautiful, in a very comfortable location near the beach, the metro and many buses to different parts of the city.
They were very kind to us, sending us recommendations of the study activities near and around the river!
It was our first experience with airbn and really was great!
Ww hope go back here! :)

I stayed in the studio for 4 days with a friend and it was perfect! It was recommended to me by my cousin Mercedes who had stayed there previously. She talked wonders about the hosts and the place and fortunately it was all true and more! Before going, Catherine made sure that we had everything we needed. All our communications were really helpful and clear. Such attention to detail and genuine concern to make our stay smooth is hard to come by! The recommendations she sent us with places to go to were amazing, especially the restaurants! The studio itself is well located, near the beach, the metro and in a safe area. Everything inside is new and works perfectly. Internet connection is wonderful! Porters are nice and inclined to help. All in all, a perfect stay in Rio!!

We stayed for just under a week at Catherine and Alan's place in Copacabana.  Catherine was very easy to communicate with, and was incredibly helpful with tourist and non-tourist things to do in Rio.  I couldn't believe that they provided us with tea, coffee, fruit and cereal for our stay -- I haven't had better hospitality in some 5 star hotels.  Other reviewers have mentioned that the place is "cosy" (which I confirm), but for us it was fine.  On top of everything, Catherine and Alan have tastefully decorated the apartment and have quality appointments.  I would definitely love to stay here again, and would highly recommend it to others.

name: 2 Bedroom Ocean Front Condo in Honokowai - Sleeps 6 - Hale Mahina #B404
summary: This elegant 2 bedroom, loft style unit has its semi-private master bedroom and bathroom upstairs and guest bedroom downstairs. Features bamboo flooring in the loft bedroom, tile in the living areas and carpet in the guest bedroom. The guest bedroom has a stall shower only, no bath tub but there is a shower-tub in the master bedroom.
interaction: Chase N Rainbows is located in Lahaina Town and is open 7 days per week: M-F 7am to 5pm, Sat/Sun 8am to 4pm. There is also an agent available for after hours emergencies.
houseRules: This Rental Agreement (“Agreement”) is entered into by the undersigned guest (“Guest” or “you” or “yours”) and Chase ‘N Rainbows Real Estate, Inc. (“Manager”). You understand that Manager is the designated agent of the owner of the Unit (“Owner”) and is signing this Agreement as the agent of the Owner, and on behalf of and with authority from the Owner. This Agreement incorporates by reference the terms and conditions set forth in your Deposit Confirmation Letter. House Rules: A full listing of the House Rules pertaining to your condo/property is attached to this rental agreement and is also located in the red binder left open on the dining table when you enter the unit upon check in. Please review these house rules as there may be warnings followed by penalties if violated.  This reservation is for quiet residential vacation accommodations only. Therefore, parties, receptions, luaus, events, and gatherings of any kind are strictly prohibited. No additional people beyond the maximum oc

host.about:
Chase ‘N Rainbows (CNR) Real Estate, Inc. is a Maui-based, family-owned company established in 1980 with two divisions: vacation rental management and real estate sales. For the past twenty years, CNR has been offering visitors and Kama’aina alike, affordable and luxury accommodations at a very competitive price. All of its vacation rental units are carefully selected, meticulously inspected, attractively furnished and well maintained to the highest standards. CNR is committed to providing the finest product and unsurpassed personalized service in the industry. These condominiums come highly recommended by leisure, business, and family travelers with distinctive tastes. A significant number of satisfied, return guests speak for the company’s service commitment and quality product. Chase ‘N Rainbows is a proud member of the Hawaii Visitors & Convention Bureau (HVCB), The American Society of Travel Agents (ASTA), Maui Visitors Bureau (MVB), Hawaii Association of Realtors, Maui Chamber of Commerce, and Vacation Rental Managers Association (VRMA).

*Please note we are a licensed and bonded professional management company and we DO NOT advertise on Craig s List

reviews.txt: Everything was exactly as promised or better. This was a wonderful location in a family friendly setting.  We would stay here again for future visits.

name: Newly Renovated Studio Midtown East
summary: This furnished apartment is a stunning, newly renovated, private and luxurious, studio apartment in the heart of Manhattan. Residential, safe block that is VERY close to all! Fully furnished apartment, with everything one might need!
interaction: We would love to meet you ;)

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: NYC Real Estate licensed broker, property owner and property manager professional with over 20 years of experience  and service.

reviews.txt: Evan & Maria were great. Their studio apartment had been recently renovated so everything was new and fresh. The location was fantastic and so was the service. I would definitely stay here again and I suggest that you stay here too.

4 girls in this studio over 5 days. This was perfect for us. The location is amazing and you have great bars and restaurants in walking distance! Evan and Maria are the nicest hosts I've ever had the pleasure to interact with. Soooo helpful and attentive! Would I stay here again? YES absolutely!!! 5 stars for this listing and the hosts and the location :) exactly as appears in the pictures. Thank you again Evan and Maria!!!

Evan & Maria were great hosts. They answer all my question and always show interested if i had any doubts of anything. I stay at the apartment with my parents and my sister and it was great! Perfect please and perfect location! I'll totally recommend this place for 2 or 4 people!

Great place, and Evan and Maria were very welcoming. This was my first Airbnb rental and I didn't know what to expect but I will be back. I came to NY for 2 weeks of work and found that I prefer the privacy and the availability of a small kitchen over a hotel any day. The studio is within a minute of several restaurants and a well-stocked small supermarket, and in walking distance of major tourist attractions.
From the beginning to the end the process felt really professional, I enjoyed the availability of our host. The neighborhood is great and the apartment was perfect.
The host made me feel very welcomed, wanted to know when I arrived and was there to greet me. The place was better than advertised and the neighborhood was great for someone who is visiting.

Evan and Maria greeted me when I arrived and helped me carry my bags up the stairs to their beautifully renovated apartment. Although it was a tiny bit smaller than I expected, the apartment is very thoughtfully arranged with plenty of storage space.  I stayed in the apartment for 2 weeks and never felt cramped.  In fact I hated to leave!  This lovely apartment is located in a very convenient neighborhood, and I'm certain I will return.  Thanks for a great stay!

Perfect rent in NYC! The renters are charming and try their best to accommodate with your check-in/out hours. The bed furnitures are excellent and the house offers clean and high-end kitchen equipment. Do not hesitate to rent!

I had a late check in and Evan was gracious enough to allow me to do this. The location of the apartment was convenient and the apartment itself was immaculate.  My first time in New York was great, and I would recommend this location to anybody here a stay.  They are a very nice couple and will give you great advice on where to go in the city.

Appartement cosy, refait à neuf et très bien placé.
Evan & Maria ont été des hôtes parfaits, toujours disponibles et très arrangeants.
Je recommande vivement cet appartement.

We loved our stay at Evan and Maria's chic home in Midtown! It was our first time in New York and enjoyed that it was central to so many things. The home is extremely well thought out as well. I liked how they maximized the entire space! And Evan was extremely helpful and accommodating! He responded back to all my messages promptly with very clear communication. I would highly recommend staying here again for our next NY visit!

Let me start by stating that it was my family's first time in the Big Apple and also our first time using AIRBNB so we have no idea what to expect when we arrive. Before I started with the inside of the apartment, like any property the most important is location, location and location. Evan & Maria's apartment is located at the heart of Manhattan. It is a walking distance to the Rockefeller Plaza and also to Times Square. There are several restaurants near the apartment and a deli just around the corner to get anything you wanted. 

Okay, now we begin with the apartment. It is very beautiful. Not only you can get anything you wanted but also you can tell the owner put a lot of their heart in to it. It is beautifully decorated and also very clean. 

On a personal note, we have the booking wrong, so we have to checked out a day earlier than we intended to. Evan and Maria were very nice and courteous about it. He texted us to let us know that we have to check out and patiently await our arrival, since we're on a ferry to Liberty Island, and help us find a hotel to move.

All and all it was a great experience even with the moving around and one thing for sure, if I ever in NY I will most definitely try to book Even and Maria super homey apartment.

Thank you Evan & Maria and good luck with the baby ...

yours truly,

The De Haans

Evan and Maria were accommodating with my check in and check out. They were clear with their instructions and welcoming. The apt. had a bottle of wine and chocolates which we appreciated! We had a chance to meet Maria and she gave us wonderful food recommendations!! Thank you Maria for telling us to call in our bagel order vs. waiting in line! The actual apt. is well decorated and very functional. We were very comfortable. 
Great location and lovely hosts!

We had the good fortune to stay in this amazing apartment for 4 nights while vacationing in the city for our 25th wedding anniversary.  The apartment is just as it appears in the photos: impeccably clean, modern, updated and cozy.  The bed and pillows were incredibly comfortable and provided a restful nights sleep after long days exploring the city.  Our adult daughter slept on the futon, and she was in heaven!  There were extra pillows, sheets and a comforter in the closet, and I'm not exaggerating when I say that she was more comfortable here than in the hotel room we stayed at during our first half of our trip.  The apartment had everything we needed: dishes, Keurig coffee and coffee maker (my #1 priority!), iron, hair dryer and much, much more!  There was a fantastic bottle of Pinot Noir that I thoroughly enjoyed and a jar full of Hershey's kisses (which we ate entirely too many of)!  Evan and Maria thought of everything; there is even an iPhone charger to use!  For NYC, it was very quiet and peaceful, which came as a pleasant and unexpected surprise to us.  The location can't be beat, close to great restaurants, parks,  & subways.  I'm sure I'm forgetting something, but let me end by saying that this apartment is so great that I want to live in it!  In fact, our daughter hopes to relocate to the city soon, and she took note of just how well Evan and Maria utilized the space and all the most wonderful details.  Well done.  Bravo!!!
Really clean updated apartment and the communication from both Evan and Maria was fantastic.
Room was very clean. With the queen bed and a sofa bed, our family of four were pretty comfortable. It's within walking distance to UN and other fun things in NYC.

Very nice, clean, new Studio at a quiet location @manhattan.  Nice shower, airco, complete kitchen. We were here with our 2 kids, what works really good. Easy to find, always accesible because of doormen next door. Friendly chat with Evan.

We had a wonderful stay at Evan and Maria's studio. 
From the very first email to checking out everything was smooth and pleasant.
The apartment is ideally located for visiting the Big Apple.
It is very well equipped, the bed is very comfortable, the bathroom is spacious and most importantly the apartment is very clean.
We hope that on our next stay in the city the apartment will be available.
Highly recommended!!!

Perfect Location!! This beautifully furnished, modern apartment in New York was exactly what we were looking for. We were within walking distance to Time Square, Fifth Avenue, Broadway  and there was a little supermarket close by too. 
The hosts were super accommodating allowing us on short notice to check out later, and sorting out any problems or queries we had straight away. Loved our stay in New York. Would recommend this place and the city to everyone.
Very nice tiny apt in the middle of NYC. Just remodeled and very clean. Too tittle if you're planning to stay with a bigger group of friends.

name: Artist Home by the Sea - a 4 minute walk to Beach!
summary: Our spacious comfortable 1 bedroom condo with original artwork is filled with peaceful and healing vibrations and surrounded by tropical gardens. It comfortably fits two and is in a small quiet complex of 18 units. Just a 4 minute walk across from the Ocean of Keawakapu Beach, listed as one of 5 best beaches in the world!  (Website hidden by Airbnb)
interaction: We are available to you during your stay via phone and email. We have contacts on island to assist if a special need arises.
houseRules: Please treat our Home with Love and Respect as you would yours!  Absolutely NO SMOKING anywhere on property. This is a complete no smoking property, inside and outside. No pets. All guests are required to complete Verified ID with Airbnb. Check in 4:00pm Hawaii Time Check out 11:00am Hawaii Time PARKING: Please use the Side Street to Park that is adjacent to our building. It is close,convenient and private. The custom here is to leave your shoes at the door, so you can enjoy your bare feet! Please rinse off all sand on yourself and beach gear before entering. A hose is at the walkway entry. Enter and leave our home using the sidewalk entry. Please do not walk in front of other people's lanai areas. It is considered private. Please be respectful of the other residents in the complex by keeping noise down at night and early morning.  Please remove trash OFTEN to keep ants outside. Trash bags are provided and the dumpsters for garbage and recyclables are located in the corner of the parki

host.about: Musician and Artist

reviews.txt:
Marilyn's condo is wonderful - best located, very, very clean and lovely! The beach across the street is beautiful and perfekt for snorkeling and watching big turtles! The kihei village is very nice!!!! We had a perfekt, unforgetable time in kihei and in marilyn's condo! 
Unfortunately we didnt meet Marilyn.... But the communication was great! Thank you, Marilyn, we hope to see you soon in Maui!

Our stay in Kihei was great. The apartment is perfectly located.  Marylin was really helpful. She's also a very talented artist and you can see some of her work around the apartment. You can walk to the beach from there if you want or go check out some other amazing beaches. I'd stay there again.

Our stay at Marilyn and David's place was great.  The location in Kihei was excellent and easily accessible to everything.  The condo itself was clean and comfortable.  Beach chairs, towels, umbrella and a cooler was very convenient as well.  We'd stay here again as well as recommend others to stay here.

Marilyn's condo was everything we could wish for for a perfect stay in Maui - just few minutes across the street from a wonderful beach, tastefully decorated with an amazing personal touch, super-clean, calm, but close to all Kihei shops and all island destinations! Besides that, Marilyn is a great host and was always available by mail for any questions we had! Many thanks, Marilyn - we had a wonderful time and hope to have the chance to come back! We can highly recommend staying at Marilyn's place!!
Place was as advertised.  Across the street from what became our favorite beach in Maui.  Comfortable stay.
Marilyn was very nice and the listing was accurate.  Her home was clean and had all of the ammenities my wife and I needed to have an enjoyable stay in Maui.
Great spot, comfortable, very nice stay in Kihei.  Safe environment...feels like home. Marilyn keeps it very clean and organized.  Would def stay again!

Marilyn made us feel welcomed at her condo. She provided us with all the information we needed about her place and quickly responded to of all our questions. 

The listing description is accurate. Her place is clean and nicely decorated. The condo is located in a quiet residential community. The location is very convenient, and I would definitely recommend her place!

Check in and check out was very smooth and easy. I much prefer the location of Marilyn's Condo in Kihei versus the more toursity Lahaina resort section, which is why we selected this location. It is less than 15 minutes to the best beach in the world, Big Beach! A short 25 minute drive to the airport.  the location was also great for our snorkling tour which docked across the street. We only went up the north west side of maui for our luau and parasailing, which the drive is kinda far for that, but not too bad to do twice. Loved the we were able to use the beach chairs and umbrella, THEY ARE A MUST on a sunny day at the beach!!! Only draw back, which is common, was no air conditioning, but we knew that going into it!
The Apartment is very comfortable and clean. Check-in without any problems. Everything was fine. The beach is very near and perfect for swimming. Thank you very much, Mailyn!

The Kihei condo was wonderful. The location is stellar-central to all the great "to-do's" in Maui but tucked back enough from major streets to be quiet and peaceful. We loved listening to bugs at night and birds in the morning. The interior of the condo was clean and well-appointed and the grounds were lush. Marilyn's artwork throughout the home and skillful rendering of feng shui decor made the place a comforting and calming retreat. On a scale of 10, I'd rate our overall experience at a 9.5.
This is a nice condo on in South Kihei near Wailea. Across the street from a nice beach, and a good value. As with many places in Hawaii, there is no AC so it can be a little warm.

Excellent place to stay while in Maui. Great location in Kihei right across the street from an amazing beach with shops and restaurants walking distance away. The apartment itself was great with all the amenities available and fully stocked for use. I 100% recommend staying here!

Marilyn was an excellent host.  She was warm and welcoming in all communication, even texting us during our stay to see if we needed anything.
   I gave her 3 stars for a couple reasons, some out of her control.  Her place is charming, but lacks air conditioning.  I'm from the Central Valley of CA & know heat, but the place is too hot to be in from 12-5pm, even with the drapes closed & the fans on high.  This meant we often could not eat lunch at the apartment & had to eat in town or take something in the morning when we left.
  The upstairs neighbor also has a loud, aggressive, barking dog that we could hear most evenings.  The neighbor also chooses to brush her dog on the balcony, letting the dog hair fall onto Marilyn's patio below, even when we are sitting outside.
  The final reason, most evenings we would return to the smell of pot from neighbors.  Some may not mind this, but it bothers me.  
  I know most of these are not within Marilyn's control, but they did make our stay less than desirable. As mentioned, she was a pleasant host & quickly responded to any questions we had & made us feel welcome in her home.

We absolutely loved Marilyn's home! It was perfect and exactly what we were hoping for. The condo is super clean and Marilyn is wonderful at answering any questions or giving advice! She always got back to me very quickly. 
The location was great. Everything that we wanted to do and had planned was super close to the condo. The beach across the street is great. Just steps from the condo and never over crowded. The little town just down the road has great restaurants and shops to grab some Souvenirs. We would definitely suggest checking out the Paia fish market for lunch/dinner. You can't go wrong grabbing breakfast at the Kihei Cafe. Make sure to get there early and bring cash!! That's all they accept. 
If you head in the other direction towards Waliea-Makena you can go to Makena park. Big beach is located here. It's a beautiful beach. The waves get a little big though, so keep that in mind. 
Marilyn's condo had everything we needed. The view is beautiful. The complex is clean and very quiet. We never saw or heard another person the whole week we were there. It felt like we were the only couple in the complex. Our only concern at first was that there is no AC, but after one night, we quickly realized that it was not needed. Marilyn provides multiple fans and Maui gets very cool at night. With the fan and cool breeze, we slept great!! 
We managed to get around most of the Island while we were in Maui. And honestly, we always found ourselves wanting to go right back to Kiehi! It's a
Very relaxed and laid back community with not an overwhelming amount of touristy activity, which is exactly what we wanted. 
We definitely will be back to Maui and would LOVE to stay at Marilyn's condo again!!!!

Marilyn was an excellent host and we especially appreciated that she responded immediately with any of our questions.  Our stay in her home was wonderful! She provided all the things we needed including beach towels, beach chairs and an umbrella that came in handy.  The location was perfect. Very close the the beach and restaurant options. I would definitely recommend staying at Marilyn's!

Marilyn was an amazing host and answered all our questions (including a few last minute ones) quickly and helpfully. The house itself is amazing, super comfortable and Marilyn has put a lot of thought into little touches which just made our holiday perfect such as the use of her cooler for picnics! The garden is gorgeous and the perfect place for a morning cup of tea. We also loved the location right near some amazing local snorkelling beaches as well as big beach also close to the local health food store Hawaiian Moons which we kept returning to! Her paintings are also beautiful and add to the peaceful charm of the house. Definitely recommend staying here.

The location was good very close to Waimea which is a beautiful negihborhood with exclusive resorts. We love snorkeling so this aloud us to be closer to La Peruse bay which was exceptional.  In the other hand being close to the main road it had a bit of noise. The kitchen was well equipped and the space was big and comfy. Having air conditioning will be a plus because the building gets lots of afternoon sun which make it a little hot.

We absolutely loved Kihei and kept coming back despite traveling out to other parts of Maui.This place is charming and cozy, with a central location to medical clinics, markets, especially beaches.  It is the perfect spot if you want a home-feel/based location.

We didn't get to meet the host, Marilyn, but she was in constant communication - and followed up quickly on questions.

The only downsides were:
1. There is no AC. Coming from San Francisco and being used to the cold, the afternoons in the condo despite multiple fans were almost unbearable indoors. 
2. She had some last minute instructions that we were unprepared for (unlisted on her website) regarding guests/visitors.  She did, however, accommodate our request.
3. If you love nuts, and nut products, this is not the place for you. We felt a little restricted in the food we could eat/cook at the condo. I myself have multiple food allergies, and most of my food substitutions come in the form of nuts - which I could not eat while there!

Otherwise, you will have a lot of fun, with pretty much everything you need close by, good internet speed, quiet neighborhood, and clean home.

Prior to arrival Marilyn sent a text message out to me getting me and reminding me of the house rules. Her hospitality was very much appreciated and got us started on the right foot. 

The place was exactly as described and perfect. It's not steps from the beach but it's about a 6-10 min walk from the beach. 

It's very close to food and shopping in kihei. I would definitely recommend and stay at Marilyns condo when given the opportunity

name: Nice Villa in the close countryside of ESSAOUIRA
summary: If you appreciate the natives in the outer boroughs, we appreciate you as guest.  Brooklyn has become very popular among Brooklynites and new comers.  While visiting NYC, if you are looking for crowds, museums and shopping, visit Manhattan.  Welcome!
interaction: We respect your privacy so will not interfere with your visit. We are not offering a hotel experience, yet a friendly and family environment.  (Please do not bring people to hang out, party or sleepovers - each additional person will be charged a nightly rate whether visiting or staying).
houseRules: No smoking, No pets.  Sanitary napkins, Tampons and Bounty napkins must be placed in the trash, NOT IN TOILET BOWL.  PLEASE DO NOT use hair dye/color.  Turn off lights, air conditioner and television when out enjoying the day.  Be sure doors and gates in front and back are locked when out of the house. Throw out trash and place in recycle bins.  Leaving the apartment untidy or dirty will incur a cleaning fee.  PLEASE RESPECT THE HOME AS IF IT WAS YOUR HOME WITH CLEANLINESS AND CARE OF BELONGINGS!  ALSO, NOTIFY HOST WITH YOUR DEPARTURE TIME - PLEASE DO NOT LEAVE WITHOUT NOTICE.  Departing after check out time (noon) will incur the daily rate.

host.about: Easy, breezy and enjoy having fun with friends and great people.  Appreciate a comfortable, clean home.  Favorite past time is reading or a good movie.  Family and my time, most important.

reviews.txt: Michelle was a very considerate, responsive host. The apartment is lovely and very comfortable and was furnished with everything we needed. We had a great stay.
