Séjour merveilleux chez Michelle qui est une hôte adorable, le logement etait vraiment super... très propre, , fonctionnel,petit plus le rez de jardin ou l on peux manger et profiter des petits oiseaux car nous sommes à new york , mais vraiment au calme,station de metro à deux (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande vraiment cette adresse, nous sommes venus avec nos deux enfants...
Merci michelle de nous avoir permis de passer un si bon voyage,!

I booked Michelle's private Brooklyn home for my retired parents, who were visiting me in LA from overseas and wanted to travel to New York for a few days. My parents returned from New York raving about Michelle, her graciousness and her beautiful home including a private outside patio! The apartment was attractively decorated and very clean with all the key amenities including coffeemaker, TV, internet, and even fresh fruit! The supermarket was conveniently around the corner, and my dad said he chatted with locals as he walked to the bakery to get bread each morning. My parents said it was like home away from home. They highly recommend Michelle as a host, and I can't wait to visit myself. Michelle, thank you for making my parents' New York trip so special. You and your family are welcome to visit us in Long Beach, CA anytime. 

Michelle, ist eine wunderbare und nette Gastgeberin.
Bei fragen und Tipps stets zur stelle und unglaublich hilfsbereit.
Das Appartement ist sehr geräumig und voll ausgestattet.
Die Lage ist erstklassig, U-Bahn und Supermarkt nicht mehr als 150 Meter entfernt.
Wir habe uns sehr wohl gefühlt und können uns nicht beklagen. Es ist jedem zu empfehlen der New York als Stadt erkunden will.
Jederzeit wieder!!

Very nice and big enough basement apartment with two rooms. Clean and nicely furnished with a good wide bed in one room and a sofa in kitchen, with all necessary dishes and coffee machine (Michelle even provided us with coffee for it) That was much more than enough for two persons. Also we used bbq in the court which also was great. Michelle was hospitable enough to meet us in the middle of the night!  We didn`t have any problems at all living in such kind of apartment. Should notice that the connection to Mahattan is a little complicated given the G metro line which is not very frequent. But in general the enviroment is quite ok with nice dominican dely on the corner of the street (highly recomended!)
Michelle was a nice person and really easy to communicate. We had a great time in this big apartment and no problem with to get into the city.

Very nice place!
Michelle is very friendly, helpfull and a nice person to chat with.
The place is very clean, homy feeling. The Subway is less than 100 yards away (about 1/2 hour ride from midtown Manhattan) which is VERY convenient. Neighbourhood ok. At the end of the day is much nicer to come to instead of a "cold" hotel room! The back yard is great for morning / evening coffe or even BBQ (the grill is already there).
Thank you Michelle  :-)
תודה רבה (Hebrew)

Michelle is a fantastic host, she made us  feel very welcome.
The place was clean and perfectly organized,  quiet at night, 4 very comfortable sleeping places, safe neighborhood, we had everything we needed. the subway is literally 1minute walk from the apartment, you get to Manhattan in 20 minutes. There are also buses that take you in no time to down town Brooklyn and Williamsburg. Supermarket is around the corner. Bakery for great breakfasts and deliciuos donuts place at 2 minutes walk from home.
The back garden is also very nice, we were too busy walking all day long, but it gave us a sense of big space, on a nice day you could spend time outside and enjoy a private corner of open air.
If I have the chance to go to New York again, I will surely go back to Michelle!
Everything was great in your apartment. Nice place, nice neighborhood with a subway station very close to the apartment. Thank you Michelle ! :-)

Notre expérience à l'appartement de Michelle fut merveilleuse! J'y suis aller avec mes parents, qui n'avaient jamais mis les pieds à Brooklyn, et ils furent enchantés par la proximité du métro, de l'épicerie, par la grandeur de l'appartement et ses facilités. Je recommande fortement l'appartement de Michelle, et j'y retournerai assurément à mon prochain séjour à New York!
-----
Our experience at Michelle's apartment was wonderful! I'm going with my parents, who had never been to Brooklyn, and they were delighted with the nearby subway, grocery, the size of the apartment and its facilities. I highly recommend the Michelle's apartment, and I certainly return on my next trip to New York!
Yol
Yol

Io e la mia famiglia siamo stati 20 giorni nell'appartamento di Michelle e siamo stati benissimo. Appartamento con ingresso indipendente, pulito, ben tenuto e con tutto il necessario per 4 persone. I letti sono veramente comodi (non si trovano facilmente nelle case per vacanze). Vicinissimo alla metropolitana, si raggiunge Manhattan in poco tempo, e vicino ad alcuni market, per cui fare la spesa è stato facile. La zona è abbastanza tranquilla, si rientrava anche a sera tardi ma non abbiamo avuto nessun problema. Michelle è una persona molto simpatica, molto disponibile e molto discreta. consiglierei sicuramente di passare una vacanza nel suo appartamento. Grazie ancora Michelle ...e speriamo arrivederci!! I love NY

Michelle was great host for my parents and very helpful in arranging taxi, showing shops and answering questions about New York. Her flat located just next to the metro station, which made it easy to get to the downtown. Had some minor problems with the radiator but Michelle took care of that so were no bigger issues. Recommended!

This was my first time to use the Airbnb and I'm glad I chose Michelle and her house. 
The house is as it's seen on the pictures. It is pretty good size for three people. My parents slept on the bed and I slept on the couch. I am 180 cm (5' 11'') and fit on the couch and it was pretty comfortable.
When we arrived Michelle's house she greeted us right away, took her time to explain how to commute, where to eat and what to do in the city. 
The location of house is pretty good. It takes 20-30 min with metro to Manhattan downtown, depends on which line you use. You can also take the metro from JFK, otherwise the cab costs  around $50. In the house everything was clean and neat. She also provided us towels for shower etc. Besides that, whenever I texted to Michelle she responded in timely manner, which made everything easier.
Honestly, our overall experience was much better than I expected.  Me and my family had a very good time in Michelle's house and NY. If one day I go back to NY, I know where I should stay.
We spent a wonderful week at Michelle's place. She was very nice and took care of what ever we needed. The apartment is just 2 min from the subway which helped us get to Manhattan quickly.

Michelle is really nice and her place is very cozy. This was my first airbnb experience and I enjoyed it a lot. Her service is much better than anything you would get at a hotel for a much better price. She gave us a recommendation on where to get breakfast that turned out great. The place is very clean and neatly decorated. It's literally right off the subway station, so that's a huge plus. We also met her mother, who is a fascinating woman. I highly recommend her place, if you are looking to visit the area.  
-- Later Edit:
I should mention that her internet is very fast. I don't know what ISP she uses, but it was a joy to go back to a temporary accommodation and know that you are well connected while traveling. I'm not sure of the exact setup, but it appeared that we had a separate modem and router just for us. This was a huge relief. Michelle had the SSID and password printed and ready for guests, so even if you forget to ask, you would still find them in the apartment. Overall, things were very well thought out before hand and Michelle was very proactive with tiny details like this that make all the difference. This was very surprising to me knowing that I'm dealing with an individual and not a company.
Michelle was very nice and her flat is very confortable, well located with the subway at the end of the street. I recommend her. Thanks a lot Michelle and see you later.
Michelle was an outstanding host and very helpful, apartment clean and convenient.

Amazing 4 day stay with Michelle in Brooklyn! We arrived a little early but she was still able to find time to accommodate us...arriving with fresh fruit and water for us. The apartment is amazing, plenty of room with all the comforts you could ask for (small kitchen/TV with cable/wifi). Easy access to trains and transportation, with many restaurants near by. After this stay, I don't think I'll be booking a traditional hotel in NYC again. Highly recommended!! Thanks again Michelle!

Très joli appartement dans Brooklyn! J'ai été agréablement surprise :) ! Nous y avons passé 4 nuits, et l'appart est parfait pour accommoder de 2 à 4 personnes. Très sympa de pouvoir rentrer pour prendre un verre ou déjeuner "à la maison". 
Le quartier n'est pas le plus trendy de brooklyn mais le métro est littéralement à 1 minute à pied! Michelle était charmante et tout était parfait! Et en plus, aucun problème pour stationner la voiture dans la rue, devant la maison! Merci!!!

Hermoso lugar, muy limpio. Michelle nos ayudó en todo momento y nos ofreció dejar las valijas gratuitamente unas horas aún cuando ya había pasado el tiempo del check out, el lugar es más lindo que en las fotos, y a muy pocas estaciones del downtown de Manhattan, 100% recomendable!
A pesar de que había nieve no se sentía nada de frío, excelente calefacción. El patio trasero era muy bonito y se veían ardillas!
Hay supermercado y KFC muy cerca, y es cómodo que esté a metros del subte.

Michelle is a great  hostess, she helped us with everything and even oferred to keep our lugagge some hours after the check out. 
The place is perfect, there are groceries, KFC, subway station, and it´s 20-30 mins from downtown Manhattan! 
Beautiful place, very comfy and cozy, everything was clean. We couldn´t enjoy the backyard because the chill, but it was awesome! and there were some lovely squirrels! We want to come back some year, and sure will recommend it to our friends

Nous rentrons d'un séjour de 8 jours à NYC où nous avons séjourn (Website hidden by Airbnb) Adultes et 2 ados) chez Michelle début mars. nous en sommes ravis malgré des températures froides.
==)positifs: 
Bon compromis rapport qualité / prix. La proximité avec une station de métro est un plus ainsi que celle de l'épicerie permettant de faire les petites courses pour les repas pris au gite. Michelle est extrêmement accueillante et serviable. 
l'appartement est simple et très propres. 4 vrai lits confortables. 
==)négatifs:
bien que situé dans un quartier + calme, la chambre donne sur la rue, et les nuits peuvent être difficiles pour les oreilles sensibles. le métro qui passe dessous est audible, tout comme les avions. mais à New York , il est difficile de trouver une endroit très calme. NEW YORK reste un environnement urbain et donc globalement bruyant, autant en avoir conscience. 
Pour une famille de 4, les lits enfants sont dans la pièce qui sert de coin jour. Une table et chaises pliantes nécessitent d'être pliés  pour installer le 4ième lit et inversement, plier le lit pour prendre les repas. Pour les français que nous sommes, la table est aussi importante que le lit. ça peut être un problème. 
Peu de vaisselle ( verres en plastique) ce qui est un peu dommage mais ça reste un détail.
Mais quand on vient à New York, ce n'est pas pour une ballade gastronomique. Nous recommandons vraiment cette adresse. Très bon compromis.
La cours arrière sera appréciable pour les périodes + douces.

English comments:
Just returned from NYC where we stayed with our 2 teenagers in Michelle's appartement. We are really delighted .

==)positives:
Good compromise quality / price ratio . Proximity to a metro station is a must as well as with the grocery store allowing some errands for meals at the appartement. really practical, opened until 21h. Michelle is extremely friendly and helpful.
the appartment is simple but  very clean with 4 real comfortable beds.

==)negatives:
Although located in a quiet neighborhood, the parent room is overlooking the street, and the nights can be difficult for sensitive ears. Subway is audible,as well as cars & trucks in the street. But to moderate this aspect,  in New York, it's difficult to find a quiet place because it remains a generally noisy urban environment as knowledge.
For a family of 4, children beds are in the main room. A table and chairs need to be folded to open beds and vice versa, folding bed for meals. it could be a problem.
Very few dishes ( plastic glasses ) which could be improved but it's still a detail.

But when we come to visit New York, it is not for gastronomic ballad, and it's important  to find a confortable & clean area. The backyard could be pleasant when the weather allows to use it. Unfortunatelly for us it's was too cold begining of march.
We really recommend this address.
Many thanks to Michelle.

Pascale et Yann.

name: Quiet Stylish Mosman Apartment
summary: My 3br ground floor apartment is close to Balmoral beach, buses, city, parks, harbour foreshore walks. You'll love the room as it has its own private courtyard. Lift access.. Comfy bed. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.
interaction: I'm in and out but love talking to people so if I'm home happy to interact or if guests would prefer to be left alone that's fine with me. I'm always happy to give advice on how to get around, things to do in the area and tips on places to eat and of course where the best coffee is.
houseRules: Only the person or people who book are allowed to stay in the room.

host.about: I am a retired property valuer. I love to travel. I usually do houseswaps but Airbnb is also a good way to connect with the community and far better than staying in a hotel.

reviews.txt:
Keythia was a wonderful Host. 
She made myself and partner feel very at home. 
The apartment was very clean and tidy with all necessary amenities. 
The bed was extremely comfortable and the sheets were 5 star. 
Keythia left out a beautiful selection of breakfast treats. 
I would highly recommend this apartment. 
Many thanks 
Mark & Rebecca

Again we had such a lovely experience staying with Krythia. She is such a wonderful host. 
Krythia make you feel like your right at home. 
Highly recommend this apartment. 

Many thanks 
Mark and Rebecca

My wife and I had a really fantastic stay with Krythia. The apartment is super homely, cosy and private. The bedroom we stayed in was really nice and had a private courtyard attached to it. We also had access to our own private bathroom. Everything was really comfortable and clean, and we were able to do our own cooking too. Krythia herself is a lovely hostess. We had several interesting conversations with her and she made us feel welcome right from the start. The apartment is just a few minutes walk from the bus stop, with it being very easy snd convenient to get into the city from there. Highly recommend this apartment, especially if you're a cat lover - Krythia's cat Cindy is super friendly!

We stayed at krythias apartment for four nights. The apartment and the room is as you can see it on the pictures. Modern and nice looking. Everything was clean and the bed was very comfy. Krythia is a really nice lady and we had some great short conversations with her. We felt very welcomed. The only thing we like to mention for the apartment that is located in a really nice area of Sydney, is that you can only reach it by bus (5 stops) - so there is no tram nearby. The last bus we were able to find to the direction of the apartment left the city at 8:30 pm. That was sometimes a little bit early for us and we had to take an uber (which costs around 20AUD). Everything else was really awesome and we can recommend to stay there for sure. Thank you Krythia for the amazing stay in Sydney.
We received a lovely welcome, everything was as described and perfect for our requirements. Thanks so much Krythia, for sharing your home with us.
Very good house, very clean room and private bathroom, very lovely cat and one very kindliness host. Spend a nice week with Krythia
Super comfortable bed and Krythia is very friendly and welcoming.
Krythia room was just what we looked for. Quiet location. Great price. Easy walking to places. Kriathia was a gracious host.  All was as we hoped.
Very comfortable bed, lovely bathroom. Krythia very welcoming.
Very clean and comfortable,
Very pleasant location, spacious apartment, extremely clean bathroom and kitchen. Excellent WiFi reception. Very friendly and helpful host
Highly recommended. No problems at all .

Great apartment located at a nice area. Good public transportation to the city. Car park available and very easy to get around. Lots of cafes and restaurants around the area. The room is nice and clean with a nice private bathroom. Cindy the cat is very friendly too.

Krythia's apartment was clean, quiet and comfortable and close to beautiful Balmoral.  Krythia was very understanding about our late arrival into Sydney and ensured we could access the property in her absence.  Krythia ensured we had everything we needed to make ourselves comfortable for our brief stay (tea, coffee) and was a generous host.
Great place, host and value

The apartment is in a small, modern complex, very close to a bus route direct to the centre of Sydney (10 minutes). Shops and beach are close but a LONG walk.
The bedroom is A-C, very private with very comfortable bed.
Amazing place, friendly host and good in value

Vi spenderade en natt hemma hos Krythia och det var bra. Vi gillade Mosman. Ävenom det är lite längre bort från stan så tyckte vi att det var värd.
Tack Krythia!

Krythia's place is central to Sydney and close to some beautiful beaches. The room is soacuous and the courtyard offers a nice private area to chill out. Krythia was a great host and very accommodating.
Krythia was a lovely host. The unit was central in Mossman and a short walk to buses which were only 10 minutes to the city. The bathroom and bedroom was lovely and we had a fantastic time.

name: Luxury Style Space: ideal for short or longterm!
summary: This beautiful space is like a mini-apartment in my apartment. The huge 12'x16' room was converted from my living space using a professional room converter. The bed is topped with memory foam for extra comfort, the windows are huge, couch is comfy. Just a dream of a stay! [FYI: no (further) discounts. I do have a weekly/monthly discount auto-installed for my listing already, so please do not ask]
interaction: I truly appreciate my privacy..... I typically stay to myself and I like to give my guests as much privacy as possible.... All are welcome, but I do have a preference for people with a similar lifestyle to mine: young artist/creative.
houseRules: CHECK-IN TIME : is anytime between 1pm - 10pm on check-in day, and must be confirmed with me 24 hours  prior to your arrival.  CHECK-OUT TIME : is 10am on check-out day.  Cleanliness : NO SHOES, NO SHOES, NO SHOES!!  (please bring house slippers if necessary, but please do not wear shoes in the house at any point, not “just on ur way out”, not “just on ur way in”, please respect my wishes and do not wear shoes in my home).  I expect my guests to be clean/neat, (especially in the bathroom). Please leave the bathroom tub/sink clean and free of your body hair. Since this is a space where I live as well, please be cognizant of my comfort as well as yours; clean up after yourself. MEN: toilet seats stay DOWN in my household lol. Please be courteous/respectful and keep your room how it was found. NO GARBAGE OR DEBRIS SHOULD BE LEFT BEHIND.   Conduct : guests should mind their noise levels  after 11pm. Cigarette smoking is STRICTLY prohibited. Just don’t do it. Keys: once booking this space,

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt: Dellasie was a very nice and gracious host. The room was huge, clean, and looked precisely as pictures. Her home was very conveniently located near transportation (train/bus/cabs), food... Anything you might need. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone coming to NYC!"

My stay in the house was perfect. The house was very clean, and comfortable. With so many space. I feel like in home. She was genial. The place was in the middle of Broklyn, so many local stores (food, clothing...) good located to the subway and bus station. I recommend this place to have a good time in NYC.
The space was comfortable, convenient, and clean.

We really enjoyed our stay here. Dellasie was a great host, was friendly and kind, gave us our privacy when needed but was always up for a chat. The flat is very nice, the neighbourhood is nice and lively, it is located very close to transport links, and you can be in Manhattan in 40 mins. A great place for anybody visiting New York! We would definitely stay again

Dellasie is a very prompt, helpful and easy-going host. Everything was set very promptly and prepared for my stay. The underground is cca 3 minutes walk from the apartment. Good choice for a short NYC trip!
Very clean and comfortable space. Separated from the main apartment area by a thick curtain. The apartment is close to the subway and very easy to access by car.

Dellasie was very warm and friendly - I felt very welcome in her home. The room is right in the center of her apartment but she was careful to make me feel like the space was my own private room. The neighborhood is great and one of my favorites in Brooklyn. I felt happy wandering around on foot in the day and the subway station is very close by with useful links. And the bed is SO comfortable!

The bed is in a large space which is on the living room of the apartment. Privacy is provided by large black curtains. Dellasie was really friendly and stayed out of your way. The Kingston metro station is just a couple of blocks away. It was a good deal for a short stay.

I had a very good experience here Dellasie was a good host and very kind. The place was clean and it was nice and quiet but most of all its in the middle of all the best places to go so no where is too far. Thank you Dellasie I would definitely come back.

I loved staying at Dellasie's place! She was very friendly and so helpful with any questions I had to ask. The room was just as described. I was perfectly comfortable the entire time and I felt right at home! I spent one day being lazy in the apartment recovering from my rough travel day and she even brought me a bunch of movies to watch. Great host!
Dellasie was easy to contact. Answered all my questions and welcomed me when I arrived. No complaints. The place was spacious, clean, easily accessable with public transport.
Dellasie made me very welcome.   Convenient location.   Very secure.

I waited a couple of days to write this review, as I want to digest this experience and try to review it as objectively as I can. 

The guest before me needs to check out late so she contacted me the day before I can do the check in between 4PM to 6:30PM. I was enjoying my holiday, I guess I could as the place I stayed before is not far from hers. So I replied yes. Long story short, the following day I got stuck in the traffic and got locked out from the place I stayed before. 

I was late. 

Dellasie was not happy, even I apologized. She won't listen to me explain either, "don't argue!" That's what she said

I didn't see her much during the days I stayed. She did provide me privacy and a big bed. Thanks.

The kitchen sink was always full of dirty dishes, I was not cooking there, just not so pleasant. The neighbour was loud at night, I can hear the TV is on till 2am, but this is New York, which is ok.

Generally it is ok, liveable, have privacy, safe area, loads of good restaurants. The host could be more welcoming, which is kind of her job. Smile once doesn't hurt.

Dellasie was very welcoming when I came to stay at her place. It is a very spacious room, and Dellasie will give you all the privacy you need. The apartment is a bit far away if you look to spend most of your time in Manhattan, but it is easy to access by train. You should check out Dellasie's music, she is a very talented singer and musician!

Dellasie was a terrific host. She was quick to respond to every inquiry. She was enthusiastic and acommodating without being intrusive. Her place was easy to get to (by subway) from Manhattan. Large room, thoughtfully furnished.
Dellasie is a great host, and the space is good as described. The area was a little noisy at night, so if it summer bring your ear plug ;)

The place was easy to find. If you come by car though,  be prepared to look for parking, especially in the evening. The room is indeed very clean and spacious.  However the bed is a bit smaller than shown on the picture. The room is separated by a thick curtain. Don't worry, it will still give you total intimacy. There is a big leather couch and a large table full of magazines; I liked the attention to details.  Dellasie is a very sweet and funny hostess (she's also a great singer!). On the bed was a basket with clean towels and a bottle of water. I thought it was a nice gesture.  I didn't see her a lot but she does respond quickly to her emails. Overall,  it is a very convenient and  safe place. I would recommend this room for a single traveler.

Even though I arrived just before midnight, Dellasie was very welcoming and showed me around the apartment straight away. She made it clear that she was available for help but left me my privacy, which was much appreciated! Good location, only a few minutes to the subway and reasonably close to Manhattan downtown. Really enjoyed my stay here and would definitely recommend!

Dellasie is a wonderful host.
Very pleasant stay. Being an artist myself, it was a bit easy to connect with her and I enjoyed our conversation.
She is extremely accommodating as we arrived a bit late, also that we kept her well informed about our whereabouts and when we would arrive.
There was a bottle of water, fresh towels and a card showing the wifi password by the bed which I thought was a nice touch.
Though I disturbed her in the middle of night when I did not try the door right, after grabbing a pizza in the corner, she and her boyfriend did not mind at all. Good people!

Dellasie is very generous and the space is pretty great - there's a large black curtain that segments the living room so you have your own space. Dellasie leaves you a towel and clear instructions for the wifi etc, and there's a huge fan in place and a place to hang your clothing. The apartment is clean and spacious, though some may find the makeshift bed a little too small. The only bad thing to me was the awful heat!

name: Most laid back-quiet place in HK
summary: Welcome to the most convenient yet quiet place in HK. Kennedy town MTR and buses are min away but yet you won't be bother by the noise of the city.
interaction: - Any advice on travel during stay including the best dim sum in town nearby! - Free welcome coffee and towels
houseRules: House Rules Check-in time is 11AM. No smoking No petting & noisy party but feel like home

address.street: Kennedy Town, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Really nice room with good location. Both the host and roommate are friendly and eager to help. I love the dim sum restaurant Felip recommended which is near by the apt. I love the food in HK so much that I plan to visit again. :) Btw, be careful of the mosquitos in HK when U visits in the summer time.
Nice place. Close to the down town. Would stay again :)

Hola a todos! Hemos pasado una semana en casa de luis y su compañero de piso, Camilo. Ambos muy simpáticos, receptivos y nos han ayudado con todo siempre. La casa está cerca del metro Kenedy Town, del tranvía y de numerosos autobuses que pasan por allí. La zona tiene muchos sitios para comer y supermercados. 
La habitación es tal y como se muestra en las fotos, pequeña pero con un colchón cómodo y aire acondicionado. El baño, completo y hemos utilizado incluso la lavadora y la cocina, nos hemos sentido en casa. Gracias chicos! 
Pilar

因为是去探访朋友和欣赏风景所以交通便利对我来说很重要 罗湖口岸出关之后地铁和巴士都很便利,从地铁站出来大概需要步行三分钟就可以到达,期间需要经过长长的台阶,拿着行李可能会劳累一些,房子很好找位于三楼,房东会很详细的安排与介绍,并留下钥匙,浴室很清洁,屋内虽小但五脏俱全,房东还贴心地准备了两个转换插头｡居住的五天确实温馨舒适,如果下次来香港的话我觉得我还是会选择住在这里｡要注意的是房间内两个屋子一个给旅客使用另一个是房东住,有时可能会带gf回来,介意的谨慎选择｡

Great location. Right next to the backside of Victoria Peak so if you're looking for nature you've found it. Very quiet and serene surroundings. Luis is very detailed in how to get here, just follow the instructions he sends you. 
Also right next to the Kennedy-Town MTR stop. Luis is a great guy, very friendly and outgoing and we very much appreciated his hospitality. Hope to stay with him again soon! Thanks!
Close to HKU and Kenndy Town. Nice roommate. Host is quite helpful.

Simply the best for its price among the dozen Airbnb offers in HK I have tried so far. 

The location: very close to MTR station; 7/11 store just down the street (free wifi), a couple of great local restaurants (one offers an awesome 2-person dinner for only 120 HKD, with free wifi), easy access to banks and supermarkets, all within 5-10 minutes walking distance. 

The room: very quiet, clean bedroom and air conditioner (I'm amazed there is no smell at all), comfy living room with kitchen, washing machine (you need that during summer time), and a refrigerator. And you could even find a copy of Animal Farm on the shelf, LOL. This really is what airbnb should offer in the first place, not some small and smelly hostel rooms without a window.

The host: quick response, easy communication, friendly permanent roommate. 

To summarize: awesome place, would definitely come back and also recommend to friends.



在香港住过不下十家的Airbnb平价旅店里,Felipe是我目前的最佳选择｡地点便利,步行五至十分钟可达坚尼地城地铁站｡楼下就有7/11便利店(有免费wifi),数家粉面店､茶餐厅(120闷二人晚餐好超值),Watson､百佳､惠康超市｡Felipe的房间安静､干净,空调无味｡起居室有沙发很舒适,附带厨房､洗衣机､冰箱｡书架上还有动物农场和其他一些书,不知可不可以拿来看｡｡｡与房主沟通很好,回复很快｡永久室友(真*房东)也很友善｡总之,远远好过无窗劏房小旅馆｡强烈推荐｡

Following the instruction that the host send me in advance, I have no difficulty finding the place. What a lovely and cozy home! I really enjoy my trip here. Thanks a lot!
看到中文评价很少,所以我用中文详细介绍一下哈*^_^*这里离坚尼地城地铁站和机场巴士站都很近,步行五分钟左右｡周围社区很安静,晚上可以休息得很好｡屋主细心的准备了液体蚊香,不用担心被蚊子咬｡关键是周围很多好吃的!攻略上有的太兴茶餐厅､新兴食家､源记甜品､德记潮州菜等等都在附近啊,吃得特别开心!推荐大家来啊,屋主很贴心很热情很友善,特别特别温暖!再次感谢!
Was a nice place to stay. In a fairly quiet section of Hong Kong, very easy to get to off the train and airport bus. About 15 minutes to Causeway Bay.

This Airbnb is what this site all about. You get a proper feel for living amongst the locals. The flat was well laid out with everything you need and the instructions from the host were super clear. 

The neighborhood is really friendly, on a rainy day we even got to borrow an umbrella from the downstairs neighbors (using sign language as we don't speak Cantonese) and the food in the area is sublime. Definitely go to the dim sum place they recommend!!! Our best meal while in HK.
Great location, just minutes walk from Kennedy Town MTR, yet located in a peaceful neighborhood away from the main road. Small but well equipped home.
Overall, it is a pleasant stay. Comfy bed and cozy room. Clean bathroom and easily accessible from Kennedy station. Great to rest up and continue  travelling around hk. :)

Charming, nice, and personal apartment in a cozy area.
A cozy place for two people with a small suitcase is perfect as there are many stairs and the room is small. 
And thank you for all your help Connie :)

We stayed 10 days, 9 nights and had a comfortable stay. The bedroom is small and we left our 2 backpacks outside of the room. We took advantage of the facilities provided and had breakfast in the kitchen and did our laundry.  The neighbourhood is lovely and gave a real local feel with cheap restaurants and a large supermarket across the street. Transport connections are excellent. We took the tram, bus, ferry and train after purchasing an octopus card all around HK. The hosts provide detailed instructions when checking in yourself and are always available to answer questions. This worked for us perfectly as we arrived very late in the evening.  If you want to get a local feel of HK with good hosts, this is the place.

name: Double Suite, with private bathroom.
summary: Beautiful sunny apartment  decorated with a vintage style in one of the best areas of Barcelona, well located,  close to the center but in a quiet neighborhood.
interaction: We let you go by yourself...but always we can go out and take a beer together.
houseRules: No drugs  No smoke No partys

host.about:
Somos Mario y Eva, vivimos en Barcelona desde hace seis años, y nos encanta esta ciudad, podemos recomendarte sitios, y ayudarte para que tu visita en Barcelona sea lo mas placentera posible.
Nosotros estudiamos y trabajamos, nos gusta el arte, la cultura, la naturaleza, conocer personas nuevas, y compartir.

reviews.txt: Il nostro soggiorno è stato molto bello, lei è stata molto disponibile. L'appartamento era molto pulito e in una posizione abbastanza centrale (a una quindicina di minuti dalla rambla a piedi). Ottimo!

Ottima posizione e in una zona tranquilla e sicura. Molto vicino alla metro e a tante attrazioni turistiche che si possono raggiungere facilmente a piedi (massimo 25 minuti). Ho davvero apprezzato la pulizia degli spazi! Ottimo in tutto!
Zona tranquila. Muy bien comunicada. Nos movimos caminando a todos lados.

name: Bundeena Garden Studio near beaches
summary: Light and stylish self-contained studio, perfect for that out-of-town break. Just 1-2 minutes walk to pristine beaches, close to Royal National Park bush walks. Located in Neil St, very close to Gunyah beach. Spacious and comfortable bed-living room (4x6m), kitchen and bathroom, shady deck with lush garden outlook. Please note that current construction work on an adjacent block may cause some noise on week days 7am-5pm. 10% discount for stays of 4 nights or more.
interaction: We live in the main house on the same property but guests have their own access through the garden and do not need to interact, however we are available to answer any questions.
houseRules: House rules for Bundeena Garden Studio: Please read this carefully before your visit so you know what to expect. If you need anything at all or have any other questions, please don't be afraid to ask – we want to make sure you enjoy your visit ☺  • CHECK IN/OUT  Please advise of your time of arrival by text message or email. Check in is usually after 2pm, check out is normally before 12pm (noon), but these can be negotiated if there are not adjacent bookings. • KEY You can pick up the key from us in the main house, or will be advised where to pick up if we are not at home. Ensure when you leave the studio that the doors are locked. • YOUR ROOM Sheets are changed for each visitor, but not the bedcover and cushion covers, so please keep them clean. The room is not serviced during your stay, so please hang towels for re-use. • FACILITIES A broom is provided – a mop and vacuum cleaner available on request. There is a clothes airer in the kitchen, and also retractable washing line under the

host.about: I have lived with my husband Chris in Bundeena for 28 years, bringing up our two sons who have now left home. We are artists and educators. We love photography, music, food, movies and travel, and believe you are never too old for the next adventure.

reviews.txt: Belinda and her husband were warm and friendly hosts during our stay and the clean, beautifully designed and cosey but spacious studio was everything we could have wanted for a quiet weekend away. We enjoyed watching the sunset at Port Hacking, a lovely dock across the road from Belinda's home and driving further south through the National Park. Highly Recommended for a relaxing weekend trip just an hour away from Sydney.

Bundeena is beautiful. The perfect spot for an easy weekend away from the constant noise of the city. And Belinda and Chris' Garden cottage is a fantastic place to spend time. Stones throw from the beach and beautiful coastal walks, but completely private in a little garden oasis. Birds everywhere. The cottage is fitted out beautifully, with thoughtfulness and great taste. We would love to return. And next time we're hoping for better luck spotting whales!

Bundeena and Royal National Park is a wonderful getaway from Sydney. Belinda and Chris' garden studio is separate from the house. Staying there was perfect -  It was cosy and inviting, well-equipped and had everything we needed. The porch overlooking the garden was peaceful while having a morning coffee, birds chirping... We walked along Jibbon's Beach the first day, and then to Marley Beach the second day - sighting migrating whales along the way! Very ideal for exploring Royal National Park, and a short walking distance from the ferry. Belinda was a wonderful host, friendly and available whenever needed. Thanks for having us!

Belinda and Chris are lovely people and very welcoming hosts. They were friendly, prompt in their communications, and provided us with a warm, quiet and cosy space for a winter getaway. Their studio is private, very well decked out, and closely situated to the beaches and bushwalks in Bundeena. Thanks for the wonderful weekend away :)

Belinda was vibrant and welcoming. The studio is lovely, private and decked out with everything you need for a cosy weekend away - there was even a fire pit which Belinda generously allowed us to use. The location is gorgeous, Bundeena is so relaxing, I didn't want to leave!

The Bundeena garden studio was a delight to stay at. Beautifully renovated, it is light and spacious. It has a very comfy bed in a peaceful environment. A lovely place to wake up to. 
Belinda is lovely and friendly and made the stay easy and comfortable.
An easy place to holiday and one we will be recommending to our Bundeena-bound friends!
I look forward to returning one day soon.

We loved our stay at Bundeena! Belinda's cottage was beautifully presented with quality comforts, privacy and has all the amenities you could need; perfect for a couple's getaway. The location is ideal just a short stroll to the beautiful beaches, bushwalking and dining. We fell in love with the area and look forward to returning there many times. Thank you for having us, we had a wonderful weekend!

Hi All, for those wanting a hideaway with the options of city experience if needed, then a cosy bungalow in Bundeena is a must. It was a lovely warm space with the fresh air or Bundeena and modern facilities. The kitchenette and bathroom were easy to use and made my life so easy. With private access it leaves you free to enjoy the environs on your own terms. The beach is a stones through away. I would love to have stayed longer. It is a quiet refreshing space in which to contemplate. A ferry ride to Cronulla is available if one needs to re-quaint once self with urban life, with the addition of train to CBD if needed. I highly recommend for those who have the time to relax and enjoy. Cheers, Brendan.

We've stayed at a few AirBNB places now and this has been the best so far. Everything was as promised and more. The cabin is a renovated artist's studio at the back of the garden, secluded and private behind trees. Belinda, the host, was lovely and welcoming and gave us some advice for how to best take advantage of the natural surrounds and events that were on in town.

The amenities were clean and exactly like the photos. We were impressed with the host's taste in DVDs and books provided for our use. 

We caught the ferry to Cronulla for the day ($12.60 return for an adult, must have cash to pay on the boat - a bit steep but worth it) and had a wonderful time enjoying the spring fair.

All in all, the host's made our stay extremely comfortable and gave us the privacy we needed to fully enjoy our stay.

Thank you Belinda and Chris!

Hi Belinda, I'd like to thank you allowing us to stay in your beautiful studio. It had all the necessities and was in an amazing location near the beach. Just perfect for our little weekend away! Your artwork is very fascinating as well, I will get in touch with you about those shortly :) thanks again and hopefully we will come back again in the future!

We had a fantastic weekend staying at Belinda's studio. The location is perfect, a short stroll to the beaches, bushwalks and the local shops. Ideal setting in the back of her garden and all the privacy you could want! We wouldn't hesitate to come back again!

We had a fantastic stay. The property is lovely, has everything you need. It was very clean and tidy. Very close to the beach, great walks. Incredibly peaceful. We liked it so much we stayed an extra night. 

Belinda was accommodating and a pleasure to rent from.  

I would recommend it to any friend.

My husband and I just had a perfect weekend in Bundeena.  This garden studio is everything it claims to be - Belinda has very thoughtfully set up this private sanctuary for 2 - it is very charming.   We will definitely come back.
We had a very pleasant short stay in Bundeena.  The accommodation was clean, comfortable and close to the beach and village amenities.  We would happily come back, but next time stay for longer.

We had such a fantastic weekend at Belinda’s gorgeous studio. Its just as lovely as in the photos – clean and beautiful and bright and airy and everything there that you could possibly need (even salt and pepper and pasta and tuna…AND scented candles). The place had a lovely vibe and even the bed and the pillows were comfy – and we have a Tempur at home so I’m very picky with beds!  Oh and the artwork is awesome!

The garden is lovely too and it’s a short walk to the end of the street to the beach and the national park. The beach is GORGEOUS!! Crystal clear, calm water and pretty seashells. Its also nice and protected so you don’t get blown away or sandblasted which happens on some other beaches.  Just past the beach is a path to the national park, which is so pretty. There were lots of birds and trees and beautiful giant rocks and some Aboriginal carvings. 

It bucketed rain most of the weekend we were there but we still had a lovely weekend. We’ve already booked our return visit for next month. :-) Thanks Belinda!

This apartment is a lovely place to stay, it's comfortable, clean and has everything you need for a stay in Bundeena, or even if you want to visit Sydney but don't just want to see city life! We would definitely recommend staying here and would love to stay again when we're back in the Sydney area.

We stayed in Belinda's garden studio for three days last week, and found it to be exactly as advertised. Very private and comfortable.  The location is really good, being so close to the beach. Overall the experience was very pleasant indeed and reasonably priced.  Lee

Belinda was great to deal with - she was organised, communicated well and best of all provided a perfect retreat! Her granny flat/studio has plenty of space, love and comfort and is perfectly positioned within walking distance to all the attractions!

We were very pleased with our accommodation and hosts Belinda and Chris. They have accessed what their guests needs may be then thoughtfully provided  everything down to an umbrella I noticed on the verandah. Everything was clean and fresh no tired old cast offs of any kind. We would recommend this BnB highly.

You can't really beat Belinda's place in terms of location and experience. I had a friend visiting from overseas and we had a lovely time in this little laid back beach town. Belinda's place is a cute little place where you can hear the birds sing in the morning and the waves crashing on the shores as you sleep. 

Just lovely and I couldn't be more happy to recommend it to anyone looking to get out of Sydney for a few days!

name: SUPERHOST- Wifi- METRO-Near Pierloti-
summary: You will not regret to stay in this room because my home is very clean and you can use kitchen and saloon. You can sit saloon and every night i make tea, coffee, prepare fruit table and regional flavor. ADVANTAGES: 1-Safe place-metro-bus every 6 minutes 2-24 Hour help desk for your travel 3-Istanbulcard for transportation 4-Pick up from airport, taxi drivers cant cheat 5-Unlimited wifi,big kitchen and living room for you 6-Breakfast, fruits, tea, coffee, deserts, nuts all free 7.Towels, shampoo
interaction: Every night i make black or roseship tea or coffee.prepare fruit table and regional flavors. You will not find so much to do at the hotel. !!!!..When traveling in another country if you want to help me how, I love to help people in the same way. This can't only get reviews. Why to host? Meet people from all over the world and provide help and support to people from other countries

host.about:
I'm from İstanbul.I'm industrial engineer at Istanbul Technical University. I like meeting with new people from different countries so I believe that sharing my apartment with my guest is a good opportunity to know more people all around the world. I like travelling. (I visited Sevilla, Granada, Madrid, Barselona, Athens, Skopje, Sofia, Beograd, Budapest, Prag, Moscow, Krakow, Sarajevo, Chisinau, Lisbon, Napels, Amsterdam, Wienna, Milano, Foggia, Rome, Frenze, Venice, Thaossaloniki, Kavala, Thassos, Beirut, Lviv, Gent, Brussels)
You will never forget this holiday. If you want really enjoyable holiday you should choose my home. At first read my all reviews and ask me all questions what you want to learn about Istanbul and other things. I'll help you all your travel.

reviews.txt: he is the best thanks nice clean comfy home

Мы останавливались в комнате у Кубилая на 3 дня,нам очень понравилось и комната и общение с ним.В квартире очень чисто и комфортно,много времени проводили в гостинной,хороший интернет и вобще расположение квартиры очень хорошее для передвижения по Стамбулу-рядом автобусы,10-15 минут до всех известных стамбульских мест.Отдельно про хозяина-очень дружелюбный и общительный,встретил нас рано утром,все показал и рассказал,каждое утро предлагал завтрак и чай, после отъезда помог нам с поселением в другую гостиницу,т.к. в ней никто не говорил по-английски)Будем рады встретиться опять и остановиться в его доме.Спасибо за радушный прием,Кубилай!)

이 숙소에서 일주일정도 머물렀네요. 

숙소를 정할때 이것저것 꼼꼼히 따지지만 인터넷상으론 절대 알 수 없는게 주인은 어떤 사람일까 이잖아요. 아무리 좋은 시설의 숙소라도 주인이 별로라면 아무리 방안에만 있는다해도 마음이 편하지 않더라고요. 
Kubilay 는 게스트의 마음을 편하게 하는 법을 아는 사람이에요. 겸손하고 유쾌해서 대화를 나누어도 친구와 편하게 이야기 나누는 것 같았고 또. 혼자서 조용히 시간을 보내고 싶을때에도 그런 저를 배려해주었어요. 

전반적으로 집도 깨끗하고 사진에 보이는 것처럼 방도 넓어서 지내는 동안 불편하지 않았고요 또 과일이나 커피등도 마음껏 먹었습니다. 저녁에는 Kubilay가 직접 전통차를 내려주기도 해서 차 마시며 밤 늦게까지 이야기하기도 했네요. 

위치는 중심가하고는 조금 떨어져있어요. 버스타고 20분 정도 거리입니다. 보스 정류장은 집에서 멀지 않아요. 게다가 종점이라 중간에 내려야하느라 신경 곤두 세우는 일은 없습니다. 탁심이나 술탄에선 멀지만 이 곳도 쇼핑가와 먹거리길등이 있ㅇ요. 오히려 음식 가격은 중심가보다 훨씬 저렴해서 좋았네요  

다시 머물고 싶을 만큼 좋은 곳이었습니다!!

Thanks Kubilay :)

Kubilay is a very welcoming and kind guy, I can easily recommend anyone to stay with him. Comfortable bed, nice room and nice flat. The location is in a non-touristy area, which is great for good, cheap food and a better experience of local life. There are also good transport connections to the rest of the city for when you want to do sightseeing.

At this point Kubilay feels just like a member of my family , an older brother  I'd say (even that he's younger than me :) ). I always know that no matter what when I go to Istanbul there is a warm welcoming Kubilay there always ready to do what ever to make your stay more pleasant.

Don't miss having that delcious breakfast with him on the weekend.

We arrived home with wonderful experience. Kubi is excelent host, everything was exactly as on explanation on site. Happy that we have new friend in Istanbul, and our warm recommandation for everyone who want to stay in this city. Can not wait till summer to meet this wonderful guy again! 
Resime: PERFECT!

I throughly enjoyed my stay with Kubilay. Although he wasn't there the first few days he stayed in touch and made sure that my stay in Istanbul was going smoothly, as well as having his friend meet us and show us the neighborhood etc. 

Kubilay is very sweet, trustworthy, friendly and good person to stay with. He is dedicated to making sure that your stay is as good as possible and extremely helpful. Makes for great conversation with a great vibe. I hope to return to Istanbul and when I do I'll stay with him once more!

This apartment is very nice for the duration of your stay in Istanbul. Kubi best and very good man. Spacious and clean apartment. Near the apartment there is a restaurant, a market all the necessary. If you want to leave a good impression living in Istanbul, I Recommend Kubi apartment)))

I liked that Kubilay's place because was nearby public transportation. I liked that there mere many resturants and shops close by. I enjoyed the farmers market on Wednesday, that was in walking distance from his house.
Everything is simply satisfying and great, the host is very helpful and his english is really good so it was eazy for both to communicate, i advise everyone for this house

It was a wonderful time for me in Mr. Kubilay house , I spent almost a month in his beautiful house and enjoyed a lot of Discussion and talking about cultures and Istanbul with him , also the neighborhood is quiet and very warm.

Kubilay is the best! Truly a superhost, there are not enough words to describe how great the Istanbul experience is when your host is Kubi. Thank you Kubi for your hospitality, friendliness and for for being such an amazing person!

Its always great to return to my “second home”. Well, Kubi’s abode is always the perfect place to stay as not a single day you feel like a stranger renting at his place. He always makes you feel so welcome and treat you like his own family members. He will always be there for you in times of need during your entire stay in Istanbul. In addition to that, he has a great heart too as he also support me for my humanitarian work in Istanbul in donating brand new clothes for the refugees! Wow! Definitely a gret host to stay with... for my entire month stay in Istanbul!

This is my first AirBnB stay with a super host and now I know what it means.
Kubi truly is a super host, he made my stay in a Istanbul more lovely, he is really a very helpful person.
The place is nice, many shops & supermarkets nearby, Buses and metro are close.

Спасибо большое Куби за гостеприимство и молниеносный ответ! Оказавшись в аэропорту Стамбула, Куби очень быстро откликнулся на мой запрос  Квартира находится рядом с автобусным кольцом оттуда можно добраться до самого центра! Рядом очень много магазинчиков и очень вкусная пекарня.

I was a bit afraid to go to Istambul alone, but thanks to Kubilay I enjoyed my stay there. He is very hospitable, sociable, always ready to answer any questions and give advice. 
The house is very spacious and warm, with all necessary equipment, and the atmosphere is so that I felt like at home)  
You will need about 30-40 minutes to go to the centre of Istambul by bus, keep it in mind when you plan your trip.
But though it is a bit far from the centre, there are advantages too. The house is situated in the district for locals, not for tourists. So you can buy cheap food there. You can find locum for 6 lira/kilo, cheap nuts and other turkish delights. There are also local shops near the house with good quality cotton clothes, underwear, tights etc.
Definitely recommend this host! Thank you very much for your hospitality!

I  stayed at   Kubilay’s place for  7 days and it was everything as advertised. It is the best location and shortest walk to access the bus and metro and minibus . It is also very convenient to shopping, restaurants, . The location of  the unit is incredible. My experience with the Kubilay’s  was very responsive and helpful . He personally makes us breakfast every Saturday and Sunday . The bottom line is I received very good value for my money and  Kubilay’s place will be my first choice on future trips to Istanbul .

Kubilay house is amazing good. Kubi is good and so nice guy who help me to search everything. He inform me everything about what i need. This place near from everywhere you no need scare for hungry becuase this place really central place. You just need walk little to get bus station and the hostes really nice to help you. No dispointed to stay here. I will stay here everytime i go to turkey. Good experience. Tessekur ederiz kubilay for your services

Would highly recommend Kabulai. Friendly down to earth and very hospitable - dont hesitate. The guy is awesome and his place is very spacious and clean. Made me breakfast on the Sunday I was leaving which was a good gesture. Wish I could've stayed longer.
The gentle home of a gentleman's educator, he can give you the utmost enthusiasm and help. You can't be mistaken for living here.

name: STUDIO APARTMENT + WIFI!!!!
summary: This fully furnished apartment includes marble bathroom with shower, kitchennette, Laundry and full access to a spacious gym and pool with a view!
interaction: We are available to assist you with our local area knowledge and to ensure you have a pleasant stay at our apartment.
houseRules: - There should be no smoking inside the apartment. Outside in Balcony only, with door closed. - No pets allowed. - STRICT NO PARTY POLICY.

host.about:
Hey! I'm A, absolutely love travelling, eating carbs with some good wine and helping people. 
First encounter with Airbnb was in Japan and loved the concept, our hosts helped us through and through. 
I thought to myself, why not help people with their holidays in my favourite city in the world, Sydney!! So here i am!! I will do my very best to make sure you enjoy your stay!! One Love! x

reviews.txt: The apartment was neat and tidy. Very close to transport and good location of you're working in the CBD. The check in procedure was very flexible and Angela was very easy to get in touch with and followed up. She even left me a box of chocolates as a warm welcome. Will stay again.
Great area and beautifully presented apartment, very clean. Angela was extremely helpful and easy to deal with. Loved staying here.

Angela was an excellent host - extremely welcoming and helpful throughout my stay. The apartment is immaculate - extremely clean and new, central location, close to shops and the train station. A perfect apartment for people who want to explore Sydney. I highly recommend this Airbnb without any reservations.
It was a perfect stay. The location was great as was the friendly service. It was meticulously clean and had the most comfy bed IVE EVER SLEPT ON!!!
Really enjoyed my stay and I am looking forward in staying again, it's clean, great location for my needs .. Prefect and great wonderful hospitality best regards
Outstanding communication prior to and during the stay. The apartment was great - would stay again!

Angela was a fantastic host! She was very friendly and responded to any questions that I had.

The apartment was nice, clean, and most of all comfortable! It had all the amenities that I needed. Wifi worked perfectly. Great location as it was within walking distance to many sights such as the Rocks, Opera House, Harbor Bridge, Darling Harbor, and George Street (shopping district). It was also conveniently located near the train station if I needed to head someplace far and to the ferries (that I took to Taronga Zoo and Manly Beach).

Would highly recommend Angela as a host and her apartment to others!

Fantastic apartment in very convenient location. Getting the keys wasn't a problem at all and was a pleasure to walk into a very clean apartment and have 2 cold beers in the fridge awaiting me too. I was very quiet which suited me as I was staying for business.
I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Sydney.

Great location!!!! 10min walk to Pitt at and 10min walk to circular quay. Great little apartment, especially if you're staying in Sydney for more then a weekend! Has a washing machine/drier, which was super convenient. Also a little kitchenette so we could have breakfast etc in. Also Angela left us a cute little gift on arrival, which was the sweetest touch. Definitely will be staying here again next time and recommending it to friends. 
Thank you!!!!

This was my first Airbnb experience and I feel so fortunate to have stayed at Angela's property.  Angela is extremely responsive and friendly, and the studio is just perfect - so clean and spacious with everything I needed.  Staying here was a breeze :). She even provided me with chocolates and grocery items when she found out this was an extended stay!  I would definitely love to stay here again and highly recommend Angela and the property to everyone visiting Sydney :)

I booked for an extended stay at Angela's apartment and it was everything I could hope for in an Airbnb stay and more! The apartment was extremely clean and well-kept with all the amenities included.  I loved the beautiful marble bathroom and the spacious living space.  The kitchen included a stove top, microwave, toaster and kettle so I was able to easily prepare simple meals and breakfast.  The neighborhood is quiet, safe, and there are various cafes and restaurants just around the corner.  It is also within a short walk to Wynyard station and major shopping spots.  This apartment was perfect for my stay in Sydney and I highly recommend it to everyone looking for a home away from home :)
Angela's place was exactly as pictured in a nice and secure building. I enjoyed the quietness, and she was very respectful of my needs and privacy. I'd return to her place next time I visit Sydney!
Angela was fast to respond to any queries, and provided excellent directions and arrival instructions.  The apartment was as described, and the location suited me perfectly.  I will be booking again.

Could not speak highly enough of the host! I let her know it was a surprise for my husbands birthday. She went out of the way to put up banners and purchase a cake as a surprise for us! Communication was A+! The room was fabulous and so clean and comfy! Thanku so very much!
The studio is comfortable and really clean.  Great location for exploring Sydney.  Quick walk to The Rocks, Sydney Harbor Bridge and Circular Quay.  Host is very accommodating.

Angela was extremely easy to deal with and was wonderful in going above and beyond to ensure we had a comfortable stay. Her communication was amazing and the overall experience was very positive. 

We felt very welcomed and can't speak highly enough of her kindness and professionalism.

The property is located in an excellent spot - very safe and super close to Darling Harbour, Circular Quay and the CBD (all within 5-10 mins walk).

The building has excellent facilities and the apartment is very clean. This was our first Airbnb experience and most definitely will not be our last.

We highly recommend Angela and the apartment. Thank you so much again for everything :)

A gem for any discerning traveller to Sydney! Lovely well appointed apartment with everything you could ask for in a stay, the marble bathroom was a bonus. Private but convenient location in the city - ten minutes walk to Wynyard's main attractions and the shopping district. Angela was a wonderful host, leaving some groceries in the fridge and communicating well to ensure I had a smooth stay. I'd love to be back the next time I'm in town!

My husband and I had a great time staying at A's place. It was super cozy, clean and in a good location close to the rocks, circular quay, transit and a grocery store. A was very responsive whenever we had a question. Definitely will recommend this place to anyone visiting Sydney CBD

This was the perfect place for my friend and I for our first trip to Sydney! The place looks exactly like the pictures and was as clean as a hotel room when we arrived! Angela was very accommodating and even provided some basic foodstuffs for us in the fridge when we arrived. 

You could not ask for a better location staying here. It's only a few blocks to Darling Harbour and a short walk to The Rocks and Circular Quay. It was easily accessible and we had no issues throughout our time staying there. I highly recommend this studio and would definitely stay here again!

I've never used Airbnb until this trip, and I was a bit nervous my first go around in an international city, but Angela made the process very smooth and saw to it that everything was taken care of for me. Very clean place and comfortable to stay in.

name: Cozy house at Beyoğlu
summary: Hello dear Guests, wellcome to istanbul. My House is 2+1 and at second floor. 1 privite room is for my international guests. House is Very close to Taksim Square. You can Walk in 30 minutes or you can take a bus.  The bus stop is only 100 m from home. You can go Taksim, Eminönü, Karaköy, Kadıköy, Beyazıt, Sultanahmet easily from home.  I have 1 bed, two people can sleep together. Second person should pay extra. You can use kitchen, bathroom, free Wifi, dishwasher, washing machine, Ironing.
interaction: You can ask any questions with phone, (Hidden by Airbnb) or email. + (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) is my (Hidden by Airbnb) number.  (Email hidden by Airbnb) is my email adress

host.about:
I am Ali, 33 years old and a Psychological Counceler - Teacher.  I am working at Secondary School. 
I like  meet with new people, chess, cinema and arts. I have blog about cinema and write critics sometimes. 

I like travel, I visited Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, England, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Kosovo, Macedonia, Netherlands, Portugal, Serbia, Spain and Ukraine. And I met many peaople in this countries, I think Airbnb is one of the best way to meet new people and share the life. So I opened my home for guests who is coming from the any part of the world.

Usualy I watch films, some of my favourite directors are Michael Haneke, Kim Ki Duk, Emir Kustarica, Lars Von Trier, Andrei Zyvanigitsev, Bahman Ghobadi, Majid Majidi, Abbas Kiyarüstemi, Ingmar Bergman, Stanley Kubrick etc. 

My favorite Tv Series are Prison Break, Breaking Bad, Better Call Soul, Mr. Robot, Black Mirror, Narcos, Intreatmant. 

I try to explain of me. You wellcome to my home.  My house is very safety, lovely and peaceful.

Easy access to popular destinations : Taksim, Beyoğlu, Eminönü, Sultanahmet, Topkapı Palace, Galata Tower, Kadıköy, Princes Islands.
I am pleased to welcome you.

People who stay with me are from Germany, Canada, Norway, Sweeden, Jordan, Russian, Iran, China, South Korea, United States, Mexico City, Malasia, Italy, Australia until yet.

reviews.txt:
Ali's place is easily accessible. From this place you can visit most monuments in the European side of Istanbul with the least complications (bus stop 1 min away and it serves Sishane metro in 10 min). If you take the bus to Sishane you can have 1 hour walk to most historical places in the European part. Next to his place there is a big market (both sides of a long street) with lots of local Turkish food. Just before his place, you can identify a small restaurant and a small grocery store. 

Ali is such a great host with distinguished Turkish hospitality. He helped me several times to locate appropriate places for buying gifts. We had interesting discussions and his excellent English helped us had rich cultural exchanges. 

I'd recommend this place if you want to get a great value of your money and enjoy a true Turkish life experience (neighborhood and hosting).
I never expected I can find a friend in Istanbul,Ali he is a good guy,he is a friend very thoughtful and comfortable.i recommend to everybody.

It was such a pleasure to live at Ali’s place. My flight was very late at night and I arrived around 1.00 am but He made sure that I checked in without any problem.
He gave me many usefull tips about the city, talked with my taxi drivers, ordered food for me and replay to all my messages fast. 
The turkish coffe He made was really god :)
Ali just makes you feel at home, He is easy going, nice to chat with and full og joy.
His lovely cat is just aswome 
Thank you for a great experience amd see you next time!

Ali is hospitable, he met me in the car. A cheerful and playful cat lives in the house. The house is located next to the shop, cafe and bus stop. Quiet area, across the road school, hear the children :) To the center to go by bus about 15 minutes. Thx, Ali! )

Ali was such a welcoming host when I initially just arrived. His hospitality attest to the warm and friendliness of the Turkish people. Though I only spent a few time and night interacting with him, I know that he could assist me with any way he can if I needed help. 
He has such a cute cat who loves to  play with his host! Perks if you love furry animals. In terms of location wise, Ali's apartment is located very near to the bus stop. There is one metro station that you can take that leads you to different and touristy parts of Istanbul.

Ali is a great host and makes you feel at home my 2 brothers stayed at his place for a week and they both say great things about Ali. 

Thank you for having us and looking forward to welcoming you in our place if you ever visit :)
This place exceeded my expectations. On of my best Airbnb experiences.
Very nice!
Very good
Very clean and comfortable place with an adorable cat included! Ali was so helpful when I arrived very late. Highly recommended!
Ali is very kind & helpful.  Though the bed is a sofa bed its shockingly comfortable; perfect combination of firmness & softness.  If you don't like energetic cats, I recommend not staying here.
More than I could imagine. Ali was not only our host, but he has become a friend. He lives in a very good position to explore Istanbul. I strongly recommend him. Thank you for everything buddy.
Ali's a great guy and super kind,I had a fantastic time in Istanbul and to his place! Also has a super cool cat that wants to play all the time! I loved it!
Nice flat with a great view from the balcony. super helpful and friendly host with a great taste of music :)

Ali’s hospitality is absolutely amazing! He never let you feel yourself like a stranger in Istanbul.
He was always ready to help me with everything and answer my questions about turkish culture. We had a lot of really great conversations.
And his home... oh, it’s sooo admiring. There are many things which are made by Ali. So you can’t leave his home without a portion of inspiration! 
By the way for every guest he has an gorgeous surprise :)

If you want to meet a friend, not just a host, don’t doubt - come to Ali’s home!

У Али я прожил неделю.мне все понравилось.Месторасположение жилье очень удобное. Рядом автобусная остановка. С транспортом проблем нет. К выходным в их районе огромный рынок открывается .рядом есть магазины продуктовые что удобно.в шаговой доступности минут 20 водный транспорт. Хозяин очень вежлив в совершенстве владеет английским. Всегда все объяснит и расскажет или посоветует как лучше. Смело бронируйте.рядом школа утром немного шумно но мне это не мешало. Тем более я рано вставал .находясь в Стамбуле хочется все увидеть.с удовольствием остановлюсь у Али в следующий раз.

Ali is very accomdating and very quick at responding messages. He gave me some good tips and showed me to a very cool local dive bar on Saturday night! The place is just as picture, convenient with bus to tourist places in less than 30min.

Ali was a charming and thoughtful host. He was good company but also respectful of your privacy and the fact you would have your own things to do. The room was basic but clean and tidy, and he provided a lovely breakfast. Highly recommended.
Good stay in Ali's home. Nice talking with each other and give me a lot of information. And good music in home. Hope meeting again.

Ali was as warm as Künefe  on a hot summers day! His hospitality was exceptional, from showing me his local tea house, to ordering in takeaway for me. His flat is well located close to the city centre, but quiet enough to relax, the room and sofa bed were great! Would especially recommend this for a solo traveller such as myself. 5 stars!

name: IDEAL APARTMENT SAGRADA FAMILIA
summary: Our apartment is completely updated, comfortable, functional, warm. You´re sure to spend a few unforgettable days in Barcelona. The apartment has everything necessary to make your stay perfect! The location is superb! Just two minutes from the Sagrada Familia, the extraordinary basilica by Antonio Gaudí!
interaction: I like to receive my guests and give them recommendations for places to go in the city: restaurants, hangout places....Barcelona is a city full of charm with many places to discover. The apartment´s location is stupendous! Located just three minutes from the metro and buses. The Sagrada Familia church, work by the Catalan architect Antonio Gaudí is right next to the apartment. It´s a good idea to purchase the tickets online to save yourself from the long lines and be able to enjoy the impressive basilica!
houseRules: No se permite entrar más personas q las plazas q hay, no se puede hacer ruido por la noche que cause molestias a los vecinos. No se pueden hacer fiestas. Hay que procurar dejar el apartamento en buenas condiciones. Si la llegada es después de las 20:00 horas tendrás que pagar un suplemento de 30€.

reviews.txt: Tuvimos una muy linda estadía en el apartamento. Todo funcionó a la perfección y nos manejamos muy bien con el transporte gracias a la buena ubicación. Nos llevamos excelentes recuerdos de nuestra primer visita a esa hermosa ciudad! Muchas gracias Marisa.
Great place great host. Very well located and clean. I really recommend this place
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is a great place to stay. The apartment is clean and comfortable, and well situated. Less than 5 mins walk to La Sagrada Família. 3 mins walk to metro station. Marisa is very nice as a host. She's friendly and warm. I'd love to recommend her place to anyone which is going to visit Barcelona.

Fue muy agradable lidiar con Marisa. Desde el principio fue muy atenta y la comunicación fluyó muy bien. El departamento es súper acogedor, limpio y accesible, exactamente como lo ha descrito. Nos dio varios consejos de lugares para comer y de la ciudad en general. Además, debido a emergencias de último minuto, tuvimos que pasar una noche más en Barcelona y Marisa otra vez tan preocupada nos ofreció ayuda inmediatamente. Un verdadero placer. Gracias por todo!
Muy lindo todo. Excelente predisposición. Hermoso el departamento
Tres bon contact, appartement  idéalement bien  placé. Expérience à  renouveler.
Très bel accueil de Marisa , l'appartement est conforme aux photos, très bien situé, le quartier est vivant avec plusieurs petits commerces, très bon séjour.

She was very nice and Friendly. The Apartment was really Cosy. 
Its not so far to the Central, very nearly.

Emplacement idéal: proximité de la sagrada, métro et commerces de proximité (boulangerie, supermarché, épicerie bio)
Appartement bien agencé avec une grande cuisine et une belle salle de bain
Balcon agréable

Nous avons eu des contacts réguliers avec Marisa, pour finaliser l'organisation de notre séjour à Barcelone, par SMS avec traduction pour mieux se comprendre, donc aucune difficulté si on ne parle pas espagnol.
Très réactive Marisa a tout fait pour faciliter notre accueil  et pour répondre à nos questions.  L'appartement est très agréable et magnifiquement bien placé pour visiter la Sagrada.
Il présente tout le confort et on se sent vite chez soi.
La propreté est parfaite et Marisa  nous a fait confiance  pour la remise des clés au moment du départ. Séjour très agréable.
We loved this apartment. Building facilities are in excellent conditions. Great location. Definitely recommend if you plan to discover this awesome city.

Superbe séjour de 3 jours à Barcelone !!! Le logement correspond tout à fait à la description du site. Le quartier est calme et idéalement situé (environ 200m de la Sagrada Familia et de la station de métro).

Merci Marisa pour son accueil et sa disponibilité !!

A recommander sans aucune hésitation !!!
Super appartement, bien placé voisinage discret et super équipé ! Je vous le conseil a deux pas de la sagrada familiale. De plus Marisa notre hôte a été super sympas

Marisa è un'ottima Host perfetta! È stata cordiale, gentile, molto disponibile. 
Si è subito prestata ad aiutarci nel momento del bisogno e a venirci incontro x accontentare le nostre richieste. La casa è bella e confortevole. Perfetta per 6 persone e ben accessoriata. Quartiere meraviglioso, a 3 minuti a piedi dalla Sagrada Familiare.  
Quando torneremo a Barcellona torneremo sicuramente da lei.

Marisa ha sido una excelente anfitriona. Estuvo pendiente de nuestra llegada y nos recibió siendo que llegamos de noche. Nos dio todas las explicaciones del uso del Departamento e indicaciones de comercios cerca del barrio para manejarnos. El departamento está muy bien equipado y coincide con todo lo que se muestra en las fotos. La ubicación es excelente. La anfitriona fue muy amable y nos dio facilidades para realizar el check out con nuestras valijas.
Lo recomendamos!

El alojamiento genial. Situación estupenda, buena comunicación con el metro a cinco minutos caminando, supermercados, fruterías y bares en la misma calle. Marisa muy amable y nos dio todas las facilidades.

We had a lovely time at this apartment.  It is very close to Sagrada Familia and also to the Metro station which is really handy for getting around the city.  We were welcomed at the stated time and told where everything was etc.  We didn't get a chance to meet Marisa, but her cleaner did a fantastic job of greeting us and making us feel very welcome.  The apartment block is quiet - you rarely hear/see the neighbours - but you will hear traffic.  But it didn't bother us.

Muchas gracias a Marisa por tan atento recibimiento. Todo estuvo fantástico desde el día 1. Incluso con el retraso que tuvimos a nuestro arribo Marisa fue tan atenta de comprarnos algunos abarrotes para poder tener algo que cenar y desayunar pues íbamos a llegar muy tarde. 

Totalmente recomendable el lugar. Hola excelente ubicación. Mil gracias.

Le logement correspond en tous points au descriptif et il est localisé vraiment tout près de la Sagrada Familia! 
Marisa est très accueillante, c'est agréable!

name: Bondi-Tamarama BEACHFRONT Apartment
summary: This gorgeous 3-bedroom apartment is directly across the road from the beach. It's very light, beautifully decorated and all within minutes of Bondi, Bronte, restaurants, shops and buses to the CBD. Watch the waves as you have a drink on the balcony.
interaction: Unfortunately, we don't get to meet the guests. We leave keys outside in a 'lockbox' which allows you to collect them whenever you arrive. We usually stay nearby and are available in the event that you need help with anything.
houseRules: Please be mindful of our neighbours and leave our home as you found it :)

host.about:
Hi there,

My name's Wayne. I live in Sydney, Australia with my fiancé, Kate.

I'm a management consultant, an author, a commercial helicopter pilot and I've recently developed a real love of travel with time in LA, Turkey, Greece, London, Vietnam, Thailand, Camboodia, Bali, Hong Kong and France all in the last 12 months.

We've done quite a lot of share living both at home and abroad so we'd like to think we know what makes a good environment in a home.

Hope to meet you soon!

Wayne and Kate

reviews.txt:
The apartment exceeded expectations.  
First, the location was incredible.  Literally overlooking the Tamarama beach and a beautifull balcany to sit on and watch the world go by.  
Secondly, the apartment itself was perfect.  It is clean, with great entertaining spaces and very welcoming.  You don't feel like your invading another persons home but it still feels homely - if that makes sense!  The beds, couch and linen were all clean, fresh and comfortable.
Third, it's only a 10 min walk to Bondi!
Finally, Wayne is lovely and immediately responded to all my questions.  We only booked the apartment a few days before, and it was my first time dealing with airbnb, so we really appreciated the quick responses.  Also, we had a bottle of champagne and chocolates on arrival which was a lovely surprise!
I would highly recommend this apartment.  It is the perfect place for people who want to hang out, relax and and enjoy one of Sydney's premier beach locations.  
I will definitely go back if I need a place in Sydney.

We had a great stay at Wayne and Kate's place. We travelled to Sydney for a family long weekend and from the moment we opened the door we felt at home. Their home is open and airy with a fantastic view of the beach. The location is perfect, we went on walks along the "ocean walk" to Bondi and the opposite direction to Coogee and Bronte. It was great sitting on the balcony looking out at the beach and the many energetic people pounding the pavements and in the water enjoying the waves. Wayne and Kate were great hosts emailing and messaging us with directions to their home and suggestions of places to visit. Nothing was too much trouble. The champagne and chocolate they left for us was also well received . We can not wait to return. Thankyou Wayne and Kate for sharing your beautiful home with us.

Wayne and Kate were wonderful to deal with, quick responses in the lead-up to our stay and comprehensive instructions on how to get the key when we arrived. As soon as we walked in we knew we were in for a lovely stay. The view is magnificent and the apartment is spacious and airy, and well-represented in the photos on the website. The kids loved the big TV which meant more time on the deck for us! Great walks and easy parking which is not easy to come by in Sydney. Would thoroughly recommend this place.

Holy moly what an apartment. Actually better than the photos! The vibe is clean, open, breezy, sophisticated. After a picnic lunch at Bronte, We enjoyed dinner together at the table and an evening swim. We were a party of 6, and all of us slept comfortably and felt like a million dollars the entire time. The kitchen was awesome to cook in and the balcony a peaceful breakfast spot. It could not have been more perfect.

Everything went smoothly and Wayne and Kate were very easy to deal with. The apartment is stunning, wonderful views of the beach, and although I only spent the afternoon there, my Mum and her friends who stayed over found everything they needed and were raving about the location. I'll be back! :)

We had an absolutely wonderful time staying at Wayne and Kate's place.. you cannot beat waking up to the sounds of the ocean! We had friends travelling from overseas for our wedding, and we could not have asked for a better place to stay; 2-10 mins walk to any of Sydney's great beaches, and all the anemities that you need in an apartment to make the place as comfortable as possible. Wayne and Kate were fantastic in getting back to us on any inquiries and were very thoughtful and approachable. The perfect hosts! now we need another excuse to rent out the place again ;) Thanks for everything!
