We had a great time staying at Wayne and Kate's place. It is an absolutely beautiful apartment in an amazing spot. It was great to fall asleep listening to the sea.
Me and 5 girlfriends stayed for a weekend and we were all blown away. The apartment had everything we needed, we just added a few bottles of champers to sip on the balcony and soak up the Tamarama atmosphere. 
Thanks Wayne and Kate :)

From the first contact with Wayne and Kate my first experience using AirBNB has been fabulous! Their regular and thoughtful communication was perfect and we were so excited to stay at their beautiful apartment overlooking Tamarama Beach. We arrived to find cold bubbles in the fridge, a block of chocolate and a 'house and area manual' to assist use with everything we needed to know during our stay. The apartment was perfect! Great size for a larger group and it was so nice to have the home comforts right at our fingertips. I cannot recommend this experience enough and look forward to staying at Wayne and Kate's apartment again in the near future!

We had a wonderful stay at Wayne and Kate's Tamarama apartment. Excellent communication and experience from the very start. Checking in was simple and we arrived to a lovely bottle of bubbles! The view and location are absolutely unbeatable, and the apartment is terrific. The photos do not do justice - it's an amazing apartment! Great lighting, very comfortable, and well furnished. The flat has all the amenities you need and truly makes you feel at home.  

We had a very small issue with the internet dropping out periodically but Kate went above and beyond to ensure things were fixed.  And… left us another bottle of bubbles for our troubles, which was so incredibly nice!

The apartment was a short walk to Bondi, Bronte and Coogee beaches.  The walk from Tamarama to Bondi is breathtaking.  We were lucky enough to catch the Sculptures by the Sea the week of our stay.

Our experience was outstanding and highly recommend Wayne and Kate’s place. We did not want to leave! We look forward to staying at Wayne and Kate’s in the future. Thanks again for everything, Wayne and Kate!  :)

Fantastic spot although the weather was not on our side!

I arrived late on the weekend, so Wayne and Kate were super accommodating with my friend John. Place is very secure, has an amazing outlook over the beach. Café’s and restaurants are a short walk away, and transport easily accessible. 

Great experience and would love to stay there again!
Thanks Wayne and Kate we had a lovely time at your apartment. Was clean, beds comfy and great view of the beach!!

What an absolutely fantastic apartment and view! The hosts were fantastic to deal with and gave quick and very helpful replies! The apartment had everything we could need for a girly weekend away. Thanks so much, we all had a ball =)
Wayne and Kate's apartment is in a fabulous location right on the beach of Tamarama. It is clean, well maintained and suited our needs with 2 teenage boys. Thumbs up!

We had a great time, the apartment was lovely, clean, the views were spectacular and all expectations from the posting were met! They even left us bubbly!
The owners were very kind and even left us tips for the area.
I recommend this apartment and experience highly.

-Boyana

Absolutely perfect place to stay in Sydney! The beach is quite literally, across the road! The views are to die for day and night. Short and beautiful walk to Bondi or Bronte for restaurants, bars and bigger beaches if you want them. The apartment is clean and very comfortable,  it has everything and more you could want. And the hosts are extremely kind and accommodating. We had a ball staying here!

Wayne and Kate’s beachfront apartment is simply amazing. From the moment we made an inquiry about the place, Wayne and Kate went above and beyond when responding to our questions and requests regarding the place – even replying within minutes when we sent a message at midnight!

Stepping foot into the place, you might have to take a second to realise that you’re not actually in a designer home magazine. All of the amenities are in great condition and all three of the bedrooms were large with the beds comfortable and extremely clean.

After settling in and making a cup of tea and coffee with the stocked kitchen, we decided to take a look at the lengthy list of activities that Wayne and Kate had compiled just for us. You can never undervalue local knowledge!

While Wayne and Kate’s place is extremely fun, it’s also the perfect place to get some work done. We popped down to Tamarama Beach Café (across the road!) and bought back some coffee and sat and worked at the breakfast bar overlooking Tamarama Beach with our laptops – using the speedy wifi that was provided, of course.

Simply, Wayne and Kate are amazing hosts and their stunning apartment is perfect for work, play and everything in between!

We loved staying at Wayne and Kate's beautiful apartment right on the beach. The apartment is beautifully furnished and we felt right at home. Wayne and Kate were fantastic hosts and were in regular contact to make us feel welcome. We can't stress enough how good the location is, being able to walk across the road for a swim at a moments notice is amazing. Highly recommended!
Beautiful location, nice hosts, close to Bondi and Bronte for cafés and restaurants. We had a great time! Thanks Kate and Wayne.
Wonderful apartment and extremely responsive hosts. Wish I were back on the beach!

Fantastic apartment, fantastic location, fantastic hosts! Everything was thought of for us and we had a wonderful stay. The best equipped apartment we have ever stayed in...enough of everything, and more!
 thanks guys!  xx

name: Cozy Room w/ Office | The Plateau Mont-Royal
summary: The Plateau Mont-Royal: At once, Quiet, Cozy, and Lively.  - Beautiful Parcs. - Great Places to Eat & Drink. - In proximity to Downtown, the Mile-End, and the Old Port. See the 'Interactive Map' for nearby Eateries. Ask me directly for additional information!
interaction: I work a lot, but can help you navigate the city and suggest places to visit, eat, drink, and have fun. I'm generally around on the weekends, so we'll likely cross paths.
houseRules: *Smoking on balconies only. **Feel free to invite guests during your stay.  But be reasonably quiet after 11pm.

host.about:
Easy-going, average cook, and continuing education (Urban Planning).
Interests include: Cities, Landscapes, Gardening, Music, and other things.

Just looking to provide you with a cozy retreat.

reviews.txt: Shane welcomed us in with open arms, he was very friendly and helpful. Stayed up to chat with us, suggested some places for us, and worked very hard to be sure we were having a good stay. First thing he did when we walked in the door was offer us food. Cozy, affordable, and pretty close to a lot of cool stuff.

Le gars est brillant! Et l'appart tout autant;  on s'y sent, immmmédiatement comme chez soi. "Hautement recommandé", si on veut non seulement dormir quelque part, mais rencontrer quelqu'un.

The guy is brilliant, and the house too. Feel immediatly at home. Highly recommended. Opportunity to sleep somewhere and to meet a human being. Thank you Shane!

Shane was a GREAT host.  When my father and I arrived, there was a lack of bed space for the two of us and Shane voluntarily gave up his bed so that we could be comfortable.  He went above and beyond to make sure we had a great stay.  I felt safe and secure and was able to live according to my odd schedule and hours without any problems !

Nice, Nice, Nice. European and artistic but well organized and covenient house. Perfect location. A block away from great street filled with international restraunts and grocery stores. While you arw enjoying the scene, you will get to the Metro or Bixie bikes. I did write this because of Shane. He is a kind and good guy. He will give you a full support while you are staying his place. So have a nice time!!

Shane was a a great host. He is very accommodating, communicative and fluent in both French and English. I never felt I was intruding in his space and I felt at ease sharing his kitchen and bathroom. His place is situated in a quiet neighborhood that is safe, charming and short commute to downtown. It is a short walk from his place to restaurants, bars and shopping (produce and clothing). I highly recommend this listing.
Shane was very helpful and amenable with check in time. The apartment is very clean, spacious and centrally located to food and drink. We loved our time in Montreal and Shane was very helpful!

Shane was an AWESOME host! I couldn't have asked for anything better; the place was cozy, close enough to everything I needed (I did have a Bixi membership for the month though which was also great), and I felt perfectly comfortable and safe. I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone :)
Un grand merci à Shane pour sa disponibilité et sa fiabilité ! Logement très bien situé et agréable.

name: Cozy Art Top Floor Apt in PRIME Williamsburg!
summary: My Apt it's right in the middle of the best and hot spots in the heart of REAL Williamsburg on Bedford Ave. Close to everything. 4 Subway stations (L/G/JMZ) around, same distance all! Very chill and cozy! 2 people only. No kids and pets please.
interaction: As much as they need my help and guidance.
houseRules: -SMOKE is NOT allowed inside the Apt. -NO parties are allowed. -NO Kids of any age. -NO access to the rooftop. -NO Bikes (there is not space for them). There are Citi Bikes around the corner in case you need them. -No execute luggage -Please do not leave the AC or Heat on, while you are not in the Apt. -Any damage will be deducted from your deposit. -Remember check in is at  3:00pm and check out is at 11:00am. If your flight is later on we can manage to leave your bags there and then you can come and pick them up before your flight if I don't have other guests coming right after. -Try to leave the house in good conditions please, remember I live there. Thank you so very much, Ade

host.about: I'm a Photographer and I love music, travel and good food! I speak Spanish, Italian and English!

reviews.txt:
Adela's apartment is fantastic – perfectly located in the heart of Williamsburg, very clean, nicely furnished and convenient.
Definitely one of the best New York apartments I stayed in recently.
Adela was very helpful and easy to communicate with.
Highly recommended!

Ade has an AWESOME apt in Williamsburg -- location is nuts, a reasonable price considering the location, and a great vibe.  Close to about everything in Williamsburg.

Wouldve stayed longer if i couldve.

Very nice Apt. in the hearth of Williamsburg and Bedford, wich is like the coolest place in Brooklyn, but in a very quiet and safety street. The apt, is in a 4th floor (no elevator) very clean and luminous.

You have two subway stations at 10'walk, and is really cool also if you want to bike the city.

Ade is really nice, will let everything ready for you and give some suggestions, se can speak Spanish too and in general all was as I expected, I would def. Recommend this place.
The apartment is nice (a bit small). Great location in Williamsburg. Nice bars and restaurants near by. 3 minutes from the subway
Ade was a perfect hote. She was there for everything. Her appartement is nice, clean and the location is perfect. Thank you Ade.

Adela's apartment is perfect, just as it looks in the photos, and was immaculately clean. The bed is comfy, the heating is warm ( we stayed in mid November)  and the location is really good, close to all the bars restaurants and shops of the local area but the street is quiet so you will sleep well!  It is only a short walk to the L train subway, and there's also 2 other subway lines a little further walk away so it's easy to travel around the whole of NYC from here. We loved staying here! Adela is easy and quick to communicate with and very kind, she gave us a fantastic list of recommendations for food and other things in the local area. Thank you Adela!

Ade fue una muy buena anfitriona y super agradable. El departamento mejor de lo que esperaba, mucho mas amplio de lo que mostraban las fotografías y mucho mas acogedor. El departamento mostraba el espiritu  de su anfitriona, mezcla de fotografía y música.
Ade was super nice and a very good host. The department was better than I 
expected, much wider than the pictures showed and more cozy. The department 
shows Ade's spirit, a mix of photography and music.

Ade is an excellent hostess. It was great to meet her upon checking in, and to get her awesome list of local recommendations which we immediately put to use from the fist night. The apartment is in a great location, close to the L train which is a 10min ride into the city. Not that you need to leave Williamsburg, we had some of the best food and drinks there during our NY visit! Ade's place is clean, with an eclectic decor, it's comfortable and surprisingly quiet. Communication with Ade was easy, and everything went very smoothly over our week-long stay. Thanks again for having us, Ade :)

Clean, quiet and perfectly located. From the list of local places of interest, to the willingness of Ade to assist us with any problems during our stay, we felt very well taken care of. I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone wishing to stay in Williamsburg!
Ade's apartment is one of my favorites in Williamsburg, cozy, clean, bright and perfectly located steps away from all nice restaurants, bars and subway stop. Highly recommended!
The reservation was canceled 38 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lovely little apartment in the heart of Williamsburg.
Ade is super nice and really accommodating.
Book it!

Super logement en plein dans williamsburg. Ade est très sympatique et nous a accueilli chaleureusement. Elle nous a aussi donné plein de bonnes adresses de resto et de sorties dans le quartier. L'appartement est bien situé à quelques minutes du métro Bedfort avenue, à un arrêt de métro de Manhattan. Il est pratique, mignon et calme. Le lit est hyper confortable. Il y a même la TV avec Netflix pour regarder des films ou séries. Vraiment parfait, nous recommandons ce lieu. L’appartement de Ade est un super bon plan pour qui veut passer une semaine à  New York au calme. Merci Ade!

Adela's place was awesome.  The location could not be beat - close to everything in Williamsburg including the waterfront and both the JMZ and L Trains for easy access to Manhattan.  Her unit is decent sized and quiet.  The bed was very comfortable and the furniture and decorations nice.  It was also very clean.  While I never met her, check in and communication were a breeze.  We would not hesitate to stay at her place again.

Ade's apt was really well-decorated, clean & cosy. Besides, it's so well-located in the heart of Williamsburg surrounded with a lot of restaurants and bars and close to Manhattan(1 stop - Metro L Bedford 5-minute walking). If you want to discover Brooklyn, it's the perfect place. Ade will give you the name of all the places she likes around her flat. We had the chance to meet Ade our last day and she'is as her flat : really nice and charming :) She let us leave our luggages very late as our plane was at midnight whereas she has already came back from her trip and was jetlag! Thanks a lot Ade for everything! Do not hesitate to rent her flat

We had a great time staying at Ade's apartment.  The place was very comfortable, exactly like on the photos.  It was a hot week in New York but the air con worked fine.  The bed was comfortable and the decor made you feel instantly at home.  Wifi was excellent and a decent sized TV with Netflix which we didn't use once because there were more exciting things to do.

As mentioned, the apartment block is very quiet ... amazing given how close it is to the main road of restaurants, shops and bars of Bedford Avenue.  

We walked around day and night in perfectly safe environment.  We took Ade up on some recommended places to eat and they were all great local places, well researched.

It was easy walking distance to all points of interest in Williamsburg, from the vintage market to the regular street food festival and East River Ferry, providing access to other parts of Brooklyn, downtown NYC and Governor's Island.  

The short walk to different subways meant getting into the city was very fast, particularly areas such as East Village and Park Slope.  We regularly went from the heart of the city back to the apartment within 20-30 minutes, a good escape when the crowds got too much in  Manhattan.

Ade welcomed in and helped us up with the bags on day 1.  There is no lift but compared to subways, a few flights of stairs was not a problem.  Again, on departure day she was very accommodating letting us leave the bags and helping us with getting them down again.

Ade's place was terrific.  Its location is lovely in Williamsburg and brilliant for getting in to Manhattan. The apartment is clean and comfortable. Ade is a friendly and helpful host. The top floor location really does make it quiet.  This is a great place to stay, whether you want to spend time in Williamsburg or Manhattan.
Ade's apartment was great. We're booking a lot through airbnb and her apartment was definitely a winner. Our collaborator loved to stay there and we'll definitely book it again!
The place was really great!! Best location ever and very friendly host. Thanks again

Location location location: Ade's apartment is perfectly situated in the best part of Williamsburg, making it so easy to hit the bars, the waterfront, and the metro.  With a location this great, you can walk two blocks in any direction and find fantastic food and entertainment.  Super hip Greenpoint is a lovely stroll away, and the East Village is just one stop away on the subway.  Ade's place was the ideal home base for exploring Brooklyn and Manhattan.  Ade herself was very cool, friendly, and helpful throughout the trip.

name: Suíte TOP frente Mar Barra posto 4 + Café da Manhã
summary: Suíte Top em Confortável Apartamento no Melhor Ponto da Praia na Av. Lúcio Costa 3300, Barra da Tijuca - RJ, compartilhado com a Top Anfitriã 5 estrelas Assunção de Fatima. O hospede tem à disposição a Suíte Top c/ Banheiro Privativo + Cama Queen de Molas Ensacadas + Sofá-Cama Solteiro + Opcional até 2 Colchões de Solteiro da Ortobom no Chão + Tv à cabo NET  + Internet Wifi + Ar Condicionado Digital + Frigobar + Armário + Roupas de Cama e Banho TOP + Limpeza Máxima + Chaves do Quarto e Apartamento + MIMOS + CAFÉ TOP! (Consulte já!)
interaction: Me chamo Assunção de Fatima e sou a anfitriã. Sou uma senhora sozinha, meu filho Israel está sempre por perto para ajudar mas não mora comigo. Não saio muito, adoro cozinhar, jogar candy crush e ver Tv. Vocês vão ter a Suíte disponível com banheiro privado integrado, Tv a cabo da operadora NET com canais HD e digitais , Ar Condicionado Digital com controle remoto, cama Queen com colchão de Molas Ensacadas, Sofa-cama e opção de até + 2 colchões de solteiro de verdade da Ortobom no chão e tudo o mais incluindo a chave da porta da suíte. A cozinha fica também, de forma compartilhada, à disposição caso queiram cozinhar. Você sempre vai encontrar a cozinha super limpa e arrumada e apenas deve mante-la organizada e limpa como encontrou.
houseRules: Check-in e Check-out no Quarto no horário do anuncio. *(Bônus)  Se precisar nós permitimos chegar *antes ou sair ** depois, vocês podem deixar suas coisas aos cuidados de sua anfitriã e permanecer no condomínio até o horário de entrada no quarto / partida (* 09 às **18 Horas) caso queira aproveitar a manhã do primeiro dia e a tarde do último. Porem no dia da sua partida o quarto e banheiro devem ser devolvido até no máximo 11 da manhã e no dia da sua chegada só podemos garantir o ingresso no quarto após as 13 horas. Durante o período que guardarmos suas bagagens vocês poderão utilizar os banheiro masculino e feminino e usar os chuveirões unisex que ficam junto à nossa sauna no pavimento térreo (chuveirão sem portar, deve usar roupa de banho). *Solicite sempre na sua reserva o "late check out" se for sair depois das 11 horas, e por favor informe se vai chegar mais cedo que 13 horas para tudo estar perfeito na sua chegada! (*Sujeito à nossa aprovação prévia, para garantir o ingresso ou p

host.about: Busco um atendimento 5 estrelas para quem quer se hospedar no Rio de Janeiro. contratar uma de minhas acomodações é sinônimo de satisfação. Conte  com compromisso, limpeza e fidelidade das informações anunciadas além de um excelente suporte com as dificuldades comuns de pessoas que vem de fora para se hospedar no Rio. Conte também com o suporte do Corretor de imóveis Israel Fagundes que ajuda a organizar os espaços, regras, e condutas do bom anfitrião. Tanto a trabalho como a lazer venha ser feliz de verdade no Rio de Janeiro nos nossos espaços. Estamos te esperando!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: A estadia com a Fátima foi maravilhosa!! O apartamento é muito bem localizado, a suíte estava em perfeitas condições, havia uma cama super confortável, um excelente café da manhã e ainda ganhamos um mimo em nossa chegada! Eu e meu namorado ficamos bastante satisfeitos! A Fátima é um amor de pessoa e fez de tudo para que nossa estadia fosse boa! Seu filho Israel também foi muito simpático, nos explicando os detalhes do (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza quando voltar para o Rio procurarei pela Fátima! Quem estiver precisando de uma hospedagem pode fechar sem medo de errar! Não tem como se arrepender!

..Foram sem dúvidas as melhores mini férias que já tive!!A Fátima nos recebeu com aquele sorriso no rosto e  uma simpatia carioca que só ela tem rs tivemos uma estadia maravilhosa,o quarto é perfeito,cama super confortável,a suíte TOP e todo restante do apartamento uma graça..literalmente: Me senti em casa e com certeza voltarei em breve!!Além de ter passado ótimos dias na barra,o condomínio é super organizado e seguro e a localização perfeita!!Ahh dica SUPER ÚTIL: Usem o aplicativo UBER ao invés de táxi,muitoooooo mais em conta e o serviço prestado é ótimo!!Já estou com saudades dessa fofinha que nos acolheu tão bem!
Fátima foi muito solícita e muito preocupada em fazer com que seus hóspedes se sintam bem.  A localização é muito boa. Um excelente custo benefício.

Amamos a hospedagem na casa da Fátima! Super atenciosa, gente boa, prestativa.. Nos sentimos em casa! Foram realmente maravilhosos dias que já nos deixou saudade! Quarto Mt bom, apartamento Mt bem localizado! Recomendamos de olhos fechados! Vale a pena conferir! Esperamos voltar em breve...

Olá quero deixar meu feedback sobre minha estadia. O anúncio cumpri com o que descreve. Ótima localização, tranquilo e confiável. 
A anfitriã foi super educada nos deixou a vontade para entrar a sair. Ela nos deu suporte em tudo o que precisávamos  inclusive no café da mãe. A casa é muito higiênica e nos atendeu para o que queríamos. Água quente no chuveiro e tolhas e roupas de cama em perfeito estado e inclusive com direito as alguns mimos ( drinks no frigobar e docinhos welcome) Obrigada por tudo.
Fátima nos recebeu muito bem ! O apartamento fica bem localizado e o quarto é muito confortável ! Adoramos nossa estadia!
Everything was perfect I felt just at home :)

Ótima localização, a anfitriã deixa o apto praticamente para os hóspedes, pois ela fica em 1 cômodo separado, a cozinha é bem equipada e oferece um ótimo café da manhã. 
É muito simpática e deu algumas dicas de roteiros.
No frigobar havia algumas bebidas não alcoólicas de cortesia.
Piscina aquecida muito apropriada para a época do ano (julho).
Condomínio de alto padrão sem burocracias.
Muito bem recebido, tudo conforme descrito, só tenho elogios. Pretendo voltar novamente.
O apartamento é muito bem localizado e a Fátima, uma anfitriã muito solícita, simpática e acessível. Foi uma estadia curta, somente uma noite, mas voltaria em outra oportunidade, com certeza.

非常棒的一次住宿!
1.房东人很好,是个超棒的老太太,拿着谷歌翻译跟我对话,详细介绍了房间,还给准备了糖果､饮料,相当贴心｡
2.关于地段,Barra 区算是里约的新区和富人区,在里约的南边,人不多,而且算是安全的一块区域了,这个住处的周围全是酒店和小区,紧挨着大西洋,超长海岸线,平时当地人都会去海滩玩耍｡主干道上巴士也很多,想打车去旁边的酒店门口就有很多车在等着,还算方便｡就是在吃的上不太方便｡周围是有几家餐馆,我吃过一家买墨西哥卷的,一般般还不便宜,其他的没吃过但我感觉都不是便宜的主,最近的麦当劳有一千多米,说近不近说远不远,比较尴尬的距离｡附近有几个大的 mall 但都得坐公交或打车去｡
3.关于房间,一个独立房间双人床,带一个独立卫生间,有电视,能看到海,相当不错,主要一天才一百多人民币(可能记错了,但也差不多),在物价不低的里约来说相当便宜了｡
综上,非常推荐这里!

Highly recommend the room!
Thank you Fatima!
Mesmo pouco tempo foi um ótimo dia e estadia ... Nossa anfitriã muito simpática e comunicativa..: nos sentimos em casa e com certeza voltaremos ... Fátima obrigado pelo carinho.

Nos sentimos como en casa gracias a la hospitalidad de la anfitriona, no manejamos con total libertad, l ubicación del lugar es realmente buena, y pudimos utilizar todos los servicios del edificio, como la pileta, el jacuzzi, el Gimnasio. 
Tuvimos comida todos los días y la limpieza es excelente.

Experiência maravilhosa! 
Tratamento VIP da querida Fátima, muito gentil e atenciosa do início ao fim da hospedagem. Nos deixou a vontade.
Limpeza e organização nota 10.
Só tenho elogios e voltarei em breve.

It’s my first AirBNB experience ever and I couldn’t be happier to have spent it at Mama Fatima’s house! 
 If you want to spend your vacation in Rio, spend it in Barra, and spend it in her home. Her place is well secured and is very close to the beach!  There’re also plenty of food available in the kitchen and there’s a grocery store just outside her place. It’s a plus that you can also wash your dirty clothes and cook your own food!
People in her neighborhood are very warm & friendly, they would smile back when you smile at them. They would greet you if you greet them. I wish I could have spent more time in her place!! I highly recommend this place for those who want a more relaxed & carefree vacation in Rio.
- lawrenzo, myra, & aba

Mantenho o meu discurso de 6 meses atrás quando fiquei pela primeira vez com a Fátima...tudo excelente! Já não é mais possível ir ao Rio e não pensar em se hospedar em seu apartamento! Fantástico! Recomendo de olhos fechados!

Minha estadia na Fatima foi incrível. Sempre que vier ao Rio ficarei em seus aposentos... O melhor tratamento que o ser humano pode ter.. parabéns Fatima... tudo muito show... Amamos... Sempre irei recomendar...

No sistema Airbnb foi nossa primeira experiência. Somos viajantes de acomodações exclusivas em hotéis, pousadas e as vezes casas. Saliento que somos casal e casal de filhos de 15 e 11 anos. A anfitriã foi o diferencial juntamente com seu outro hospede que tornaram a experiência ótima! Adoramos os dois! Ao ponto que gostaríamos de retribuir recebendo ambos em nossa (Website hidden by Airbnb) dica fica pelo seguinte; pra quem tem nosso perfil e estiver fazendo uma reserva no Airbnb, pergunte sobre o perfil do outro hospede(s) que estarão no seu período e se derem a sorte que demos, o único risco que correm é de fazer novos amigos e viver uma experiência que queremos repetir!! Abs Denis.

Eu e mais duas amigas ficamos hospedadas 5 dias com a Fátima. Ótima anfitriã, não temos queixas nenhuma é somente elogios. A Fatima nos deixa realmente em casa, sempre muito disposta a fazer de tudo para uma hospedagem maravilhosa. Impossível não virar sua amiga no final
Da viagem. Em relação aos quartos, impecáveis, muito limpos e roupas de cama bem cheirosas. Banheiro limpo e com todos produtos. O café da manhã é digno de hotel e fora que ela da total liberdade para fazermos lanchinhos no meio da tarde. Temos muita privacidade em sair e chegar na hora que quisermos. Enfim, foram 5 dias maravilhosos, Fatima arrasa na estadia.

Everything was great at Fatima's house, fully recommend her place and her great attention!

Best,
Gustavo

name: The Executive  Posh Room
summary: Our Cozy Executive  Posh 1 large  bedroom in private house with queen size bed 42" TV with cable and WiFi, close to both airport easy access to  buses and subways to Manhattan very quiet and safe neighborhood 10&15 minutes to JFK and LGA  airport
interaction: We are family oriented so we will interact with the guess at their convenience, host will be present upon arrival of guest.
houseRules: Just clean up after yourself, your mother doesn't live here. No pets of any kind and please do not put your luggage on the bed.

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: I'm a great gal just cool and easy going

reviews.txt: It was a pleasant stay an the host was very helpful an nice throughout my entire stay, I would recommend to anyone who needs a room..
Great place, very clean and comfortable. About 20 minutes to the train station. host can help with you anything you need. :)

The room was comfortable and clean and  it was quite easy to get around on public transport,. 
It is a family home and I found it friendly and welcoming
The room was as advertised. Transition to the accomodation was smooth. Karlene is very helpful and hospitable. I had no issues whatsoever. 100% recommend.
Loved this place.  Karlene and her family where very welcoming and helpful.  Communication was awesome from Karlene.  The room was exactly as described.  Bed was lovely and very comfortable.

Karlene was very Accomodating.  Although i did not stay that much in the house, but karlene was SUPERBE!  I think i would stay there again
I would recommend anyone going to NY to try out Karlene's Place!  You will be happy
Thanks Karlene

Karlene made me feel extremely welcomed! As a first time AirBnB user, I was a bit nervous about the process, but she made me comfortable by timely answering any questions I had prior to booking. Beautiful home and exactly as pictured. Would definently recommend!

Karlene was very friendly and helpful. The place was clean and comfortable and it was easy to get around by public transport. Futhermore she organized a pick up at a cost from the airport for me. I enjoyed my stay and can highly recommend  this place to stay.

Although my flight came in pretty late, Karlene was waiting for my arrival in her home. She was very accommodating and kind. Her home was in a nice quiet neighborhood, clean, comfortable. She even arranged for my pickup to take me to the airport early the following morning.  All in all it was a pleasant stay.

Karlene was very helpful, friendly and accommodating to our strange travel itinerary in regards to our checking in and out needs. The location was great for JFK, clean and comfortable for a good nights sleep. $15 in a uber to JFK - Thanks again!
Great experience! The neighborhood is very safe and bedroom was comfortable. I also enjoyed watching First Presidential Debate together!

Great 1st Time Experience 
Thx Karlene

Even though the location of the place is a bit remote, it is a great room if you need to stay close to JFK. The house is clean, the bed comfortable and the area is safe.
Karlene is a great host, very kind and willing to help. I felt great staying with her.
Excellent, was very communicative and helpful when my flight arrived very late at 3am.
I booked the place for my friend who just landed in NY and Karlene was very helpful by communicating well and assisting with transportation.
Good place to stay.  Close to airport, which is where I was working while there.

When there was a small SNAFU with the original room due to a burst pipe, Karlene was quick to find me an alternative location at a nearby room in her mother's home.  This was tremendously appreciated since I was in the air over the Atlantic when her misfortune occurred and I would have had a challenge finding new accommodation on such short notice.  This was the second time I've stayed with Karlene and I am quite appreciative.  Even helpful finding transportation to the airport. All was fine.

Clean and tidy room. Communication was very easy. We booked only a day before our arrival because our flight to Orlando got cancelled because of the hurricane. Karlene and her family are very nice. Thank you for the spontaneous stay!
Karlene is so nice that she waited for us very midnight. It's very close to JFK airport. Everything is good.
Place is nice though communication is a little time consuming. you need to take bus then subway to go to manhattan. otherwise place is really nice.

name: Cozy Comfy Suite of Rockaway Beach
summary: Enjoy a luxury and cozy stay at Arverne by the sea beachfront community in the Rockaways. This suite is walking distance to all shops, restaurants like "Thai Kitchen by the Sea, Boardwalk Pizzeria and Dunkin' Donuts. Transportation to  A train, Q22 and QM17 are only blocks away. This is a terrific stay for solo adventurers, couples, friends & families and business travelers.
interaction: Please feel free to contact us, we will try to accommodate all your needs during your stay.
houseRules: Please treat our home with respect! Put things away after using and leave them in its original condition. Please place all garbage in the wastebasket. Conserve energy and water! Please don't forget to turn off the lights when not in use, or before you leave. No smoking anywhere inside the house.  Please be mindful of neighbors.

reviews.txt: Safa's place was perfect- just what we needed for a short trip to the beach. The place was clean,  quiet,  and had all of the necessities.  The fridge and water cooler were life savers!

This was a wonderful place to stay!!! Really close to the beach. Safa (or the woman who checked us in) was super flexible about our arrival time and took care to make sure everything was set up and clean. In the morning a neighbor had parked us in and she quickly took care of it. Easy to walk to the beach, easy to park, really clean and simple and great.
Safa was very responsive and helpful.  Our accommodations were clean and cozy and perfect for a beach weekend getaway! Very close to the beach and boardwalk, and places to get food and go surfing!
房间崭新舒适,交通便利｡房东热情好客

This was the perfect place for a beach getaway. It felt more like a studio apartment than a room in someone's home, just without a full kitchen (microwave and fridge though!). The room was incredibly clean and the AC was strong and quiet. 5 minute walk from the beach. So great!
Highly recommend staying at this property. Extremely clean, great location minutes from the beach. Host was very courteous. Definitely booking this property again soon!
Clean,  easy, and a quick walk to the beach.  Basically like a hotel room. Safa was quick to respond and very helpful.
Place was convenient, clean and comfortable.  Safa was a pleasure to deal with.
Very nice and clean room! Perfect location for seightseeing New York and a little bit relax on the beach!
Ordentliches, zweckmäßiges Zimmer. Ideal für die Nacht vor dem Rückflug vom JFK Flughafen. Sehr nah zum Rockaway Beach. Die Kommunikation war gut, Ein-und Auschecken haben sehr gut geklappt.

We booked this place for one night based on very good reviews. I had a half marathon race in the next early morning. When we arrived, Derek (the premise manager) welcomed us and everything looked nice, comfortable and clean. The location is also good (close to the A train station and the beach). 
However, it was not quiet during the night sleep. We were woken up by constant loud noises ( between 12am and 2:30am ) from the tenant family (apparently, who also rent and stay in the house but on a different floor or room). We had no choice but called Derek around 12:16am and later with SMS, but the situation was not under control. The tenant's kids kept speaking loudly and running around, we could not get any sleep between 12-2:30am at all. We felt exhausted and bad in the next morning due to disruptions of night sleep (remember, I also had 13miles race to run).  Definitely, it requires further improvements.

The unit was exactly as advertised and it fit our plans for Rockaway perfectly. 

Derek, who was filling in for Safa, was very attentive to make sure everything was in order.

Very clean room, good amenities, no kitchen, but a microwave and toaster. 

The only issue was the noise: the neighbors were very noisy all weekend
It is a great suite.  Everything is perfect. And Safa is easy to communicate

This room was exactly as advertised. It was very clean and the bed was comfortable. Safa was responsive and professional. However, we were only there 2 nights and we hardly slept the first night because the neighbors in the adjacent unit were in the hallway yelling running up and down the stairs until about 3am. It seemed like there was no sound proofing between our room and the stairwell. If not for the noise, I would definitely recommend this room.
Great place, magical location. Private and cozy.
A good inexpensive place to stay. It's a bit out of the way so definitely important to have a car.
The room was clean and exactly as described. We enjoyed our stay.
We stayed for two days with my wife and two kids and the place is exactly how it is advertised . Safa was very responsive and I would definitely stay next time .
very easy check in and communication. short walk from train and beach. walls are thin but otherwise a very nice sunny pleasant room!

name: Chic City Pad with Leafy Outlook
summary: Recently renovated and truly spacious studio apartment in the heart of Potts Point. Within walking distance to some of Sydney's best attractions and an easy 8 min walk to Kings Cross Train Station. Beautifully renovated and appointed, you will have access to free Wi-Fi, the new kitchen with cooking facilities, washer & dryer and the building's stunning pool!  The space works for solo adventurers and business travellers, with the comfortable queen sized bed making it perfect for couples.
interaction: I will be available 24hrs each day during your stay, just phone or email me. I will also most likely be there to check you in and show you around the apartment when you arrive in Sydney.

host.about: Hi I'm Vickie! I am an avid traveller who loves my city and Airbnb allows me to share it with you and!!! I truly enjoy meeting new people and look forward to welcoming you to my beautiful city.

reviews.txt:
Spend a great 2 nights at Vickie's studio. Well decorated, had everything we need and surprisingly spacious. It was my first time in Sydney, so the location was just perfect; many good cafes and restaurants near by.

Vickie is an amazing host, she made sure we were comfortable and well adjusted. Great person to communicate with.

Merci Victoria pour votre charmant accueil, votre appartement est charmant dans un quartier animé avec des cafés et restaurants à proximité. 15 mn à pied de CBD et de l'opéra de Sydney. La vue de l'appartement est dégagée et très bien exposé.
Merci pour vos messages de compassion suite aux attentants de Nice. Je vous recommande cette adresse.
Fabienne

What a fabulous Studio in the centre of Potts Point. I was lucky enough to be one of the first to stay here. Everything is lovely, fresh and new. It's quiet, but at the same time has everything on the doorstep. Vickie is a wonderful host and made sure I was comfortable.

Vickie was a lovely host and did everything she could to help and make our stay enjoyable. The apartment is in an excellent position - close to restaurants and cafes as well as walking distance from the city. The apartment itself is great with a very comfortable bed and has everything you need.

Vickie is an amazing host with a beautiful apartment. Location is incredible- right by lovely restaurants and bars, and only a quick ride into the city. The apartment itself was gorgeous- so clean, light and airy. Queen bed is super comfortable as well. I highly recommend this apartment, and would love to stay here again. Perfect Airbnb experience.

The apartment was exactly like the photos, brand new and very clean.
The bed was a fold out from the wall, very comfy and the pillow and blankets were amazing.
Perfect apartment! Great local restaurants and supermarket across the road. Perfect and professional communication from the host. Well done. I will stay here for business again.

Great location! A very nice area with lots of bars, shops and restaurants close by and a nice stroll to the city. Clean, modern and comfortable apartment. Very friendly and helpful hosts who were great at communicating and made us feel very welcome. We would definitely stay there again!

The studio was clean and nicely furnish. The sofa and bed are comfortable, and the apartment has a ledge by the window with chairs to people-watch in the day. It has everything necessary for a short term and long term stay. There is a big TV with chromecast that was so useful when my partner and I simply hung in the apartment after a day of exploring.

Victoria was prompt in responses and prepare materials abt the area and the facilities that were very useful. Check-in process was very easy. 

Highly recommended, and will be very happy to be hosted by her again when I visit Sydney.
Apartments is small but it is nice and well located. The street is good and plenty of good restaurants and just 5min walking to king cross station

We really enjoyed our stay at Victoria's place. It was a beautiful apartment in a fantastic location; close to all shops and amenities. Kings cross is only a short walk away but most days we walked through the beautiful botanic gardens to Central Quays. 
We really appreciated being able to stay until after lunch on our leaving day. The apartment was beautifully clean and although cosy had everything we needed.
Vickie was an excellent host and responded to any queries very promptly despite being away at the time.
I would definitely stay at this apartment again if visiting Sydney.

We stayed at Vickie's apartment for five nights and we enjoyed it a lot. The apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures and it's well-equipped, beautiful and cozy (the bed is especially comfortable). 
Victoria was very friendly and easy to communicate with. When we had issues with the wifi, she immediately came over and sorted everything out, although it was already 8 or 8.30 in the evening. She also gave us a lot of information about restaurants, bars and sights in the area. All of her recommendations were really good too!
We had an amazing time in Sydney, thanks to our great host Vickie and her lovely apartment. We can definitely recommend this place! :)

Victoria è un Host perfetto. Ci siamo sentiti molto spesso per cordinare il viaggio. La casa è molto vicina al centro molto pulita e graziosa.  Se dovessi tornare a Sydney sicuramente sceglierò nuovamente questo appartamento.

Vickie is The perfect host. She is very nice and polite. The apartment was cute and clean. The location of the flat is good and Vickie gives you recommendations of were to have good meals next to it. We would definetly come back there if we ever came to Sydney again!

Victoria's Chic City Pad was an an excellent stay!! She made my friend and I feel really welcomed from the start! She communicated clearly about the arrival time and gave us great advice about the city. She also checked in regularly to ensure we were enjoying our stay. The neighbourhood is very posh, a less than 30 minute walk from the Opera House and Harbour Bridge, as well as the Botanical Gardens. It was easy to find from Kings Cross train station and we loved the modern feel and look of the flat.
Great apartment close to everything. Vickie was really easy to communicate with on our arrival and knowledgable of the area too! highly reccomend.
The apartment was amazing. Perfect location. So comfortable and had everything we needed. Victoria was communicative and attentive. Would love to come back.
Awesome location and great host. Flexible with arrival and departure needs too. Thanks for a great stay Vickie!

Victoria was super quick to respond to all questions, the location is amazing, great area for cafes and bars, also very central to close to the train so it's very to get around.  Lovely and clean space, it was a pleasure to stay

Check in was very easy. Victoria was there to meet me, explained the area, where everything was and was very helpful in letting me check out later. It was a great stay, definitely recommend the space for any solo travellers and the area for anyone who is looking for great food, and a nice relaxing atmosphere.

name: MONTJUIC FOUNTAINS APARTMENT
summary: Excellent apartment situated opposite Barcelona Fair and Conference Centre complex.
interaction: .INFORMATION TO THE GUESTS:  - An 24/7 emergency phone number will be provided at your arrival for anything what could happen during your stay  - According to the Barcelona law we are committed to register all occupants information, so you will receive an email with a form that you will need to fill in with all the occupants data  - We remind you that you will need to call 30 minutes prior your arrival at the apartment to the check-in phone numb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) -If you don't call the check-in phone number nobody will be waiting for youat the apartment
houseRules: .GUESTS REGISTRATION:  - The registration of all occupants data is an obligation by Barcelona law. You will receive an E-mail enabling you to supply us with these details online  - The guest assumes responsibility to return the apartment and all its furniture and equipment in good condition on the day of departure. The apartment and sets of keys should be handed back in the same conditions as that of the arrival date  - The guest agrees to respect the residents of neighbouring apartments and to not cause excessive noise at any time of day. The failure to complete with the above conditions may result in immediate eviction from the Terrallar S.L. property without receiving any refund.  - The client assumes the responsibility of the apartment as well as the furniture and utensils, having to leave it in the same conditions as on arrival, the day of departure. Leaving in the apartment as many sets of keys as received on the day of arrival.  - Each set of missing keys will be charged € 30 /

host.about:
Barcelona Bedroom es una pequeña empresa familiar con más de 50 apartamentos propios repartidos por toda la cuidad de Barcelona.
Estaremos encantados de recibirte y ayudarte en todo lo necesario para que que tengas una agradable estancia. No dudes en contactar con nosotros. Gracias y esperamos verte pronto.


Un saludo!

reviews.txt: We were 4 people on business travel and the place was absolutely perfect! Clean, quiet (nothing if you want to party), central and a fantastic view and surrounding.

Very bright and clean apartment in front of the Fira Center and next to the Crown Plaza it can't be more convenient for a business trip. The view is very nice and all rooms and bedrooms are very practical.

Hola,

El apartamento está en general muy bien. En nuestra opinión se nota que es una empresa de apartamentos y no una casa de un particular. Muy mal que para un apartamentos de 6 personas sólo den un juego de llaves! 
Estaría bien que hubieran dejado los mínimo: Papel higiénico suficiente, agua, café.

Great apartment set in the heart of Barcelona and just a stone's throw from Espana Plaza. Apartment is spacious with everything we needed. Clean, great views of the city and close to transport links. Host was fantastic at allowing us to extend our stay by a day and have lots of great tips on how to explore the city. Barcelona was amazing and will definitely come back - would stay here again in a heartbeat.

L'appartement est très bien situé, bien desservi par les transports en commun.
Il est bien entretenu, et propre.Il offre une belle vue à toutes les fenêtres ( fontaines de Montjuic, centre de Barcelone). L'ascenceur est pratique pour l'appartement qui est au 6ème étage. Il y a tous les commerces nécessaires à proximité.

Par contre, l'isolation par les fenêtres et à revoir car on entend beaucoup les bruits de circulation de la rue qui est passagère y compris la nuit. On ne peut pas remonter les volets jusqu'en haut sinon, ils se coincent. Dans une des salles de bains, il y a toujours une odeur d'égout.

всем привет) отличное месторасположение!заселили раньше чем указано,не пришлось где то сидеть и ждать с чемоданами-спасибо!))) кому нужен тихий сон,данный вариант не подойдёт! остекление очень тонкое, окна на проезжую часть,ночью шумно от машин!будет проблема,если вы приедите , как мы большой компанией 5 человек, установлен маленький бойлер для  воды, приходилось ждать , когда вода нагреется! хороший сигнал интернета! прекрасные живописные виды из окон! 10-15 минут пешком до старого города!   в общем данный вариант оставил положительное впечатление! спасибо))))

This apartment and the surrounding area were great and very comfortable.  We were greeted well when we arrived and the host is very professional.  Also, the area was easy to make daily excursions around Barcelona from.    I was surprised to find that the kitchen didn't have an oven though.

Firstly the accomadation is in a really fantastic location with special views of the city - if you dont mind being a little bit out of the downtown. Easy walk to metro in 5mins. The instructions on how to get to accomodation and the process is super clear and professional. Call as soon as you land as taxi only takes max 20 mins. Appeared that host is not the actual home owner but rather part of a management company - not relevant for appartment. Kitchen had all utensils required but no basics such as sugar,salt etc. Good space in the appartment for a group and a great sitting room. Take note of late arrival charges - they are communicated in listing. Panorama view of Tibidabo hill is fantastic and location again great if you dont need to be ultra central.

Excellent communication and very easy to find. Clean and spacious apartment with great views. Maybe one or two chairs and one sharp knife would be nice but everything else is OK and we would definitely come here again.
This apartment was a wonderful place for our stay, the apartment was very clean, space full and perfectly situated.

Not much contact with the host, but when needed was eay to get hold of. The Neighbor hood is very nice, with a few Supermarkets & Cafe's around. 

Relatively easy to get a Taxi as they wait beside the hotel down the road. Place was clean and tidy and I would definitely recommend.

We were phones on the day we we travelling to confirm our arrival time. We were met at the door as we turned up. The flat was ready and we were quickly checked. Efficient, proactive and friendly service - I couldn't fault it
The host was very kind and helpful. The apartment is really good located for those who come to sight see Barcelona

This is a great apartment in an amazing location. The stay is overall very comfortable and I would stay there again. Having said that, there were a few things to note for improvement, but not deal breakers for me: 

1. we stayed a week and ran out of toilet paper on day 3. we were informed that we need to supply our toilet paper. not an expensive buy, but the inconvenience of having to worry about that was not pleasant.
2. the smell of cigarette smoking from other apartments in the building kept coming in through the heating vents, i had to open the windows to air the rooms every few hours. This was certainly unpleasant, but i guess it could happen anywhere.
3. as others mentioned, sometimes smells were noticed in the bathrooms - it happened randomly through the day. i guess the building;s vent systems are not great.

again, these were minor things. we felt very comfortable otherwise. we also really appreciated the view and the location. the beds were comfortable too.
Perfect location at 5 min walk from Plaça Espagna, beautiful view, clean rooms, a very good experience!
Casa amplia y cómoda con excelente ubicación

Ne cherchez pas le 1 de la rue, c'est au 1 bis. retard de l'hôte et accueil assez glacial. Il ne répond aux appels que par textos. Assez bruyant et des améliorations sont à apporter dans l'ensemble. Odeurs désagréables dans les salles de bain. Cependant, l'appartement est bien situé et nous a permis de passer un séjour agréable. Idéal pour un très court séjour. A recommander pour le feu d'artifice du 31 décembre, vous y avez accès depuis les chambres comme s'il était tiré spécialement pour vous.
This apartment is beautiful and spacious, its the perfect size for a larger group of people. Beautiful view of Barcelona. We really enjoyed our stay
Meticulously clean, perfectly located, and a large comfortable apartment. It was perfect for us.

Great apartment, excellent location near Plaça Espanya, just a few steps from the Magic Fountains and the Museu Nacional d'Art de Catalunya.  Everything was as expected, very clean, very comfortable, nice view from the kitchen window.  Check-in process was fast and smooth.  It is located on a SIXTH floor, but the building has an elevator for 3 people.  Shower cabin in one of the bathrooms is very small, if you are a medium sized man, you will have some troubles.  But anyway, this is one of the few things you have to live with when you travel.  If I return to Barcelona, I would definitely consider this apartment again.

name: Room Close to LGA and 35 mins to Times Square
summary: A private small bedroom in a 2 BR 1BA apartment. There’s no living area as I converted to live in. The location is 2 minutes to Q33 bus stop, 5 minutes to 7 train station ( which directly takes you to Times Square in 35-40 minutes ).
interaction: This apartment has my husband and me. This place also has a chinchilla and a French Bulldog. We are living in this apartment in a living area. And we are offering an actual room for your privacy. I would be very happy to welcome all dog lovers because our frenchie loves to interact with people. So feel free to contact me if you have any questions :)
houseRules: * check-in time AFTER 5:00 pm. Guest is required to communicate and update by messaging AT LEAST 30 MINUTES prior your arrival. NO EARLY CHECK-IN to keep the other guest's privacy.  * STRICT CHECK-OUT TIME IS 11:00 AM. There will be an extra night charge for late check-out with no prior approval * Guest's visitors are not allowed to come in without prior approval * Please take off your shoes at the entrance of the apartment. Per AirBnB’s policy, no 3rd-party bookings

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt: Host was wonderful. She and her husband were awesome host with nothing strict. they volunteered to send me off knowing i have many baggage. i would love to stay with her if given the chance again and at this price. its a steal folks in NYC. love the pet as well, furry and fun
房东人很好,入住前很认真的打扫了卫生｡房源信息描述准确｡有毛巾和洗发水沐浴露提供｡街区很安静,离地铁站比较近｡
Wonderful stay at Cheer s apartment, the room is cozy and clean. Cheer and her roommates showed great hospitality. I had great time talk with them.

It's an amazing place to stay in New York, Cheer and her husband were really welcoming and answered all my queries quickly, they even helped me with all the touristy things and all. The room is as advertised, cleaned. The dog is really amazing and if you're a dog lover then it's the best place to stay at this price. I highly recommend this place.

Cheer and her husband were incredibly nice and welcoming. Their place is very nice and clean. I loved the neighborhood, it's very diverse and safe. It's only a 5 min walk to the 7 train which connects you to everywhere. I would definitely recommended staying with Cheer!

Very lovely couple, nice and clean place, they did 150%. 
5 Stars allarround, highly reccomended.
I will return to this place ever.
Thank you very very very much

When I reached Cheer was there to attend me and the place was clean and ready for me to stay. They provided everything they claimed and also more.
Pudit was also very helpful.The puppy is really sweet. I'm not a dog person but it didn't bother me.Its really well trained for guests. Usually you won't even notice its in the house. 
I had to extend my stay but the place was already booked after me. Cheer helped me to find a nearby Airbnb proactively.Also Pudit offered his cart to carry my guitars. It was really sweet of them. They are really approachable people.
Thanks for making my stay comfortable guys!
It was a great experience! The room is terrific!
Cheer was so nice .She suggested memany things .I want to come back to  stay at this place again.
I love the place, Cheer and her husband were very kind, the apartment was very close to the subway, definately I'm going to stay with them if I'm back to New York

Cheer was very accommodating and her puppy was adorable. The room was very clean, especially the towels and bed sheets. It was nice to have an air conditioner in the room, although I didn't need it. I was worried about the location at first but it was great and safe to roam around even at night. Lots of fruit stands around during the day! There was a train station close by so I was able to go to Manhattan easily.

Cheer is so so helpful with what to do in the neighbor! She is also such a nice person. I very much enjoyed talking to her. I didn't want to leave just because I want to talk to her more! Her husband is also a great guy, who helped out when I got some blisters in my feet.

The neighbor is very good. 37th Ave is great. You can take long walk to either direction and end up at either Corona Park or Diversity Plaza. A very cultural distinctive place.

Cheer's place is fantastic! 
Very friendly and a cozy clean room. Excellent location and would stay again and recommend to friends and family.
Thanks, Cheer!

Cheer's place was great! I like the room - simple, comfy, and clean. It's like your old room back in the city that you just want to retire after a very exhausting day. =) 

Mostly my fault that I didn't get to interact as much with Cheer and her housemates during my stay (coz US Open), but they were wonderful and easy to get along. Sorry that I wasn't able to personally say goodbye coz of my super early flight. But until next time! =)
The room was just as described. The 7 line is just 2-3 minutes away and you also have a lot of nice places you can eat shop right there in the vecinity. Felt like I had everything I needed.

Cheer and Pudit made sure that my stay in New York is one for the books...  The room is super clean and the restroom as well... They value your privacy and they don't restrict you when it comes to time in coming home... And Nathan the cute french bull dog is the bonus mascot in the house!!! I highly recommend cheer's place if you want value for your money, good location and tidiness!!!

Cheer and her husband were wonderful. The room was clean and cozy and felt like home. Another big plus is that it is only about a five minute walk to the 7 train. 
Overall, I would definitely recommend staying with Cheer. 
Thanks again for making my first Airbnb experience a great one!!

For me this place is a perfect place to stay if you want to visit new york. Cheer and her husband were really nice and they welcome me. Their dog, Mason, is really friendly and i enjoy playing with it.

The experience is the first for me and I was say it's a good one. The couple is very friendly and it's. Very clean place, and you go in and out as you please. Only drawback, no parking like anywhere else.

Cheer was a perfect host! I arrived later than we had originally planned, but she was completely understanding and was there to welcome me in. The room has everything to make you feel at home : a closet equipped with hangers, umbrella, and iron; television, books, tissues, towels; even a mini-fridge with water and some snacks. The apartment itself is impeccably clean. Lots of restaurants nearby. Safe area. Bonus: cute puppy and chinchillas.

name: MODERN CONDO WITH VIEW - GRIFFIN
summary: Enjoy your stay in Montreal by relaxing in this brand new condo with a lot of great amenities in the building :) You will love the view, the balcony, and the free coffee/tea in the morning ! Feel free to borrow a travel guide and go explore the city!
interaction: During your stay, you can reach us by phone for any question
houseRules: - Please leave the place clean after you, do your dishes.  - No guests or animals are allowed (max 3 p. in th condo and the common areas) - No smoking - Do not be too loud

reviews.txt: My sister and I just got home from an amazing weekend away in Montreal! This was the first time we used airbnb and Manon was a wonderful host. She was prompt to answer any questions we had. The condo was spotless and beautiful and looked just as the picture described. The neighbourhood was lovely. Was only abou a 7 minute drive to downtown and we used uber! It was a locked and secure building. We have only amazing things to say about our stay and the host. Thank you again Manon!

name: Bright, Modern, Spacious Duplex Apt
summary: We recently updated this listing from a room to the full apartment! That means more privacy for our guests, and an even better experience. Please ask about the changes if you have questions! Astoria is 15 minutes from midtown via subway (N and Q lines near the 30th ave stop). Relax on the couch, enjoy the queen-sized bed, or do some work in the sunlight dinning room. There's no better place to rest up and recharge during your stay in NYC.
interaction: Think of me as your concierge. I'll answer any questions you have about the area during your trip. Ask me any time! I'll do my best to help.
houseRules: Please remove your shoes when you're in the apartment. There's a nice shoe rack right by the door. Please wash your dishes after you use them. At the end of your stay, please shut all lights and close windows when leaving the apartment. You may leave the keys on the dining room table. Thank you so much for your help.

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: Hey there! I'm Gabe, a software development manager from NYC. I work in life insurance and love all things digital, I'm an Airbnb host because I enjoy sharing with people!

reviews.txt:
I had the pleasure of being  Gabriel's first Airbnb customer. With that said I do not think it would matter if you were the first or the 61st, Gabriel and his Mother, Mirta made ever effort to make the stay an absolute pleasure. The space is private,quiet and very comfortable, with a separate private entrance.  The location is close to many good restaurants and the train. You have easy access to the city (train) as well as walking distance to all of Astoria. 
I would  highly recommend this site for 1 or two people. 
Jerry

There are no words to describe accurately the experience I had staying with Gabriel and his mum in Astoria for ten days so I will try to be systematic so i can maybe help other travelers.
Firstly the room was amazing. It was the basement of their home with a lot of space and a half bathroom. Really relaxing experience with all the privacy you want, a large TV with Netflix and Amazon  for those who like to watch a nice movie when coming back from a long day in New York. The photos on airbnb are not really capturing how nicely decorated and well kept is the room. Nothing compared to other rooms I have seen in Astoria. The towels provided are of very good quality and very large, the wi-fi works perfectly and there is plenty of space for your things. To me and after seeing a lot of rooms, there is no doubt that this one is the best taking into consideration the space provided, the location and the price asked!
The neighborhood was again really pretty. Very safe with lots of shops for food and interesting markets. I had the feeling and really wanted to go back to Astoria and walk around after a busy day in Manhattan. 4min walk to 30th station and 16 min ride to Lex avenue and the upper east side which in my opinion is the best area in NY 
I can't say enough about Gabe and his mum. Their hospitality was awesome! I was welcomed with a lot of snacks, fruits and a bottle of wine waiting for me when I arrived and kept coming during my stay. Gabe was answering immediately to all my texts and tried to sort out anything I needed in order to feel more at home! But besides that the most important thing is that both of them are very interesting and well educated people. You can have a lot of discussions about lots of things and learn, which at least for me is very important! I think I made some friends in NYC, which by the way is a truly amazing city.
Highly recommended, no need to look anywhere else! Thanks a lot guys.

Staying at Gabe's apartment was a domestic Experience with a capital E.

Gabe met me when I arrived and showed me the place. He had answers to my questions about the area and was good company while I settled in, great guy.

His guest floor includes a private entrance and bath, custom furniture laid out to fit the space, and enough artwork to befit a museum.

Let me count the ways I loved this place:
1) Laid out and available were snacks, coffee machine + spindle of flavor cups, water, and a toothbrush.
2) The place has style. I keep a good home but Gabe clearly has a future career as interior decorator awaiting him.
3) Plants! There's a garden of greenery spread around the apt.
4) Everything useful is labeled, from the lightswitches to the recycling bin.
5) There is a pre-sentient voice-activated music player in the living room. "Alexa play some Jazz". "Alexa louder". "Alexa next". I'll be getting one of these for myself, it's from Amazon apparently.

Hosts like Gabe make Airbnb amazing to use. I hope all my future hosts will be similarly excellent.

My boyfriend and I had a fantastic stay at Gabe's home. This is what AirBnb is all about! From the first moment, Gabe and his mother made us feel welcome and were eager to make our stay more comfortable. We were even provided with some food, fresh linen and towels! The room is better than as advertised and has all of the necessary amenities. The apartment is a short two minute walk to the nearest metro, and about a half hour train into Manhattan. I would highly recommend this room to anyone and will definitely return one day!

Very cozy, tidy and spacious suite, helpful and nice hosts. You get a huge room and restroom in the basement, separate entrance, shower and kitchen are shared, but considering it's NYC, it's a great deal. The metro is 5 min walk away, there are groceries, restaurants and gyms around. Gabriel was always there to answer all our silly questions and gave us good advice about anything we would ask. Would definitely recommend to anyone coming to explore the great city.

We had a really great stay at Gabe's! I mean no complaints at all!! 

The bed was super comfortable, the room was really beautiful, and the apartment was extremely nice. Gabe and his mother were very friendly, (we had the place to ourselves)  which was perfect although we were out wandering the city all day,  when we did see them upon arrival they were helpful, sweet, & very welcoming! The area is perfect, very close to the train, shops, cafés and some of the best food on this trip. Super nice block - nothing to worry about with a private entrance, that allows you to come and go freely. It was such a nice spot! The pictures do not give you what the experience will - it was great not having to NOT worry about anything.  

Gabe provided towels, toiletries, iron, Tylenol any and everything you may need on a trip (that you sometimes forget to pack). Thanks Gabe!

I totally recommend staying here, whether for a day or a month. The price is right and the place is even better :)

My girlfriend and I had an extended stay in Gabriel's Astoria location, and everything about it was absolutely perfect. Gabe is an incredible host, makes you feel like you're living in your own home (even provided a ridiculous amount of Keurig coffee for us), and gave us all the info and advice we needed to have a great time in the city. His home is beautiful and you are able to live in the entire lower floor, and it truly feels like you have your own personal space. We were both very comfortable for our whole trip and I cannot recommend staying with Gabe enough, it was a wonderful experience!

Gabe was the consummate host.  When (Hidden by Airbnb) maps misinformed us about the directions, he came to fetch us from the station.
Great location and ambiance.

Gabriel was an expert host. So friendly and on hand with any queries or questions. While talking one night he noticed the smallest piece of dirt on the floor(which I didnt notice) and immediately cleaned it up. He also has great knowledge about the local area which you should tap into.

Gabriels place is amazing and alot more space which the photos do not do justice. From the bed and couch being extremely comfortable to the shower and everything being immaculate it was just an absolute pleasure staying with Gabriel. By far the best airbnb experience I have had. Well done Gabriel you were a great host.

I had a fairly lengthy stay with Gabe at the apt when I was looking for my own place after moving to NYC.  Really a very comfortable place, almost like your own studio in that you have a relatively large basement room with toilet to yourself, your own entrance, etc.  They keep the place spotless an clean regularly, change sheets and towels, etc.  5 min walk to the N/Q train and lots of food, shopping etc very nearby.  Probably one of the best Airbnb options in Astoria and definitely way better (in terms of value for money) than any hotel, especially if you are staying for more than a few days.  

Bottom line - was very happy there and would stay again or reccommend to friends.

Gabriel and his mum were amazing and made us feel so comfortable right from the start of our holiday! The room we had was lovely, private, and spacious. Definitely will be staying here again! Thankyou Gabe and Mirta!
All good, clean and tidy and as promised.  Really close to subway so great location.

Gabriel's mother welcomed us at the arranged time. The apartment was modern and clean. Our downstairs space was large and private. It was especially nice to have our own half bath and separate entrance to the suite. Full kitchen and bath upstairs were always available. Neighborhood was safe and quiet. Very convenient location with subway and bus stops only 2 blocks away which makes for easy access to Laguardia airport or midtown Manhattan. Small shops near by to stock up on groceries, bake goods, wine, etc. Jimbo's is an excellent Greek bar and grill one block away that has entertainment 6 nights a week. Paid short and long term parking available 2 blocks away. Excellent NYC stay!

We had a wonderful stay. Having the whole apartment was lovely and there was all the privacy we needed. The apartment was impeccably clean and in a great area! Adorable and even better in person. I would definitely recommend this apartment to all and would totally stay here again when in Astoria!

Sejour parfait , gabriel est un hote incroyablement gentil et comprehensif , il a tout fait pour faciliter notre sejour familiale. Le quartier d'astoria est incroyablement vivant , tout se trouve a proximité , metro, marché, supermarché, restaurants , magasins ...parfait.
Exactly as described, replies almost instantly and the place is only 2 minutes from the subway station. Very quiet and comfortable.
Place was clean, very well decorated and easy to get to.  I had a very nice stay.
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I've stayed in probably 5-10 airbnbs in NYC, this was the best one in terms of single apartment. Really wonderful stay and honestly you are so close to the subway that its also a very well connected area (when MTA is running properly of course =P). Regarless of that, Gabriel is a super host, makes everything easy going. The flat is beautiful and comfy. I'd stay here again for sure.
Great location near subway and lots of great restaurants.  Sparkling clean!

name: Charming StanleyBeachFlat w/rooftop
summary: A charming,funky cool 1 bdrm flat in older walk up bldg close to Stanley beaches,mountain trails. A huge shared BBQ rooftop. No lift, 4 floor stairs Light,airy floor/ceiling windows. Buses at door,cafes.shops.wireless.full cooking kitchen.great spot!
interaction: Marcos is always available to help host and answer guests needs.
houseRules: Please No crazy parties as we have nice quiet neighbours. No extra guests staying overnight eithout advance notification..take care of artwork in flat...turn off aircons and lights when not in flat

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Marcos had been most helpful, trying his best to make my stay a pleasant one even when he was away on holidays. The apartment was very cozy, the bed was especially comfortable and the place was warm even in the winter. Just opposite the busstop, with plenty of restaurants around.

It was the second time I was renting a flat from Marcos. No surprise. Marcos is a great host. Always available if you need anything and making your stay as nice as possible.
The flat is of perfect size with its separate bedroom and good living room space. The walk through dressing room is also very convenient. Plenty of room to put your stuff (which is not always the case in Airbnb flats in HK).
Stanley is great, you'll meet people easily just by going down at one of the bars. I recommend Verns for their beers and Smugglers for the atmosphere. ;)
Marcos's flat is in a good location. It is easy to find and very convenient to go to downtown. I like Stanley very much and will stay in his place again in the future.
很方便的地點,很舒適的屋子!

We found the appartment as advertised on airbnb. The place is cosy, clean (for long time visitors: the cleaner comes once a week), and the location could not be better (5 minutes walk to the beach, restaurants, shops, Stanley market; half an hour by public bus to central Hong Kong).

Marcos is a very nice and helpful person. He answered all our questions quickly both before and during our stay. He even came up with a few beach toys for our children and offered them participating in a tennis lesson for kids free of charge.

Perfect appartment offering value for money, perfect host, perfect stay - thanks!
It's such a nice place for a holiday, the location is great and the beach is just 10 mins walk, Macros is very nice and helpful, we had a good time at Stanley.

Very nice flat, in the heart of Stanley village. Home away from home, the flat is very cosy. Thank you Marcos for your welcoming and your advices about Stanley. We could not have gas in the kitchen, but that was a minor problem given all the very nice restaurants around very very close, eg in Stanley plaza.

Marcos gave very specific instruction on the location of the flat before our arrival via phone and message.  Altough we made some misunderstanding about "the room on left side of the stair" , no one answered while knocking the exact door (with TV noise). And we found a key in the running shoe for the other room as instruction. That confused us.  But he is warm and very nice after all.

Except the air condition is a little noisy, the room is as comfortable as our home and extremely convenient, close to the bus station and shopping area,with a wonderful rooftop.

Marcos' place was terrific. A comfortable 1-bedroom, an incredibly comfortable bed, and an awesome location right next to Stanley Market. It was the second time Marcos was kind enough to host me. He's quick to respond, and has an easy-going personality as well. I'd highly recommend a stay there. Thanks again, Marcos!
Really good place to stay. Great host

Nice one bedroom flat in one of the best neighborhoods in Hong Kong. A good  escape from the busy city centre but still with easy access to everything. Marcos is a nice host. He kept checking if things were ok during our stay. Thank you for hosting us, Marcos.

Marcos' place is a perfect location for being in Stanley, right near the market, waterfront restaurants, the bus station and shopping.  We were not able to use the grill, which was disappointing, but his place was clean and adequate for our stay.
This was a great location in Stanley, near bus depot, coffee, and market. Bed was very comfortable. Ma cos was easy to get in touch with via email.

We had a great time in Stanley staying at Marcos' flat!  Awesome location... walk to both beaches and restaurants and shops and bars and the market and coffee houses and... well, everything!  For trips to the city, the bus stop that takes you right to downtown Hong Kong is literally across the street and very easy to navigate.

Marcos is a great host, very friendly and welcoming and there to answer any questions you have and/or give you great recommendations.  Would definitely recommend.

The property is very well located in Stanley market. Short walk to the Beach. Instructions were accurate and made it easy to locate - it's on the 5th floor with a nice staircase. Marcos apartment was neat & clean, exactly like the pic and I enjoyed my stay with him. Thanks.

Marcos, the host, has been extremely kind and helpful during our stay.  The flat is excellent and exactly what we need for a mini family vacation in a quiet seaside place. We love Stanley very much, and Marcos' flat would be our definite choice for our next trip there.

We are a family of three with a young toddler. Marcos was very friendly and he prepared a teddy for our daughter to play with during the stay. He upgraded us to another apartment of the same building and he attended to our requests even at night time. Thank you.
Had a little confusion with the key, but the overall place was very nice. Great location as well

Marco's place …is simply perfect!! A very nice place for stay-cation! Located at a great location which allow accessing bars around pier, the beach and the market in walking distance. 

For the house, it's with artistic decoration and fully equipped kitchen! The rooftop makes the perfect place being incredible!!

I enjoy my time there so much and would definitely return!!
Marcos was a great host and always responsive. The flat is very nice. Would recommend to stay there!

name: Sunny Bedroom in Downtown Montreal
summary: Sunny bedroom in the Downtown of Montreal, 2min of walk away from the Atwater metro station and close to the main attractions of the city.
interaction: My nice 4 international roomates will be there to answer to any question you might have about the appartment or the town ;)

reviews.txt: Chambre fidèle aux photos et bon emplacement. Cristina est très disponible pour tout renseignement et très agréable.

name: Barra da Tijuca: cobertura ESPETACULAR
summary: Localizada em bairro nobre do Rio de Janeiro, totalmente mobiliada, com sauna, em um condomínio contando com diversas facilidades (piscina, academia, portaria...), disponível pela primeira vez para locação. TUDO NOVO. Super caprichado!
interaction: Estou sempre disponível para os hospedes, seja para um pedido especial, seja para esclarecer duvidas e/ou fornecer dicas seja por msg, wpp, email ou celular.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Localização ideal. Apartamento novo. Preço justo.

name: Ribeira Charming Duplex
summary: Fantastic duplex apartment with three bedrooms, located in the historic area of Porto, Ribeira (Cube) - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Centenary building fully rehabilitated, without losing their original character.
interaction: Cot - 10 € / night Dog - € 7,5 / night
houseRules: Make the house your home...

host.about: Gostamos de passear, de viajar, de conhecer pessoas e locais novos, gostamos de desporto e animais! Vivemos na cidade mais linda do mundo!!!

reviews.txt:
