A casa da Ana e do Gonçalo foram o local escolhido para a passagem de ano com um grupo de amigos. Fomos super bem recebidos com uma grande simpatia e predisposição a ajudar com qualquer coisa que fosse necessário.
A casa era ainda melhor do que parecia nas fotos, totalmente equipada, com mantas, aquecedor e tudo o que pudessemos precisar.
A localização não podia ser melhor! Não há melhor do que acordar de manhã e ao virar da esquina estar a ribeira do Porto.

We are french's students, we traveled some days in Porto, this space was good and we can cooking easly. It was rainning so we eard every time the water fall to the ground in the street when we sleeping. But It was cool and or was well received by Ana et Gonçalo

We had a spledid time in the old centre of Porto.
The appartment is very well situated next to the old Ribeira square. It's perfect to have such an appartment to your disposal, you feel home, and have a place to relax between the exploration of this very nice city.
We thank Ana & Gonçalo, and we hope the appartment is free when we go back next year. Porto is charming original.

Ana and Goncalo were very helpful and accommodating. When they were not available they put us in touch with their nephew who was equally as helpful. The flat was as described, neat and tidy. The weather was quite cold, but thankfully A&G left us with extra blankets and electric heaters to use. Location was great. Outside the flat there was a slight smell of the river/ sewage, but in all honesty it did not come into the flat, and once you go down the road it doesn't carry on. This may also have been down to the very wet weather we had while there. All in all, very happy and would definitely recommend.

The hosts were very accommodating and agreed to meet with my parents as they were arriving before us. Communicated very well and always responded in a very timely manner. You couldn't have asked for a better location of this apartment and the place was identical to the pictures in the in the listing.

THE PLACE TO BE, l'appartement est situé au milieu de la Ribeira , tout peut se faire à pieds c'est l'ideal,l'appartement est très bien agencé et équipé.
Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable dans ce duplex avec beaucoup de charme .
Accueil très chaleureux de Ana et Gonçalo, ils ont pris du temps pour nous indiquer tout ce qu'il y avait à faire sur Porto et répondus  à toutes nos interrogations en terme de commodités.. Merci..

We had a great time in Porto. Ana’s & Goncalo’s apartment is located right in the heart of the Old Town and is great value for money. You really are at the centre of things and it’s the perfect place to get swept away in the hustle and bustle of Porto. Ana and Goncalo were great hosts.

Ana and Gonçalo were very welcoming and made a lot of information about Porto's sights available. It was very clean, very beautiful and the location was superb. It does have a lot of restaurants around it, so it could be a bit noisy for us at night but otherwise  great location. We would stay there again.

Super appartement très bien placé, au cœur de l'animation de la Ribeira !
Nous avons passé un super séjour à Porto !
Toutes les informations données par Ana et les documents laissés nous ont bien aidé à organiser notre séjour.  Nous avons (presque) tout fait à pied ! Le parking Ribeira est proche et bien utile pour garer le véhicule.
Merci !!!
Philippe

The appartment was great, it is really nice and cosy, and it is situated at a perfect location. Ana and Goncalo were very friendly, they were very helpfull during our stay. We had a great time during our stay in Porto!

Kävimme majoittajan kanssa viestinvaihtoa ennen lomaa ja he antoivat mukavan vaikutelman. He olivatkin hyvin mukavia ihmisiä. He tulivat lentokentälle vastaan kahdella autolla mikä oli hyvin ystävällistä. He kertoivat myös kaupungista ja sen nähtävyyksistä. Asunnon sijainti oli täydellinen. Se oli myös erittäin romanttinen ja kaunis. Kokemus oli hyvin onnistunut.

Hemos pasado unos días increíbles en Oporto. Llegamos más tarde de lo que habíamos pensado y Ana & Gonçalo nos esperaron pacientemente y nos facilitaron la llegada, además nos recibieron con un regalo de bienvenida!. Nos dieron todo tipo de indicaciones y consejos más que de sobra para disfrutar de los días que estuvimos allí. La ubicación de la casa es inmejorable!! la única pega fue que el soporte de la ducha estaba roto pero como eran pocos días no quisimos molestar a Ana & Gonçalo y no se lo comentamos.
Great location, comfortable place, responsive and friendly host! Highly recommended!

This house is in the heart of Porto, set back enough to be away from the hustle and bustle but only a few steps up from the river, bars and restaurants. A great place to stay.
The house was clean and functional. Ana and Goncalo are perfect hosts with lots of information on places to visit and   eat.

The location of the house is wonderful! You are in the heart of the old city and the Douro ist just a few meters away. Perfect for a first visit to Porto!
Very cosy and warm house with everything you need.
Gonçalo gives a lot of good tips that will help you to have a perfect stay. Communication is very easy with him.

We spend a really good time in Porto, the flat is so well situated. The bridge is just next door, the view on the river is amazing, and plenty of restaurants and pubs, transport are just around.
Gonzalo is very kind to wait for us, also lat, for the check in, thank you.

Thanks for a great stay! 6 of us were in Porto for a long weekend and we had a blast. The apartment was perfect; location and size to accomodate us. The hosts were great, then even picked us up at the airport (for a fee but it was a great service). Thanks again! Bridget.
Superb location and very nice, big and overall pleasant apartment!
The apartment provides basic facilities but is good value for money and very well positioned for easy access to restaurants and bars, the Ribeira district and the Port house in Gaia.

Ana und Gonçalo sind sehr hilfsbereite liebe Leute, die  alles tun, damit man sich wohl fühlt. Wenn es etwas zu beanstanden gab, wird das sofort problemlos erledigt. Das Apartment ist charmant, die Möbel schon etwas mitgenommen, aber das passt insgesamt ins Bild von Porto und macht den Reiz aus. Die Lage ist super, genau am Duoro. Es gibt Strassenmusik bis in den späten Abend und auch morgens geht's früh los mit fröhlichen Lärm von der Flusspromenade. Nichts also für Leute, die es ruhig brauchen! Die Lage ist wirklich exklusiv und tröstet über den recht teuren Mietpreis. Im Umfeld gibt es typische Touri-Fallen, wo alles doppelt kostet, aber gleichzeitig findet man auch sehr nette kleine Bars, in der man chillig und günstig frühstücken oder generell lecker essen kann. Die Stadt ist klein genug, um sich schnell zurechtzufinden und groß genug, um immer wieder neues zu entdecken. Wir waren zu dritt (50, 25, 20 Jahre) und haben die Zeit wirklich genossen.

name: Gorgeous Boutique Hotel Room in Taksim #8
summary: This double room with a private bathroom is a great option for travelers who look for a central and comfortable stay. Based in a building which is restorated in January 2017, this room is designed for your comfort.
interaction: We personally take care of each and every guest, who choose to stay in our apartments. You will be greeted on your arrival, helped with your questions and provided with useful information of the neighbourhood and the city. Most of the daytime, we will be available in the house and if you need further assistance you can reach us by phone 7/24.

host.about: We love travelling and we take the best ideas from each apartment  we stay at when we are furnishing our own houses.  We want to offer fellow travellers a similiar experience to the best apartments we have been to in years.  We hope you enjoy Istanbul during your visit.  Send us a message and let us know if we can help you in any way!!

reviews.txt: The place is really good! nice location and very pleasant host) highly recommend!

name: Cozy Apartment near Charley Young Beach in Kihei
summary: Enjoy the convenience of this cute apartment near the beaches! Hosted by an experienced Superhost, this comfortable one-bedroom first-floor apartment is a 1-block walk to Cove Park Beach and a 2-block walk to Charley Young Beach. Surfing, shopping, dining, bars, grocery stores are all just blocks away. The apartment's location is a convenient home base for many activities you can walk to in Kihei or drive to elsewhere on Maui. Includes AC, free Wi-Fi, free parking spot, full size washer & dryer!
interaction: Your experienced Airbnb Super Host ensures that apartment is ready for you prior to the check-in time, so normally there is no need for the host to interact with guests in person.  The host for this apartment is on call and available via text messaging or phone calls or Airbnb messaging for any issues that arise before, during, and after a guest stay.

host.about: Thomas is a longtime resident of Maui and enjoys providing guests with comfortable vacation rentals in Kihei on the sunny South Shore of Maui. He is an experienced Airbnb Superhost who operates several vacation rentals all near the Charley Young Beach area of Kihei, Maui, each of which have earned a lengthy set of positive reviews from pleased guests.

reviews.txt:
First of all, Thomas is truly a Super Host! He is communicative, polite, and detailed with the itinerary. Thomas answered all of our questions quickly and made sure everything was good. We stayed in his lovely apartment for the weekend after extending our trip a couple more days. His home is clean, nicely decorated and a 5 minute walk around the block to Charlie Young Beach. He provided beach chairs and towels. I love that his apartment feels like you're staying in a hotel! 

The apartment is also close to restaurants and stores in Kihei. Thomas was very kind enough to send his personal favorite list of places to visit/eat in Maui! If you want a home away from home, this is the place to stay.
Good place to stay, Thomas made sure we were confortable and satisfied!

Sehr gute Ausgangslage für Ausflüge auf der ganzen Insel. Die Wohung war perfekt für 2 Personen und sehr nahe an einem tollen Strand.
Supermarkt sowie Bars und Restaurants gut zu Fuss erreichbar.
Reservierter Parkplatz direkt vor der Wohnung.

We enjoyed two wonderful weeks in this well equipped, great location apartment in Kihei. Thomas is an excellent and attentive host. Communication from the very start was fast and detailed. Every question was answered, and our request to start our trip a little early was accommodated without any fuss. He also sent us a PDF guide with lots of pages on tips for restaurants, beaches, snorkeling, driving adventures etc. A lot of them we followed.

The apartment itself is exactly as advertised. Comfortable, well equipped with all the essential kitchen appliances and accessories. Air conditioning in the main living room, and portable air conditioning in the bedroom which worked a treat during our stay. The added extras such as beach chairs, beach mats and a drinks/food cooler was very much appreciated, and used every day. Parking is right at the front and easy to access. 

The location is to die for. Having explored every part of this amazing Island we agreed that our favourite location was Kikei. The locals were very friendly, access to restaurants and supermarkets was just minutes away, and many of the Island learn to surf clinics (highly recommend doing this!) were run from a beach 5 minutes walk along the street. Every day we swam with turtles at the beaches immediately in the area of the apartment. You can literally walk out of the apartment, across the road and watch the sunset over the ocean every day. Amazing!

I highly recommend this apartment and Thomas as a host.

The apartment is really nice and perfect for a couple or a small family. Perfect location within walking distance to Charlie Young Beach (children-friendly) and Cove Beach (Surf Spot). Grocery store (Foodland & others), restaurants and markets are also within walking distance. Would definitely return here.

The flat is in a great location, clean and with all you need to have a comfortable stay. I didn't meet Thomas in person but he is for sure a great host.
Thanks for you space Thomas!

Great location, apartment was clean and had everything we needed. Loved the list of local attractions to visit while in Maui. 
Thomas was very helpful, he came to help us find the apartment the night of arrival. Thank You!

Thomas was an excellent host - from responsive, quick communication before our visit, to the nice little touches and treats in the apartment, all the way through our stay. 

His apartment was magnificent - very chic and nicely furnished, with a great kitchen and dishes, pans, and tupperware for making meals and cooking up local farmer's market produce. It's in a terrific location in Kihei with reserved parking, in close walking proximity to two great beaches for easy sunset viewing. He also sent us wonderful tips and .

Service above and beyond the norm: Thomas was even willing to receive a package and hang onto it when I realized I'd left ordering a bit late for it to make it all the way to the mainland before our trip. Truly outstanding service!

Thomas, thank you for your outstanding hospitality and beautiful space. I will be wholeheartedly recommending your apartment to friends!

What an incredible find:?)  Close to the beaches, very clean, plenty of amenities (laundry, well-stocked kitchen, comfy king sized bed and a private lanai!)  Thanks to our host, Thomas for accommodating us on short notice!  Your hospitality and aloha will not be forgotten!

If you are looking for a great place to stay with an excellent location to multiple beaches, dining, and shopping look no further! Thomas was a great host and his place was super clean and up to date with everything we needed plus more.
Very nice and clean apartment! Thomas is an amazing host and communication was excellent. Very flexible check in process.

The location was great and the space was exactly as described. Clean with well thought out details and all the best amenities.

The only issue was we found the bed to be a bit on the soft and lumpy side, that's about the only area that could be improved in this very nice space.

Location exceeded my expectations!
Great walking distance beach, shops and restaurants.
Quiet nights sleep and really appreciated the hair products in shower since I neglected to pack any. The place itself was clean and comfy!

Great location! walkable to some nice shops and great places to eat - but just far enough away from the “resort scene”. The beach is across the street, which makes catching a sunset or doing some spontaneous snorkeling quick and easy. The condo itself is roomy and a perfectly good spot to close your eyes. It is well suited for someone that likes to get out and doesn’t plan to spend a lot of time inside. Thomas is very responsive and even provided some local tips. Great spot!

This was my first time using Airbnb! And I’m converted! Thomas was awesome! He made me comfortable by assuring that the place is reserved and gave me specifics on how to find the it, parking, getting in, etc. This is the perfect location to explore the Kihei area. Exactly what we needed. Thank you so much!

Thomas’ place was easy to find and conveniently located...made a great starting point for our adventures. Cute and clean. Thomas also provided a couple of nice surprises and good suggestions for places to go.
Thomas was awesome!  Excellent communication, amazing location & nice touches.  I look forward to visiting again :)

Very good central location in Kehei, easy to get around from there to all the beaches.  Well equipped kitchen for cooking your own meals if you want.  Nice space, we spent several days there and were very comfortable.  Front room just a bit noisy because it's close to a busy road.  But the bedroom was very quiet and we slept great, super restful!  Excellent natural ventilation, air flow through was quite pleasant.  Thomas was very welcoming and helpful, we'd love to stay here again!
The apartment was good! We had a great time and everything was organised perfectly! Thank you!

Thomas’ apt was a comfortable place to relax and he had some very sweet touches for us when we arrived. Check in was seamless and he had 2 bottles of water for my husband and I in the fridge. He also laid out some snacks and candies for us, and had coffee and tea for us. We thought it was very kind of him to do that. The only con was that the air conditioner is in the bedroom closet, and when the closet door is closed it’s okay. But when you open the closet door to let that cool air into the room, the AC is loud. So this made it a bit difficult to sleep through at night. We were also bummed we never got to meet our host and we called him to inform him we were checking out and he never got back to us. Other than that he was communicative throughout our stay and we enjoyed our trip to Maui. :)

name: Tai Hang (Causeway Bay) Sunny Aprt'
summary: Quiet, light apartment. Suits 3 people (couple + single). 4th Floor walkup. Countless nearby eateries are scattered in this quaint, quiet area which a blends 'old' & 'new'. A supermarket is downstairs. Easy access to trains, trams & buses to all areas. Reviews are in listing 389017 Please note: this is my home and only available to book when I am away. My belongings are in the apartment - it is not an empty apartment.
interaction: I am happy to advise and chat with guests about the many options of things to do in Hong Kong. Hong Kong is a vibrant and busy city and guests will find they have easy access to areas of Hong Kong. I am happy to help to make your stay as comfortable as possible - to either share my 'local' knowledge of the city or to let you explore with maps and a sense of adventure.
houseRules: Appreciate no smoking inside the building. I've never had a problem in my 8 years of hosting this apartment - all guests have been extrememly respectful of the space and items in it. Few details to help maintain the 'pest free' and comfort of my home: 1. Please keep the 3 sink holes covered & closed when not in use.  I have no cockroaches etc and ask that drains remain covered to ensure my home remains this way. 2. Walter filter. Water is drinkable from the tap. If you choose to use the filter - please ensure it is only filtered with COLD water. The hot water ruins the filter. 3. Hot water: please leave OFF when not in use - prevents high power costs. It is electric so it'll need 3-5 minutes to hear prior to a shower  4: When going out for the day, or leaving, please ensure the following is turned off: water heater, air-conditioners, lights & coffee machine. (& sink holes closed/covered) 5. When leaving, please ensure the door is locked (seems crazy, but many forget this!)

host.about:
I'm a Kiwi now living in NZ
I have spent time living, working and travelling in Hong Kong - experiences that have built my love of travel.
I work as a counsellor in a school and in an agency.
I enjoy walking, biking, going to the theatre or movies, enjoying a good coffee and spending time with my family (whom I actually like) and my friends (whom I also like!).

address.street: Tai Hang (Causeway Bay), Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Very comfortable apartment, perfect for what we needed.  Lots of good local amenities, good location, easy for buses, taxis and 5 mins to Tin Hau MTR (Metro).  Causway Bay is only 10 mins walk for lots and lots of shopping. We had both rooms, everything was as you need it, a home from home.  Su gave us lots of information and was always available during the booking process.  Thank you Su!
2nd time booking. Everything is perfect!
Clean ! Good!
It was a great time living here. The loction is convenient. Close to the subway and bus station. Householder was patient to answer  and explain questions.
지하철역에서 가깝고, 집앞바로 슈퍼가 있어 좋았습니다.

Su's appartement was a very nice choice for us.
The neighbourhood is plenty of small shops and food stalls or fancy restaurants and bars... you will find whatever you want.
Not to far from an important bus hub and metro station, but incredibly quiet.
We three slept like babies.
The house was super super clean and tidy.

Happy to have discovered such a nice place in HK.

We will definitly come back
Lovely flat in a hip neighbourhood. Recommended
Lovely place in a fantastic location . Host very friendly

Su’s apartment is in a great local neighbourhood close to lots of shops, restaurants and the MTR. The apartment itself is bright and clean with enough space for a comfortable stay. Su is very well organised and easy to communicate with. Highly recommended.
值得推荐

The place is well equipped and very compact and in a good location. Metro is close by and the bus to and from the airport stop a few minutes walk from the house.
Su is an amazing host, extremely helpful and very responsive to all sorts of questions. 
I can highly recommend her to anyone who wishes to spend some days in Hong Kong.

name: In Sisli. Walking distance to Taksim,Nişantaşı.
summary: At the center of Istanbul,Sisli.  You can arrive “Osmanbey” Subway Station in 3 minutes by walking:)  5 minutes to Taksim by subway, 15 mins to Taksim by walking.  Walking distance to Mecidiyeköy & Nişantaşı.  Only for females.

host.about:
My name is Gokce. I am a clinical psychologist and a pHD student :)
I of course love traveling !! :)

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Ranch Abode Loft in Bushwick
summary: Simply appointed and centrally located 1st floor apt with 20 ft. ceilings, a loft bed, and exposed brick in the bathroom.
interaction: I'm available any-time via phone if you need me.
houseRules: - Enjoy yourself and please ask any questions you may have!  - Please be respectful of the neighbors and community. This is their home.  - Turn off lights and heat or AC when you are out of the apartment and make sure to turn off when you leave:)

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: Hello! I am a Brooklyn based film, television, video producer and director. I am originally from a small town in New Mexico. I travel all of the time and have had a wonderful time renting to other traveling airbnb'ers! Looking forward to meeting you!

reviews.txt: Shannon's apartment was left lovely and clean with plenty of towels and bedding, the place was huge and it was a pleasure to stay there.

Shannon was very helpful and flexible, available for questions whenever I had them. Her apartment is gorgeous, just as described and very clean and spacious. The apartment complex is also really cool, and we were lucky enough to meet some of the other lovely residents during our stay. The location near the myrtle JMZ train station was so convenient. We had a fantastic time here.

I only hope that every airbnb host is as friendly and efficient as Shannon. We couldn't have asked for a better stay in her lovely apartment. It was clean, spacious, fully stocked with linen/bathroom supplies and super close to the JMZ train line. Thanks so much Shannon, it made the trip that much easier.

we spent a great time in the appartment of shannon. everything we needed was there- perfect kitchen, lots of fresh towels and sheats, very interesting building with billiard, ping pong,etc.downstairs. perfect subway station to everywhere nearby. nice delis around. perfect for a new york brooklyn trip - not the snobby one.
thank you shannon

Shannon is so cool ! And her loft is conveniently located for almost everything. Very close to the subway station,bars.restaurants,and delis. She helped me,and my girlfriend to find things to do nearby, She also took good care of us. I would stay at her place again and again.
Wonderful apartment, great hostess.
Great space in an amazing area. Very unique.

Appartement très bien placé, au carrefour de Brooklyn (Bushwick-Williamsburg) et Manhattan. Très bien déservit par le métro et les bus.

Ce qui nous a plu est la vie de quartier très populaire sans aucun souci, gens sympathiques toujours près à aider ou renseigner (comme partout ailleurs à NYC )

I had a really great time at Shannons Apartment. Everything was perfect and everything was there to feel like home. Shannon is a very nice person and i hope to be there very soon again. Thank you for all.

Shannon's Appartment is amazing. 

The place is in a great location within walking distance from two subway lines, great restaurants, 24 hour fresh produce and deli, close to good clothing shops and a quick 15minute subway ride to everything manhattan has to offer. 

The bed is comfortable, the kitchen is well stocked, the games room is good fun and the rooftop is jaw dropping. 

Shannon is a great host, she had plenty of good recommendations to help us get the most out of bushwick and it's surrounding neighborhoods. And she was incredibly accommodating towards our crazy 2am arrival! (Thanks for waiting up Shannon!)

If your looking for a more unique stay in New York, away from the swarms of tourists in Manhattan then this is the perfect place to base yourself. 

10/10 could not fault the place.

My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay at Shannon's loft. Shannon was extremely friendly and considerate, and she was very reachable when we had questions. I felt safe in the building, and the room suited the two of us just fine. Loved the book collection. No pool balls in the common room, but we just played ping pong instead. 

The location is extremely convenient - just a couple minutes walk to subway. We were able to get all over NYC easily and it was great to come back, relax and cook a nice meal at the end of the day at the loft. We would definitely stay here again - wish I lived here!
Perfect. Great location. Great host.

Shannon's place was great, just like the home I would want in NYC. I used to live in Manhattan years ago and I was visiting with my girlfriend for the New Years. It was her first trip to the U.S. and she wanted to see New York, a real, authentic, and old New York. Bushwick is that right now. It's hip, arty, and with just enough grit to make it feel like you're in New York not the theme park that tourists end up going to. Her apartment is close to trains, some great restaurants and grocery stores, and the building is really cool. We mostly stayed out, but when we stayed in we could cook and watch Netflix like we were home. I can not stress how comfy she has made it. I really felt like I was home. I would highly recommend Shannon's place and would love to stay there again

Shannon's place was perfect.  Not too sparse, not too cluttered.  A great loft experience.  Location is great - subway two blocks away and the Citibike station only 3 blocks away.  Shannon was very easy to deal with, quick to respond and was a pro at hosting.  Hope to stay here again!
OK:)

Shannon était en déplacement, mais nous avons pu facilement la contacter, et avons été reçu par une amie qui nous a donné les clefs. Nous avons pu avoir les informations qui nous manquaient par mail ou par téléphone avec Shannon.
L'appartement correspond à la description, un des couchage est sur une mezzanine au dessus d'un lit 2 places. Le Building est très sympa, c'est super pratique de pouvoir faire ses lessives, et de pouvoir répéter son instrument (pour les musiciens) au sous-sol!
Le quartier est typique, c'est agréable d'être les seuls touristes, de pouvoir se sentir immergé.  C'est un quartier authentique et populaire, mais on s'y sent en sécurité. Il y a des commerces à proximité.
The place is very nice, big, clean and stylish. We really enjoyed our week and Shannon helped us very quickly when we had questions, thanks a lot!

For our first time in New York, it was somewhat courageous of us to live like locals, deep in the neighborhood of Bushwick, Brooklyn.  It took some adjusting for us to hang out in the area.  The area is considered 'gritty' which is extremely true. I cant stress that enough. It is dirty, you might be bothered for spare change, you might be asked to swipe your metro card for someone,  however the area does have some of the coolest restaurants in the city. But you must go looking for them, otherwise you will only find corner deli's that don't take international credit cards and random pawn shops etc.  We actually loved our experience at Shannon's though. Shannon's studio was great. Lots of space for two. The only complaints we had were that the walls were paper thin and it was all around a bit dirty. We washed the dishes before using them since they were dusty and just kept a fan at night to block out noise. We also could not reach Shannon until the day of our reservation and had to wait past check in time to get the keys. Once we were in contact, Shannon was super nice and helpful. The roof top is amazing! You can see some of Manhatten's skyline. The subway takes about half an hour to get to Manhatten , once you are there, probably another 15 to wherever you want to go. It is nice to get away from the zoo of Manhatten, I strongly recommend staying in Brooklyn, it's gives you more of a well rounded experience.  For us, this was great, we loved the experience of what it would be like to live there.

Shannon's apartment was fantastic. A great location super close to the subway and to plenty of delicious spots to eat and drink, this apartment provided us with a very relaxing place to take a break from the hustle and bustle of the city while still remaining close enough to get back it when rested. A great price for such a fantastic location would make this apartment a no-brainer for any future trips we take to New York. Thanks for such a great place!

The accommodation was very good, we liked the neighborhood very much even though is a little gray in contrast to other areas. Brooklyn, however is a neighborhood that is being transformed. It takes about 30 minutes to get to Manhattan, but worth staying in Brooklyn and explore this part of the city. Shannon's attention was good although not met, although slow to respond to messages so you have to take that into account. The apartment was clean, but the building was not.

Undoubtedly it is a good option to stay especially if you're a tourist and you want concoer both Manhattan and Brooklyn.

name: MODERN DESIGNED STUDIO APARTMENT IN TAKSIM PLACE
summary: A glowing trip to Beyoglu and exotic history of Pera  Luce Di Pera is a boutique hotel enviably located in the heart of Istanbul -  Taksim, Beyoglu of the historical Pera region;  right in the center Beyoglu’s most popular attractions. The boutique hotel has 9 large, design and elegant rooms provide a refreshing night’s rest in the city that never sleeps. Our staff takes great pride in consistently offering an exceptional experience to our guests.
interaction: ıt is in the hearth of taksim . It is very close to metro , public transportation, istiklal street, galata and all shops and historical places even these factors it exactly in the silence area.

reviews.txt:
Отличное место! Очень хорошее расположение в богемной части Стамбула. Рядом с самой известной барной улицей города, но в тоже время очень тихое и уютное. Рядом веселые бары, отличные галереи, очень вкусные уличные места с едой. 
Прекрасный владелец, с которым обсудили все детали перед приездом. Перед приездом составили план каждого дня. Идеальное расположение, чтобы увидеть весь Стамбул: туристический, богемный, калорийный и странный) Мы обязательно вернёмся! За маршрутами и советами обращайтесь)

Very much enjoyed staying here. Very friendly & helpfull staff, really good location, nicely furnished, clean.
Enjoyed The Complimentary tea coffee in the foyer. Great 24hour reception.
I’m so glad to spent my vacations on this place!

We stayed 3 nights, but when my girlfriend checked out she didn’t realize at the time she left her ‘make up bag’ full of make up in the room, which also has some jewelry in it. She called the mgr a couple days later, and the Mgr said she should have called same day bc it’s gone even if they did find it, it wouldn’t be there anymore... as hotel staff there’s gotta be a place for lost and found at least for a week or something.

What a wonderful place! What wonderful people....
Brilliant safe location - just off the busy Balik market and Istiklal Caddesi so it was quiet at night but just a step away from the hectic excitement of the street-life, and only a 5 minute walk from the Taksim or Sishane  metro stops, making to very accessible for exploring the rest of Istanbul.
Our room (22) was great - perfectly clean and tidy with some beautiful touches and the most amazing, powerful and hot, if uniquely shaped, shower.
The friendliness and recommendations from our hosts were spot-on and added to the incredible experience that is Istanbul. Definitely recommended. Thank you Pelin for your hospitality.

5 Harika gün geçirdik! çok güzel ve güleryüzlü bir karşılama ile karşılandık. Oda beklediğimiz gibi çok güzeldi, resimlerle aynıydı. Konumu İstiklal caddesinin tam ortasında yani mükemmel bi lokasyonda. Sadece odada giderlerden kaynaklı küçük bi koku sorunu vardı bunun için ellerinden geldiğince bu sorunu çözüp bize yardımcı oldular, hatta odamızı değiştirdiler :) Her zaman çok (Website hidden by Airbnb) çok memnun kaldık. Bir daha ki sefere görüşmek üzere.
Sevgiler :)

Location is fantastic and room bedding is romantic fabricated, colors and design. 
Room size is decent compared to other hotels of the same category. 
Will come back again :-)

Everything was great, we had a good time 
The staff were really helpful 
I would stay there again
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It’s on a very good location easy to reach everywhere. The hotel was so nice it was perfect for my honeymoon! The staff was very kind and friendly on a professional level. The hotel was very clean also. I will return here again thank you very much.
See you guys again !!

Nice hotel located on Balil Sokak, a street that is very lively at night filled with clubs and bars, the hotel is located on a side road so it's just a few minutes walk away from some attractions and 10 mins from the tram, far enough away from the party scene to easily get a good nights rest.

Me and my family booked two rooms here because of the great interior. Thanks to our host Pelin that she complied with my wish and gave us rooms on the same floor. 
The hotel by itself was clean, comfortable and so close to istiklal caddesi (less than 5 minutes walk). Pelin and her staff were very helpful and friendly. 
I can highly recommend this place since its price and location are really attractive.
Amazing location and cute place overall.

Location was the best thing about the place. We stayed in a different hotel on the first night which wasn’t as nice as the Luce di Pera and was only informed the day before. Other the host is friendly and helpful. The room was modern and clean and set away from the noise of the Taksim night life

Менеджер сказала что для нас забронировали номер с балконом, однако дала прокуренный и темный номер на первом этаже (единственный и на проходе) с выходом на маленький грязный дворик вместо балкона. После моего возражения и просьбы поменять номер сказала что грязный дворик - это и есть балкон, и что свободных номеров больше нет, не нравится - уходите, что мы собственно и сделали. Не рекомендую!

We had a lovely stay in our room at Pelin's. The cute decoration of the place and the good location were very nice. 
There were not table and chairs on the balcony as on the photos but otherwise the photos are completely the same as in reality.
The service and location are valuable! I totally recommend this place.
Luce di Pera has fantastic rooms, very well decorated and clean. All the staff has been kind and friendly

Great location, really close to public transit and an amazing pedestrian area. The alley it is located on is full with great restaurants and shops. Extremely easy to find your way to Galata Kulesi or the metro/tram/funicular and then Sultanahmet or any other neighborhood one would like to visit. The room was clean, bed was comfy and the heated floors in the bathroom were a very nice touch! 10/10 would come again.
Great location and the hotel was nice at some point i huess but maintenance is very poor. Needs urgent work

name: Be Happy in Porto
summary: Be Happy Apartment is an amazing space. Renovated and comfortable apartment, located in a building dating from the nineteenth century in one of the most emblematic streets of the Porto city "Rua do Almada".  Be Happy Apartment is located in the city center, able you to visit the historic center only by foot, being very close of majority points of interesting of the Porto City. Be Happy Apartment is located close of central Station MetroTrindade.
interaction: I`am always avaiable with for my guests.
houseRules: . No smoking inside the apartment. . Is forbidden receive or lead strange people to the apartment. . Only people that are part of the reservation should have access to the apartment. . Do not eat on the bedroom. . Do not drink things like wine or sugary drinks on the bedroom.

host.location: São Félix da Marinha, Porto, Portugal
host.about:
Olá o meu nome é Fábio Ramos tenho 32 anos.
Sou uma pessoa animada, divertida e altruísta, tenho inúmeros prazeres nesta vida um dos quais é viajar e conhecer pessoas de outras nacionalidades culturas. 
Enquanto anfitrião prometo ser o mais prestativo possível, tanto nos primeiros contactos como quando forem meus hóspedes, estarei sempre disponível para ajudar e dar todo o suporte necessário para que passa uma estadia super agradável e interessante na cidade do Porto.

reviews.txt:
Fábio has everything you can look after for a host!
The apartment is very nice and its location is perfect, we strongly recommend for your stay in Porto!

The apartment is perfect for two people. It is clean, well equipped and has a super comfortable bed. The interior is new and tasteful.  We didn't miss anything and felt like home. The location is in the center and perfect tfor sightseeing.
Fabio is a very nice and helpful person and a great host. I totally would recommend this apartment for an unforgettable visit in Porto.

Listing as described. Well location. Fabio was always in touch. Just small issues with tv, but had lots of options to make this up.   Definitely a listing I would stay again and recommend Fabio as a host!

Fabio was the epitome of how warm and friendly Poruguese people are. He made me feel not as a tourist but as a friend. Fabio wanted to make sure that i will visit the most interesting places in Porto that's why his recommendations were truly useful! His place is also spotlessly clean ad very cozy!

Fábio given us all the attention, since the reservation until the delivery of the keys on arrival. The announcement corresponds to reality, the photos do not cheat. The apartment is very cozy. I strongly recommend to stay in this accommodation.

Foi uma viagem de trabalho que trouxe-me até ao Porto.
No entanto, o espaço deu-me a possibilidade de mesmo depois de chegar tarde ao apartamento, ainda encontrar muitos cafés e restaurantes à volta!
Não poderia ter melhores coisas a apontar ao apartamento e ao anfitrião.
É um apartamento muito espaçoso e muito bem equipado e com um aspecto muito moderno.
Obrigado pela atenção, e espero ficar aí muitas mais vezes! :)

Nous avons été parfaitement accueillis par notre hôte. Celui-ci était présent à notre arrivée. Il nous a présenté la disposition de l'appartement ainsi que les fonctionnalités. L'appartement correspondait tout à fait à la description. L'intérieur a été totalement refait et surtout bien fait (totalement refait à neuf avec porte bien sécurisée, même si le quartier pourtant ne craint pas du tout). La cuisine est bien aménagée et bien équipée. La salle de bain est pratique. 
La localisation est idéal à vrai dire : à deux pas de la place de la liberté et très proche de la station Trindad (liaison direct aéroport). Enfin, proche de toute commodité et des animations. Le double vitrage et le volet intérieur protège bien de la rue, qui est somme toute très calme. On y reviendra!

Estive no Porto com o meu namorado durante 4 dias e o apartamento, que é tal e qual como aparece no anúncio, foi muito adequado. Está situado numa zona histórica e central e por isso foi possível passear sempre a pé pela cidade. É uma zona calma e a menos de 5 minutos é possível chegar ao supermercado, ao metro e a diversos centros turísticos e lojas. Tem as condições básicas e estava tudo limpo e organizado. O Fábio foi sempre atencioso e prestável desde o momento em que chegámos. Ideal para duas pessoas e para uns dias de descanso! É, sem dúvida, uma experiência a repetir.

Appartement très bien situé, avons tout fait à  pied.15mn de la ribiera, 7mn de la'bouche de metro trindade.
Quelques restaurants peu excessifs, atypiques par leur decor et tres bons à  proximité.
Fablio, tres accueillant, nous attendait à  L appartement.
 il a pris son temps pour nous expliquer ce qu' il y avait à 'visiter. Très disponible pour répondre à  nos questions durant le séjour.
Appartement est similaire aux photos. Dans la cuisine, il y a tout pour cuisiner.
A recommander.

Fabio, nous a très bien accueillis. L'appartement est très bien situé, il est exactement comme sur les photos. Fabio est un hôte disponible, qui donne pleins de bon conseils. Encore merci. On y reviendra.

We had a lovely stay in this flat and it made a huge difference to my holiday in Porto. Beautiful and fully equipped apartment in the city center. Fabio was a great host. I would definitely recommend staying here!

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Fabio qui a pris le temps de donner des idées de choses à faire à Porto à notre arrivée. L'appartement est neuf, charmant et très bien entretenu. Nous vous le conseillons.

Apartamento com excelente localização, próximo ao metro, supermercado e o centro turístico de porto. O apartamento é exatamente como ilustrado nas fotos e a limpeza também muito boa! Se tem algum ônus, é na hora de tomar banho, a aguá quente dura cerca de 7 minutos e existe a necessidade de esperar 1 hora de intervalo para ter água quente de novo.
Fábio é um excelente anfitrião!
Fabio is a great host, I had a really nice time in Porto thanks to him. His flat is nicely positioned between the train station and city centre. I would come again.

Fabio nous a bien accueilli  et nous  a conseillé .
L'apparat était tel que décrit.
La situation parfaite et sur une rue pleine de fêtes.

L'appartamento è molto bello e confortevole, di recentissima ristrutturazione, con arredamenti, sanitari ed elettrodomestici nuovi; la cucina è delle giuste dimensioni, funzionale e completa di tutti gli utensili necessari; il bagno è un po' piccolo, ma non scomodo, completo e funzionale; due grandi finestre assicurano un'ottima illuminazione e queste si affacciano su una via del centro che comunque non è molto trafficata ne rumorosa nelle ore serali e notturne. Posizione perfetta, praticamente in centro, a pochi minuti a piedi da molti siti di interesse. L'accoglienza è stata ottima, Fábio è molto simpatico e disponibile, ci ha fornito valide informazioni sui luoghi da frequentare, oltre a lasciarci un contatto telefonico per contattarlo in caso di necessità.

Foi um fim-de-semana magnifico. O Fábio e toda a sua equipa foram fabulosos connosco desde o início ao fim da estadia. O espaço é tal e qual as fotos relatam. Muito confortável, espaçoso, ideal para duas pessoas. A localização não poderia ser melhor. Quase sempre optámos por comer na rua. As referências são as melhores. As únicas questões a apontar são o facto da casa de banho ter estado com alguns problemas aquando da nossa chegada e só fomos alertados então. Gostaríamos de ter sido alertados antes de ter lá chegado. No entanto foi tudo resolvido e ficamos contentes por isso. Obrigada e até à próxima.

Appartement conforme aux photos et extrêmement bien situé dans Porto  : emplacement calme et près de toutes commodités. Les prestations sont TOP : équipement, qualité de la literie, taille de la chambre,etc..
Fabio a été un hôte attentif, toujours disponible pour répondre à nos questions et très sympathique :)

Fabio is great host with kind attitude and was very kind to meet us at the flat even earlier than agreed check-in time. He gave us all the tips for our stay. Place itself is perfectly located to all the central attractions of the city, everything was very clean and smells nice, linens are fresh and the bed is very comfortable for a good rest after the long walks in lovely Porto city. I definitely recommend Fabio and his place to everyone.
Fabio is very welcoming and helpful and The appartment is great !

name: Adorable Garden Gingerbread House
summary: Romantic hideaway! This property has the lush beauty and privacy of Hana, without the drive! Only 15-20 minutes to the airport, 10 minutes to beaches, 2 minutes to restaurants and shops...on a private gated property with organic nursery. BEAUTIFUL!
interaction: We will greet you and orient you to the property and live on the adjacent property so can be there in less than a minute if you need us...but we also respect that you sought our property for privacy. We are available to guide you, answer questions and give you a tour of the farm if desired.
houseRules: This property is a "drama-free zone" so please respect the peace and serenity concept.... Our biggest rule is that you respect the land, people, plants and animals on it...and yourselves as well! Please note check in is after 3:00pm and Check out is 11:00am. Changes to this need to be planned well in advance to coordinate with cleaners. Thank you. Otherwise, the cleaning crew will be showing up promptly at the check out time of 11. We welcome children but ask that parents monitor them while in the yard....this is "real nature" with a seasonal stream, slippery rocks, etc. and we do not want anyone hurt. Please take 100% responsibility for your safety and that of your children. Quiet hours are 9pm-8am. Noise projected beyond the property during quiet hours is not allowed. This is a working nursery and farm so please know that we do work and live here. It is very private however, others are on the property. It is a LARGE property.... We appreciate respectful, responsible people who are ca

host.about:
We are friendly, fun, hardworking people happy to share our beautiful piece of paradise with you. We are writers, photographers, gardeners/farmers, divers, entrepreneurs, animal lovers, artistic, creative people dedicated to living peaceful, drama-free lives. We have been together for over 20 years, and on Maui longer than that. 
This property is the cure for "Nature-Deficit-Disorder"....let us give you a tour of the farm and garden, teach you about coffee production and tropical plants....then make a smoothie (or other delicious tropical beverage!) from fresh banana, mango or likikoi!

reviews.txt:
We had a great time at your brand newly upgraded cozy, little gingerbread home! Eve and Steve (Jeff Bridges twin brother LOL!!!) are amazing hosts. This is a beautiful location, very lush, wooded garden with a nice river in the back of the cabin. Eve has an awesome sacred garden located on the property. It is very unique, peaceful, serene, excellent for relaxing and meditation. The gingerbread is close to a cool little beach town called Paia and the Baldwin Beach Park. Thank you for letting us enjoy your beautiful property. We definitely recommend the Gingerbread House for couples!
P.S. Don't bring an alarm clock, the roosters will be happy to wake you up in the morning!

This was a great place to stay and a great experience.  There are interesting grounds and the amazing plant nursery to explore, and there is also Eve's Forbidden Fruit Stand.  The Gingerbread House is truely unique.  It is very interesting and has been recently remodeled.  A beautiful place inside and out.  The grounds offer a variety of fruit trees and it is set in tropical rain forest.  It was a most pleasurable base for our adventures on Maui.

Eve's enchanted jungle cottage was amazing! It was just what we needed! The seasonal creek behind the house was flowing, the tangerines were juicy and ripe, and the succulent garden was spectacular! Eve has really created a special place with her creativity and green thumb! The labyrinths arranged on the property were fantastic for clearing the mind so we even bought a book Eve wrote about labyrinths. Thanks for the beautiful accommodations! Bodhi the dog is super chilled out and cool to have around too. Very private but not overly isolated. Perfect place!
We love this place and this house. It's a small paradise. Eve is a great host and woman.

Eve's place is sweet, cozy and a complemented our Maui experience. Nestled next to a stream with trees laden with oranges, lemons and bananas, the Gingerbread House delivered all the comforts and ease of home, while providing great views of the tropical trees towering above us. Morning chickens would cluck near our door and the friendliest dog in the world, Bodhi, always gave us a nuzzle. The house is on property shared with Eve's plant nursery -a beautiful setting that completes the picture.

We loved this cozy little cottage!  It was close to the airport, and only a few miles away from Paia, a happening little town.  The Sacred Garden was pretty amazing. The grounds were quiet, and we loved the rain at night falling on our rooftop.  It was a very peaceful and relaxing place.  Thanks Eve for letting us stay.  Hoping to come back and visit again one day. Mahalo!

Eve and Steve were really outgoing and helpful -- and the cottage was fantastic. The place is situated in a beautiful landscape with lots to explore. Inside it's cozy, clean and the sort of place you want to tuck away inside for a few days to relax. There's a great little kitchen and big bathroom so there's no "roughing it" about this place. Highly recommend this spot as Eve and Steve have clearly thought through all of the details to make it a great place to stay in Maui.
This beautiful, clean, comfy cabin is located in a gorgeous haven called the Sacred Garden.  It was everything we hoped it would be!!

Eve's Gingerbread House really is adorable and the grounds around it is so beautiful. There's even a stream running close by which you can hear from inside the house. The place looks even better than the photos. Wifi and cellular reception can be spotty, but what a great location to explore this part of Maui! Makawao and Paia is a five to fifteen minute drive away with restaurants and hiking trails close by. I highly recommend staying here. The place is charming, comfy, and cozy!

As there are so many comments in English we decide to serve the German speaking customers with a comment in German:
Die Lage von Eve's Gingerbread-House für die Erkundung der gesamten Insel ist optimal. Das GB-House befindet sich auf einem tropischen Grundstück mit einem Bach, dessen Plätschern einen angenehm in den Schlaf sinken lässt. Bett, Kitchenette mit Kühlschrank und Sofa bilden den Wohnraum. Das separate Bad hat eine tolle Dusche. Das gesamte Cottage ist sehr gepflegt und sehr sauber.  Das Bett ist typisch "amerikanisch bequem".  Der Internetzugang im Haus klappte während unseres Aufenthaltes nicht, war aber bei Eve möglich.  Eve ist eine herzliche und hilfsbereite Gastgeberin. Wir haben uns hier sehr wohl gefühlt und können das GB-House empfehlen.

This was a wonderful experience! It was also our first time using Airbnb and visiting a Hawaiian Island and we would definitely do it all over again. Early in our planning we intentionally made the decision to avoid the big resorts and seek out something that felt a little more like the "real" Hawaii. Eve's rustic cabin provided just that. The cabin was clean and comfy, with a great amount of lighting and windows. One of my favorite parts of the cabin was the large window high above the kitchen that looks into the jungle across the stream. It almost looks like a framed painting every morning when you wakeup.  The chirping birds in the jungle made it that much better. The property is close to Makawao and Pa'ia, both of which have great dinning and shopping and a great small town feel. We still visited the big resort towns for the beaches which weren't too far away. A baby beach protected by a reef is also just 10 min away! We found the cabin to be a great central location to see just about everything on the island. 

Tip: We bought the book "Maui Revealed" before we made this trip and used it religiously the entire time we were there. Kula Bistro is a must, Makawao fresh morning doughnuts in the white building with green trim and usually a line (it's quick I promise!) 808 Cafe has great food and is across the street from our favorite beaches. Drive to Hana takes all day if you go all the way around, but is so very worth it. Get out and see everything! Bring food!
The Gingerbread Cottage is a perfect central location to everything on the island, but far enough from the hustle of the towns. Be sure to do the labyrinth walks on the property, it's a great way to prepare your mind to enjoy your vacation, also go sit by the river and read a bit, it's very relaxing. We will be back next year!!!

Steve met me when I arrived. He was friendly and suggested places to eat during my stay. The gingerbread house was clean and comfortable. It had everything you might need. A kitchen area with fridge and microwave. A nice bathroom with a large shower. I enjoyed my time there.

The Gingerbread House was a great place for a stay at Maui. Perfect gateaway for our Honeymoon! Very privat and direct in jungle. 
Staying at the Gingerbread House was a great experience! 
Mahalo

Loved the Garden Gingerbread house.  It was peaceful, great location and had everything I needed.

Thanks Eve.

Me and my girlfriend had a wonderful time staying at the  Gingerbread house!  We wanted to be excluded from  other tourists  and the big hotels and this was exactly what we were looking for.  The stream flowing in the back of the house is great,!  The inside and outside is beautiful!  It's at a high elevation so driving  to or from other cities is awesome seeing  the views!  I would definitely recommend staying here!!!

Staying at the Garden Gingerbread House was the best decision of our trip. This beautiful oasis in the center of the gulch is where to find tranquility and peace. Eve was a phenomenal host who met us upon arrival to explain the ins and outs of this spectacular property. The smell of  cedar permeated throughout and it had every amenity we could ever need. As we walked the grounds, we were able to benefit from the sounds of water running through the creek, birds chirping, Bodhi on his latest adventure and explore The Sacred Garden next door. The labyrinth is a must! Mahalo to Eve for all of her recommendations. We found healing in a very special place and will never forget this glorious experience. Hope to be back again!

We had a wonderful stay at the gingerbread house. Eve and Steve were wonderful and attentive hosts. They had great tips on what to do and where to go, and we spent the week eating lilikois from their garden. The cottage is just enough for two, comfortable with a killing shower. The cooler was a very nice touch and we carried it everyday with us. It is the ideal location if you want to explore Upcountry Maui and still be very private. That is if you can do with the upside of a forest getaway: bugs. Unfortunately for us I had a bad reaction to mosquito bites, but that's on us.
Eve was very hospitable and the property was so much more amazing than advertised! Felt so tranquil and magical there, exactly what we needed to get away. Thank you Eve!

Eve is very helpful and sweet.
The house is wonderful, a dream. Unfortunately I was afraid for spider and insects. The house is very clean and complete with everything but it's in wood and in the middle of a fantastic Garden.
Eve understand immediately and give us other accomodation, as beautiful as that.
We lived four relaxing days in her home so wonderful that was very difficult leave that place..
Thank you Eve, we lived a dream.
The house was absolutely adorable & homey & very tastefully decorated. It was exactly as the listing described it as.

name: Amazing Ocean View Condo in Wailea!
summary: This amazing 3 bedroom/2 bath condo has +1,700 sq ft of living space with a huge wrap-around lanai for enjoying whale watching, ocean breezes, and beautiful sunsets. The condo has a warm inviting homey feel that appeals to both adults and children.
interaction: We provide all our guests with a detailed Welcome Packet that provides more information about our condo, the complex, and surrounding area. We are also available to assist you with any questions you may have about Maui or things to do, or where to eat.

reviews.txt: Although a short stay, it was an unforgettable memory to our family. Good location, beautiful house, clean status, and all the convenient things. It was better than the photos. We enjoyed Maui so much. I wish I could come again. Thank you.

Jim was so welcoming and easy to work with! All instructions for check in and check out were provided early. He even sent me a welcome packet that gave lots of useful information for me to plan my trip. 
The condo itself was clean, spacious, and well-stocked. Our group of 8 had no issues fitting here. While you are required to post parking permits, I didn't have any difficulties having guests over for dinner after our long days. Our guests were all very impressed by how nice the condo was, especially considering the price we paid for it! 

All in all, I would love to be back and will recommend this condo to any of my friends looking to rent in Maui.

We had a wonderful stay in Wailea courtesy of Jim. His condo is one of the most tastefully decorated and well-appointed that we have stayed in anywhere.  Huge master bedroom and good sized 2nd and 3rd bedrooms (one with Queen, one with two twin beds). Great living space with a large lanai. Well supplied kitchen with everything that you could need if you want to cook in.

Parking right outside the door, walking distance to Ulea beach and a short drive to other beaches, great shopping and superb restaurants.

Jim couldn’t have been more friendly and easier to talk with, and was very accommodating of our travel schedule being a little out of sync with his standard check-in/out times.

Jim’s was one of the best places we have had the privilege of staying at and we highly recommend it

We had an awesome time at the condo! The location was really great and peaceful. Jim was very accommodating and allowed us an early check-in since we landed early. The condo slept 8 people easily and we had a great time lazing on the balcony enjoying the views. Would definitely recommend the place!

Fantastic location and Jim was great at communicating quickly and made the whole experience very smooth. The Condo was very clean and well presented. It is is a fantastic location, close to beach and shops with nice pools and security on site. I would recommend this as a great base to explore Maui.
Great place!

We were made to feel welcome right from the beginning.  The information provided was very helpful.  This a beautiful condo in a beautiful location.  I would definitely recommend this condo to everyone.  Very homey and has everything you could need.

We had an excellent time at Jim's condo. It was exactly as described! The master bed and bath were amazing! We had a larger group of people and were perfectly accommodated. Jim answered all of questions before & during the stay. Would definitely stay again.

Had an amazing time in Maui while staying at Jim's Condo. He was very responsive and accommodating during our stay. Great location and within walking distance to a nearby shopping mall with good eats. We borrowed the house's Road to Hana cd for our trip up the coast for an easy guided tour. There's a tennis club next door so if you enjoy tennis, this is an ideal place. Two pools very close to the condo with BBQ grills for use as well. All in all, we had an excellent time during our stay, with the help of Jim. Thanks for everything!!
The room is spacious, lots of beach accessories which are very helpful.
Great condo for a family getaway! Very clean, convenient location and comfortable accommodations! Beautiful view - great hosts!
Our stay and Jim's was amazing!! We felt right at home and it was perfect for a family vacation. We didn't need for anything. We will definitely be coming back

Jim's place was a very comfortable and relaxing place to stay in Wailea. Our family of 8 stayed comfortably in this condo, with the use of the fold out lounge, which was very comfortable. It was great to have access to beach umbrella's, chairs, boogie boards, snorkelling equipment, beach towels etc. when visiting from overseas. We were able to make the most of the beautiful beach in Wailea. We were able to park both of our hire cars right at the front door of the condo, which made getting around Maui so much easier. The condo is in a great location, only a 3 minute drive to the beach and a stroll to some great restaurants and shops. There is a supermarket 10 minutes up the road which was good to be able to make use of the fully equipped kitchen. The washing machine and dryer were a bonus. Jim was extremely efficient with all communications prior to and during our stay and made the entire trip a breeze. I would recommend this place for families wanting a relaxing holiday.
Jim's place was lovely! We felt so relaxed from the moment we walked in! Good way to start our trip :)
It was a fantastic stay and had a very comfortable condo.

We loved the condo and am so grateful Jim hosted us. We loved having all the space to ourselves and the condo provided a great view! The space was huge and perfect for large families and I appreciated the extras like beach chairs, umbrellas, and sand toys for our 4 year old. Communication was easy and the check in process was also easy. Overall we would definitely love to stay there again and recommend this place to family and friends! Mahalo Jim!

As you know, 3 br condos that are affordable are hard to come by in Maui. Jim's place was clean, easily accessible and offered many extra amenities (pool access, toys, washer/dryer, AC in each room, large lanai) that you don't realize are awesome until you actually have them! We would absolutely stay here again.
Beautiful, updated, well appointed and spacious home in a gorgeous, well maintained community. Anything you need is already here. Exactly as described and excellent communication with the host.
Great quality and host!

Would like to thank Mary and Jim for their wonderfully furnished and comfortable condo. 

Great access to the beach and restaurants; enjoyed the local golf courses, particularly the Emerald. Overall a great stay! 

Mahalo!

name: Greystone Apartment 2
summary: Hi my name is Julie and ı am originally from the UK. I understand when traveling the importance of comfort and cleanliness. We wish for you to Feel at home in one of our stylishly decorated Greystone Apartments. Tastefully renovated, with winding marble staircase, set amidst the hustle and bustle of Bohemian Beyoglu. Relax on your own private terrace. Bed linen and towels provided. Fully equipped kitchen, WiFi, TV, air-con in bedrooms.  5 min walk from Taxim square and metro stops.
interaction: We personally greet our guests to hand over the keys. We spend quality time with every customer explaining where you are and what is local. we have specially made a brochure of things to see and do seen through the locals eyes. We can offer our guests the choice of an organized private taxi and local travel cards are also available.
houseRules: Our apartments have been designed for couples who want to relax in our quiet apartments. Children under the age of 13 are not usually accepted. ıf you contact us with personal requests we can discuss this. One older child or adult is charged EUR 30 per person per night in an additional bed. We provide a futon with all bed linen. cash /Visa ,  The hotel reserves the right to pre-authorise credit cards prior to arrival.

host.about:
We are an Anglo Turkish family run business, renting out refurbished apartments tastefully decorated to a high standard. 

Our 19th century apartments are situated among 18th century Armenian architecture, where churches and mosques mingle. You can feel the energy and pulse of this unique area. As a person who enjoys photography this is the area for you to explore and wander. Staying at our apartments you have a range of amenities right on your doorstep. Taksim underground metro station is within easy walking distance, putting the whole of Istanbul at your disposal.

We would like to offer our guests a comfortable and cultural stay with either long or short term agreements in the historical Tarlabashi district in the heart of Istanbul.

reviews.txt: Great flat, Nice host, good location!

The flat is finished to a good standard and is the perfect size for a couple having a long weekend. The location is excellent where you can walk to bars, restaurants, and all the main tourist sites. You can also easily get taxis from the main road.

Julie was a wonderful host, giving us local advice about Istanbul and what to do to get around. When I fell ill and had to go to hospital she went above and beyond, accompanying me to hospital so she could speak to the Turkish doctors. We want to come back to Istanbul soon so that we can stay with Julie again!
l'ost e' stato molto gentile e (Website hidden by Airbnb) ha fornito molte indicazioni su tutto, il posto corrispondeva esattamente alle nostre aspettative

L appartement est confortable,joli et tout équipé et comme sur les photos et très proche de la rue piétonne principale et à 10min à pied de taskim! Il se trouve cependant en limite d un quartier assez délabré mais qui est en pleine transformation. Pas de problème de securité et ce n est pas gênant car l'immeuble est en tres bon état et dedié à la location!Julie et son employé sont sympas disponibles et serviables! Tres content de mon sejour! Merci

Julie personally welcomed us at the apartment and informed us about all the important things including places to visit and all the necessary stores around the apartment. She was very friendly and always available for help during our stay.The apartment is located in the middle of Beyoglu (10 Minutes away from Taksim Square), a district where you can hardly find any tourists. (which is great if you want to feel like a real person from Istanbul). The apartment is exactly like shown in the pictures. It is very clean and you have everything you need. All together it was a very nice stay and i can just highly recommend this apartment ! We will definitly book this apartment again if we come back to Istanbul!

Our trip to Istanbul was brilliant, made even better by the beautiful and well-maintained apartment as our base. It is perfectly situated to the bustling nightlife and great places to eat, and to get the team over to the historic district. Julie had left lots of useful information in a pack, which we used - including booking a great local luxury Hamam - and she also arranged taxis for us to and from the airport, which really helped. Great service, lovely apartment. Perfect :)

Die Fotos des Apartments entsprechen der Realität, gut eingerichtete Stadtwohnung, Balkon mit Abendsonne mit Blick auf das Strassenleben der Nachbarschaft. ( Apt 4 ) Das Haus liegt knapp ausserhalb der Ausgangsszene von Beyoglu in einem lebendigen Wohnquartier im Umbruch. Für uns war es ideal, wir würden die Wohnung wieder buchen.

It was a wonderful time we had at Greystone! Great place! The interior is amazing and we enjoyed the nice terrace...
The recommendations of Faruk were great and we enjoyed the best turkish food we ever had with a Raki ;-)

Unfortunatelly we haven't had the chance to meet Julie. But she always helped out if we had any questions!

The only think was that we didn't expect to pay extra for a third person when we arrived... But we managed in the end.

I would definately recommend that place!

Julie's apartments are a great place to stay in Istanbul. We loved the comfortable rooms and especially the big balcony (Apartment 2)...although we didn't really use it as the weither was a bit rainy. Julie was a great help explaining our confused taxi driver where the Greystones Apartments are located and arranging a ride back to the airport on very short notice. I can highly recommend this lovely place in the heart of Istanbul!

The neighborhood was very authentic, felt like we lived there. Great proximity to main artery of the city, shopping street. Apt was clean, modern, beautiful, spacious, shining, awesome shower. Beautiful little touches. Julie was welcoming, kind, gave us a homemade guidebook. I would recommend! :)
We loved the apartment and Julie was incredibly helpful!

What a wonderful place in Istanbul. We spent many an evening on the expansive terrace off our bedroom, enjoyed coming home to fresh towels and a made bed, were pleased to find everything we needed was already available, and loved how easy it was to walk to many of Istanbul's highlights from our front door. The Greystone team was a sheer delight - helpful, friendly, generous, and fun. I highly recommend staying with them and I personally can't wait to return. Thank you, Miss Julie and Faruk!

I really could not fault the Greystone apartment. I stayed in apartment 2 which was on the first floor. You get a lot for you money, big apartment with tall ceilings, very tastefully (and newly) decorated and with a huge terrace which was nice but I hardly used it as I was out so much. 

The host was very friendly and communicative. In terms of location it's within a stone's throw from the main shopping and nightlife of Taksim but enough out the way that it won't disturb your sleep. Restaurants, cash machines etc are all less than a five minute walk. It's barely a minute from the main road so you're not walking deep into a potentially dodgy neighbourhood. Do your (Hidden by Airbnb) maps homework before you get there and it's easy enough to find. 

I took the Havatas bus from Attaturk Airport which took around 50 mins and dropped me off in Taksim (Point hotel). From there it was about a 15/20 minute walk. If you come with suitcases however you'll want to get a cab as the pavements in Istanbul are not build for cases! Next time I'm in Istanbul I'll definitely be coming back here.
This is a very quiet great place, in a great location. We had a wonderful time. Julie was a great host.

My boyfriend and I spent 4 nights here for over New Years. We really loved the apartment. It was very spacious and nicely decorated. The heating worked really well (which was useful as it was freezing with 2 foot of snow!) and the kitchen was well equipped. The area is great. Close to all the bars and restaurants. Really responsive communication  from Julie. The only minus was the water temperature in the shower was slightly temperamental.

Julie was an incredible host!!! nothing was too much trouble and she went over and above with enquiries and her response times were excellent!
The apartment is exactly as you see on the photos. Homely, spotlessly clean and just a breath of fresh air! The apartments are maintained daily. 
Wifi is excellent. Just about everything is within walking distance and there are loads of fantastic restaurants and bars close by. If you feel the desire to self-Cater there are two brilliant fruit & veg stalls a couple of doors down and a good little supermarket. I always felt safe in the street, even at night and staying at Greystone offered a brilliant insight into local life whilst being so close to all of the attractions! And I was an Airbnb virgin too!
I seriously could not have had a better choice of accomodation for this trip!! Thanks so much for an incredible stay Julie!!!!

Thank you so much Julie and Faruk for making our stay wonderful. The apartment was just perfect specially the decor. It had everything we needed and so convenient location. We didn't want to be right in the middle of Taksim square's hussle bussle and noise but not too far either, we could walk to Istaklal street. Julie advised us very clearly about the traffic to the airport which we didn't know and would have missed our flight otherwise.
Hope we can comae back again :)

We, My wife and I, had a wonderful expérience, location is great (not in a touristic area) close to supermarket and Sightseen. 
We felt very welcome and the apartment was cosy and clean.. 
i Highly recommend it..

Julie and her apartments are amazing! She was there to welcome us when we arrived and provided us with a map and a booklet of places to go. The apartment is exactly what you see in the photos. The location was perfect, only a few blocks away from Istiklal and the Beyoglu district but far enough to where its not too loud. Theres alot of great food nearby and markets if you want to cook. We wanted to really feel like we were living in Istanbul for the few days we were there and Julie helped us achieve that, thanks Julie!

Faruk and Julie were absolutely incredible people, very helpful and kind. Anything that we ever needed was handled immediately and with care. The place itself was PERFECT for my fiance and I, the view from the balconies were stunning and exactly what we were looking for in a home in the city for a month. The place was cleaned 3 days out of the week by the live in house keeper, Hatije, who was an unexpected but very welcomed surprise. 10 min walk to Taksim square with plenty of great places to eat every day, or fresh vegetables from the markets right outside the front door!  If you stay here, you must go have a bite to eat at Merhi, it's great place to have some traditional Turkish home-cooked foods. The Turkish rice pilaf is an instant favorite of ours now. We heard some news of some areas being dangerous, but never felt a bit in danger ourselves and we traveled all throughout the city. We will stay here again and again every chance we get to return! Thank you so much Julie and Faruk, you are amazing!

name: Eliseos Luxury Apartment HUTB-001281
summary: Beautiful 100m2 apartment decorated with designer furniture throughout. Large living room open kitchen area with bay window. It has 2 double & 1 single bedrooms & 2 full bathrooms. The master bedroom's ensuite leads to a large & sunny terrace. Centrally located, 1 block from Paseo de Gracia, restaurants, boutiques and bars within walking distance. Close to metro stations, bus stops, casa Batllò, La Pedrera etc Fully equipped kitchen- safe box. Ideal for families, groups or professionals
interaction: We will recommend you the best restaurants in the city from the trendiest to the local secrets for foodies. For our lady guests with a soft spot for shoes and handbags, we can organize a visit to Serena Whitehaven's showroom. This is a local brand which is establishing itself worldwide - already has a shop in New York - come and get pleasantly surprised and let them pamper you !
houseRules: - Only small pets allowed

reviews.txt:
thank's for everything
it was

Absolutely wonderful place to stay at. Very nice location, and the apartment itself looks even better in real. 'Coming home' after a long day in Barcelona was always a pleasure.  Upon arrival we got a warm welcome and introduction to the apartment and the city itself. Very clean, no complaints whatsoever.

Two girlfriends and I had an amazing stay at Heike's flat in Barcelona. The location couldn't be better, just blocks from the main shopping & attractions street. It was spacious, clean and inviting and Heike was incredibly responsive throughout our stay. I would highly recommend and would see if it's available next time I'm in Barcelona - thank you Heike!

If we could have slept properly, I would have given it 4 or 5 stars. The location was amazing and made up for what the flat lacked in sound sleep and thorough cleanliness. Heike was great, however, and deserves a lot of credit!
Great apartment in an amazing location.
L emplacement de l appartement est idéal, bien centré et ds un superbe quartier. Par contre, logement tres bruyant, tant en journée que durant la nuiT.

The location of the house is very convenient and central. Walking distance to La Rambla and other shopping streets. The house has a nice small terrace to relax and enjoy your travelmates. We really enjoyed staying thank you!

Schwarz was right on time, although we had a late checkin and she was very helpful. The flat is really beautiful with a great terrace. Location is perfect if you want to be close to luxury shops and restaurants. I would definitely recommend to stay here...
Excellent location and lovely spacious apartment in Eixample area.  Large kitchen and living space for our family.  We hope to return again soon!  Heike was a fantastic host!
Beautiful apartment and great host

The apartment is exactly as the pictures show, we loved the place! It was very clean, comfortable, quiet and a great location. There is a small restaurant below the apartment, where every morning we enjoyed to get a quick coffee and breakfast. We highly recommend staying at this apartment!
Fantastic location. Great patio and apartment. Helpful hosts. Thanks Heike and Alex.
Tres bon séjour agrémenté par un logement agréable et un tres bon accueil ...

Apartamento lindo, grande, buen ubicado
Paseo de gracia a una cuadra, mejor imposible
Todo muy limpio y ordenado
No nos faltó nada! 
Heike, es súper recomendable!!!

Heike and Alex are great hosts to deal with  Very responsive to communications and quick to resolve any issues. Alex speaks perfect English! The two apartments that we experienced (Eliseo & Juliet) were very stylish and comfortable. Juliet is probably quieter amd more homely with fantastic artworks and a selection of books  Location is perfect for shopping at the best stores on Gracias. Very central to the major attractions too. The perfect apartments for those of us who enjoy something more spacious and luxouious  Five stars.

This place is awesome. Excellent location, pretty close to La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. Metro station at walking distance. Plenty of restaurants around. I was traveling with my family (wife and four kids) and Schwarz was a super host. She answered all my messages in minutes and at check in, she brought some chocolates for my kids, and some local food items (olive oil bottle, rice, chocolate and salt).

Great location for restaurants and shopping. Nice and large place for my friend and I. Very nice terrace area but this time of the season perhaps a bit coldish to take advantage of it. Heating works great!
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Booked for some colleagues to stay for a conference in Barcelona, great communication from the host
Great location, apartment, and hosts.  Highly recommended!

name: Spacious bedroom with a trundle bed in Botafogo
summary: A bedroom for two in a beautiful colonial style home built in the early 20th century. Located in Botafogo in a quiet village with lots of vegetation just minutes from one of the landmarks of Rio. The neighborhood features many leisure activities.
