interaction: I wish my guests have the best experience as possible. I will be available to help with whatever you need. I can give you many tips on amazing places that will add to the traditional tourist itinerary.
houseRules: Espero que você se sinta à vontade como se estivesse em sua casa. Desta mesma forma desejo que os hóspedes sejam cuidadosos e zelosos para com o uso da casa. Respeitem a convivência harmoniosa entre os vizinhos. Não leve pra dormir em casa outras pessoas que não forem as combinadas. Use com consciência a água e a energia elétrica.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Olá!!
Seja bem vindo!
Eu adoro conhecer novas pessoas, compartilhar ensinamentos e pontos de vista. 
Amo a natureza, respirar um puro ar e me sentir conectada a energia da terra.
Me sinto muito feliz em receber convidados simpáticos que desejam experimentar ótimos momentos no Rio e desfrutar das alegrias e belezas deste lugar que eu tanto amo.
Botafogo é um bairro  onde a vida histórica e contemporânea convivem com charme a harmonia. Rodeado por montanhas e ruas arborizadas, viver em  Botafogo tem custo mais baixo que os outros bairros da zona sul, aqui é repleto de restaurantes, bares, feiras, museus e eventos culturais que acontecem com muita frequência, o bairro fica a poucos minutos do centro do Rio e dos principais pontos turísticos. A vila onde a casa está localizada foi construída há quase 100 anos, tem muitas árvores que recebem a visita de adoráveis animais da Mata Atlântica.
  A poucos minutos de caminhada  você encontrará a "Praia de Botafogo" que compõem uma das vistas mais incríveis do Rio, se preferir pegue o caminho oposto e dê um pulinho na Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas, de lá aproveite pra curtir o por do sol no Arpoador.
  Durante muito anos o Rio de Janeiro foi a capital do Brasil, então imagine passear entre as centenárias ruas de paralelepípedos do Centro do Rio, rodeado por prédios memoráveis de  belíssima arquitetura do século 19. 
  O bairro da Urca, onde abriga o bondinho do Pão de Açúcar, está a menos de 15 minutos de ônibus ou táxi.
  O Cristo Redentor  pode ser visto da janela  e você pode chegar a subida do Morro do Corcovado em apenas 15 minutos de ônibus ou táxi.
 Será um prazer compartilhar todas as dicas e lugares especiais que conheci ao longo dos meus anos de vida nesta cidade maravilhosa.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
Fue una experiencia increible, Ana siempre se comporto amable, disponible, siempre ayudando a facilitar mi viaje, aconsejando como llegar a lugares a los cuales queria visitar.

El lugar para dormir es super comodo, super limpio y super tranquilo, buena onda. 

Estoy muy feliz de haber quedado en esta casa.

Muchas gracias.

Fui muito bem atendido pela Ana Rita e muito bem recepcionado pelo Sr. Mauro. A residência fica em um condomínio muito bem localizado, o quarto é limpo, espaçoso e confortável, além de ser bem silencioso. O bairro é muito bom, tem metrô próximo e conta com comércio bem diversificado. Recomendo!

Simplesmente me senti em casa! A Ana é uma pessoa agradabilíssima e como anfitriã, se mostrou sempre prestativa e com ótimas dicas sobre o Rio. A casa é um charme e o bairro de Botafogo muito tranquilo e cheio de natureza. Tem uma visão privilegiada do Cristo Redentor. Quanto a segurança, me senti muito segura ao andar pelas ruas do bairro. O comércio também é muito diversificado e atende as necessidades de um "viajante". Foi uma experiência ímpar e espero podê-la repetir, uma próxima vez, com mais tempo para aproveitar tudo o que o Rio tem à oferecer!!!

Me and my boyfriend stayed at Ana Rita's apartment for ten days during the Olympics, and it was definitely the best Airbnb experience we ever had.

The flat is very well located, Botafogo metro station is about 10/15 minuts walking. The area is full of markets, bars and restaurants, and above all is very safe.
The apartment was perfectly clean at our arrival, and the room equipped with a double bed, a big drawers and a closet.
Ana Rita (and her father too) was friendly and very helpful since the beginning of our stay. During our vacation in Rio we lost our credit cards, and her help was fundamental to get them back. She also suggested us a lot of good places to eat :)
We could use the kitchen and also do the laundry, which was quite necessary since our stay was long.

I can certainly recommend Ana Rita and her flat, you will have a great stay there!

Iza nos acompañó en cada uno de nuestros días de estancia,muy afectuosamente nos ayudaba con cualquier duda que teníamos. Ana Rita fue muy amable y cortez.el barrio nos pareció muy seguro aunque un poco alejado de las playas.

name: BEST HOME in the BlueMosq area!
summary: - Best location in the old city touristic center! - Washing Machine, Dish washer, Microwave and fully equipped with the daily basic needs! - 125sqm, Sapacious and comfortable! - Brand new, Neat n Clean! - 3Bed Rooms, 1 Hall room, 2 shower n toilet
interaction: We dont stay with guests to make our guests feel home. YOU will have the house to yourselves but we will meet you to welcome and hand over the keys and show you all the features of the house and area, give useful information whenever you want.  Note: We do not live in this house. We keep it just for our guests.
houseRules: -We thank our guests for not smoking in the house. You can always just walk out and smoke in the balcony fresh air. -Please let us know about the broken things, so we can fix it for our next guest. -No unexpected guests are welcome to stay overnight for safety reasons. -Our cleaning time is 11:00 am-13:00pm, please inform us before when you don't need. -There is a pair of keys, please do not forget to put it back when you check out. NEVER LEFT THE KEYS BEHİND THE DOOR!!! -Towels and bed sheets will be changed upon request.

host.about:
We, Ali & Argen, are two young enthusiasts who love Istanbul. We are both university graduates and currently studying MS in İstanbul Universities you probably have not heard :) We have been living here for more than 10 years. During those years we have worked in different sectors of tourism and gained a great experience (as a guide, receptionist, interpreter, seller of turkish delight in Eminonu) We are eager to do our best to make you feel home. Hope you will enjoy your stay with us here in Istanbul. Take care and see you.
Argen & Ali

reviews.txt: We stayed at very nice apartment, well located in Istanbul's Old City, near many attractions and restaurants. We felt very safe and comfortable.
Fantastic place. Value for money. Very clean, excellent location, will recommend using again. Our host Ali was fantastic too bloke.
Great location. Outstanding hospitality.

We (just like lots of others hosted by the boys) ended up with another apartment. 
That being said, the pace we were given was large, very clean, in a perfect location.

Огромное спасибо Али! Отличная квартира! отличное расположение. 7-10 минут до Голубой мечети и основных  исторических достопримечательностей. Очень дружелюбное отношение: встретили, разрешили оставить чемоданы до время заселения, очень чистая квартира, большая обеденная зона. Мы ездили с подругами - 8 девушек. всего хватило) всё понравилось) от души рекомендую!
That flat was on the first floor but clean and nice and very spacious, it is next to the blue mosque and the tram. Loved the place and the location

Location is good. (Entire are is on up hill_historical places also are in up hill) Amenities are good, Ali and his partner are well behaved. Any one can select this property without any hesitation. (Except one wash room small, kitchen is small)

The location of this house and the hospitality of the host (Ali) cannot be beat. The best host I have ever had among my stays at airbnb homes. The house is within walking distance of blue mosque, grand bazaar, and many shops. 
We really enjoyed our stay at this house.
The host canceled this reservation 95 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Verifiquen que les estan entregando el apartamento que efectivamente contrataron. Comi anfitriones son excepcionales gran seres rumanos.

This place was great! Extremely homey, easy check-in, a beautiful 5 minute walk from the tram that connects most of the must-see tourist attractions, and Ali was extremely nice and helpful
Special thanks to Ali and Argen
Ali的房子位置非常棒,因为在高地,出门就可以看到远处的大海;出门走5分钟就可以到蓝色清真寺,附近还有各个景点,非常方便;因为在老城区,房子不新,但还干净,作为旅途中休息的地方,已经很不错了;房子附近有土耳其餐厅和中餐,很方便;最让我们印象深刻的是我们入住和离开时,因为我们人多,行李也多,Ali专门安排了两个人帮我们搬行李,谢谢Ali

The property is in an outstanding location for anybody who wants to see the highlights of Istanbul. Ali was an outstanding host arranging airport transfers and providing so many helpful suggestions on what to see and do. You cannot go wrong with booking this property.
The place was clean in a great location. Perfect communication and well organized.

When we ariived, Ali and his friend helped us with our luggage’s and gave us information about the city and places to visit. His place was very close to Blue mosque, restaurant, and many attractions. Ali was very quick with communication through (Hidden by Airbnb) . He was very respectful and nice. His friend even helped us take our luggage’s to a new apartment that was 5-10 minute walk. 

The reason why I give this a three star is because it was not as advertised. The number of bedrooms, bathroom, and pictures did not match. Also, they were queens size beds and not king. 
2 bedroom had 1 Queen bed 
1 bedroom had 1 Queens and 1 twin bed 
And rest were sofa beds. 

And one full bathroom and 1 was half bathroom (only toilet and sink) 
 
Another reason I give this place a three star was the fact it was cleaned only once in our entire 1 week stay. 


Other than that this place was great.

Ali was an awesome host. He went out of his way to make sure our family was comfortable. There was this tea kettle that my mom and I loved at his apartment, and I wasn't able to find it anywhere, so he went out and bought it for us! He was always there for communication and tips on where to go and what to eat. My niece was sick, so he even took my brother to the hospital and had her checked up. He stayed with him until they were discharged. If I could recommend a place to stay to atone visiting Turkey, it would be with Ali and Argen. Thank you for making our stay easier in a foreign country!

Ali was superb and he really took good care of us.
The apartment was old but fine, really well located and clean.
I recommend without  a doubt to rent with Ali & Argen.
Thanks for everything.
It was a perfect place it is a very clean and lovely

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
I was in Brazil for the Summer Olympics as a volunteer and I needed to be close to the Olympic Stadium (Engenhão). This home was perfect only 25 min by bus.

Kayanh and his family were awesome. He was great in making me feel at home, I left feeling like family. He took me on a tour of Rio on my first day and showed me everything to do in Rio. He was so accommodating and made me feel at home when I first arrived. Kayanh far exceeded my expectations. The home is so beautiful (I called it the tree house). The bedroom has everything- TV, fans, zoned air conditioning. The bathroom was awesome too. Everything was very well decorated and very clean. The neighborhood was great. It was in a very private, quiet neighborhood, close to the BRT and the area is very convenient, everything is in a walkable distance if you like walking. 

Kayanh home is 35-40 min from the airport by car and 1 hour from Centro Brazil, if you do not mind travelling by public transportation all the tourist areas are accessible.   

Kayanh and his family are the best hosts that you could ever ask for. I only speak English, and Kayanh spoke Portuguese and English which was a tremendous advantage. 

Kayanh and his family are 5 star hosts.

name: Studio convenient to CBD, beaches, street parking.
summary: It is a spacious basement studio with a small kitchen.  It has its own external entrance, but is attached to our home.  For the best views feel free to use our table on the shared verandah. Close to Harbour beaches and beautiful walks, and Direct buses to the city run at least two times an hour in both directions. Shops and restaurants are walking distance. There is plenty of on-street parking.
interaction: We are generally on hand as needed.  And I like to meet guests.  Self check-in is available.   I am easiest to reach through the Airbnb app, but you can also text me. We expect guests to take advantage of our garden spaces and verandah, Make yourself at home and enjoy the view.  We are always happy to chat if we are outside.  :)
houseRules: Treat our home the way you would want your home to be treated. Keep towels hung. Recycle. Follow checkout rules posted for checkout--check room, take sheets off the bed, recycle. Have we run out of an essential?  Text us and we will get it to you. Did you forget something?  Text us and we can usually help.

host.about: We are a family of four (Two teens).  We love meeting our Airbnb guests and sharing our favourite places to eat, travel, hike, cycle, or sight see in Sydney.  We are originally from the US, but have lived here for over 10 years.

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 73 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

super comfortable room, great location (few min from manly wharf by bus or a fantastic walk on manly scenic walk). Safe neighbourhood and quiet. Leslie and Eric are great people and have a great family. Thanks very much!  I look forward to catching up again next time I am in Sydney. Elias
We spend  4 perfect days ! Helpfull and guestfull !  I recommande !

We were warmly welcomed as friends when we arrived. It was very easy to talk with Leslie and Eric. The beds were very comfortable and the bathroom was clean, the shower was very good. The location was very handy to the remarkable Manly and the ferries allowed us to get to the city. The weather was lovely warm during our stay. the views from the balcony was spectacular.
Very clean and confortable. Nice view on the bay.

The home, location and experience staying with Leslie and her family for 2 nights far exceeded our expectations. We had a fabulous introduction to Sidney, as this was our first visit to the area. The home was as described and her family was gracious, engaging and very helpful. We will return without a question the next opportunity that we have to visit the Sidney area!
Thank you Leslie!

Leslie, Eric and your family are lovely people. we have provided anything we needed. their home is very spacious fit to stay whether on holiday or for work. the bus stop is within walking distance from home. Balgalowah is very beautiful and is very close to Manly. Thank you!

Great house with an amazing view over Manly Harbour, lovely room and Leslie and her family made us feel at home. They gave us everything we needed including the Opal cards.
A bit far from the city but was worth it for the quality and price!
Leslie and her family were very welcoming and the accomodation was perfect for me. I stayed 2 nights on business and would happily stay again.

Leslie's place is located in a quiet and family friendly suburb not too far from Manly and the city. The room, located in the basement, is large, with lots of privacy. The house has an incredible harbour/ocean view. Leslie and her family are friendly and full of character. We would definitely suggest this accomodation to anyone visiting Sydney.
Fantastic area in manly with great beaches and towns. Easy access to city and a nice breakfast included!
Loved it. Great family home

Die Unterkunft ist in gute Lage, nahe zu Hotspot von Manly. Die Fotos zeigen die schöne Aussicht auf das Meer, dich das ist nicht diejenige vom Zimmer aus. Dieses hat gar keine Aussicht / Fenster 
Es gibt einige Verbeserungsmöglichkeiten
Value for money stay in a lovely house. Leslie made us feel very welcome and a fantastic base for exploring Sydney.
We stayed 2night in Leslie's accommodation,it was a lovely place. Leslie was really friendly and we appreciated the accommodation and what a beautiful view.

Spacious self-contained apartment and wonderfully hosted. Leslie and her family were very welcoming, and offered next level service in a stunning location. Having breakfast on their balcony, overlooking the water and moored boats was a highlight of my trip. I will definitely stay again, thank you for the toothpaste rescue!!
Very lovely home with a beautiful view of the harbour . Would recommend to anyone visiting sydney.

Leslie's place was very nice, spacious, and clean! The whole bottom floor made it feel as if it were our own place, and it was nice to meet others from Texas while traveling. Would highly recommend if in the north!
Excellent host and a spacious room with a great view with the harbour! Convenient to get around with a car too.

Leslie's family home is close to the bus line and ferry; an hour ride from the airport and a thirty minute commute to Sydney Harbor.   The room has plenty of sleeping quarters, the bathroom is stocked with all essentials (shampoo, conditioner, body  wash, hair dryer), and  breakfasts are light and delicious.   Having a refrigerator, microwave,tea and coffee pot are helpful; and a washing machine within the unit is terrific.  The family accommodated all are requests; we traveled some days as two persons and some days we had three persons.  Leslie helped us with restaurant suggestions and paths to walk.

name: Cozy Chinatown studio apartment
summary: Neighborhood feels like old New York, the last authentic part of Manhattan. Our cozy studio apartment comfortably fits 2 ppl. 10 minute walk to LES, SoHo, TriBeca, South street seaport and great restaurants and bars nearby. Very close to B,D,F trains. A,C,E,4,5,6 also walking distance.
interaction: I'm available by phone call, texts or airbnb messages during your entire stay.
houseRules: Please be mindful of downstairs neighbors, they are sometimes sensitive to noise. Please keep the volume down past midnight.

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt: Maia's description of her studio flat is perfectly accurate. It is very cozy, well-located and is really in such a vibrant area of NYC and the last part of Manhattan that hasn't been gentrified - offering a truly unique and authentic experience. The flat is a good sized studio (the pictures make it look smaller than it is) and is well-equipped. Maia was a fantastic host - leaving a bag of wonderful coffee, excellent local recommendations and responding promptly to all of our queries. The flat is great and I recommend it to all. I stayed there with a close friend and it was easy to share the space and it served us well.

Awesome gem in a great neighborhood. Really cute and tidy place - has everything you want, including a small kitchen. Perfect for a couple wanting to be close to the city but in a unique neighborhood. F train is super close. Highly recommended - would stay there again!
Great place

The location was absolutely perfect and very central. Maia and her husband were very gracious and helpful whether that be suggesting a nice restaurant to offering to let me store my luggage in their home past checkout time. Would suggest as a nice place for singles/couples who would like to be in a authentic part of town!
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 68 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is an amazing place! Much bigger than it looks in the photos. Great New York neighborhood. Clean and open and bright. Maia could not have been a more gracious host. Magical little space. I highly recommend.

This apartment is a gem and Maia was a nice host. I stayed for five nights while in NY for work. It was under 30 minutes to get to my office at Union Square. The apartment was comfortable and was perfect for this trip. I would recommend this for anyone who appreciates a quiet space to retreat to at the end of the day.
This was an incredible value for being right in Lower Manhattan! Great for a young married couple looking for a weekend getaway!
Great studio apartment in china town. Clean, with everything you need and Maia was a perfect host. Would definitely recommend. Thanks for having us! Kat and James

Maia's studio is so cute and cozy.  The apartment is very well designed and even though it is small it does not feel that way!  Everything was super clean and Maia greeted me on the street to show me around right as I got out of the taxi from the airport!

Maia & Peter’s place was a great stay for four nights in Chinatown. The apartment was really cosy and well decorated. They were both excellent hosts, and responded to any messages quickly. Definitely a great place to stay to see ‘real’ New York City! ✨

It’s in a quieter part of town, great studio in NY. Maia had everything we needed. We didn’t want to be in the middle of it all but still easy to get everywhere and that was great. If you don’t mind stairs this is perfect.
The bed is comfy too and she was very communicative when we needed. Also super accommodating to our arrival, as we did have a flight delay. Highly recommend if your looking for a great value and clean place.

Maia’s place is like the pictures and description: light, friendly, and with a comfortable bed. It is close to subway stations, around the corner from Brooklyn bridge and in the middle of Chinatown. Little Italy and Soho are within walking distance. Chinatown, and the rest of the city, are lively and busy so it was nice to come ‘home’ in Maia’s appartement.
You get what you spend.
Great stay! Maia’s appartement is very well located and well furnished.

Everything in Maia’s apartment is very nice. It’s bigger than on the pictures and the subway is very close (F train).
Maia was very helpful and check in was easy. Would definitely recommend.

This is a great apartment to explore the city from. The neighbourhood is such that you have lots of cheap delicious food all around you and beautiful views of the bridge. The F train is close and the neighbourhood that surrounds the apartment is still an authentic part of New York City, including with all its grit and grime. The tall ceilings of the apartment make it feel very airy and spacious and it stays cool even when its warm out because it is in the back of the building. Its a great space to unwind and rest from all the hubbub outside. Not for parties or the heavy footed as neighbours can be sensitive.

This apartment was an excellent place to stay! We stayed here for 5 nights, 6 days. It was very convenient to trains and multiple neighborhoods/attractions. 
Maia was quick with her responses and went out of her way to do what she could to make us feel welcome. 

Great space for couples to utilize!
Maia was a great host! Would definitely stay here again :)

name: Premium Exclusive house & garden Rua Almada
summary: In the historic center, this XIX century exclusively renovated house keeps the traces of historical Porto. Brightness and design make it an exceptional place. Terrace and garden are a haven of peace in the vibrant city center, at the top of Almada street. It has a sunny and elegant living-room, a modern fully equipped kitchen with a terrace and access to a private garden. In the 2nd floor, two suites provide the comfort for a perfect stay. A premium place for an extraordinary experience!
interaction: The house is managed by Alexandra Oliveira which will organize your welcome. She will provide you with valuable information to make your stay in Porto a memorable trip.
houseRules: Availabe in the house

host.about: I'm a publisher and an author based in Paris. I have set up and managed the French office of Lonely Planet during 10 years. Beside the 6 years I've spent in New York where I worked for the United Nations, among other things, I have travelled all over the world. Especially in Asia. Three years ago, I fell in love with  Porto where I bought my house and renovated it. I love to go there whenever I have a chance. What makes me really happy ? Travelling, cooking, books and films and share time with my friends.

reviews.txt:
Dès notre arrivée, et l'accueil chaleureux d'Alexandra, on se sentait "chez nous". Elle nous a donné des instructions facile à comprendre sur tous les gadgets (wifi, sound dock, television et lecteur de dvd, machine à laver et sèche linge ) suivi par les bons tuyaux pour profiter de la ville en peu de temps, où manger localement (Mundo deli ---top) et comment se rendre à la plage en metro. 
La maison sur deux étages est superbe. Nous avons aimé le mélange de la pierre et des parquets en bois. Tout est neuf.
Elle est équipée avec tout ce que l’on peut vouloir. La cuisine est fantastique. Elle se prolonge par une terrasse où l’on peut prendre le petit déjeuner ou déjeuner. Cette terrasse donne sur un petit jardin plein de plantes et de petits arbres.
Tout est décoré avec goût. C’est sobre et élégant. Tout ce que nous aimons. Des lampes et des meubles design ou vintage dans chaque pièce. Un salon immense, haut de plafond avec des volets intérieurs, donne la sensation de l'espace mais reste intime. 
Nous avons aimé la possibilité de manger ou prendre un verre dans le salon, ou la cuisine, ou le terrasse ou le jardin. 
Confort des chambres et les salles de bains: simplement parfait. Et les draps sont si confortables que je pensais être dans un hôtel 5 étoiles. 
Située en pleine ville la maison reste tranquille et bien placée.

Nous avons passé un moment merveilleux à Porto. On peut voir que cette ville est en pleine ébullition. Et la maison était comme une oasis de paix à quelques minutes du centre-ville. Tout d’abord, la rua do Almada, où elle se trouve, est une rue passionnante. Des boutiques vintage ou design, sont à côté d’autres endroits qui vendent des produits électriques pour artisans comme nous n’en voyons plus à Paris. Nous avons été si bien accueillis par Alexandra qui s’occupe de la maison. Elle parle un français parfait et l’anglais aussi. Elle nous a donné plein de bonnes informations pour profiter de Porto. La maison, elle-même est magnifique. Elle vient juste d’être rénovée. Nous avons adoré la pierre que la propriétaire a sauvegardée sous les fenêtres et autour des portes et les volets typiques à l’intérieur. La décoration est très soignée. Là aussi, un mix d’objets très design, comme la superbe lampe dans la cuisine ou dans le salon et des petits meubles vintage un peu partout, très beaux. La cuisine est un bonheur. On pouvait prendre notre petit déjeuner sur la terrasse qui donne sur un petit jardin adorable où l’on peut descendre par un large escalier. Nous avions un grand choix de vaisselle magnifique. Les chambres sont aussi très confortables. Chacune avait sa salle de bains. Mais le must, c’est les draps. Nous avons eu l’impression de dormir dans un hôtel 5 étoiles. Douillets et soyeux à souhait. J’aimerais avoir les mêmes chez moi ! La bibliothèque du salon contient plein de livres intéressants et une bonne collection de dvd. On s’est senti chez nous, avec un certain luxe en plus ! C’est sûr, nous reviendrons à Porto et dans cette maison qui nous a touchés. Le séjour était trop court, comme toujours…

We loved staying at Zahia's place.  Alexandra welcomed us very warmly and gave us good tips about Porto. The house ist very well furnished and there is nothing at all we were missing. More – we loved the design and everything  including the dishes of villeroy & boch. We felt like at home! 
Everything is new and clean. Also the beds are very comfortable - in addition it's a quiet neighborhood and we slept very well. We were very lucky to find a place like this and can recomend it to everyone. 
We'll be back...

This was the best house we have stayed so far for the Portugal/Spain trip. Zahia house was really very neat, tidy, spacious and tastefully decorated. Her friend was there for the check in. He was such a great help and host. I highly recommend Zahia house if u and your friend are in Porto and would like to do some cooking and enjoying by the backyard with wine.  Also not to mention, u can walk by foot to a lot of places from Zahia house between 15-20mins, and a lot of eateries just 2-3mins walk from her place.

The appartment is very well located, very conveniet, fully equipped.
We have been welcome, and provided with lot of tips (best locations to have lunch, to go shopping or to enjoy pasteries and drinks.  So much that we preferred not use the kitchen so as to enjoy the portuguese food (even the vegetarian!).
We warmly recommend this location.

I would return to Porto just to repeat the experience of my visit to Zahia's home in the old city of Porto!

Every step of the process, from making first contact to sadly having to say goodbye, was a pleasure.  Such beautiful energy and style. Thank you so much Zahia, Alexandra and Diogo for your kindness, care and assistance. Also very much enjoyed meeting some of your lovely friends in the neighbourhood at Mondo Deli. 

A word of warning though when staying at Zahia's home, her beds are so comfortable, they will wrap their silky sheets around you and not want to let you go  : ) zzzz

Could not recommend more highly to visit Porto and Zahia's home.

Obrigado

: ) errol

Exactly as described. Communication was excellent and host was flexible with check in & out with regard to leaving our bags at the house. V clean in general with a very well equipped kitchen. Great location for exploring Porto.

Wir waren zu dritt, zwei Erwachsene und ein Kind. Es gibt zwei Schlafzimmer. Das Haus ist traumhaft! Genau so grosszügig und wunderbar eingerichtet wie auf den Fotos. Es hat uns an nichts gefehlt und Alexandra hat für uns vorab sogar einen Parkplatz um die Ecke reserviert. Wir wurden herzlich mit einer Flasche Wein empfangen. Danke an die Gastgeber!

Zahia and her wonderfully helpful friend Alexandra provided the most fantastic welcome via their friend Diogo. He gave us all the best restaurant tips and was so helpful. The house itself was absolutely gorgeous, and in a fabulous area, close to the city. The garden also was a lovely place to relax in. Would wholeheartedly recommend staying in this memorably beautiful home!

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Alexandra, qui nous a donné d'excellents conseils en matière de lieux à visiter et de restaurants sympathiques. Elle a été toujours facile à contacter durant notre séjour. Cette maison de ville est agréable et très bien située dans le quartier historique de Porto. La maison était très propre à notre arrivée. Sa situation permet de visiter  la ville à pieds ou en transport en commun facilement. Porto est une belle cité qui monte et descend en permanence.   Très bon séjour, nous recommandons cette jolie maison à qui veut visiter Porto.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis. Nous avons eu de très bon conseils (restaurants, lieux de visite, etc.) pour agrémenter notre séjour.

Le logement est très bien placé dans un quartier encore peu touristique. Quelques restaurants et bars branchés se sont installés dans le quartier. Ce n’est pas forcément la peine d’aller loin pour sortir le soir.

Le logement est très bien équipé et tout est neuf. La literie est très bonne.

This is a roomy, light, and well-equipped apartment. There is a lovely private garden area and a balcony over-looking the garden. Everything was as described, including very comfortable beds.

The neighborhood is within walking distance of everything in the historic area of the city and is also a few blocks walk from the Metro. There are several grocery stores and cafes, bakeries and restaurants close by.

Our host, Zahia, and her assistant, Alexandra, were gracious and helpful. Alexandra made certain that we had a taxi waiting for us at our 4 AM departure. 

Great apartment, great city, and great hosts.

The stay at Zahia's place was just perfect. The house is charming .. the neighbourhood was what we where looking for .. quiet, far from the crowds still very much in the old city, with lovely restaurants and coffee places nearby ... we loved it !!!

Wir haben tolle Tage in Porto verbracht. Das Haus von Zahia ist wunderschön renoviert, perfekt ausgestattet und liegt sehr zentral in der Altstadt. Da es teilweise schon kühl war, waren wir auch froh um die Heizung. Das Haus hat alles was man braucht. Alles im Zentrum war gut zu Fuss zu erreichen und für Orte weiter weg, wie der Strand etc, ist die Busstation nicht weit weg. In der Nähe sind Supermarkt, Restaurants, Bars und Cafes und viele kleine Geschäfte. 
Alejandra hat uns herzlich empfangen und uns sehr gute Tipps und Empfehlungen gegeben. Herzlichen Dank für Alles!

Zahia's house is warm, quiet and confortable. The decoration and furnitures will make every one feeling home. The terrace and the whole house is perfect to chill after the walks through the up and down city of Porto.

The house is perfect with a spacious, beautiful interior and a magical small garden. The location is ideal with everything in walking distance including good food shopping and restaurants but the block is just far enough from the center to feel calm.

Accueil sympathique, localisation sympathique.
Appartement extraordinaire, beau, grand, propre, de bon goût.
Merci Zahia et Alexandra!

La casa è ancora più bella di come sembra nelle foto, è molto spaziosa, luminosa e silenziosa e soprattutto è originale e con grande personalità. La zona e  vicina al centro ma tranquilla. Le collaboratrici di Zahia attente e sollecite. Ottima esperienza, se torneremo a Porto torneremo qui!

An old house in the centre of Porto that was converted one year ago. Beautifully converted with good sized accommodation on two floors - a large kitchen, and separate lounge on the first floor, and two good sized en suite bedrooms on the second floor. Very clean and perfect high quality accommodation for visiting Porto. We had a great time and we would recommend highly this property.

La anfitriona fue muy amable, nos recomendó varios lugares para salir y comer, y fueron todo un acierto. 
La casa está muy bien ubicada, cerca del centro histórico (menos de 5 minutos andando) de forma que te permite recorrer toda la ciudad sin necesidad de utilizar el transporte público.  Además, la casa tiene encanto.

name: Harbourside Apartment - Water Views
summary: This one bedroom apartment is bright and airy with unique views of the Sydney Harbour Bridge, Sydney Harbour and surrounding North Sydney and Kirribilli. One Queen Bed + Sofa Bed, wifi, balcony, undercover parking, 5 minutes to Ferry wharf, 7 minutes to Milsons Point train station, 2 minutes to bus.
interaction: Basic provisions, welcome manual and dining suggestions provided. If you have any problems during your stay I'm usually easily contactable by phone or email, and there is also a Building Manager who can help in emergencies. My husband and I used to live in the apartment but now live around the corner so we’re very nearby if there’s anything you need.
houseRules: Just common sense really - please leave the apartment as you found it, and not do anything that is likely to disturb the neighbours (no parties)!  The building is strictly no smoking, and unfortunately no pets are allowed due to Strata rules. There will be instructions in the apartment about where to dispose of rubbish and any other details like this you might need. Children are welcome though the apartment is not child proof, and there is a balcony (one level above ground). Please be careful on arrival and on returning to the apartment that you get the right building - the next one along is almost identical!

host.location: North Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
host.about: I'm a born and bred Sydneysider, working as a Cellist and teacher full time. After living in the apartment myself for many years, I now live around the corner with my husband and daughter. I love living in Sydney and travelling, trying new places to eat and enjoying all the great things to do in our beautiful local area.

reviews.txt: Compact, well-appointed and equipped flat in top location, near public transport and shops. Eleanor is a very responsive and helpful host too.

Lovely compact apartment in a convenient location. Close to nice restaurants in Kirribilli and Milson's point train station. Also a two minute walk from the ferry. Everything we needed was in the apartment and Eleanor quickly sorted out any minor problems we had.

Why would you stay in a hotel when you could stay in this compact but all-you-need apartment in a perfect location just on the north side of the bridge in Sydney?  There are great eateries near by (our favourite - takeaway gourmet burgers overlooking the Opera House and harbour), and train and ferry only a few minutes away. Eleanor was very flexible and everything went very smoothly, and her provision of breakfast food and staples was very helpful.
Recommended.

I booked this for family staying in Sydney for my wedding.  My family members staying here thoroughly enjoyed their stay.  The apartment was comfortable and clean and within a great area for being central whilst also away from the hussle and bustle of the city!!  Eleanor communicated well and helped out with all our queries before and during the booking.  Thank you!

My wife and I stayed at Eleanor's apartment for a week - we were met by Eleanor's mum who showed us around and provided us with a welcome pack of food.  The apartment is perfectly located with bus & ferry 2 minutes walk and trains only 5 minutes away. Kirribilli village is great for local shopping and eating out. The communal laundry one floor down was very convenient. The view of the bridge from the balcony is a bonus. We would definitely recommend Eleanor's apartment to other visitors.

Fabulous location. close to ferry, train and every great eatery that North Sydney has to offer. Fabulous apartment. very quiet retreat with the hustle and bustle only a short ferry ride away or 15 mins walk over the Sydney Harbour Bridge and you're in The Rocks.

We had a wonderful time at Eleanor's harbourside apartment. You really do have a view of beautiful Sydney harbour and the Bridge from her balcony; a lovely spot to sit outside, have a glass of wine and relax. The location couldn't be better - a 2 minute walk to the ferry and within walking distance of the Ensemble theatre, Flying Squadron bar, the cafes of Kiribilli and we even walked past Luna Park round to the restaurants of Lavender Bay. The apartment is cosy and had everything we needed for our stay. Car parking was a bonus for this area.

Everything about this stay was perfect! While I did not meet Eleanor in person, she was very helpful prior to arrival and communicated in a timely manner. The home was great, it's an awesome location, and was well maintained. No surprises here--just a truly wonderful stay. I spent 30 days at Eleanor's home and would stay there again if I came back to Sydney for a long work assignment.

Eleanor's apartment is very well situated with great access to the city by train, bus, ferry or even by walking across the bridge. The apartment was bright and comfortable with a nice view. Eleanor is a conscientious and friendly host.

A beautiful, well presented place in a lovely location. Eleanor is a very welcoming host with a great appreciation of the area and provided plenty of suggestions for what to do/where to go. highly recommend.

Eleanor's place is lovely and both Eleanor and her mother were great to deal with and went out of their way to make me feel welcome and help me out. The flat is really great - it has everything you need, including an amazing view of the harbour bridge, and the obligatory Sydney fireworks!!

Eleanor's place was very clean, comfortable and in a great location, the apartment was well equipped with everything you would need for a stay, including a well stocked fridge, comfortable bed and lounge, and a beautiful little balcony with amazing city views! The fans in the bedroom and lounge were very effective and quiet, and the location was so convenient. It was magical taking the ferry from the city to the apartment on my last night. I would definitely recommend Eleanor's home to other travellers.
Great location, very easy to navigate and perfect for a couple. Thanks for a great stay.

Eleanor was kind to let us check in early.
House manual was comprehensive. Little disappointed with little fridge space for 6 nights stay.  Small area to prepare meals. About shower leakage was told on the day. Mould around screen from wet floor was unhygienic.
Eleanor was great!  Great neighborhood!
The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Eleanor's apartment was very cosy and just a stone throw away from the ferries which allowed us to access the main tourist spots like the Opera House and Harbour Bridge easily. We were welcomed by Eleanor's mom who showed us how to access the property with ease. The apartment was perfect for couples and provided a homely feeling.

We had 3 nights at Eleanor's place and it was perfect. Location, communication, very warm welcome with a fabulous breakfast hamper.  The views from the windows and front balcony are stunning and the locality offers really handy restaurants, cafes, convenience stores. A 10/10 apartment/location.  Thanks so much Eleanor.

Fantastic location! Very easy access to both ferry and train. Shops 5min walk away.  Clean and tidy place,  perfect for a couple or single.  The breakfast basket was much appreciated! Thanks again for having us stay.
Great place. Quiet location. Generous breakfast and great place.

name: VERY LARGE 5 Bedroom Home, free onsite parking
summary: This property has 5 bedrooms catering for 10 people in comfort.  You can travel from the ferry wharf to the city or Darling Harbour in two stops.   Onsite parking can be purchased at an additional cost.
interaction: Please contact the Host via the Airbnb messaging system (as Airbnb require all Hosts to liaise with guests via this method).
houseRules: - Guests 25 years old or older can book this property. - Any noise complaints received from neighbours during your booking will result in the forfeiture of the entire bond and may result in the immediate termination of the booking. - No consumables are supplied for this booking.   - Guests are to ensure dirty dishes are all cleaned and put away in the cupboards (and dishwasher empty) prior to the end of the booking.  - All rubbish is to be removed from the interior of the property at the end of the booking and put into the council bins available onsite in the carport.   - Council rubbish bins must be taken out to the pavement on Sunday evenings each week as the council collect the rubbish early Monday mornings.   - No smoking  - No left luggage facility available - There is a key replacement fee of $50 per key for lost keys (or keys accidentally taken home at the end of the booking). - Personal items left behind at the end of the booking can picked up from the property at a time suitab

host.about: Hi,  we look forward to welcoming you to our beautiful home. Book today !

reviews.txt: Very happy with the house, beautifully decorated and very spacious. Only issue was there was no wifi.
Great location. Really close to city. Tidy and clean and absolutely artistic. Vanessa replied all questions on time and really helpful.
Vanessa very helpful, a great spot!

A botiuge place to stay, a little sparse in furnishings and would be a little cold in winter, lots of concrete. 
In general a nice place to stay and very convenient to restaurants and the city of Sydney. A short walk to the bottom of the hill and you are at the waterfront looking at the Opera House, Harbour Bridge and Luna Park.

Vanessa was extremely prompt in returning all emails.  The location was brilliant and close to many great places to eat, catch a ferry and public transport.  The kitchen was great with all you needed to make a great meal and serve.  I would definitely stay here again.

We loved the house! We came as 6 colleagues on a conference and had a great time. There was so much space and lots of places to sit, chill or catch up on work. The house was the most unique , modern and trendy place I have ever been to - like a 5* hotel. I might be wary if I had kids though as there its a lot of artwork that I would hate to damage.

The house was quirky with lots of lovely artwork, as well as being very large easily accommodating 6 adults. The house was fully equipped with anything you can imagine - and if there is anything you need, it is central to both North Sydney train station and Mcmahons Point ferry terminal.  Lots of local restaurants, pubs, shops (IGA, Aldi and Coles as well as the fantastic Mcmahons Grocers).  Vanessa was very quick with responses and accommodating us after some previous accommodation with another host ended up being double booked.  Her information and instructions were well written and documented.  The house was very quiet and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay and didn't want to leave.

True to the pictures. The space was huge and more than enough for our family of seven. We loved that we could dine together when we liked in the roomy dining area. It was also a short walk down to a lovely Thai restaurant (Chet Thai), a little playground for kids, a small grocery store, and if you have time, walk down to the ferry point and you will be struck awe by the view of the harbour.
It is a nice place, our family enjoy the stay very much. The host is very helpful when we have some questions.
Great apartment and Vanessa was so nice. We loved staying here and we give it the best score that is possible.

房间非常漂亮,位置虽然不是CBD但是交通也算方便｡
房间对于8人来说非常宽裕｡
但是房东的各项要求非常严格,退房时间也非常早,而且在最后一天(当天是中国农历新年第一天)离开时无法寄存行李,导致我们一行人无奈只能拖着行李箱在市内玩了一天,非常疲惫｡

Over all a good place to stay. Two rooms with their own shower /toilett was perfect, the third one needs some finishing... 
Wifi exist but slow.
Big house near Sydney center around 10 mins driving. Tidy, clean and wide space could accommodate almost 10 people. Most of restaurant, bar and groceries nearby.

We were a party of 8 and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Vanessa's place. 

There is more than ample room and you never feel you're in front of someone else's face. 

The location of the house is in a beautiful neighbourhood - under 10 mins walk to the North Sydney train station and another 10 mins walk to this fabulous look out point down Blues Point Road.

Recommended.

This place is perfect for few families and those with children! Plenty of space and not to mention many interest art pieces. Very Walkable to Luna Park, harbour bridge plus North Sydney train station and Greenwood plaza for all your grocery needs. Highly recommend for short or even long stay. :) do bring a clothes rack along if you have plenty of washing to do. Thank you Venessa!!!
Great location near parks, shops, ferries, buses and trains.  Extremely spacious and well appointed place with beautiful artwork. Quiet and peaceful for large family groups travelling together.

Great place to stay... everything was perfect. We had 5 people go over for a conference and it had plenty of space for everyone to have their own room and sitting areas. Vanessa was great to deal with too. Thanks for having us!

The house is absolutely beautiful and stylish! The location is great and close to public transport, cafe and restaurant. Every detail in the house is carefully designed. It represents a very good taste of the host. It is not only a house but a great piece of art. It is definitely enjoyable and lovely staying there. The host is warm-hearted and has very fast response. I would definitely recommend this place to stay in Sydney.
Recommended for family stay and great location for sydney visit

The place is very large, with very big common areas that could accommodate everyone twice over. The location is great with transport connections from the airport bring very simple with short walk and train ride. The surrounding cafes and parks. Given the look in photos I was concerned that my 1 and 3 year old might reek havoc this was not the case. The little outdoor areas and the nearby playground were great for them. Supermarket  cafes, pubs are 5mins walk away. Vanessa was helpful and quick to respond.

name: Shiny BALCONY:)) room CENTRAL ISTANBUL ŞİŞLİ
summary: from a Londoner...Not in dark streets. BALCONY:)) New room with king size bed for two in a large flat in the central of Istanbul-ŞİŞLİ that so close Beyoğlu,Taksim(2km),Galata, Sultanahmet Grand Bazaar by Subway or Bus.Cevahir, Trump Shopping Malls are just 5min.Buses that cover whole lstanbul,are stopping in front of the home.Kitchen, bathroom and the living-room are open for our guests.There are Restaurants,Burger King,coffee shop, Supermarkets next to home which is infront of Şişli Nuroltower
interaction: I am a guy from İstanbul who lived in London to study the law. When it comes to London ! yeah It has been missed awfully :)) It would be my pleasure to give you advices to visit during your stay in Istanbul. Pls pay attention to this I already lived in many houses in London facing some hard challenges. That's why I am sure what a home or room should be:)) so You have my word about any informations' accuracy. from now on You are very very welcome...

host.about: Londoner I m:)) a lawyer in Istanbul and have been to London and stayed in many places all around the world. That's why I know what kinda feeling being a guest in someone's home. so Let's do it so easy and make it comfortable like your own :))

reviews.txt: Erdinc is an awesome person and he helped us a lot!!! Although he is not stay at home a lot but he tried to help us every time and he provided everything we need. Also the house is in a good location you can go to lots of malls for shopping. Lots of restaurants, transportations and supermarkets around so it's convenient.
Erdinç bey'in evinde bir gece konakladım. Ulaşım kolay, balkonlu oda, fotoğraflarda gördüğünüz gibi. Kesinlikle tavsiye edilir bir ev sahibi.

Erdinc is a wonderfully friendly and incredibly helpful. The room was basic but clean and the bed was comfortable. The balcony lets you look out onto Istanbul life. It is near a big road which makes it a little bit noisy, but the insulation is good, so when everything is closed you barely hear a thing. 

You can walk to Taskin square in a little over 30 minutes or you can just take the Metro which is very close and will drop you off wherever you need to go. 

In other words, great location and great value for money

name: Renovated 2 Bedroom/2 Bathroom Apartment P0305
summary: All of our apartments include free wireless internet, air conditioning/heating, satellite TV, a phone with free US/Canada calls, one outdoor parking space, and weekly cleaning services. Extra rollaway bed available!
interaction: We are always available to answer any questions and to help guests throughout their stay.

host.about: Je vous propose une location de vacances au Sunset Suites, le choix parfait pour le temps libre des voyageurs qui veulent le confort d’un atmosphère a la maison loin de chez eux avec les services d’un hôtel. Mes appartements totalement équipés sont situés, dans la Ville de Mont-Royal, un secteur dans le centre de Montréal. Proche du centre commercial Rockland et a quelques minutes en voiture de l’aéroport et du centre-ville de Montréal. Sunset Suites satisfait principalement les voyageurs de longue durée (7 jours ou plus), mais je fais de mon mieux pour héberger les voyageurs recherchant un séjour de 3 jours minimum.

reviews.txt:
I would strongly recommend Maya's suite to any one whether you are by yourself, with friends, or family. It is very clean , supplies in abundance, WIFI is strong. The only thing I would suggest to Maya is to try to get in touch with client upon request. I did try even emailed her but vainly.


I had a great time. I felt like home.
Maya was very welcoming from the beginning of our stay to check out. She was very willing to help us and even called us an uber for our travels. She was very kind and made our stay very pleasurable.

name: Designer's Historical Apartment
summary: This tastefully functional Istanbul apartment with a great soul is in the heart of the city. Offers lot's  of sunlight during the day and quiet sleeps at night. Enjoy the historical neighborhood with antique stores, galleries, and coffee shops.
interaction: An interaction before arrival to arrange the guest's access to the apartment, during the stay to be sure if everything is OK, and before the departure.
houseRules: - No smoking allowed in the bedroom. - Please keep the main entrance of the building locked after 10pm and be sure that the door is closed at all times.

host.about: Born and raised in Europe, educated in California. I am an artist and international school teacher, currently work/live in SE Asia. I practice yoga, surf, and lead a conscious and healthy lifestyle.

reviews.txt:
Staying at Pia's was very nice. Pia was most helpful and hospitable. She gave us detailed instructions upfront, met us at Taksim and explained a lot about the neighborhoud. Her apartment is newly and nicely refurbished, with all appliances you might need. The bedrom is quiet with sun and sound of birds in the morning. The apartment is well situated between the lively Istiklal and a net of peaceful small streets with shops, restaurants and galleries. We enjoyed walking around, all the way down to the Bosphorus. We are grateful for experiencing Istanbul. 

Branimir and Marina

Pia was a great host, took time to describe the neighborhood to us, and helped us settle in. The place is clean, and in a great location tucked away from the crowds. Lots of great places to eat nearby, and quiet at night.

Just an amazing apartment! So clean, luminous and comfortably spacious. I spent wonderful 2 days in this calm, cozy and modern decorated apartment in a historical building. Besides being SO much cheaper than a hotel, there is a very comfortable bed and artistically designed sitting room.  Clean furniture, towels and bed linens. It is also possible to prepare something to eat as there is a kitchen. 
 
Just 5 minutes by waking to Taksim Square and Istiklal. But still in a very special historic quiet street full of vintage, art and antique shop. Nice neighborhood with homemade food restaurants and small authentic cafeterias. There are also bakeries that you can find freshly-baked bread and other Turkish specialties. Metro and tramway is in walking distance. I just felt like an inhabitant of the quarter.
Owner is so kind and friendly!

The flat had a calm, relaxing feel. I enjoyed hanging out there when I wasn't being a tourist. It is stylish and well designed. The furniture, which I liked, is made by the owner. 
It has a good location too. Cihangir is a cool neighbourhood in its own right but also centrally located. The flat is near cafes for the morning, as well as interesting restaurants and good bars for the evening.
The shops in the area are very individual too.
The flat is just a walk and short tram ride from the main tourist sites such as Topkapi Palace and Haghia.
I had a great time and can really recommend staying here.
Richard

I found this Apartment through a friend where I work at the University of California , and was thoroughly disarmed   by the quality accommodations that I found upon-my  arrival.
Pia was the consummate host and went out of her way to ease my arrival into Istanbul which was for my first time ever In Turkey.She even met me at my air bus  in Taksim square and personally walked me to her place which is only a few blocks away.This beautiful flat in a storybook location, is situated on a street that one would swear is from the the back lot set of Goldwyn Studios in Hollywood. The neighborhood is truly in the fashion of a Bohemian San Francisco with steep winding streets and many excellent restaurants, flea markets,and designer shops all near by.
The best surprise of all was the the fantastic roof patio where one can sit and see the beautiful views of the Golden Horn and the Blue Mosque in the distance.
The rooms are airy and light with tall ceilings, and her personally designed cabinets and interior ,had such a simple elegant feel.
The separate bedroom is extremely cool in the summer and relaxing ,which has a view to the back over a tree covered 400 year old Hamam .The combined call to prayer and  the sound of many birds is positively magic. 
I highly recommend this Flat
Michael Schmitt 
Santa Barbara California

Truly, it was very hard to leave this beautiful apartment in the most wonderful area of the most wonderful city. Pia was an excellent host, staying up until the wee hours to greet us after we arrived on a very late flight and got stuck in traffic for hours. She provided lots of useful advice on what to do, where to eat and what to see; and not just for Istanbul, Pia was very obliging in offering us tips for one of our future destinations (India). The apartment itself is serene, peaceful, spotlessly clean and beautifully furnished making it hard to resist the temptation to simply stay in and relax! We wouldn't hesitate for a moment on recommending Pia's apartment. Thank you Pia for a wonderful stay, Michael & Kieran.

Pia's home is very comfortable and she is a great hostess. It is very conveniently located. 

The house was very clean and very relaxing. I would definitely recommend it and would stay there again.
Pia was a very kind host, her appartment is beautiful. She even took my to Yoga classes and we had dinner together. Thanks Pia!

We spent five days and nights in Istanbul and were happy to stay at Pias appartment. We very much enjoyed our stay. The appartment is perfectly located in Beyoglu where you have many shops, restaurants and bars. The neighbourhood is very lively and sometimes loud at night but the appartment is in a quiet street which is perfect. Unfortunatelly for some reason there was no possibility to use the roof terrasse that is shown on the pictures as I was told by Pias friend who showed me the appartment when arriving. So if you attach importance to a terrasse, better check this out.

Location is simply great: few steps away from nice evening-out places, the main shopping street, about 10min to get to the tram, etc. At the same time the flat and the bedroom was quiet and had everything we needed. 

Pia is very nice person and very good host.

First of all, Pia was a very kind host, she waited for us while we arrived with a very late flight, checked if everything was ok during the stay, kept our luggages in the appartment the day we left & called us a cab to return to the airport.
The appartment is perfectly located, in modern Istanbul, 2mn from Istikal street, but at the same time is very quiet. There is no noise at night, while there are plenty of nice coffees and restaurant very close. There is also a tram station to get to old Istanbul (Sulthnamet) walking distance,15mn walk down the hill. 
The appartment itself is very nicely decorated, very clean and confortable. Only you should know, if you do not come in the summer, that there is no central heating, only one portative heater that you can move one room to another. In March, we were quite cold. So we would recommand with no hesitation the place, but preferably with summer weather.

Pia's place was fantastic. Located minutes from the bustling IIstiklal Street and Taksim Square, the apartment is clean and cozy.

Shops selling great food are nearby. And if you need the metro, it's also walking distance.

Pia was very helpful and even though I arrived late at night, she waited for me and spoke to the taxi driver to give him instructions.

And Pia even made the effort to take us around despite her busy schedule. What a host!

This is an ideal place if you want peace and quiet, and yet want to be at a central location.

Amazing apartment in the best area! We had a lovely time in Pia's apartment and we couldn't have wished for a better location. It is in the middle of all the cool shops and new trendy local restaurants. She was a lovely host and we can definitely recommend this place.

Pia was a very affectionate and helpful host. The appartement was exactly as described: Very clean, great style, quiet and situated at the best location you could wish in Istanbul. There are various nice cafés, bars and restaurants nearby and the narrow streets are very peaceful and picturesque. We are thankful for the great recommendations Pia gave us to make our holidays in Istanbul special and unforgettable. We would definitely recommend staying at her appartement!
The reservation was canceled 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great experience! Very beautiful area, beautiful place!
The host canceled this reservation 107 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Private Room with perfect location in Bostanci
summary: The house is the perfect choice for travelers who wants to discover and experience local side of Istanbul. . It's located at the heart of the Asian Side ''Bostanci'' where you can find all the transport possibilities for traveling all the sites.  The location of the apartment is very quiet, silence and safe. The flat is fully equipped for your comfort.
interaction: I can show around the city historical places, If I am available. During your stay, you can contact with me anytime you want by mobile phone.

host.about:
Hello,

I am an easy going person. I love to travel, learning different cultures, meeting with new people from all around the world. I have travelled around 40 countries. I would like to travel more.

I love to enjoy having quality time with people. I love to explore new experiences. I like going out with friends, tasting different food, participate concerts. 

I am a finance professional. I work for a multinational retail company.

reviews.txt: I had to sleep on a couch instead of private room which I booked before and paid for it. Because there were another couple who have booked room before and wanted to extend their accommodation after booking room from Airbnb. So also he was renting house to people after meeting with them on Airbnb and not keeping his promises. Entering house was horrible because he gaved room another people there were no enough keys, I had to wait for them on the door for long time and it happened couple times. Bathroom was not clean and in the shared living room which I had to sleep was noisy and dirty smelled. I am sorry that I couldn't be able to write a command about room that I've booked..

Engin's place is located in very nice neighborhood, near to all amenities, personnaly! it was a big pleasure to meet Engin, he made us to feel such as we are in our home, he's helpful, and a cultivated person! I hope I could get another trip to his beautiful city. Thank you Engin.

Engin fue muy amable y flexible con nosotros. Tuvimos una buena charla sobre la vida. Su casa es muy grande y cuenta con todo lo necesario para hospedarse.
Muy recomendado

Anadolu yakasında işiniz var ise yer anlamında ve fiyat/kalite anlamında tercih edilesi bir konaklama. Bina eski fakat evin içinde bir dökülme söz konusu değil. Banyo/tuvalet, mutfak ve yatak odası hem temizlik açısından hem de malzemeler (tuvalet kağıdı, sabun, duş, kahve, bardak, su, temiz çarşaf, havlu ve battaniye vs.) anlamında yeterliydi.

name: Downtown Montreal Fully furnished apartment WIFI
summary: - Fully furnished apartment in the heart of downtown Montreal - WIFI (high speed internet), stove, refrigerator, air conditioning , heating, hot water and necessary furniture are included - Near Concordia University, Mcgill University, Université de Montréal, Lassale College, HEC, UQAM, Metro Guy Concordia, hospitals & restaurant  - Indoor parking available on demand
interaction: I usually am on the premises to welcome you. If not, somebody from our team will give you a warm welcome and show you all the amenities of your apartment. We will answer any questions you may have about the neighbourhood as well

reviews.txt: I stayed here for 3.5 months and had a great experience! It had all the necessities and was very comfortable. Great location!

Muito bem localizado, ônibus 165 na porta do edifício, 5 min a pé do metrô Guy Concordia (linha verde), apartamento bem limpo e organizado, cozinha pequena, mas, equipada. Aquecimento muito bom e internet rápida. Um pequeno defeito é que não tem TV.
Samuel responde aos e-mails muito rápido, podendo auxiliar no que for necessário!
Recomendo.

I stayed in downtown apartment for more than a month and It was nice. Apartment is really huge and gets sunny. Best part is its away from street so no dust and traffic noise. Things which bothered me was smoke smell, noisy neighbors at times.

Very good apartment! Studio very well located, close to metro and Sant Catherine avenue! Samuel always answered my messages and always helped quickly! I recommend this apartment as it is very close to everything and very well equipped
Friendly host. Good location, however it could be cleaner.
Logement en plein centre-ville. Tout équipé et spacieux. Samuel répond vraiment très très vite, séjour très apprécié! Merci
Great responsiveness and perfect for a long stay!
This place is in a great location , very close to the main downtown offices, about 1 km walk to Bell centre etc..
Logement très bien situé.

name: Charming apartment in Plateau Mont Royal
summary: The apartment is in the heart of the Plateau-Mont-Royal, at the border of the Mile-End. All the cafes, restaurants, and boutiques you'd hope for are nearby. The place is also at a 2 min. walk from the Laurier Metro Station, which will take you downtown in minutes. The Parc Laurier is 10 min. away. The place is comfortable, homy, and welcoming, ideally located in a central neighbourhood. Good for couples, small groups, solo adventurers. Families (with kids) are also welcome!
interaction: You have the whole place to yourself, but I will be nearby. Don't hesitate to contact me if you need anything, regarding the appartient or cool spots to explore in the city!

host.about: I’m a bilingual (French/English) Montrealer passionate about social justice, anthropology, playing the piano, and meeting cool people from near and far.

reviews.txt: Really great place ! Super close to the metro station and many restaurants. Host was amazing with communication and check in was smooth.

On a passé une merveilleuse experience dans l’appart d’emilie. Endroit magnifique avec beaucoup d’espace et un balcon ensoleillé et tranquille. Emilie est très arrangeante. Merci! On reviendra avec plaisir!
Super apart bien placé
Emillie was very kind and hospitable, great stay!
Appartement tranquille, bien situé c'était parfait !
I highly recommend Emilie's place. Its super convenient and 10 min drive to downtown. If you are lucky you can find a parking spot right by her apartment. Its clean and comfy.

Our stay was great! 
Emilie's apartment is the true Montreal experience (I used to live there). The classic walk-up, the original details: hardwood floors and crown mouldings, the quaint balcony to sit and enjoy your morning coffee. Her place is incredibly close to the metro station and the location is incredible, it has all you need for shopping, eating, drinking, sight-seeing, you name it. Emilie was a great host, and it was very easy and quick to communicate. Our check-in was a breeze :)
Clean and cute space in a beautiful location
Le logement est idéalement placé pour visiter Montréal.

Really homey, classic Montreal vibes. Balcony was very enjoyable. The door was a bit of a hassle as well as there was no toilet paper however for the cost it was well worth it! Great location too close enough to pretty much everything but residential enough to find some calm in the city!
Great place, in a great location. Emilie was quick to respond to any questions.
Rapport Qualité prix parfait, appartement bien situé (metro et épicerie à 3-4 min) propre et charment.

name: Artsy 3BR in Plateau by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the modern architectural details, beautifully exposed brick walls, and stunning fully-equipped kitchen. Located in Le Plateau, known for its assortment of delicious restaurants and relaxed cafes.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
houseRules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

host.about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

reviews.txt: Overall a good experience. This unit is in a great location and the perfect home base for me and my friends during our stay. We were a bit surprised by the level of noise and on the streets at nice (the windows are not very thick)

This place was an amazing find! We were in awe from the moment we walked into the apartment! Location was fantastic, all the amenities and the service we received from flatbook throughout our stay was top notch! 

We were aware that there was no AC but when we arrived we were so happy to see a small unit set up for us! It was a pleasant surprise and they had many fans for us to use as well. 

All the guests had a wonderful experience, 5 stars!!
Great place, best bang for your buck anywhere near this neighbourhood for sure.
The place was beautiful and clean
Looks nice on surface but over busy street w/minimum in amenities, and comfort

Appartement spacieux et  joliment décoré situé dans un quartier cosmopolite et animé, bars et restos sympas à proximité immédiate. 
Bon à savoir: Beaucoup d'animation dans la rue tard le soir les vendredi et Samedi soirs
The condo was beautiful and very comfortable. The location was perfect walking distance to little restaurants, shops and bars. Overall the stay was great and I had a wonderful time in Montreal.
Very nice stay!
Great place.   Super spacious and well equipped. In a great neighborhood.

We had a great stay in the Sonder flat. It was perfectly located for us in the center of nightlife, great food and bars. As a large group of 6 the flat was a nice size and we slept very well at night. The only drawbacks for us was the lack of kitchen staples (most rental homes include ample sugar, salt, olive oil bottles, etc) and some issues with electricity (the only way to turn on bedroom lights was via turning on the living room light as well and there was lacking useable sockets in the bedrooms). Otherwise, we had a great time and would definitely return with larger groups again.
Awesome area for going out with a lot of cool small restaurants

Great location, coffee across the street and pretty much anything else you need was walking distance. Furniture and floors were cheap, some parts of the floor were broken. The apartment overall was quite sterile and dark.  Not super cozy but served its purpose as a place to sleep and shower.

An amazing place to stay in Montreal! It was a clean, and stylish apartment that offered some great amenities.  However, the best part of the whole apartment is its location. We were close to so many great restaurants, and activities. This apartment is an easy recommendation.
Amazing location, and great value for a spot in montreal

The apartment is big, well located, near good restaurants in Le Plateau. Some parts of the floor were broken and the floor of the kitchen and bathroom were sticking. We asked for an extra cleaning and the concierge in a few minutes answered our message, but unfortunately, even with an extra cleaning the floor was sticking yet. The best part of the apartment is the location.
AMAZING LOCATION. Clean and stylish space. Super fun - best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at.

Great location, comfortable amenities, but what you don’t see (or hear) in the add are: music from the downstairs retail store, noise from the upstairs renters, one bedroom with no windows, outlets, or ventilation, a TV with no cable or antenna access, and street noise. It’s a great rental if you plan to be out and about in Montreal.

This is a great place to rent in the heart of the night life. My friends and I really enjoyed the location and the space was beautiful. It looks even bigger in person than the photos! Thanks for the stay! Would totally stay here again

name: Charming Apartment,perfect Location
summary: Charmoso quarto e sala, privativo, finamente decorado, com uma deliciosa cozinha americana totalmente equipada. Aqui você encontrará tudo para tornar sua estadia mais agradável e divertida.
interaction: I like to do some programs with my guests. It depends on my time and if you are open for this.
houseRules: 1.O apartamento situa-se em edifício residencial. Não é permitido fazer barulho no apartamento que possa incomodar os vizinhos. (Lei do Silêncio (22:00 Hs)  2.Crianças acima de 5 anos, contam como uma pessoa. Mais de uma criança menor de 5 anos também contam como uma pessoa. 3. Se você tem um visitante, você é responsável por ele. Não é permitido circulação de pessoas com trajes desapropriados no corredor e na portaria do prédio. Quando houver reclamação de um morador, ou o porteiro ver alguma atitude errada, o síndico do edifício pode aplicar uma advertência ou uma multa. O valor da multa pode variar entre U$ 70,00 e U$ 200,00 , e esse valor será pago por você. Caso haja reincidência, você deverá deixar o apartamento sem qualquer tipo de reembolso. 4.Assim que você chegar ao apartamento, deverá preencher um formulário de registro com suas informações. Este formulário é necessário para registrar o nome das pessoas que estarão no apartamento e permitir o acesso ao prédio. Não é permitid

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Olá,

Estou no Airbnb desde 2011 e sou um grande fã da Plataforma. Tudo que conquistei foi graças ao sucesso no Airbnb!

Minha experiência começou quando recebi um flat da minha avó através de herança (em vida!!), investi pesado na reforma do apartamento para poder oferecer o maior conforto possível aos meus hóspedes. Comecei a administrar seu aluguel e o sucesso foi tão grande que mudou a minha vida!

Meus amigos e familiares viram como o meu “negócio” estava dando certo e começaram a pedir para que eu também administrasse o aluguel dos apartamentos deles (nessa época ainda não existia a figura do co-host). 

Topei o desafio e o número de apartamentos foi se multiplicando! O resultado foi ótimo e percebi que me sentia muito realizado com as experiências que estava ganhando como empreendedor e ao conhecer pessoas de tantos lugares do mundo! De tal maneira que decidi largar meu emprego como gestor em marketing para me dedicar exclusivamente a vocês!

Fiz um curso de guia de turismo para ter mais conhecimento sobre a cidade e abri a All in Rio, uma Agência de Turismo que oferece tours culturais, naturais e de aventura, além do aluguel de apartamentos de temporada.

Meu objetivo é oferecer uma estadia segura, confortável e poder fornecer todas as informações necessárias para você desfrutar ao máximo a sua experiência em nossa cidade maravilhosa! 

Obrigado pela atenção!

Fabio

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hi!

I've been on Airbnb since 2011 and I’m a big fan of the Platform. All I got was thanks to my success on Airbnb!

My experience began when I received a flat from my grandmother through inheritance (in life!!). I invested heavily in the renovation of the apartment to be able to offer the greatest comfort possible to my guests. I started managing the rent and the success was so amazing that it changed my life!

My friends and family noticed how well my "business" was going and started to ask me to manage their apartment’s rent too (at the time, the figure of  the co-host didn’t exist).

I accepted the challenge and the number of apartments was multiplying! The result was great and I realized that I felt very fulfilled with the experiences I was gaining as an entrepreneur and by meeting people from so many places in the world! So I decided to leave my job as a marketing manager to dedicate myself exclusively to you!

I took a tour guide course to gain more knowledge about the city and opened the All in Rio, a Tourism Agency that offers cultural, natural and adventure tours, as well as apartments for seasonal rents.

My goal is to offer you a safe and comfortable stay and to be able to provide all the information necessary so you can enjoy your experience in our wonderful city to the fullest!

Thank you for your time!

Fabio
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Comments from my guests:

“This apartment is in the most amazing location. Leblon is beautiful, safe, and packed with fabulous restaurants. The apartment is just by the ocean - couldn't really be better. Communicating with Fabio was super-easy. He was really responsive and helpful. We are missing it already!” - Ed Pilkington (UK)
“Fabio goes far and beyond the average host, my trip was a day earlier than I booked and I would have been stuck with no place to stay but Fabio personally went out of his way to get the place ready for me, great guy and will always go to him first when traveling to Rio. Thank again Fabio abs!!” - Darren Sanford (USA)
“O apartamento é lindo como nas fotos e a localização é perfeita! O Fábio é super atencioso e respondeu super rápido nossas dúvidas. Recomendo muito!” - Bruna Ferrary Deniz (Brasil)
“The apartment was better than we could have imagined. The photos don't do it justice. The place is huge, in a great location. Fabio was a very accommodating host. I would definitely stay there again.” - Jordan Giordano (USA)
“Our stay at Fabio’s place was fantastic! The apartment is simply beautiful and it made us feel at home. Super stylish and cozy.
