We are very particular about the properties we stay at, and this one exceeded our expectations The apartment description was very accurate! We loved being so close to the beach and all the great restaurants around. Thank you very much!”- Pablo Perez (Canadá)
“Fabio was a perfect host.  He answered promptly all our questions and is a really nice guy!”- Daniela (Brasil)
 “Fabio is the perfect host. Friendly and extremely helpful”.- Soren (Denmark)
 “It is really difficult for me to put down in words how grateful I am to Fabio! He is a wonderful host and a GREAT person!”- Justine (Dubai)
“Más que anfitriones, hicimos una linda amistad. Gracias por todo... “- Leo y Aura (Colombia)
“Fabio is a very friendly and considerate person and clearly takes great care of the apartment”.- Jonathan (Spain)
“New to Rio? You should definitely speak to these guys.”- Vitaly (Russia)
 “Fabio is an amazing host with a deep concern for his guests' comfort. We feel that we now have a good friend in Rio!”- Ali (Canada)

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Binho and Deia are great hosts! The apartment ist perfect - clean, cozy and comfortable. Great location, great people - we are definitely coming back!

My boyfriend and I stayed at Binho's place and we couldn't have asked for a better experience. The apartment is small but comfortable. It is clean, modern and up to date. It is close to EVERYTHING. There are bars, bakeries, restaurants and pharmacies at your doorstep. Binho was an incredible host. Upon arriving, he gave us suggestions and tips about things to do throughout our stay. I can't thank them enough for having made our stay unforgettable. Thank you!

Fabio was a good host, he gave us very useful recommendations for our trip. The apartment was exactly as seen in the photos. Very close to the beach and very easy to get to all the tourist sites. At night it was noisy, a lot of load music from the place across the street. We had no internet in the apartment but Fabio was solving the issue. We had a very god time.
O aparatmento realmente é como está nas fotos.

I'd like to recommend dear Fabio to everyone as a special helpful and absolutely fantastic friendly host! Thank you so much for everything! The apartment in Copacabana is really cozy, full of light, extremely convenient and very good located. If I am back to Rio, it could be the only place I stay. Fabio, thank you very much indeed and thanks a lot to your wife!

The apartment was excellent and Fabio was a wonderful host. It was our first time in Rio so Fabio gave us great advice on what to see and do during our stay. Overall great experience.
Thanks

I had the most amazing time in rio (Website hidden by Airbnb) apartments were fantastic,they were exactly the right spot close to everything and just a small walk to the beach were FIFA fan fest was which was great.fabio and his support crew were there in a blink of eye if I needed them and it surely made my stay  that little bit easier.the neighbour hood was great  safe and  vibrant with the World Cup on the Brazilian  people sure know how to put a party on.lots of fun and an experience I will never forget.thankyou Fabio from Ben de Marco .
This apt was great and Fabio was very organised, professional and friendly. The apt itself is in a great location, very tastefully decorated and I would definitely stay here again when back in Rio.
O apartamento é exatamente como na foto. Super limpo e arejado. Possui todos os utensílios necessários.

Let me start by saying that I loved the apartment. The place is cozy and immaculate. Other than the bed being a bit stiff, I loved being in the apartment. The water was hot, the wi-fi worked perfectly. The only negative that I had about the room was the noise. 

The unit is situated on the 2nd floor of the building right outside a busy street. Every night around midnight, two bars would open up across the and start blaring music. The music would not stop until 8am the next morning. I ended up having to buy a white noise machine just to last through the night.

The only other feedback I had was around Fabio, the host. All of the reviews mentioned how responsive and helpful he was. However that was not the case for me. The day I booked, I couldn't get him to respond to the booking. I even had to have AirBnB call him. And then I asked him about touring the city. Instead of offering, he pointed me to a few self serve options. When I asked again, he said he would plan a trip then never responded. When I responded to him, he said he was too busy and my trip was over. 

Fabio being my tour guide is not a huge requirement, but I had thought he would be more willing (or suggest someone), given the feedback people had for him o this site.

All in all, great place if you don't mind the noise and don't need a helpful host.

Fabio a été adorable.
Il nous a merveilleusement bien accueilli.
Il est très serviable et très gentil.

Fabio is a lovely host and helped point out all the best things to see and do in Rio. This apartment was great, I stayed their on my own and felt very safe. Literally 2 minutes for Copacabana beach. Great flat. A little noisy outside but a very vibrant area.

Thank you Fabio once again! This is the second time that I have rented from Fabio and it has been again a great experience. The apartment is immaculate and in a great location! I look forward to renewing my rentals with Fabio. Communication was very easy and Fabio will make sure you are well accommodated!!

Sem dúvida uma das melhores recepções e serviços que já recebemos!!!!! Primeira vez que usamos o AirBnb. Foi sensacional. O Fábio, que nos recebeu e fez toda parte de receptivo, foi sensacional!!!!!! Nota 10. Super maleável com entrada e saída... Nos ajudou em tudo. Impecável. Mais que recomendo!!!!! Apartamento maravilhoso... Exatamente como nas fotos!!!!! Tudo de primeira. Localização perfeita... Perto de tudo!!!!!!!
Todo excelente! El apartamento es igual a las fotos, todo se encontraba en orden y funcionamiento!

Fabio war wirklich ein sehr aufmerksamer Gastgeber, den man schon im Vorfeld mit allen Fragen zur Wohnung behelligen konnte. Auch einen kostengünstigen Taxi Transfer vom Flughafen zur Wohnung hatte er organisiert. Die Wohnung liegt wirklich sehr zentral in einem sicheren Haus, dessen einem top Zustand, und mitten an der Copacabana gelegen. Für eine Erkundungstour von Rio wirklich eine top Lage. die Wohnung entspricht exakt dem was an Fotos und Beschreibung angegeben wurde. Einziger kleiner kritischer Einwand ist, dass gegenüber der Wohnung eine Disco ist, in der zumindest am  Wochenende die ganze Nacht Betrieb ist, was man in der Wohnung doch sehr hört: Alles in allem aber eine top Unterkunft, und uneingeschränkt weiter zu empfehlen!
O apto é super aconchegante, tudo limpo e de bom gosto. O único problema foi o barulho durante a madrugada.

O Fábio é show. Ótima recepção. O apartamento é ótimo. O prédio é antigo, mas o apartamento é novo, bem decorado, cama ótima, dois televisores com tv a cabo, e banheiro muito bom. O apartamento é nota dez! Bem localizado, pra que vai andar e conhecer Copacabana e o Leme, é tudo perto e bem localizado. O único problema é um bar que fica em frente a janela do quarto. Tem dias, não todo dia, principalmente fim de semana,  que tem barulho e música a noite toda. Mas, creio que no futuro, se for possível colocar uma janela acústica ali, o problema fica resolvido. O apartamento que já é ótimo,  ficará excelente.  Obrigado, por tudo Fábio. Foi top. Abraços.

El departamento es divino! Todo nuevo, muy bien ambientado, cómodo y súper equipado. De verdad lo disfrutamos. La ubicación es muy buena, a 1 cuadra de la playa de Copacabana. Estar cerca el día de año nuevo donde hay tanta gente en copacaba fue importante! La atención de Fabio es súper buena, nos ayudo en todo! Muchas gracias

Fabio was a wonderful host. We arrived much earlier than the check in time so Fabio let us leave our luggage at his home and then brought our bags to the apartment for us when it was ready. He was incredibly helpful and gave us lots of great suggestions about what to do during our stay in Rio. If we had any queries during our stay Fabio was easily contactable. The apartment itself was fantastic. It is bright and modern and has everything you need. The location is perfect, very close to the beach, supermarkets, restaurants etc. Would highly recommend!

name: Luxurious, bright, spacious Plaza Catalunya
summary: Magnificent apartment situated in the heart of Barcelona. Located in a prestigious building with concierge next to Rambla de Cataluña, this apartment is the ideal choice to accomodate up to 6 people. The apartment is composed by an entrance hall, living room, dining room and a fully equipped kitchen with all the kitchen utensils. There are 2 dormitories with 2 single beds, a big bedroom with a double bed and two bathrooms.  Tourist licence HUTB - 003179.
interaction: We are available 24 hours to assist our guests.

host.about:
We are owners of several apartments Tendency Group located in the city center of Barcelona and are proud of offering our guests a personalised service together with high quality apartments. 
We are travelers like you and understand and try to meet and exceed your expectations.

reviews.txt:
Lovely and very central apartment in the heart of Barcelona. It's position made exploring the city very easy either on foot or using public transport. Plenty of shopping areas and restaurants around and a lovely organic and vegetarian shop near by. 

The apartment is quite airy but unfortunately the blinds do not work in the rooms so there is no natural light. Even though the apartment is very central all the windows are on internal patios ( the living room windows are enormous and let lots of light) which makes it very quiet.

We had a lovely time and we certainly will use it again when we return to Barcelona.
Great neighbourhood, and very central.

Apartment clean, wide and cozy. Near to Casa Battlò, Placa de Catalunya and many restaurants, it's a perfect place for families. The host was kind and helpful, we didn't have any problem during our stay.

Bel appartement très bien placé et silencieux. 
Par contre pas de parking comme indiqué et pas de demodulateur pour avoir des chaînes françaises
the apartment has very central  location, near to Placa Catalunia. It is bright, beautiful and comfortable, with all the ecquipment one can need. good for 5-6 people. Thanks to Tendency!
Increíble! Súper buena la ubicación y un departamento de lujo!
Very well located and great looking place.

Very good location and flat. Everything was perfectly clean, bright and as described. We had a very nice stay. 
We use the bagages services company that the host advised us during our check in: for €5 they come to get your luggages and bring them later at the airport (because our check out was at 11am). 
I would just recommend to bring your own hairdryer (if you are coming for special occasion as us - we were in BCN for a wedding). 
I really recommend this flat
A lovely apartment in a great location. We would definitely stay there again.

très bel appartement situé à l'arrière de l'immeuble.
immeuble magnifique avec un gardien.
deux chambres sont plus sombres où il y fait plus chaud.
il manque juste un rideau opaque dans la grande chambre.
je recommande cet appartement spacieux.

The apartment is very close to Plaça de Catalunya giving very good access to all public transport. The neighborhood is very nice with cafés, restaurants and bars close-by. I stayed in the apartment for 5 days with 5 friends of mine and the apartment turned out to be very comfortable for 6 people with its 3 rooms and 2 bathrooms.
Excellent option when staying in Barcelona! I loved how close we were to a grocery store, restaurants, and major attractions. The space was comfortable for our family of 6 adults.

Everything is as described. It's central, a lot of supermarkets really close, one of them is 24/365. It's very confortable, amazing beds, amazing shower and well equiped kitchen. It's perfect for a few days to really see Barcelona.

Peaceful location steps from all the action. 

We had a wonderful time in Barcelona staying in the 3 bedroom flat we used though Tendancy. It had tons of space, good beds and was very clean. Being less than one block from Las Rambles, I was worried about noise, but once you enter the building, all the city noises go away. Check in was easy as a representative from our host met us at the door, let us in and showed us around. The location was awesome. Literally steps away were many restaurants, shops and other places to go. There is even a small food market 3 doors down on the same street. The main square was a 5 minute walk. When in Barcelona, I would definitely consider staying here again.
Fantastic location, and the apartment had everything we needed.

Great location to access all parts of the city. Just a little north of Plaza Catalunya so a nice departure from the touristy Las Ramblas area. 

Sitting area is nice and spacious. Master bedroom is quite large but very bright from the floor to ceiling windows.  The other two rooms are a bit on the small size but not too cramped to fit 2 twin beds.

Had a really great time in Barcelona! Would stay at this location again!
Great apartment in the heart of the city. Close to everything and highly recommend.
Fantastic apartment, brilliant position. Can't fault it.
Very spacious apartment in great location.  At corner is Las Ramblas.  Quiet, safe area. Coffee, bakery, market nearby. Modern, well equipped kitchen. Great for families and business travelers.
This apartment was gorgeous and in a perfect location. We had a very delightful stay and enjoyed the nearby restaurants and shopping areas. We highly recommend this listing!

name: Chic Queen Bed in 5 Star Location!
summary: Spacious Rooftop Terrace in a Cosmopolitan Suburb. Close to Centenial Park, Right on Oxford st! Close to Paddington Pubs, Restaurants & shops, 15min walk to Central CBD &  15min bus to Bondi Beach. You'll love the apartment which is artfully decorated & the only one (1st floor of townhouse) so very peaceful & private.  I pride myself on giving my guests the best value for money, as that’s what I look for in my air bnbs when I travel too!  Can’t wait to welcome you to Sydney :)
interaction: I am available for all questions and recommendations via email or phone, if not in the appartment myself... looking forward to welcoming you to Sydney! :)
houseRules: I’m easygoing, but do ask that you respect what you use in the apartment and clean up after yourself in regards to the Kitchen & Bathroom. Please recycle your rubbish! If there’s this symbol ♻️ it recycles.  Any lost keys will incur a charge.  Strictly 2 guests.  Looking forward to welcoming you here at "Axford Arthouse"!

host.about: Travel girl with a free spirit:)

reviews.txt: It was lovely to meet Jessica, she was an amazing host! The apartment was clean and comfortable. The location was great, with Paddington's amazing restaurants and shops just on our doorstep. Jessica was very friendly and helpful and we're definitely planning on staying here again next time we're in Sydney!

Jessica is a genuinely kind hearted person. She made me and my boyfriend feel welcome and helped us in the ways that she could.  She also collects art and has excellent taste, so her flat is absolutely adorable! We stayed 5 nights, and everything was comfortable. There's even an electric blanket in the bed. Paddington is a very nice neighborhood mainly of boutique shopping on the main road. Centennial Park is also a 10 minute walk away, so we took advantage of that. I've been in many a Airbnb, and I definitely recommend Jessica and her flat!
Gorgeous host and such a lovely comfortable room. Very flexible with my arrival.

Jessica is a great host! Amazing location of the place, wonderful accommodations. Seriously, if you're visiting Sydney I highly recommend staying with Jessica. In between the city and the beach. Amazing!

1.房間無對外窗有點悶熱,跟房東借電風扇有所改善,但夏季可能會非常熱
2.有天窗可以引進自然光,因此白天光線很好,當然也不可能睡太晚｡
3.因為直接睡在房東原本的房間,因此房東會睡在客廳的沙發,所謂會提供的洗衣機等配備都不方便使用,連晚上上廁所都要擔心吵到房東｡
4.wifi連線很順暢
5.住宿的幾天附近都有人在施工,因此有點吵｡
6.餐廳有貓飼料等,因此有蠻明顯的貓味道｡
7.距離paddington Saturday market很近
8.房間衣櫃不能使用,且空間小,行李箱一打開就沒有空間可行走
9.有蟑螂
A beautiful, clean and cosy place in a nice and convenient neighbourhood. Jessica is a very friendly and helpful host. We enjoyed our stay here!

It was my first experience with airbnb and I am glad that my host was Jessica, who is a great host! 
And it is true - it is 5 star location place - it is walk away from Hide Park, Opera House, Harbour Bridge, Royal Botanic Garden. I would definitely recommend Jessica´s place.

Staying at Jessica's was great value for money and in a top location! A clean and tidy place and Jessica was lovely.
Thanks for having us!

Jessica's place was lovely! She was so easy to communicate with and accommodating. The bed was super comfortable and had such nice sheets! She provided us with towels and had some lovely complimentary tea and cookies. Jessica was able to recommend many great local spots and made us feel very welcome. I totally recommend if you're looking for a nice spot to stay!
Lots of stairs. No windows but has ample natural skylights.  The neighborhood is trendy with great transportation access.

We stayed at Jess' place over the Easter break and it was a great spot in Paddington with lots of nice bars, shops and restaurants near by. It's just around the corner from the bus stop which has buses running to the city centre and also to Bondi. Jess was friendly and helpful and made us feel welcome during our stay.
Jessica is a nice person! She gave us a lot of useful suggestion! Cats are quiet and cute. Thanks!

Jessica was a lovely host! Despite her being unwell while I stayed there I could always rely on her to help me out with anything around the flat, awesome restaurant and sightseeing recommendations and just generally pleasant company :) The cats were lovely and very affectionate. I definitely felt at home at Jessica's flat. Extremely well located for buses to take you to either Bondi or central Sydney, as it's basically halfway in between. I walked to Mrs McQuarries point one day and it took just over an hour to do so, buses take 10-15 minutes to central. Paddington itself is a cute neighbourhood with some nice places to eat/drink/shop nearby. Quite a few steps to take up to the flat just for anyone who might have issues with that, I didn't. Really enjoyed my stay at Jessica's flat highly recommend it!
Great location, comfy clean bed and great value. Jess is a lovely, friendly, helpful host.
Jessica has a funky Paddo pad in the middle of everything Sydney has to offer. Perfect Sydney stay.
Jessica is so amazing ! She is so sweet and it is in a great location
Very basic but great value for money if you spend most of your time out and about. Host was lovely and accomodating.
Great place to stay! Very clean and comfortable. Good location and some great eating options around.

Jessica était à Paris mais très bon accueil avec sa maman, des cookies chauds, et un chat adorable. Très bon emplacement au coeur de Paddington.
La porte ouverte toute la nuit pourrait peut être être remplacée par une chatière en hiver ? Wifi un peu inconstant.
On recommande ce logement.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Nice appartement in central
summary: 1 bedroom in a 2 bedrooms cosy apartment, all furnished. Located in central midlevels really close from the escalator, calm and clear. 2 minutes walk from the Soho area with bars and restaurants. Many supermarkets and groceries around. And also bus and taxis. MTR central station is 10 minutes walk.
interaction: Yes available
houseRules: Respectful People

host.about:
Hello,
My name is Audrey I work in fashion in Hong Kong and have been in this city for 5 years and truly loving it; i call it home 
I Love books, music, hiking, and traveling

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Audrey est très gentille et réactive au questions durant le séjour. L'appartement est fonctionnel bien équipé et se trouve dans un quartier calme et non loin du centre! La chambre est cosie, je recommande ce logement!
Audrey's flat very nice and exactly as on the pictures. The location is great and area is full of bars and restaurants - thanks:)

The place is my standart of staying in HK, bright, comfy, clean,  perfect size rooms, picture perfect kitchen, especially sweet scented candles in every rooms which I found rarely in HK. Convenient location and Audrey is truly amazing host!

I warmly recommend Audrey's place ! The location couldn't be better : on top of Cain   Road, in a pedestrian super quiet street, it is very Central but extremely quiet around the neighborhood. 
The apartment is charming, spacious, light, very clean and well decorated. 
And Audrey s roommate is as lovely as the place! 
The price is very okay for the place !

A neat and stylish abode right within Central - a great base from which to explore HK. Take the famous Central-Midlevels Escalator on the way home and experience the hustle and bustle of Soho.  Or take the ferries from Central to other parts of HK. Plenty of artisan coffee, local cheap eats, restaurants, and bars just a few steps outside the apartment. The place was very clean, had great storage and all the amenities required for a comfortable stay. Audrey was very responsive and even suggested some amazing eats. Her roommate, Stella, was just as friendly and welcoming. I had an amazing time in HK thanks to Audrey and Stella. Will definitely revisit when I'm back in HK.

Stella is  a great roommate! I was very happy with that.
I felt very welcome and the communication was perfect. Thank you for the hospitality.

Audrey's appartment is great and very close to Soho. Getting there is kind of a workout since the build is on a hill but you can take the Mid-level escalators which makes it easier. Checking in and out was very easy. I didn't get the chance to meet Audrey in person, but communication with her was very reliable. Can definitely recommend her place!

name: Sunny 1 or 2 BR apt in Boerum Hill
summary: Large, sunny apartment in a classic Brooklyn 3-story row house in historic and trendy Boerum Hill neighborhood known for its charming, brownstone buildings and tree-lined streets.
interaction: We live in the building and available for recommendations to area activities.
houseRules: This is a non-smoking apartment. Roof access is not permitted. Sorry, we do not permit pets.

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about:
My husband (a West coast transplant) and I (East coast native) bought and renovated this 19th century row house in Brooklyn several years ago.  Since then we have been enjoying the unique vibe here.  
We are both passionate about design (I am also an architect), so we really enjoyed setting up the vacation rental and hope our guests enjoy it too!

reviews.txt:
Great apartment! Super clean, comfortable, and plenty of space. Very close to the A/C and only a short trip to Manhattan. Beautiful neighborhood full of restaurants, bars and coffee shops. 

Would recommend anyone to stay here!

My husband, son and I stayed in Judy's apartment for a week. We loved it! The location was brilliant and the apartment was stunning. A fantastic kitchen that we cooked in every night, a great dining area for friends to pop around and very spacious, clean and stylish furnishings. Judy was brilliant. A caring and energetic host always there to ask questions and check in if we needed anything. On arrival she greeted us with some food and even helped me to organise my little son when we had to leave. Would definitely stay again and hope to do so later in the year :) Many thanks again Judy!

My parents came for their first visit (in a decade) to New York, so I booked Judy's second-floor apartment, just down the block from my flat. They spent a long weekend (three nights) in this spacious airy apartment.  The accommodations are clean, comfortable, secure, and include a well-equipped modern kitchen.   Judy was very nice and welcoming, providing a supply of breakfast staples as well as great hints about neighborhood cafes and restaurants.  My mother - always apprehensive about parking - was especially pleased that there is lots of free on-street parking available in the surrounding neighborhood.  Judy was easy to correspond with in advance and to connect with the day they arrived - she's very responsive, and even let me preview the space to ensure it would be accessible for my older parents. I hope the apartment is available the next time they visit Brooklyn - which they are excited to do as a result of a very restful, comfortable weekend.

Excellent experience! Judy met me at the curb and even helped carry our bags upstairs. We mostly communicated via text, she always responded promptly so it was very useful. The apartment itself is incredibly convenient, near many subway lines, excellent restaurants, and various interesting sections of Brooklyn. It was lots of space for two people, with plenty of light and a comfortable bed. Recommended all around as classy and convenient NYC lodging.

I honestly loved staying at Judy's apartment. She and her husband was really helpful, they gave us tips on restaurant, yoga classes...  The apartment was really clean and pictures are representative of the place. New kitchen and new bathroom. 

The area was great as well, a lot of restaurant and ship close by. It was our first time staying in Brooklyn and we enjoyed it a lot.
We had a wonderful stay at Judy's and absolutely recommend her place!  It was beautiful, extremely clean and in a great location near shops and restaurants and the subway! We will be repeat visitors.

My husband and I, along with our one year old son, had a wonderful stay at this apartment. Judy was great and very responsive via email and text. The apartment itself was spacious and had lovely amenities. Looks just like the photos. The washer and dryer was a huge plus for us since we were traveling with a toddler. The location is fantastic too. I cannot say enough good things about this apartment and experience!

I booked Judy's apartment for 2 nights last week along with my adult son and his girlfriend.  Judy was extremely helpful and easy to deal with!  The apartment was very spacious and immaculate.  There were fresh cut flowers on the table and a few essentials in the kitchen: milk, cereal, coffee, tea bags, etc.  These nice little touches were very much appreciated!  We had a quick breakfast at the apartment and then were on our way and ready to explore.  There were also toiletries (shower gel/shampoo) in the bathroom for those (like my son! who do not bring their own!  Judy also had an extra bedroom just down the hall that I rented as well (for privacy).  The apartment is located in a very nice and charming area with lots of (inexpensive) restaurants nearby along with some cute shops.  You can walk down Atlantic Avenue or State to get to Brooklyn Bridge Park (which is quite lovely!).  It's about a 10 minute walk.  We were literally a 3 minute walk to the nearest subway heading into Manhattan, so that was a plus.  Staying in Brooklyn is the way to go if you like a less chaotic and quieter place to stay.  We will definitely be back!

This apartment was fantastic. It's a lovely, charming place, very bright. The kitchen and bathroom have both recently been fully renovated. The apartment was very clean. 

Judy was a great host. When we arrived, we found that she had left us a carton of organic milk, granola, and a package of Stumptown coffee. She gave us some good tips for local restaurants, and she let us store our luggage in the building for a little while after we checked out. 

The location is great. There are some good restaurants just around the corner on Atlantic, as well as a very good french bakery. Just a couple of blocks down Bond are two more very good restaurants, Building on Bond and Ruccola. The neighborhood is great to walk around. Smith St. is just a couple of blocks away with tons of shops, bars, restaurants. The Hoyt Schermerhorn metro is just a couple of blocks away, which can take you into the city on the A or C, or further into Brooklyn on the G. Other statios are a few minutes walk away. 

We would love to stay here again.

This is a fantastic apartment - great space, great location, great price - and Judy is a wonderful host.  She responded to all of my questions and concerns promptly, accommodated an early arrival and late check out, and even promptly took care of a small issue that occurred during our stay.  I would absolutely stay here again.

We came to visit family in Brooklyn. This was an amazing space to relax and the perfect location to get around everywhere! Judy was so nice and accommodating. Her little touches made us feel so welcome :) We would recommend this and plan on staying here in the future.

The apartment is superb: spacious, immaculate, furnished with impeccable taste, and renovated with excellent quality materials!!!!! We loved the open space full of light and the spaciousness to relax after a busy day .Judy added so many touches that made our stay remarkable: basics like juice, milk, coffee and granola; toiletries, laundry detergent, fresh flowers. Everything was very clean and there were cleaning products available for our use.  The washer and dryer were a big plus. We were not able to meet Judy since she was not in town  but all our communications and the arrival/departure arrangements were perfect. We liked the neighborhood: diverse, vibrant, close to Atlantic terminal/subway/buses and with nice grocery/dinner options. It was a wonderful way to enjoy Manhattan since it was an easy and short subway ride away. We had the best pizza in many years at Lucali's. We could not asked for anything else and we are extremely thankful to Judy.

Judy was a fantastic host and my family and I couldn't have been happier with the (Website hidden by Airbnb) apartment is beautiful. Renovated, sunny and well kept, it was perfect for my family. The kitchen and dining room sealed the deal with the dining table where we were able to have a family meal. The eye for detail throughout my family's stay was so helpful- from the instructions on every set of keys, printing out of maps and a binder full of recommendations, I'm definitely going to tell my friends to stay here in the future.  Judy is super easy to get a hold of and happily answered all of my questions. Thanks again, Judy!

If you wanna explore Manhattan and especially Brooklyn (which has so much to offer), this is the place to stay and relax! We felt instantly at home in Judy's stylish apartment, which has every amenity you can think of. Moreover Judy was a kind and helpful host. We recommend this place warmly!

The apartment was clean and uncluttered with a modern kitchen and bathroom.  It met all of our expectations.  My wife loved the fact that the kitchen was well stocked with the basics.  We will definitely stay there again on our next trip to Brooklyn to visit our son.  Dave, Cindie, Brian

We've had a great stay at Judy and Sasha's place ! The apartment is spotless, actually larger than it appears on the pictures, has all you need and is very tastefully decorated. Our hosts went out of their way to accommodate our two year old son on a real mattress in the main bedroom. Although the nearby avenue can be a bit loud at night, earplugs are provided, and the cool humming of the aircon happens to cover most of it.

The neighborhood is great ! Lively yet very safe. Within walking distance is the buzzing Fulton Mall, and the more elegant Smith St. and Court St. Plenty of restaurants, bars, bakeries and cafés. Judy and Sasha provided us with a list of their favorite places - Don't miss Van Leeuwen's unforgettable organic Ginger Ice Cream ! Catch the A and C lines at the Hoyt-Schermerhorn station, one block away, and ride to downtown Manhattan in ten minutes... 

Judy and Sasha are discreet hosts, yet very caring. We've been texting prior to our arrival and while we were staying there. They dealt with any little issue in a swift and elegant manner. We really felt like we had settled in Brooklyn for a week, and have left NYC with unforgettable memories. 

---

L'appartement de Judy et Sasha est propre, plus grand que sur les photos, bien équipé et décoré avec goût. Judy et Sasha ont tout fait pour que notre fils de deux ans puisse dormir avec nous dans la chambre sur un vrai matelas. Le bruit de l'avenue peut déranger, surtout la nuit, mais le ronronnement de la clim couvre le plus gros. 
Le quartier est super : d'un côté, Fulton Mall fourmille, et de l'autre, Smith St. et Court St. sont plus élégantes. Le quartier regorge de restos, cafés, bars et boulangeries. Sasha et Judy fournissent une liste de leurs endroits préférés. A un pâté de maison, vous trouverez les lignes A et C à la station Hoyt Schermerhorn, qui vous emmène dans le Sud de Manhattan en dix minutes...
Judy et Sasha sont des hôtes discrets et prévenants. Nous avons échangé par texto avant notre arrivé et pendant notre séjour. Ils ont répondu à toutes nos demandes avec réactivité et élégance. Nous avons vraiment eu l'impression d'habiter Brooklyn le temps d'une semaine et avons quitté NYC avec des souvenirs inoubliables...
Judy was great all around. And the place was lovely and clean and convenient with plenty of space. Would definitely stay there again.

I had an absolutely fabulous time staying in the apartment! The apartment was cosy and tastefully decorated. And It had all the amenities I needed while traveling to New York on business. The apartment was spacious which was great as I dislike small and cramped living spaces. 

The neighborhood felt safe and has some really cool stores that are worth checking out. There are also some nice restaurants, bars, bakeries and cafés. Check out Bacchus! Its a nice french restaurant close to the corner of Bond St. and Atlantic Ave. And for midnight munchies there are a few 24 hour convenience stores near by. It is also worth mentioning that the apartment is within walking distance to the bustling Fulton Mall stretch, where you can find good buys.

I found the Hoyt-Schermerhorn subway station to be very convenient as it was very close to the apartment. You can catch both the A and C lines which will take you in and out of Manhattan in about 10 minutes or so.

Judy was a joy to deal with and I thank her for her hospitality. She answered my questions swiftly and responded to a slight glitch in the internet quickly which was a great help. Even though I was only in New York City for 4 days, I felt like I was just settling in and enjoying all that New York City had to offer. I will definitely return to Judy's place the next time I am in New York!

Judy has an absolutely beautiful apartment!  Great communication the whole time.  My mother enjoyed her stay, and it was right around the corner from my apt.  Quiet, great light, comfortable bed, gorgeous decor, lots of space.  Thanks, Judy!

We had a great time at Judy's apartment. It is very nice, clean and sunny and fully equipped with everything you need during a 5-day city trip. The location is great, it takes just a few minutes by subway to Manhattan downtown. There are a few nice restaurants and coffee bars in the area as well as a small supermarket. We'd definitely come back to this place!
Thanks Judy, you made us feel at home in Brooklyn! 
Stephanie

name: Surry Hills Studio - Your Perfect Base in Sydney
summary: This spacious, light filled studio has everything you need to enjoy Sydney and is the perfect base for exploring. The harbour is an easy walk, Bondi a short bus trip away.
interaction: You have complete privacy during your stay.
houseRules: No smoking:  No smoking any substance, including e-cigarettes. Lost Keys / Locked out of Apartment:   If you lose the key to the apartment building itself (i.e., the yellow security key) the cost of replacing it is $250. It will be deducted from your security deposit.  If you lock yourself out of the apartment, it is solely your responsibility to contact a locksmith to open the apartment door for you. You are also solely responsible for the cost of the locksmith, including the cost of replacing the lock mechanism if necessary. If the lock mechanism needs to be replaced by the locksmith,  you must provide 2 copies of the new key.

host.about: Software developer from Sydney, Australia.

reviews.txt: Ben's place is in the perfect location. Had a lot of fun staying there.

Ben's apartment was perfect for a few days in Sydney - well located, clean, bright and spacious. 
It is quite big for a studio, and the floorplan gives the feel of a separate kitchen, bedroom and living area. 
A great view, well ventilated and bright. 
Ben was a great host, with really good communication. He was very accommodating with check-in and check out times. 
Only downside is that the apartment doesn't have wifi, so perhaps not ideal for business travellers or longer stays.

I enjoyed my stay at Ben's place. Perfect location for public transport either to city (5 mins) or Bondi or Coogee beaches.
Small but has everything you need to explore Sydney with and best of all, great city views!

The apartment is in a nice building with some cool Art Deco details. Location is good - we pretty much walked to all major sights in city (opera house, darling harbour etc.) and there are some great shops and places to eat nearby (thanks to Ben's suggestions). Apartment has all the stuff you need for a comfortable stay, and Ben is super helpful and excellent in communication. We had such a nice time and would recommend Ben's apartment!

Ben was an excellent host; he met me on time and showed me around the apartment ensuring that I was comfortable and had everything I needed. 
The apartment itself is a small but comfortable studio with beautiful views of the city. It's located close to Oxford St with access to public transport if needed. Only a short walk to Darlinghurst and the city. Also, a Woolworths Metro within 200m. 
Loved the place and would stay again.

Bens apartment is in a great location in Sydney close to great restaurants, museums, bars and shopping - Everything you need. Ben was also very friendly,  helpful and communicative. We would highly recommend !
Great central studio!
Great location for work or holiday, clean, lots to explore in the neighborhood, a stress free stay, thanks Ben

Bens apartment was perfect. Great location and everything in Surry Hills, Oxford St and Taylor Sq are walkable. Perfect for Mardi Gra weekend as we watched the parade from the lounge room windows. Would definitely stay here again when in Sydney
에어비앤비숙소중에  가장 좋았다

Ben's place is centrally located with a great view of the Sydney skyline. The place looked exactly as it did in the pictures and was the perfect size for the two of us. Ben was a great host -- always quick to respond to my messages and happy to answer any questions. I would highly recommend this place.
Ben's place was in a great location and close to transit.  We enjoyed the coffee shop downstairs, the shops and theater.
The charming apartment is conveniently located with beautiful view of Sydney Tower and Habour Bridge.
Great location. Apartment exactly like pictures. Perfect for two people and nice and clean. Great communication.

Great location, perfectly positioned for getting into the city or to Bondi. (It's very close to the Darlinghurst nightlife so it can be a bit noisy on weekends, but you can't be in a central location without a little activity!) The apartment is clean and tidy and great for two, with very good shower water pressure. And that gorgeous view across Sydney!
Great apartment in a fantastic central location! All the ammenities you could possible need and an added bonus of harbour bridge views!
It was really nice.
很小巧精致的房间,独立的厨房卫生间,各项设备齐全,居住十分方便｡位置也十分便利,能观望到悉尼大桥和海湾景色｡美中不足的是入住第一晚隔壁房子在举办彻夜的party及高声唱歌,相当打扰睡眠
Amazing view, great area and a great studio
Great pad!

name: Where Castles and Art meet the Sea
summary: The flat is located in Matosinhos, part of Porto's District, where you can have the best of both worlds: the magic and beauty of Porto's Old City and the Beaches, Central Park and Seafood restaurants, with plenty of eclectic entertainment.
interaction: To ensure that you will have a fully supported staying, I will provide all the assistance that you need, namely, guide you through all your concerns, needs and wishes in Porto,for instance, help you finding a cruise in Douro's River, a Show in a Theatre, a dinner in a fancy restaurant at Foz (most exquisite area of Porto), or a traditional Portuguese restaurant. You just have to name it! We will provide you as well, with all support for any house's issues so you can enjoy your stay peacefully. Your comfort and happiness are our main aim.
houseRules: I think the main rule of the house is, take care of that as if, is your own house. If you decide to rent more then two weeks is mandatory a weekly cleaning, with an extra cost of 30€ per week.  The house has fibre TV with 130 channels, nevertheless, if any extra subscription will be activated during your stay, that amount will be charged to your account, on the end of your staying.

host.about: All my life I’ve travelled hopping that one day I would be able to share my country, my house, my experiences, with those who have the same love about new cultures, new people and new emotions, as I do. Thank you for being a part of that!

reviews.txt: Perfect stay ! Impossible to do it better , Thank you Jose and i hope That i Will come back soon :)

Apartamento impecable, situación inmejorable. Perfectamente equipado, con todas las comodidades y màs!! Nos recibieron puntual e impecablemente. Trato superamable y acogedor. Mil gracias a nuestro anfitrión y su amigo Sergio, nos sentimos como en casa. Obrigada!
Excellent reception and follow up by Jose and Sergio. My family really enjoyed their support. Many thanks

José is a fantastic host, together with Sergio they took care of our stay in the apartment. The place is fantastic, with a view to the beach and the giant sculpture "She Changes". Well placed between Foz, the beaches and the restaurants area. The apartment is well equipped, with a modern decoration and clean. They provided us with a cot and a high chair for our baby. I recommend the apartment if you want to know Porto and Matosinhos, or simply relax by the sea. Thank you Jose and Sergio. We hope to return! Everything was perfect

It was an amazing apartment close to the beach, you only have to take the escalator, you walk 2 mn and there you are! You also have access to a swimming pool. Our kids had a lot of fun there !! Sergio, a friend of José welcame us with such a kindness... Really! If you want to visit Porto and you love the ocean Matosinhos is the place to be and this apartment is the place to rest !! Thanks for everything José and Sergio and thank you most of all for your kindness !!!
Très bel appartement situé à deux pas de la plage. José est très accueillant et laisse des petites attentions partout dans l'appartement!

The apartment is really nice & comfortable. It really does have everything:) José & Sergio were great hosts. It's a shame that there is a huge building in front of living room & bedroom which almost completely blocks out sea view :(  Take note that Matasinhos is a 25/30min tram journey to Porto (although  much closer by car).
Perfect as usual , best stay in Matosinhos

Estuvo esperando Sergio a nuestra llegada porque Jose estaba fuera. Nos enseñó la casa y nos sugirió sitios a donde ir. Atendió una llamada nuestra enseguida y nos despidió a la hora concertada, todo con amabilidad y en español. El piso está en una playa tipo surfista, en primera línea y delante tiene la línea del autobús que te lleva al centro de Oporto bordeando el mar y el río. También a unos cuantos metros puedes coger el metro que te deja en la parte alta del centro de Oporto pero es bastante ruidoso.
El piso está muy bien para los que quieren combinar playa con ambiente de la ciudad de Oporto.
Nosotros íbamos en familia con niños (12-14) y nos encajó bien. Pasamos un par de días en Oporto (pateada, paseo en barco, funicular, telesférico, tranvía...) y otros dos en Matoshinos y en Leca da Palmeira (surf, piscinas de mar, baños...). El agua del mar fría, conviene neopreno.
Bueno, que hemos pasado unos días estupendos y entretenidos.
Felicidades a los portugueses por hablar inglés y más o menos español y hacerse entender. Gracias, algunos deberían aprender de este país.

Idéal situation to enjoy both the best beach of Porto and the city. Shop close by. Metro very close as well. Touristic bus stop at the bottom of the building. Apartment clean, matching the pictures. Welcome gift very enjoyable, and nice attention: water in the fridge. Comfortable bed, and well equipped kitchen. Super quite apartment.
As a summary, perfect for a couple
The host canceled this reservation 100 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Logement idéalement situé près de la fameuse plage de Matosinhos, spacieux, très propre, décoré avec goût, près de délicieux restaurants où le rapport qualité/prix est vraiment interessant , une vie nocturne vraiment sympa et la piscine très appréciée les jours ou trop de vent pour la plage. José notre hôte nous a gaté en nous laissant des gentilles attention tel que de l'eau et des jus de fruit au frais dans le frigo (ce qui est bienvenu quand on a fait 17h de route), du vin, du lait, des bières, shampoing, gel douche etc... Je suis tombé sous le charme de ce lieu.  Merci José

The apartment was in excellent conditions. Very clean and warm. Everything was well organized. The position of the apartment is perfect. Close to public transportes and with direct access at the sea. The view from the balcony is amazing. The owner, José, was very helpful and always available for anything we needed. I recommend the apartment without any doubt.
Panagiotis Saliaris

name: Double/single room, bathroom & garage in Poblenou
summary: My house is a perfect, new and beautiful flat for staying some days in Barcelona. It’s 10 minutes walking to the beach, and 15 minutes walking to two shopping centers (Diagonal Mar/Glories), Agbar tower, Forum or CCIB. It’s well communicated with the rest of the city by tram (Fluvià station) bus (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) (in front of my home) or Metro (Selva de Mar). There is a Touristic Bus Stop near: 300m. And It is 10 minutes walk to one of the most typical streets for eating and drinking: Rambla Poblenou
interaction: I respect the privacy of my guests and I am happy as well to interact as much as needed or to let them be independent as they might wish. I will always welcome you on arrival and explain you the facilities so that you are comfortable and well settled and same will apply on departure time. If your flight doesn’t fit the check in and out timings do not worry and do let me know as I can always help you further and be flexible in order to help you. While you are here you can always whatssapp me or use messenger if you have any questions on how to get around or simply for recommendation. I have printing facilities for your boarding pass or online purchases of your tickets for shows, etc so only let me know and I will happily print them for you!
houseRules: - No se aceptan fiestas o eventos - No se aceptan acompañantes sin aviso previo o pago de suplemento - Prohibido fumar en todo el piso

reviews.txt: Das Zimmer und das dazugehörige Badezimmer sind geräumig, sehr gut eingerichtet und sehr sauber! Die Wohnung ist sehr modern und sehr schön. In der Wohnung gibt es alles was man so braucht.  Die Kommunikation lief sehr zuverlässig und unkompliziert. Die Lage ist fantastisch, es sind nur wenige Minuten zum Strand, aber dennoch sehr ruhig. Ein sehr schönes Einkaufszentrum "Diagonal Mar" ist nur wenige Minuten entfernt. Direkt vor der Tür gibt es viele kleinen Läden und Cafés. Eine Metrostation sowie eine Tramhaltestelle sind auch vor der Tür. Froilán ist ein perfekter und sehr sympathischer Gastgeber! Ich habe mich sofort willkommen gefühlt. Vielen Dank Froilán für die schöne Zeit in deiner Wohnung!

Ich war mit meiner Freundin zum ersten Mal in Barcelona und das war meine erste Unterkunft, die ich über Airbnb gebucht habe.
Ich muss sagen wir waren wirklich positiv überrascht. Er hat uns vom Flughafen zu unserer Unterkunft und wieder zurück zum Flughafen mit seinem Auto gebracht und zwar gratis. Er wollte einfach nichts von uns nehmen. Für die Stadteroberung haben wir ebenso gratis zwei Fahrräder bekommen. 
Die Wohnung befindet sich in einer sehr guten Lage, bis zum Strand braucht man weniger als 15 min. Die Wohnung ist sehr schön eingerichtet mit einem Balkon mit tollem Ausblick über die Stadt. Der Gastgeber war fast nie in der Wohnung und wenn er kurz da ist war er sehr hilfreich und hat uns insider Tipps gegeben. Zum Schlafen hat er ein eigenes Zimmer mit eigenem Bad und WC, somit komplett getrennt von uns. Ganz ehrlich kann ich diese Unterkunft jedem empfehlen und ich hoffe wir werden wieder mal Froilans Gäste sein :)

Frolian was a fantastic host and we thoroughly enjoyed out stay in his flat! The location is great, flat was stunning and spotless. Froilan was absolutely sweet and he made us feel at home. He was really helpful and advised us on how to get round in Barcelona and he even helped with our transfer to and from the airport. If i go back to Barcelona i would definitely want to stay at his flat again!

Froilán is a very courteous , likeable and pleasant host. 
Before my arrival he has been in touch with me constantly via (Hidden by Airbnb) . 
The apartment and my room were super clean and also decorated very tastefully. The kitchen has a full equipment, and I was allowed to use everything. 
During my trip Froilán told me great tips to see some beautiful places in Barcelona. I felt very comfortable and would definitely come again. 

Thank you very much Froilán!!!

Froilán is a very kind and helpful person, he was really interested in us, helped us out with all problems (he reserved a parking spot with his car for us), gave us a lot of insider tips for Barcelona and much more.
The flat is really nice and clean, we had our own room and own bathroom.
We used the modern kitchen a lot and enjoyed nearly every meal on the beautiful balkony.
All in all, 5 stars and a big Thank you to Froilán!

Froilán est un super hôte, il nous a super bien accueilli et même réservé une place pour notre voiture afin de ne pas devoir chercher une place. L'appartement était super propre et la chambre parfaite. on a passé un très agréable séjour, et cest certains que nous retournerons lors d'un  mon futur trip à Barca!

Froilan was amazing! He got me from the airport and insistet not to take any money from us. Besides, he offered me all the comfort and even sth to drink and fruits. His appartment is very clean and good value. With tram or bus you will get quickly to any place in Barcelona. Great value for money.

Froilan is a perfect host for a dream vacation.

The house is absolutely amazing, the location is perfect and very close to the best beaches, you basically have everything you'll ever need in his beautiful modern flat. 

He is extremely helpful and answered our messages during our stay within seconds and advised us with all the tips to make the best of our stay. 

Froilan thank you so much for the amazing hospitality and we owe you so much for this. 

Don't hesitate to catch this place - you will never regret - promise!

Froilan is super-friendly, very helpful and he will do everything to make you feel like at home. Apartment is pristine, accessible (including balcony!) and very close to La Rambla Poblenou - best place to eat in Barcelona. Room is spacious and very comfortable.
The apartment is very comfortable, very clean and you can really enjoy your stay there. Froilan us really a fantastic and kind host who always smiles.

My stay at Froilán's was perfect. He was greatly helpful and his place is very nice. I went to Barcelona because of a Conference, but I could enjoy the city as well, which is wonderful! Definitely, I would visit Barcelona again and would stay at the same place! :-)

everything was just great. the owner is very outgoing, caring and sympathetic person! location of the apartment in a nice area, 10 minutes - and you are at the sea. near a supermarket and mini-shops that are open around the clock. we are fully satisfied with our trip!!!

Nous avons été accueillis très chaleureusement par Froilàn qui nous a d'abord trouvé un emplacement pour la voiture. Après la visite de l'appartement et les explications sur les commodités des lieux, notre hôte nous a même offert une bouteille de vin local que nous avons fortement appréciée. La chambre est agréable et la salle de bain indépendante est un plus.
Froilàn a toujours été à l'écoute de nos besoins par message parfois et qu'il a su même anticiper parfois.
Froilàn est gentil, serviable, discret et de bonne compagnie.

Friolan was amazing!! You could not ask for a better host!! His house was the only place we stayed where we had access to a/c and we're able to make the house cooler.  INCREDIBLE!! Out of 8 stays in Spain  his house was the ONLY one that matched the amenities listed on his page!!  Very clean and he went above and beyond for us.  You will not regret staying with him.  And he was extremely helpful and willing to give suggestions.  10 STARS!!

Froilán is a fantastic host, communicates quickly, and has an excellent, clean, and comfortable home. The bed is also support comfortable. What more can I say that hasn't been said? I would recommend this place and I would consider staying here again in the future. Froilán was also gracious enough to give me a ride to the airport as well.

Au top ! Froilàn est un très bon hôte, son accueil et ses conseils nous ont permis de passer un très bon séjour (malheureusement trop court). Son appartement est à proximité du tram et métro pour un accès facile en ville. La chambre est propre, pas bruyante et une salle de bain privative, un vrai confort. Nous recommandons fortement :)

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour chez Froilàn, un accueil chaleureux et beaucoup de bons conseils.
L'appartement est bien situé, joliment décoré, propre et agréable. Les photos et le descriptif correspondent fidèlement. Le parking et sa douche privative sont un plus :-) 
Une très bonne adresse à recommander.
Muchas gracias Froilàn !!

I usually don't take the time to write reviews, not because I don't want to, I just always forget to, but for him, it's a MUST! It was a great experience! He will make you feel like home. Good place. Good location. Good value. Good host. Good everything! Thanks again for hosting.
Everything in the apartment was great. Froilan was a great host.

Froilán was our favorite host during our two-week trip to Spain. He is super nice, friendly and professional. He really made us feel at home. More than at home, actually! His home is beautiful, modern and very clean.

He went out of his way to help orient us at the beginning of the visit, telling us how to best use public transportation and pointing out all of the key attractions in the city. Some of his suggestions were highlights of our vacation. 

When we were getting ready to leave and drive to our next destination, he packed us the most delicious oranges which we snacked on for the next several days. 

We cannot recommend Froilán enough. We are now back home, a week and a half later and we we are still talking about what a great person and wonderful host he was!

name: Spacious 2 Bedroom: Soho/Escalator
summary: Bright and spacious two bedroom apartment located in Soho along the famous HK escalator.  Numerous restaurants, cafes and bars (including the Lan Kwai Fong district) are only minutes away on foot. All comforts are provided including clean sheets, towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, hair dryer, laundry, hand soap, full kitchen amenities and wifi.
interaction: Key-less key pad entry makes this place super easy to enter.  A binder with detailed instructions on wifi, TV and other important information is provided.  I am always available by message on Airbnb.
houseRules: We're sure you will have a wonderful stay in this very exciting neighbourhood.  Although our walls are pretty thick, please respect our neighbours and be quiet, particularly when you are in the hallway coming and going. Please do not use linens and towels other than what are provided for you. This may incur an additional charge for laundry services. Please also keep the place clean and tidy. There is a large garbage/rubbish bin in the stairwell. Extra garbage bags are under the sink. If you would like to recycle, you can take recyclables down one escalator to the seperation bins.

host.about: Living in Hong Kong for the past 10 years my husband and I love to travel in Asia any chance we get. When not travelling, we relax in our village house outside the city, garden and go to the beach. We love staying active, eating healthy and exploring all corners of Hong Kong.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: This place is a gem!  It's in the heart of everything from western restaurants to shopping to the nightlife district.  It was still very quiet though in the building.  The place looks exactly as the photos and was recently renovated completely. The concierge was helpful when we needed help. Tara was fantastic as well. She waited for us for over a 1.5 hours when we were late, gave us a thorough run down of the apartment and neighbourhood, and made some very good recommendations for places to eat around there in her welcome guide package. Would highly recommend this place and going with her suggestions.
It's good. Tara is very kind person. This bnb is located soho street. It was fantastic!!!!!!

Die Wohnung war super! Sie ist sehr zentral gelegen. Von dort aus kann man in nur 20 Minuten bis zum Hafen laufen. In der Nähe gibt es sehr viele Restaurants und Bars. Die Wohnung selbst ist sehr gut ausgestattet (es fehlte nichts) und war für 4 Personen ideal. Auch die Gastgeberin war super freundlich und war für Fragen immer da. Ich würde diese Wohnung immer wieder buchen!

Tara's Apartment ist der perfekte Ausgangspunkt um Hongkong zu entdecken. Auch für eine unkomplizierte An- und Abreise vom / zum Flughafen ist die Lage super.
Der Bezirk Soho bietet viele tolle Cafés, Bars und Restaurants die man fußläufig erreichen kann.
Die Ausstattung des Appartement lässt keine Wünsche offen. 
Alles hat prima geklappt. Wenn ich noch mal in Hongkong bin, bin ich auf jeden Fall wieder bei Tara.

stayed at Tara's place for 6 nights as 3 adults and 2 children. quiet apartment with 24hr friendly doorman, located right next to the mid-level escalators, about 15 minutes up from IFC (easy access with a stroller with only a half-flight of stairs between Hang Seng Bank and the Central Market building). two grocery stores just down the street. 2 bedrooms with good cabinet space. plenty of sheets and towels. large open-design kitchen/dining/living room with good counter space. well stocked kitchen with coffee/tea/sugar. welcomed with bottle of red wine and fresh fruit. provided with baby cot, baby tub and high chair for the the little ones. umbrellas came in handy for the 2 days of rain. overall a very nice place to stay with family in Hong Kong.

No doubt, this is THE apartment for enjoying a stay in Hong Kong:
- Prime location
- Full equipped apartment 
- All facilities around (organic shops, mini-supermarket, good restaurants, ...)
- Excellent tips from Tara on good adresses around her place
- What else? Everything was perfect and thanks to Tara who has been friendly, reactive and flexible (late check-out due to personal reason)

L’appartement est très bien situé près de l’escalator. Quartier branché plein de bars et restos mais situation très calme malgré tout car l’appartement donne sur l’arrière de l’immeuble. Entièrement refait, il est propre et moderne, très bien équipé. Une belle pièce de vie et des rangements. Je recommande fortement. Tara est très rapide à répondre également à toute question. Et en plus, nous avions une belle corbeille de fruits et une bouteille de vin qui nous attendaient à notre arrivée. Séjour parfait.
Die Wohnung ist super gelegen und Tara eine super Gastgeberin. Auch wenn wir sie nicht persönlich kennen gelernt haben, war die Organisation und Kommunikation spitze!

My brother, a friend of mine and I stayed at Tara's place for just under a week. The location of the place is spectacular, the view is amazing (nestled inbetween so many skyscrapers) and getting in and out of the place is really easy! We had a bit of trouble checking-in, since we didn't have the apartment number in the information provided to us. That was not Tara's fault though.. When you come here, just make sure you get all of the neccessary info in advance from airbnb. The aparment was clean and well-kept and communication with Tara was easy and quick. She let us check out pretty late (3pm), which we really really appreciated! The only thing we didn't love about the place was that there sometimes was a bit of an odor coming out of the bathroom.. I'm pretty sure that isn't Tara's fault either though, it must be a problem with old plumbing. But there is a window in the shower, so it's very easy to just air-out the bathroom with the door closed!
Over all we are very very happy with our stay at Tara's place and would definitely come again:)
good and valuable place with nice location

Tara’s place is absolutely fabulous. 
She also made it very easy foe us in terms of communicating super fast for any requests. 
Location is great. It’s nicely decorated with good lighting and art. 
The bathroom is modern and well kitted out. 
We cooked meals at home on the great stove. 
The apartment has everything you need, and is in one of the best locations in town. 
We highly recommend staying there (if it’s free!)

This apartment provided me the perfect balance needed for a memorable holiday weekend. It was lose enough to access the vibrant nightlife, but far enough to enjoy a quiet morning respite. The space was cozy enough to lounge amongst friends in the salon, but large enough to provide two private bedrooms for a restful slumber.  And Tara’s communiques we’re friendly and informative, but never intrusive or inflexible. I highly recommend this Cameo Court apartment as the place to stay as you enjoy all that the Midlevels has to offer.
Perfect location for discovering the city’s local hotspots and a close enough walk to the MTR. Great living space when plenty of amenities for us, couldn’t have picked a better spot in Soho!
Very convenient location.  Good size.  Quiet apartment.  Reasonable price.   All very much appreciated.

Loved the place and definitely would stay again! Great location (right in the middle of SoHo), stylish + clean place and very friendly host. It's up on the 4th floor which means it's pretty quiet from the street noise. Would highly recommend it when visiting HK!
Location right next to the escalators was perfect! And the building security guards were so nice and helpful. Tara always answered my messages right away and was very helpful!

This apartment was exactly what we were looking for in HK: a central location away from the super-touristy hubbub, and with space for those stay-at-home moments you crave when you’re travel-logged. The place has a modern feel and included all the amenities one would need for cooking and relaxing, including filtered drinking water. We felt safe and cozy, and the building was quiet at night for restful sleep. Tara was very easy to get in touch with and provided responses quickly. I loved the location—super walkable to great restaurants, the zoo, Victoria Peak, and lots of public transit—but beware, if it is your first time to HK island and you want to walk from the subway/ferry, (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps won’t show you the amazing escalators and walkways that will make getting there a breeze, and you might get stuck carting luggage up many flights of stairs (as we did). I highly recommend staying here if you want to experience HK island like a local. Just remember to research the walking path, or take an alternate form of transportation if you’ve got heavy luggage!

Tara’s place is a real gem - it is centrally located, right next to the Central Travelator, with the convenience of acesss to pretty much everything (restaurants, grocery stores and public transit etc. BTW we simply walked with our luggage to the place directly from HK Station which took <15 minutes).  It is one street up from the hustle and bustle of the Soho district, in an area that is more upscale, largely quiet and family oriented.   The place itself is very spacious and sparkly clean - we even had closet space!  It is a place that we would like to stay again next time in HK and I would highly recommend to anyone, especially families with children.  Tara is also a wonderful host who was very responsive to all of our communications.  Thanks Tara!

Tara's place is really awesome. Neighbourhood is safe and full of restaurants, coffee shops, etc. You're right in the mid levels and it's easy to walk anywhere. Tara is a great host and was there to meet us. Super great our new home away from home in HK.
Great location next to the mid-levels elevator and in front of a great French bakery. all amenities nearby. very nicely decorated. we had a great stay with our kids thank you !

name: Lovely ap at Leblon beach
summary: Ap amplo, claro e arejado localizado no melhor ponto do Leblon, à 1 quadra da praia, Lagoa, restaurantes, supermercados, farmácias e shopping.  São 3 quartos que acomodam confortavelmente 5 pessoas. Sala de jantar e estar. Cozinha e área de serviço. É possível fazer tudo a pé e desfrutar de toda a beleza do bairro mais charmoso do rio.
interaction: Caso necessário, estaremos disponíveis para ajudá-los em horário comercial (9:00 AM TO 6:00 PM).
houseRules: Não aceitamos animais. Não aceitamos hóspedes adicionais. Não é permitida realização de festas e eventos. Após às 22 horas é necessário trancar a portaria com chaves, que serão entregues no ato do check-in. Fazer silêncio após as 22:00 horas. Apagar as luzes e ventiladores ao sair.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
Dona Sonia foi uma excelente anfitriã. O apto estava impecável, sem nada a reclamar. Ela inclusive deixou água e cervejas gelada na geladeira, camas arrumadas, toalhas no banheiro, novos sabonetes e até alguns remédios em caso de emergência. Também se ofereceu  para ajudar várias vezes e se mostrou 100% a disposição. 

O apto é perfeito: amplo, arejado, muiiiito bem localizado. Há 1 quadra da praia, rodeado de bares, bons restaurantes, lanchonetes, healthy foods, hamburguerias, temakerias etc. Garantia de economia de tempo de deslocamentos, porque dá para fazer tudo a pé.

name: Room on the waterfront
summary: Welcome to Manly and our beautiful seaside apartment. I hope you will enjoy your stay here being only a short walk to Manly while being so close to the beach.
interaction: I will be around to offer any suggestions on the best local spots/things to do.  While always available I also respect my guests privacy so that they can enjoy their seaside stay.
houseRules: Considerate guests are welcome to treat the place as it was their own.  Its easy - Respect all shared spaces and clean up after you to leave the room as clean as you found it.

host.about:
Outgoing  New Zealander who after living in the UK and in France decided to return to the beach life at Manly.
I've spent 20 years in Manly and have become part of the community.
I love the outdoors and swim all year round at the beach at my doorstep.
My favourite time is being at the outside  but being
a kiwi I love being anywhere to watch a rugby match.

I'm looking forward to sharing my home with considerate, outgoing people who want to make the most out of life.

reviews.txt: This place is a gem. Maria is super friendly and generous with her time and pantry supplies. The water really is that close!! The location spectacular to look at and snorkel or just chill out with a coffee on the walkway. The room is very spacious and the window seat just makes you want to connect with your inner cat. We had an amazing time and can't wait to plan another trip to Sydney.
Maria is a great host made us feel at home straight away. The room is amazing and makes relaxing a breeze.

Maria and her partner Gerry were warm, quiet and friendly. I was made welcome and provided with plenty of directions to find the beautiful space which was shared with me... The bay window photo says it all about the iconic building and the sensational location. For me , real is what I love to experience, and real is what I got... The location and neighbourhood  make this a perfect relaxation point... Older style building with charm and character and great food and coffee right under the window and 5 mins oceanside walk into Manly...

First experience in Manly with Maria is really wonderful. The room is so spacious and bright just as displayed in the album. We enjoy the sunrise and breakfast on that colourful balcony very much. Maria and her husband are warm sunshine in chilly windy Sydney. We really appreciate their hospitality and kindness. Looking forward to our next visit to that shiny sea and this cute accommodation.

We loved our stay at Maria's. You could not get any closer to the water and her and her hubby were super friendly and welcoming.

We will be back!

Maria's hospitality is amazing and makes her guests feel most welcome. We arrived a little later in the evening, and she had all our needs taken care of. Her apartment is in an amazing location, 10min walk to the centre of Manly, and overlooks the ocean. It was a pleasure to stay with Maria and would like to return to experience the location again.
Very well presented and an amazing position !
Very good - great position and Maria and Jerry were lovely

Maria's and Jerry's place is a real gem!! I've Airbnb-ed a lot in the past months here in Sydney and I must say this place was my absolute favourite of all :) It's a cosy piece of paradise with the most beautiful view, directly above the ocean, super huge bedroom that feels like its own little apartment, incredibly cute decorations, a super comfy huge bed, extremely lovely hosts and a neighbourhood and area that is truly feeling like a millionaires paradise :) Sitting in the pillows at the huge window, or hearing the ocean in bed and having a coffee, ocean breeze or swim right below the apartment felt like the ultimate vacation, I can't recommend it enough!! :) Thank you to both of you for sharing your little paradise :)

Amazing location, snorkelling, surfing & gorgeous shelley beach right on your doorstep. Loved coffee at the boathouse and falling asleep to the sound of the ocean. Maria & Jerry are great hosts,very friendly and helpful. Their apartment is in a worldclass location. Stunning. Felt priviliged to stay there.I had a great time. Thanks guys,will see u all soon! X

La habitación es muy cómoda, y la vista es espectacular! Muy cerca del Corso de Manly, la playa y cafes. Muy buena comunicación con María y con Jerome. Si volviera a Manly seguro alquilaría de nuevo la habitación!
Fantastic room. Fantastic location. Although I never got to meet Maria who was away, Jerry was a fantastic host. A not to be missed room and location.

Maria was off jetsetting when I came to stay ( half her luck ! ), but ensured that I was in good hands with the charming Jerome - well, he's French, so charming of course ; )

It's difficult to think of a more stunning spot in Sydney than this iconic building, above the cafe along the Shelley Beach board walk - tranquility itself, no matter the weather.

Thank you so much guys - I'll certainly stay again.
Amazing stay!

Wow, what a view for such a great price. It was like being in the ocean. Amazing room so very comfortable and the hosts were super duper hosts, never there but always checking in. Loved my stay.. it was a special time. Thank you

Maria and Jerome's place was absolutely fantastic... the location was perfect for our long weekend trip away. Close to fabulous cafes, restaurants and the most beautiful beaches.

The window seat is to die for... the activity outside in the water of swimming, surf skis and divers is very cool to watch before starting the day's activities.

I didn't get to meet Maria but her commutation and friendliness was amazing, she gave us tips of where to go, where to eat and things to do.

We met Jerome half way through our stay and he was so lovely and made us feel very welcome.

Would absolutely recommend... I want to go back already!

Maria and Jerome are such lovely hosts. They really know how to give you your privacy for your holiday (which I very much appreciate), but they are always there when you need them via text/call/Airbnb message, which is greatly assuring. They have awesome recommendations on local places (including places with local deals) and the room does not let your expectations down. The view is absolutely amazing, no matter the weather. The room and amenities are very clean, with extra towels and sheets in the cupboard, should you need them. I was worried about heating since it's winter and the listing didn't have heating ticked, but they provided a thermostat heater that kept us nice and cosy. Another cute thing to note was the deco. There's an adorable kiwi bird toy and some binoculars that we took advantage of with the great view from the window. Also, go up to the terrace! You definitely won't be disappointed at Maria's :)
Thank you so much for sharing your awesome accommodation, "a piece of heaven on earth " ! Hope to come back one day...
Magnifique endroit et vue de la chambre ! Accueil très chaleureux ! Tout était parfait ! N'hésitez pas !

Perfect location at Manly with a stunning view.  An easy stroll to Manly and the wharf with breathtaking views along the way.  Maria and Jerry were charming and friendly and willing to share their knowledge of the local area.  So much to see on the beach side of Sydney and away from the crowds of the city.  Highly recommend.

name: Artsy Downtown Studio!
summary: Downtown, convenient, cosy and bright semi basement. It is both my home and art studio. Perfect for one but could fit 2 people. Near museums, bars, atwater metro and guy-concordia station. One street away from St-Catherine but surprisingly calm! Also; an equipped, separate kitchen + wifi is included.
interaction: I won't be in town, but a friend will be my ambassador :)
houseRules: No parties, no events, just please respect the neighbours and the space

reviews.txt: Great spot. Small and cozy- perfect for one person. The hostess is friendly and welcoming. I had to leave early and she was very accomodating despite having arranged to only come back to the city after I had left.

Nous nous sommes sentis les bienvenus et Marie-Amelie était très disponible en cas de besoin. L'appartement correspond tout à fait à la description et la localisation est parfaite (rue résidentielle très calme à seulement quelques pas de Ste-Catherine). Nous y retournerions sans hésiter !

name: Heroísmo IV
summary: If the dates you wish are not available, we have other options in the same location. You can find them on my profile. My goal is for you to have your days with the most comfort i can propose. I want you to taste all the feelings in Porto, as our food, as our best places, our best pointviews. I just love to help you enjoying this beautiful city :)
interaction: I'm always available to help as much as I can for my guests to spend a wonderful time in Porto.
houseRules: I ask all the care with: - Noise from the 22 hours, especially when it comes to reach the apartment. - With decorative objects, furniture, bedding and bath, care in the handling of kitchen equipment. I am always available to answer any questions.

host.about:
Welcome!
The apartments has all the things to provide you a perfect days in Porto. It is located in a very central area, inside a typical oporto building. 
I will give you lots of informations about Porto, my personal tips, and I'll always be available to help you with anything. All I want is for you to go home knowing Porto and inevitably loving the city! :)

reviews.txt: Nuno and Francisca were extremely kind and helpful people. They made us feel very welcome and the house is surprisingly spacious. The wifi connection did struggle in our room but maybe we just had bad luck. They were even kind enough to extend our stay last minute. The service was top quality and the shower was amazing. Highly recommend staying here.
Muito simpáticos e atenciosos. O apartamento é muito confortável e com pequenos detalhes que fazem a diferença. Muito perto do metro, o que é óptimo para deslocações necessárias.

Bonjour, Notre séjour a été très agréable. Nous avons été très bien accueillies. Nuno nous a donné de nombreux conseils, lieux de visites... Le logement était également très bien. Nous avons vraiment pu profiter de Porto. Le métro est tout proche du logement. C'était vraiment un très bon séjour. Merci encore.

Our stay at Heroísmo IV was the perfect Airbnb experience. When we got there, Francisca was waiting for us. She was extremely nice and accommodating, she showed us the apartment and gave us a map of the city and plenty of tips about what to visit, where to eat, etc. The apartment is really small but has absolutely everything you need. It's clean, new, has a really nice kitchen, a very comfortable bed and is near the city center (we walked everyday). I highly recommend staying at Nuno's place. ¡Gracias por todo, Francisca! Porto is a beautiful city, we hope to come back soon!

A nice litte appartement. We arrived very late but were kindly greeted by the host. She showed us arround and gave us very useful tips (where to go/ where to eat/ etc.). The appartement is located directly to a metro station and has a Lidl and other grocery stores very near by.  It was a perfect stay!

Квартира не большая и очень уютная. В ней есть все необходимое. Отличное расположение рядом с метро. Я получила много полезной информации при заселении. Во время сильного дождя в ней сыро, но это не испортило отдых.

Desde o primeiro contacto, a comunicação foi muito fácil e clara. Colocaram à nossa disposição uma série de hipóteses de transporte a partir do aeroporto, bem como a possibilidade de termos em casa cabazes de alimentos. Assim que chegamos, com toda a sua simpatia, tinhamos a Mariana à nossa espera, recebeu-nos explicando os vários  pontos importantes para quem chega: locais a visitar, restaurantes, transportes...
Gostámos muito do espaço, do Porto, fazemos questão de voltar em breve. Local excelente!

Francisca was very friendly and was waiting for us, she took the time to explain us everything about the flat, she even let us good adresses of restaurants, coffees and places to visit in Porto.
The flat is 10 minutes by foot from the center, with no stairs to climb, good for our heavy luggages! It is very calm and we even had a table outside where we took our breakfasts. The flat is tiny but very functional, clean, and well equipped.
It is perfect for a short time in Porto.
