The apartment is great value for money and the location is fantastic. We arrived before the check in time but were greeted promptly and could leave our luggage to explore the city straight away. Francisca gave us a lot of good advice and recommendations for the city, which was very helpful.
Thank you for hosting us Nuno. Our trip was perfect. The host was very kind. And the apartment is beautiful, near the center and is well think : it has everything for a few days.

Estúdio muito simpático e limpo. Ideal para uma ou duas pessoas, para explorar o Porto durante um par de dias. Estação de metro à porta. Perto da zona histórica do Porto — faz-se bem a pé. Pastelaria ideal para pequeno almoço mesmo à porta.

L'emplacement est parfait, dans un quartier calme et à proximité immédiate du métro et du centre-ville. Seul bémol: l'absence d'eau chaude à la douche (un seul ballon d'eau chaude disponible pour plusieurs appartements), franchement regrettable en plein coeur de l'hiver. Ce qui du coup entraîne un rapport qualité-prix un peu cher

El apartamento esta genial, es pequeño pero tiene todo lo necesario, cama super grande y cómoda, el apartamento está en general como nuevo y se ve exactamente como las fotos, estaba todo suuuuper limpio y tienen un radiador que calienta el habitáculo en muy poco tiempo. Nos recibió Rita, y de maravilla, nos dio un montón de información sobre Porto en un momento y nos dejó un montón de mapas e info útil. la zona es tranquila y tiene un montos de aparcamiento seguro en la misma calle. Aun que no está en el mismo centro de la ciudad se llega a el en un paseo de poco más de 10 mins, además en la misma puerta hay una parada de metro. Ha sido una experiencia genial quedarnos aquí para visitar la ciudad. Muchas gracias por la amabilidad, si volvemos a la ciudad no dudaríamos en volver a quedarnos aquí.

Gostamos muito do espaco, pequeno mas muito agradavel. Excelente para passar apenas uns dias. Obrigada ao Nuno que esperou por nos ate tarde e que ainda tirou um tempinho para nos explicar e dar umas dicas sobre a cidade! Aconselho!

Небольшая, но очень уютная квартирка со всем необходимым! Завтракать на свежем воздухе очень приятно, в кухне можно приготовить все, что захочешь! Очень гостеприимная хозяйка, рассказала много интересного о местах поблизости и в городе!
Excelente Studio, muito bem localizado e com todas as comodidades necessárias para uma pequena estadia.

The flat is situated right next to a metro station. Also perfect, if you arrive by car - free parking just in front. 15 mins walk to downtown but lot of cheap cafes and restaurants full of locals around.
The check-in was perfect. We got lots of information, what to do/see/where to eat. Thanks for that. 
The Apartement is very small but for a short city visit, big enough. If you stay for a week or so, I would recommend a larger Apartement.

Fantástica estancia en Oporto. Apartamento pequeño pero suficiente para pasar unos días en  Oporto una pareja. Situado un poco a las afueras pero muy buena comunicación  con el centro (parada de metro y autobús enfrente del apartamento).
Atención inmejorable del anfitrión, respondiendo muy rápido a nuestras consultas y gestionando nuestra llegada. El único fallo es que la lavadora no se podía utilizar. Muy recomendable para pasar unos días en Oporto relación calidad-precio.

We had a very nice welcome where we received tips about the neighbourhood. Those we tried turned out excellent. It's a 15 to 20 minute walk to the centre, the room is small but it has everything you need and is well maintained. Very close to the subway, a small outdoor area where you can sit. 
Tip: sandwiches (pork with cheese) from casa guedes
Excelente relação preço qualidade, muito boa comodidade e excelentes acessos. Muitas opções para as refeições por perto e metro à porta. Recomendo.

name: B5.Walk to MTR 1 min/Economy room/Twin single bed
summary: Our room is conveniently located in Hong Kong’s renowned commercial and entertainment district at Jordan.Located on Nathan’s Road,near Tsim Sha Tsui. 1-5 minute walk to the MTR,Airport Bus Stop,Yue Hwa Chinese Products,Prudential Center,Park Lane Shopper’s Boulevard,SASA,Bonjour,Mannings,Watsons,Temple Street Night Market,Australia Dairy Company,Tsui Wah Restaurant,Hui Lau Shan,7-ELEVEN. Whether you’re in town for business or pleasure,we will be your best choice.
interaction: Our room availability calendar and prices are accurate, can be booked directly recognized. If you want to learn more about Hong Kong travel information, you can let me know by airbnb. If you exceed 23:00 registration (check in), please let us know and we will wait for your arrival.
houseRules: Not to make much noise, does not affect the other residents,it is so! Not too many restrictions on it!

host.location: Flat Rm A9/F, National Court, 242 Nathan Road, Jordan, Hong Kong/九龙佐敦弥敦道240-252号立信大厦9字楼A室
host.about:
Welcome To Hong Kong
欢迎来到香港

reviews.txt: Location very good, in the shopping center, and many fast food place,  traffic is very convenien !
交通确实很方便,香港住的地方都不大,好在即便如此设施也都有｡性价比高
总体来说算是便宜的,性价比还是蛮高的,地理位置也挺方便的

Well recommended place. Very close to Mtr Jordan station and many shops nearby. Place is just like how it is in the photo. Good for solo travellers. At first i got lost finding the place but on the next days i feel like i am a local in hongkong. Thankyou until next time!
很好的一次体验,香港寸土寸金这个价位住到这样的房间很不错了,地理位置也很好非常方便,离地铁站很近,周围也有巴士站,大厦楼下有保安首先安全很到位,其次能分到有窗户的房间也很好空气流通好,就是香港的汽车喜欢改装排气管,一踩油门轰轰的很吵,不过还好,其实香港给我的感觉非常好很安静很安心,除了消费高点没什么不好的,总体来说这次体验还不错,下次再去还会住这里,也会推荐给朋友

- 非常靠近佐敦地鐵站,交通十分方便
- 附近有不少美食,也開到很晚
非常便利的地段
真是太太太好了,下次还来耶,我爱｡

The pictures are quite deceiving I would say. The room we stayed in was quite dirty and there was a roach crawling about the place. Linens were riddle with stains and towels as well. The bathroom had a peculiar odour. The size was just as expected and not a problem.  The location is great. I would recommend spending the few extra dollars and getting a place much cleaner.
觉得整体性价比还不错~就是早上起来感觉身上痒痒的,发现床上有小虫子~
大体上还是可以的,但是太过于狭小拥挤,给人感觉有一丝简陋吧｡卫生间的马桶盖一直无法完全开启
地点超级方便哟,附近也好多好吃的,好玩的｡比想象中干净｡

The address in Airbnb app was just to show where the reception counter is. I’m glad I’m staying in another building. The room was refurbished although the exterior of the building was old. Saw tiny cockroaches but I was not surprised as the building was old. Space was good for me as Asian. We could hear noises from the street and other room but we are okay as we are not light sleepers. We need to share hair dryer with other guests. Thanks to the staff who helped to empty trash bin daily and I liked the firm bed very much as I could rest really well after walking all day long.

name: Cute Attic room Beyoğlu, Istanbul
summary: This is a room in an Ottoman liberty style townhouse in Beyoglu. The location is very central, walking distance to istiklal street, one of the main centers in Istanbul. There are many cafes, restaurants, bars, and shopping, night life.
interaction: I live in the same building, on the second floor, two levels up from the entrance (same floor as the kitchen). You are always welcome to have a tea or coffe with me or share my table if you happen to be at home while we eat.
houseRules: Please do not smoke inside the rooms, throw your own garbage. In Istanbul the tap water is not drinkable, please buy your own drinking water. Please clean the kitchen after you use, do not leave dirty dishes, left overs, vegetable remains that can stain the working space. ıf you use the terrace and want to move the chairs, please take them back to the original place after using. Do not throw cigarettes inside the plants. For long term stays please buy your own toilette paper. Please switch off the lights that you do not use. Close the door  of the terrace and switch the light off when you leave the terrace. Sorry if you feel like" why do you need to tell me such basic behaviors!". Not all but some people forget that it is not a hotel but a home. Thank you very much in advance.

host.about:
I am from Adana, a town in old Cilicia, have been living in Istanbul for quite a while. I have worked in tourism sector for a long time now I am retired and want to know new people. I can speak english and I can join you through your visit to show Istanbul or giving you some local information. 

I love cooking and feel myself lucky to know both eastern and wester cooking traditions of Turkey and willing to give half day cooking classes to whom it may interest.

reviews.txt: Comment raconter en quelques mots les trois semaines magnifiques passées chez Fatma ! Impossible. La pension est charmante et possède une terrasse très chaleureuse. Fatma est une personne extrèmement intéressante avec qui il faut absolument prendre un café dès quelle le propose (ce qui arrive très souvent !). Elle cuisine merveilleusement. Elle connait Istanbul comme sa poche. La chambre est au dernier étage, elle est calme et douce. Elle a un accès direct sur la terrasse ce qui permet de bouquiner avant d'aller dormir ou de faire un peu de yoga le matin. Le quartier est au coeur de Beyoglu avec une foultitude de restaurants et de bonnes adresses à découvrir. Si vous hésitez encore à réserver, n'hésitez plus ! Quant à moi, je reviendrais le plus vite possible !

Ich bin unheimlich glücklich bei Fatma Abla gestrandet zu sein. Es ist immer was los und selbst wenn mankein türkisch kann,Fatma Abla versucht mit English und Händen und Füßen zu reden. Eine unglaublich sympathische und unterhaltsame Dame, die ich sehr schnell ins Herz geschlossen habe. Sonntags sind wir zusammen zum Bio Bazar gelaufen und an einigen Tagen kochen wir sogar was zusammen.  Mein Zimmer befindet sich im obersten Stock, wo ich komplett meine Ruhe habe. gegenüber von meinem Zimmer ist eine wunderschöne Terasse, die zum Yoga machen oder ein Buch lesen einlädt. Gäste sind auch immer willkommen. Fatma hat ihre eigenen Stil, welches dem ganzen Haus, bis auf den Eingangsbereich, einen unglaublichen charm gibt. Jedes Zimmer ist individuell und man muss sagen, dass bis her die Leute, die ich im Haus kennengelernt habe, echt toll sind. Wenn man sich für Fatma entscheidet, sollte man auf alle Fälle kulturoffen sein und sich diesem schönen antiken Stil und der Nostalgie einfach fallen lassen. Ich bin durch Fatma und durch die Wohnung in einem alten Istanbul angekommen und fühle mich super wohl. Zu meiner Arbeit in Cihangir laufe ich täglich zu Fuß. Die Lage ist sehr perfekt. Ich brauche kaum Bus oder Bahn zu benutzen, da ich alles in Beyoglu und Taksim finde, was ich brauche. Nur für meine Touristentour habe ich lediglich die Bahn benutzt. Obwohl man zum Eminönu auch zu Fuß laufen kann, wenn man spazieren gehen mag. Ich danke Dir, Fatma abla, so wie ich dich gerne zu nennen pflege, für Deine Offenheit und Deine Wärme. Ich werde Dich sehr bald wieder besuchen kommen und hoffentlich sogar mein altes Zimmer beziehen im obersten Stock.

Fatma's home is a perfect place to enjoy Istanbul : peacefull place, independence, located close to main places ... Fatma is nice, and other people staying in Fatma's house so you can meet new people etc
So I recommend it !

I stayed with Fatma for many weeks in December 2013, in the attic room on my own, and then with my boyfriend in the larger double room, and had an amazing time. 
The neighbourhood, Tarlabaşı, is different and more down to earth than the posher neighbourhoods around. The location is wonderful: it's easy to get anywhere by foot, taxi, bus, dolmus, metro or boat.
Fatma, who lives there, and her daughter Elvan, who lives in Italy but is quick to communicate by email, are extremely friendly and helpful. 
Fatma also cooks wonderfully and even offers cooking classes. 
I would definitely recommend staying there, for three nights or three months, and hope to stay there again myself.
Be aware though that if you have respiratory issues, this might not be a good choice as there is a fair amount of smoking happening inside, and even the neighbourhood is quite smoky because of the coal heating.

Sono stata 5 giorni ospite da Fatma. Purtroppo non l'ho conosciuta perchè era in Italia dalla figlia, con cui sono riuscita a comunicare molto bene in italiano (dato che il mio inglese è molto scarso..), è stata gentilissima! come anche gli ospiti che mi hanno accolto lì a Istanbul! Si è creato un bel clima e anche se spesso ero fuori per visitare la città, ho passato due bellissime serate in un clima multiculturale!

The perfect visit. 

For me, this attic room in Beyoglu was perfect for my time in Istanbul. My hosts were wonderful, the room is great, the terrace is greater, and the location is fantastic. I was in Istanbul for a intensive summer school at their Technology University, and got the privacy, space and support I needed to get everything done, and to a high standard. I was sad to leave and am looking forward to returning again in a few months. 

Thank you thank you thank you, and will miss you guys!

Beau x

Fatma, Elvan, her daughter, Hasan, her husband, and all of the other guests with whom I shared the house made this one of my best travel experiences. Fatma really tries to make everyone at home in her home and in her city. We shared dinner on the terrace several times with her past guests / friends, and they made me feel so welcome and quickly become knowledgable about Istanbul and the broader society. 

The room, itself, and the neighborhood have been correctly detailed in the room information, guest feedback, and the feedback for Fatma's other rooms' feedback. I encourage you to read them all to get a clear idea. 

All said, the room is good value for money, and the people will make it a fond, memorable experience.

I stayed for one month in the attic room and was very pleased with how everything turned out. Fatma and Hasan are very welcoming, and I have many good memories of my stay (like drinking raki and talking about Turkish music with Hasan at the dinner table). If you stay here you will meet many interesting people from Turkey and around the world passing through the house. The area will not be to every ones tastes, but I highly recommend it for the more adventurous among you.

Thank you Fatima and family for a wonderful time in Istanbul!
I love your house, my attic room which is very central and from where I was able to walk to all sites in Istanbul. You, your husband and daughter, all were very welcoming and helpful. I definitely want to come back.

Fatma and Hasan, the hosts, are truly some of the nicest people I've had the chance to come across. I stayed for 3 months and loved every second of it, only regretting that I could not stay for another three. The landlords are fantastic and experienced Airbnb hosts, which makes the experienced that much better. Fatma is an outstanding cook, and one should not miss a chance to dine with her and Hasan! The house is great, very typical and nice - as a bonus, the bathrooms were all renovated and they look fantastic. The terrace made for many evenings relaxing away from the hustle and bustle of Istiklal St. In terms of location, the house is in a great spot: seconds away from Istiklal, minutes from Taksim and the cool Cihangir area, and a short train ride or longer walk to Sultanahmet, Topkapi and all the tourist sites. Would recommend without any hesitation, as I already did to two friends of mine who also stayed at Fatma and Hasan's house.

I spent a really nice month at Fatma's house. The room is lovely and fits the description. I also really enjoyed the beautiful terrasse from where you can watch the neighborhood. I thought the house was in an ideal location to explore the city. The street where the house is on is pretty calm. 
This room is on the same floor with the terrasse and the kitchen, so you have ideal access to both of them. The kitchen is ideal if you just want to cook something small from time to time as there's only one cooking plate.
This room is perfect for people that wish to be in contact with the host and exchange with them from time to time as you walk by their living room and kitchen as well as share the bathroom with them. If you rather be a little more to your own and mind cigarette smoke, I recommend one of the other rooms.
Fatma and Hasan are both very very nice, always asked about my day and they were very patient when I tried to say something in turkish. I hope that my turkish will be better one day so that we can have longer and deeper conversations!  They made me feel very welcomed and I also really enjoyed meeting Fatma's daughter and grandson!They are very generous, sometimes invited me for tea or something to eat. I also got lucky to taste some of Fatma's amazing food!

It was fantastic to stay at the house of Fatma and Hasan! The room is very nice, like you can see on the pictures. Next to the room is the kitchen and the terasse, which is great. The bathroom of which you can´t see picture was aesthtic too.
Particularly if you are in Istanbul because of learning Turkish Fatma and Hasan´s house will be the best choice as both are very communicative and patiant with beginners. Above all Fatma and Hasan are such nice people, I am really looking forward to stay in contact with them. 
I highly recommend the room. But you should have no problem with shareing the bathroom with the hosts as well as shareing the kitchen and the terasse with a lot of other guests who stay in the house. But that´s why the attic room is the best one for people who want interact with the hosts and get to know other guests.
I also loved the neighbourhood.

Fatma and Hasan are wonderful hosts, warm, welcoming and very hospitable.  The room is just as describe.  Central location, easy to get around by foot or public transportation, grocery stores and lots of dining options at your finger tips, can't be beat.

I really enjoyed staying at Fatma and Hasan's. They were incredibly sweet and welcoming, it almost felt like staying with my aunt and uncle. I was alone with Hasan for the most part as Fatma was out of town. During that time he always made sure I'd get home safe at night. I thought that was very endearing. The room itself is super cute, with its own kitchen and terrace access, which I tremendously enjoyed as it gave me the sense of having an entire apartment. The neighbourhood is a bit off the tourist track but for that reason very charming. And it still is very close to Istiqlal, essentially just across the street. So you are strategically located.

파트마는 친절하고 가족처럼 대해줘서 편안하게 잘 쉬다갈수있었네요^^ 가격에 비해 좋았습니다. 오래동안 머물면서 특별히 블편한점은 없었구요. 샤워 요리 빨래 등등 마음껏 눈치안보고 할수있어서 좋았네요.
추천합니다 :)
Amazing and warm place that I fully recommend. Hassan does delicious Turkish breakfast...
A lovely place to stay! The house has character, there's a gorgeous terrace and it's well located for bars, cafés and museums. Hasan was the perfect host!

A wonderful journey at Fatma and Hasan's house !! So pleasant place, clean, very very well located, lot of plants on the terrace... But above all, amazing and great people live here ! Fatma and Hasan are so welcoming and warm, it was a real pleasure for me to spend time with them. I definitely recommend this place, and hope to come back as soon as possible !

Fatma and Hassan are wonderful and caring hosts. I accompanied Hassan to work and he showed me his favourite breakfast stops; I also had a lovely few hours drinking tea with both of them chatting Turkish recipes.
The room was just what I had hoped for with a lovely terrace just outside it.
I will be back!
Great little room on the top floor. Perfect for solo traveler. Lots of other people staying there also. Both Hasan & Fatma were warm and friendly. Lots of stairs

name: Cozy place in Hong Kong Island
summary: Great location near to Wan Chai and Admiralty MTR station. Walkable distance to many fabulous restaurants in town. Good for both business or leisure traveller.
interaction: I have a day job, but I work relatively close to home. I can offer help by call or in person if needed.
houseRules: - No shoes in the house - Do not open the windows in the kitchen

host.about: Frequent traveler who likes to know more about the locals in addition to the sightseeing.

address.street: Wan Chai, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: It's really a great and sweet house. Carmen is so nice lady. The last day we went out buying tickets and forgot checkout time. Carmen reminded us won't be worry and wait in patience.

It's very clear and quiet.

Very good

房主的房间非常的整洁,同时也非常的温馨 周边环境也很好｡
    房间地点离地铁站不远,步行5分钟即可到达｡离铜锣湾只要一个地铁站,也可以步行前往金紫荆广场｡
    房主很友好也很热情,向我们简单交代了一些注意事项,还提供了一些游览建议｡
    总之,这是一次非常好的住宿体验｡
Carmen’s apartment is cosy, clean and well located. Carmen did her best to help us every time we needed.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Carmen is a nice and warm host. Her place is small but cosy and very convenient. The location is perfect to visit HK : both close to lively areas at night, and to nature paths for an early jogging.

The flat is cosy and very well located, and Carmen was really helpful throughout our stay! Just be aware that the apartment may not be suitable for 3 tall adults (as it was our case), as beds are very small.

There are 2 types of AirBnBs - one feels like a hotel and the other is someone's actual home. This is the latter - do not expect a hotel experience. Location is great (Star St in Wanchai has boutique shops & nice restaurants, you're less than 5 min walk from the MTR and less than 30 min walk to Central). Building is more modern than most in the area, with a doorman and elevator. Apartment has an open view (not easy to come by on HK island!) Carmen keeps her place tidy and well equipped with everything you need. Bed is short (as others have noted) and the sofa is small too. Bathroom is basic but shower has hot water and ok pressure. Kitchen is tiny but there is plenty of space in the fridge and a water boiler. Carmen is friendly and super responsive! Bottom line: Great for a couple of nights only.

I stayed with my parents and it was great to have a separated bedroom from them. The apartment was not huge because of HongKong's high population density, but it was simply decorated and comfortable enough!  Some of visitors were too tall for the bed but with my 155cm height, I had no problem sleeping on it.  Hot water from shower was abundant. The view of skyscrapers from windows was good. I could even partly see New Years fireworks from windows. 

Apartment concierges were at a ground floor 24 hours. They open the entrance door when you come home. Some of them can communicate in English. They are all kind and helpful.

Carmen was super kind and communicative host. Her indication was accurate and helpful. She kindly left an octopus card for visitors to charge and use. 

There is a washing machine in a listing but HongKong was too humid to dry laundry fast.  You can use a laundry shop next to the apartment. They wash and clean your laundry in a day.

The location was only a few minutes from a tram station. 
Walkable distance from Central and Causeway Bay. 

There are many towns in HongKong but I am totally satisfied with staying in Wanchai. 
Wanchai has modern skyscrapers, hipster attractions, and daily local markets and small restaurants.  St Francis street looked very sophisticated and I didn’t feel unsafe. In front of the apartment, there are rainbow stairs which looks like an Instagram shooting spot and a lot of foreign people were taking photos. If you are a vegetarian, I strongly recommend a restaurant “天然齋 Green Veggie” 15min from the apartment.

name: Spacious and well located apartment
summary: Enjoy Porto in a spacious, airy and bright apartment, fully equipped, in a building with lift, located in a region full of cafes and restaurants, close to the subway and close to the best places of the city.
interaction: I leave my guests at ease, but I am available whenever they need me.
houseRules: Cuidar do apartamento e dos pertences com o mesmo carinho que temos. O apartamento se situa numa zona estritamente residencial, e deve-se manter silêncio após as 22 horas.  Apesar de adorarmos animais de estimação, aqui eles não são bem-vindos, a não com consulta e aprovação prévia, sujeita a uma cobrança extra de taxa de limpeza. Não fumar nas dependências do apartamento.

reviews.txt:
We arrived late in the night and the host assistant was so nice with us. She gave us some typical food and presents so that we could feel as good as home. She showed us how stuff works. Then we went together to see where the supermarkt and resaturants were. Everything was clean and tidy. The apartment was big enough for 5 people. It´s perfectly furnished!
It was located in the typical familiarly and quiet neighbourhood, only 20 minutes walking to the city center and near a Subway station. Restaurants and shops are cheaper than city center ones.

He offered him to pick us from the airport and a guided tour as well.

We´ll come back for sure! 


Llegamos muy tarde por la noche y la asistente del anfitrión nos enseñó la casa, nos dio dulces típicos y vino de Oporto. Vino con nosotros por el barrio para recomendarnos restaurantes y enseñarnos dónde estaba el supermercado. 
El apartamento estaba limpio, ordenado y perfectamente equipado. Tenía armarios vacíos para poder dejar cómodamente las cosas. El salón es muy grande. 
Está a 20 minutos andando del centro de la ciudad y tiene una parada de metro cerca. El barrio es familiar y tranquilo. Nada peligroso. Los restaurantes y tiendas eran más baratos que los del centro.

El anfitrión se ofreció a recogernos del aeropuerto y a hacernos un tour guiado por la ciudad.
Volveremos!!

Andre was able to meet us at the apartment. We had a nice long stay there, so we got very comfortable. The apartment is lovely and well furnished and equipped with everything we could have needed. We loved the neighbourhood too!

Great and spacious appartment with a wonderful view and location, it is even better in real life than in photos. We spent a month there and everything worked perfectly, the person who gave us the keys was very welcoming and was always there in case we needed him. Don't hesitate to stay in this appartment, you will not regret it!

L'appartement est tout à fait conforme à la description (peut-être même mieux). Situé dans un immeuble calme, dans un quartier calme où l'on peut se garer.
Accueillis avec une grande gentillesse par Fernando, qui a répondu à toutes nos questions et les a même devancées.
A recommander !

It's a very lovely apartment. José Fernando welcomed us with a great kindness and answered all our questions. Thank you very much for your hospitality and port wine. Everything was clean and tidy. There was lots of space for my family of 4. Especially we enjoyed a big balcony. It's well furnished and equipped but it would be great to add a washing machine. TV has a great channels list in Portuguese and English. The apartment is located in a walking distance to the city centre, metro stations, grocery shops, bakeries and pharmacies. WiFi worked perfectly. The bath has a handle grip, it's perfect for elderly guests and young kids. There is a small lift in a building. Our experience was great and we highly recommend to stay in this apartment.
Malgré nos deux heures de retard l'hôte nous a reçu comme des "princes". Appartement conforme à nos attentes.

Excellent place to stay with either family or friends. Very spacious living area and bedrooms. Close to the centre and we thoroughly enjoyed our daily walks to the centre and local bakery. José is excellent in giving directions as needed. Problems are always fixed on time with the customer in mind.Will highly recommend this place.

Vanessa
The location was really good . You can reach the place by walking
Ok

Si vous allez chez Andre vous y serez comme à la maison! Rien à redire sur la propreté et l'appartement. Je recommande très fortement Andre et son co-host Josè. Ils accueillant, serviable.. enfin bref ils sont top!
Me encanto lo espacioso,como y limpio k estaba todo maravilloso
A very nice apartment. Within a few minutes you are in the centre of Porto. We loved our week here. Almost everything we needed was in the apartment. Thanks for the wine and the fruit!!
Appartement agréable , avec une belle décoration et surtout accueil chaleureux par Fernando .
O apartamento apesar de um pouco velho, é um bom custo benefício. A cozinha tem o que é necessário, as camas são boas, roupas de camas e toalhas não faltam. Só falta uma máquina de lavar roupas.
Excelente! Recomendo!

Excelente em tudo. Agradecimentos especiais ao José, que tão gentilmente nos acolheu e apoiou durante toda a estada.
Recomendo muito a morada.

André est une personne exceptionnelle pour la qualité et la bienveillance de son acceuil, il est naturellement chaleureux, et son logement est situé dans un très bon endroit de Porto, en plus d'etre assez proche du centre ville et transport en commun.
André est une personne admirable, largement recommandé,
Un grand merci a André

Great place to enjoy Porto with space and small attentions.
Our host was lovely and knew perfectly the city which was very helpful !
Appartement confortable, calme et bien situé ! Propriétaire aux petits soins ! La salle de bain aurait besoin d'une bonne rénovation pour correspondre au standing  de l'appartement.

La casa en general está bien y es agradable. La persona que nos recibió también muy agradable y solícita. Pero, el agua caliente el primer día no nos funcionó porque había saltado un plomo. Los días siguientes, al ser calentador eléctrico, para 3 duchas el agua caliente llega justa.

name: Big, Bright & Convenient Sheung Wan
summary: Hollywood Rd Studio Only 1 apartment per floor 650sqft! Fast Wifi and Kitchen! Daily Housekeeping! NEAR 3min walk from MTR 3min walk from Escalators 5min walk from LKF (Please note I live here so some belongings kept in wardrobe)
interaction: I will be on a holiday trip, but you can access me through email and I can call you if you have any issues
houseRules: Please treat it as you would your own home!

host.about: I am a consultant and travel very often. I usually host my apartment when I leave and search for Airbnb rentals for accomodation.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Regg's place is clean and bright and at the best location in Hong Kong. Regg is communicative and easy going. We enjoyed our stay very much.

name: New 1BD Condo in Napili Ridge, Walk to Beach
summary: Newly Renovated 1 BD, 1 BTH Condo With A Brand New Queen Size Bed And New Pull Out Sofa. The complex has Pool, Laundry and Bbq area.  5 minutes walk to the crystal clear waters of Napili Bay. Perfect for snorkeling paddle boarding or just relax on the beach. Sea House Restaurant for Best Happy Hour Pupus on the Island. Restaurants, golf and tennis courts are also in walking distance. Short drive to World Class Kapalua Golf , 15 min to famouse Kaanapali Beach and 25 min to Lahaina. TAX INCLUDED!
interaction: Please feel free to text or call me at anytime with questions or concerns. (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
houseRules: - Check out time 10am - Additional guest $20 per night - Quiet hours 10pm to 7am - $125 cleaning fee

reviews.txt: Our stay at the condo was great.  The host was very easy to work with as far as being able to check in early and check out late, which was very appreciated considering we had two babies with us.  The only downside was that there was no AC. Given, it was my fault for not checking the listing, and although I thought we wouldn't survive a night there, you felt a nice cool breeze when you opened both front and back doors so the AC wasn't needed after all.  (One of the neighbors came to yell at me because one of the babies was crying so I had to keep the door shut) The location was perfect! It was walking distance to the very popular breakfast spot "The Gazebo" and to the Napili Bay that is very beautiful and you can see turtles.  There were a couple of issues with roaches, but it's inevitable considering they are condos and not everyone that lives in a complex is clean, although the condo was.  We would stay there again

Lovely little place for one or two to stay. Car park available at no extra cost, good kitchen which is well furnished, and a quiet place. Good access to the freeway. The beach was walking distance and the area was something from a dream. Would stay here again.

Location:
A place looks as expected, 5 min from Kapalua Beach.  We didn't have any issues with neighborhood  condos. Despite there are a lot of people in this Condo Complex (Napili Ridge), we didn't feel the place to be crowdy (as well as elsewhere in Hawaii). While the most interesting activities (IMHO) are in Lahaina, there is just 12-15 min drive. You can drive elsewhere on Maui within 3.5-4 hours (one way).
____________________________________________________________________
Facilities/Equipment:
It really looks recently renovated, all facilities and equipment are good. There is a fridge, microwave and regular oven, plates and silverware. We enjoyed having breakfast on Patio with a nice garden view. Parking lots are not the issue - you just need to fill the form and submit it to management office.
____________________________________________________________________
Cleanliness:
The place was clean as expected. Host provided to us beach and bathroom towels which was greatly appreciated
____________________________________________________________________
Overall
Great value-for-money deal for Hawaii travelers who don't want to spend tons of money for vacation. Note that rental car is required in most cases when travelling to Maui.

The place was very cute. Perfect size and a 5-10 min walk to the beach. We came when I was pretty high temps and it did get hot at night due to no AC. We made due and enjoyed our stay very much. Would definitely rebook. Thanks!

Linda-Lee's place was in a great location (walkable to the beach and a few restaurants). The remodel is truly done well. The only negative we really had was regarding no AC. When we reserved this Airbnb we didn't see it mentioned in her comments, but it's clearly stated in them now. She was super easy to communicate with and ensured we got settled in okay. Perfect getaway for a couple or small family.
Everything was simply great. Enjoyed the place. Mostly the opportunity to cook your own meals which is quite important for me. Thank you!
The flat is really pretty and bigger than I expected. I had a wonderful stay there!

Our stay at Linda’s was great. We had quick responses to our questions. The place was very clean. Quick walk to Napili beach. Kapalua trail is nearby which is an easy and scenic hike. Overall our stay was great!

We had a great time at this place !! Excellent location.  Close to the beaches (walking distance). Close to Lahaina (15 minutes drive). The condo had everything we needed and even more (we really enjoyed the beach stuff provided - chairs/boogie board and we liked the big fridge with freezer). We also used the BBQ every night and the pool. And the king size bed was a great bonus. We recommend this place !
Linda-Lee's 1-BR unit in Lahaina is professionally managed and a great place to stay. I liked that it was quiet late at night and close to a grocery store and beach!
This condo was exactly as described. We especially liked the short walk to the beach and the WiFi signal was excellent.

Upon arrival the condo was clean! I highly recommend Linda's condo for a vacation stay in Maui. You're not too far from beaches and Front Street. There is a beach about 20 minutes walking distance from the condo.
She provided a coffee maker, toaster and other kitchen items for cooking as well as food storage. Linda also contacted me and made sure I made it to the condo.

Eine sehr schöne Unterkunft nicht weit vom Napili Beach, bei dem man täglich Schildkröten beobachten kann. :) Sehr gut eingerichtete Wohnung, sehr geräumig. Bushaltestelle und Lebensmittelmarkt in der Nähe. Check in hat super geklappt und es gab einige Tips für die Umgebung bei der Ankunft.

Good home-away from home. 

The apartment had plenty of amenities and a fully stocked kitchen so you could certainly cook if you wanted to. There was even a blender and toaster. One item that was missing was a bottle opener! There are wine glasses but we couldn't find an opener... 

Although the area feels residential, it's a quick drive to many beaches and you could walk to Napili Bay, if you wanted to. It's very quiet so if you're looking for an escape from all the resorts, it serves as a good home base. 

Overall, we were very happy with our stay and appreciated the new-ness of the amenities, even if small (e.g. sponge, dish soap, etc.).

Beautiful, clean, &  organized. We love having all the amenities such as stove, fridge, coffee maker, etc. Plus having beach supplies and a cooler was a bonus too! Napili Bay is a great beach for sunset and turtle watching! We drove to Lahaina and/or to/near Kaanapali area most days and although it's a short trip (15 mins?), we didn't mind as it's a beautiful ride. The condo is close to some stores as well! We forgot there was no A/C when we arrived and thought we might get hot overnight but sleeping with the windows open and a fan was perfect for all 3 of us.

Linda's place was perfect and suited exactly what we had in mind - we were walking distance to the most beautiful beaches, as well close to shops. 
The Bus stop is at the end of the street, which was a perk as well. 
The place itself is lovely, warm and inviting – with everything you need. 
It was lovely living with residents of Maui, as we got the chance to get to know them and find the best local places to swim, eat and sight see. 
We will be back!!

The apartment had everything we could need and was in a great location - up a quiet road just a five minute walk from nice beaches and trails and a short drive from some great restaurants! Lilla was a fantastic host and drove out to help us when we accidentally locked ourselves out of the apartment late at night! I would definitely recommend this place! We had a great stay!
Great value! Quaint little no-frills place with all the amenities. Walking distance to great restaurants, snorkeling and the beautiful Kapalua Ocean Trail.

Great place, about 5 minute walk from the beach, local grocery store and shops not too far. Perfect location if you’re looking for peace and quiet away from the hustle and bustle of resort style accommodations!

Great stay. The place is spotless and a good size for a couple. Nice lanai for a drink. Bed was super comfy. The bathroom was super warm and we were always overheating after being in there! We stayed at a time where the whole complex is undergoing a facelift and therefore was quite noisy early mornings and during the day.

name: Heroísmo ZB
summary: If the dates you wish are not available, we have other options in the same location. You can find them on my profile. My goal is for you to have your days with the most comfort i can propose. I want you to taste all the feelings in Porto, as our food, as our best places, our best pointviews. I just love to help you enjoying this beautiful city :)
interaction: I'm always available to help as much as I can for my guests to spend a wonderful time in Porto.
houseRules: I ask all the care with: - Noise from the 22 hours, especially when it comes to reach the apartment. - With decorative objects, furniture, bedding and bath, care in the handling of kitchen equipment. I am always available to answer any questions.

host.about:
Welcome!
The apartments has all the things to provide you a perfect days in Porto. It is located in a very central area, inside a typical oporto building. 
I will give you lots of informations about Porto, my personal tips, and I'll always be available to help you with anything. All I want is for you to go home knowing Porto and inevitably loving the city! :)

reviews.txt: Nuno and Francisca were extremely kind and helpful people. They made us feel very welcome and the house is surprisingly spacious. The wifi connection did struggle in our room but maybe we just had bad luck. They were even kind enough to extend our stay last minute. The service was top quality and the shower was amazing. Highly recommend staying here.
Muito simpáticos e atenciosos. O apartamento é muito confortável e com pequenos detalhes que fazem a diferença. Muito perto do metro, o que é óptimo para deslocações necessárias.

Bonjour, Notre séjour a été très agréable. Nous avons été très bien accueillies. Nuno nous a donné de nombreux conseils, lieux de visites... Le logement était également très bien. Nous avons vraiment pu profiter de Porto. Le métro est tout proche du logement. C'était vraiment un très bon séjour. Merci encore.

Our stay at Heroísmo IV was the perfect Airbnb experience. When we got there, Francisca was waiting for us. She was extremely nice and accommodating, she showed us the apartment and gave us a map of the city and plenty of tips about what to visit, where to eat, etc. The apartment is really small but has absolutely everything you need. It's clean, new, has a really nice kitchen, a very comfortable bed and is near the city center (we walked everyday). I highly recommend staying at Nuno's place. ¡Gracias por todo, Francisca! Porto is a beautiful city, we hope to come back soon!

A nice litte appartement. We arrived very late but were kindly greeted by the host. She showed us arround and gave us very useful tips (where to go/ where to eat/ etc.). The appartement is located directly to a metro station and has a Lidl and other grocery stores very near by.  It was a perfect stay!

Квартира не большая и очень уютная. В ней есть все необходимое. Отличное расположение рядом с метро. Я получила много полезной информации при заселении. Во время сильного дождя в ней сыро, но это не испортило отдых.

Desde o primeiro contacto, a comunicação foi muito fácil e clara. Colocaram à nossa disposição uma série de hipóteses de transporte a partir do aeroporto, bem como a possibilidade de termos em casa cabazes de alimentos. Assim que chegamos, com toda a sua simpatia, tinhamos a Mariana à nossa espera, recebeu-nos explicando os vários  pontos importantes para quem chega: locais a visitar, restaurantes, transportes...
Gostámos muito do espaço, do Porto, fazemos questão de voltar em breve. Local excelente!

Francisca was very friendly and was waiting for us, she took the time to explain us everything about the flat, she even let us good adresses of restaurants, coffees and places to visit in Porto.
The flat is 10 minutes by foot from the center, with no stairs to climb, good for our heavy luggages! It is very calm and we even had a table outside where we took our breakfasts. The flat is tiny but very functional, clean, and well equipped.
It is perfect for a short time in Porto.

The apartment is great value for money and the location is fantastic. We arrived before the check in time but were greeted promptly and could leave our luggage to explore the city straight away. Francisca gave us a lot of good advice and recommendations for the city, which was very helpful.
Thank you for hosting us Nuno. Our trip was perfect. The host was very kind. And the apartment is beautiful, near the center and is well think : it has everything for a few days.

Estúdio muito simpático e limpo. Ideal para uma ou duas pessoas, para explorar o Porto durante um par de dias. Estação de metro à porta. Perto da zona histórica do Porto — faz-se bem a pé. Pastelaria ideal para pequeno almoço mesmo à porta.

L'emplacement est parfait, dans un quartier calme et à proximité immédiate du métro et du centre-ville. Seul bémol: l'absence d'eau chaude à la douche (un seul ballon d'eau chaude disponible pour plusieurs appartements), franchement regrettable en plein coeur de l'hiver. Ce qui du coup entraîne un rapport qualité-prix un peu cher

El apartamento esta genial, es pequeño pero tiene todo lo necesario, cama super grande y cómoda, el apartamento está en general como nuevo y se ve exactamente como las fotos, estaba todo suuuuper limpio y tienen un radiador que calienta el habitáculo en muy poco tiempo. Nos recibió Rita, y de maravilla, nos dio un montón de información sobre Porto en un momento y nos dejó un montón de mapas e info útil. la zona es tranquila y tiene un montos de aparcamiento seguro en la misma calle. Aun que no está en el mismo centro de la ciudad se llega a el en un paseo de poco más de 10 mins, además en la misma puerta hay una parada de metro. Ha sido una experiencia genial quedarnos aquí para visitar la ciudad. Muchas gracias por la amabilidad, si volvemos a la ciudad no dudaríamos en volver a quedarnos aquí.

Gostamos muito do espaco, pequeno mas muito agradavel. Excelente para passar apenas uns dias. Obrigada ao Nuno que esperou por nos ate tarde e que ainda tirou um tempinho para nos explicar e dar umas dicas sobre a cidade! Aconselho!

Небольшая, но очень уютная квартирка со всем необходимым! Завтракать на свежем воздухе очень приятно, в кухне можно приготовить все, что захочешь! Очень гостеприимная хозяйка, рассказала много интересного о местах поблизости и в городе!
Excelente Studio, muito bem localizado e com todas as comodidades necessárias para uma pequena estadia.

The flat is situated right next to a metro station. Also perfect, if you arrive by car - free parking just in front. 15 mins walk to downtown but lot of cheap cafes and restaurants full of locals around.
The check-in was perfect. We got lots of information, what to do/see/where to eat. Thanks for that. 
The Apartement is very small but for a short city visit, big enough. If you stay for a week or so, I would recommend a larger Apartement.

Fantástica estancia en Oporto. Apartamento pequeño pero suficiente para pasar unos días en  Oporto una pareja. Situado un poco a las afueras pero muy buena comunicación  con el centro (parada de metro y autobús enfrente del apartamento).
Atención inmejorable del anfitrión, respondiendo muy rápido a nuestras consultas y gestionando nuestra llegada. El único fallo es que la lavadora no se podía utilizar. Muy recomendable para pasar unos días en Oporto relación calidad-precio.

We had a very nice welcome where we received tips about the neighbourhood. Those we tried turned out excellent. It's a 15 to 20 minute walk to the centre, the room is small but it has everything you need and is well maintained. Very close to the subway, a small outdoor area where you can sit. 
Tip: sandwiches (pork with cheese) from casa guedes
Excelente relação preço qualidade, muito boa comodidade e excelentes acessos. Muitas opções para as refeições por perto e metro à porta. Recomendo.

name: Charming and cozy condo Plateau Mt-Royal/ McGill
summary: Charming and cozy ground floor studio condo in Plateau Mont-Royal. Steps from McGill University (3 min) or trendy St-Laurent Street (5-7 min). Located right on Prince Arthur. Easy access to public transportation, groceries, restaurants, cafes, bars.
interaction: I'm available to answer any and all questions you might have.
houseRules: No smoking. No pets. Maximum 3 people.

host.about: Great food, that's what Montreal is all about!

reviews.txt: This studio is really really well located, comfortable and well equipped. I needed to spend a night away from home running around Montreal, and being on the cusp of downtown and the plateau made it easy for me to reach most places I needed to go on foot. Saint Laurent is right around the corner too. Tarek is a friendly and funny guy, and was easy to coordinate with (he actually checked me in personally at 11pm). Oh, and the bed has been replaced by a full one! Definitely would recommend this place to tourists who want a cosy space and central location.

My husband and I had a great time staying at this studio for our daughters graduation. The location is one block away from McGill Downtown campus. The host was very kind to help us find free parking right next to the house upon arrival. The facade of the house looks like a heritage site, very beautiful. The studio has all new facilities, the bathroom is large for a studio and fully renovated. Kitchen is nice, it also had some breakfast items. This place is great for a couple. The only downside is the mattress, not the most comfortable. Otherwise an A+ place and host. Would highly recommend.

We absolutely loved staying at Tarek's charming place which is just how he described it -- a cozy ground floor studio condo that is perfectly situated. We were just steps from the scenic McGill University, a short walk to the vibrants bars & restaurants on St-Laurent Street, and were conveniently able to walk to many other places during our stay. The exterior of the building is beautiful and historical looking while the interior is updated, comfortable, and super clean... all while being very peaceful and serene when we needed a break from sightseeing. 

Tarek was a superb host -- he was very kind and communicative with us from the get-go and was flexible to some logistical issues we had. He even gave us "must-see" and "must-eat" tips and overall made us feel very welcome on our first visit to Montreal. We would definitely stay here again in the future. Highly recommend!

We had a great experience staying at Tarek's apartment.  It was very clean and spacious for a studio, and the location was fantastic.  We hit quite a bit of unexpected traffic and were about an hour and a half late arriving, and he was extremely accommodating for us.  He helped us find parking, and was available for questions throughout our stay.  Check out was a bit cumbersome because of an unforeseen conflict, but Tarek was very accommodating to make it as easy as possible for us.

We had a really nice stay at Tarek's place. The room is very clean and cozy. Location is perfect too. It is close to McGill University and few minute walk from rue St Laurent. Bus stop is just around the corner too. Tarek is also an amazing host and really accommodating. Would highly recommend!

My fiancé and I arrived on a Thursday afternoon. Tarek met and welcomed us kindly. He showed us the apartment and even gave us some local restaurants and areas we should visit during our week long stay. He was an excellent host. When I reached out with a couple of questions, he responded even though he was away on vacation. The apartment is perfect for a couple looking to spend quality time together. It's cozy, clean and more than I expected for a studio apartment. I would return here without a question. Thank you Tarek!
I enjoyed my stay in this place. it is clean, neat, and we furnished. The host is very helpful and responsive. it is close to downtown and very quite.

Tarek was very helpful and flexible regarding our check in and check out.  We came an hour later than we had expected (as our train was delayed) and he was very understanding.   We were three adults staying for three nights, and although the place is set up for one or two adults, Tarek provided us with an inflatable mattress, and things worked out fine.  The place is nice, fully renovated, and very well located, in the heart of McGill Ghetto.  It's very lively with all the students setting up for the school year.  There are a lot of ammenities close by and the location is quite central.  Overall, a very nice stay.

My girlfriend and I stayed at Tarek's place for a weekend trip to Montreal. Tarek was an extremely gracious, communicative, and accommodating host. His place is clean, cozy, and very comfortable (the bed is a dream). The apartment is in a superb location: convenient to public parking garages, close to more delicious restaurants and cafes and bars than I can count, only a 20-minute walk from the Museum of Fine Arts, and just a little longer to the Old Port and Notre-Dame Basilica. Our only regret is that we didn't stay longer!

Everything about Tarek's place was great.  Perfect location for checking out Montreal.  He was informative about what to eat/visit/check out and I would absolutely recommend this place to others.  A nice quiet apartment, very close to St/ Laurent!

Tarek was extremely accommodating. When we arrived in Montreal, was about to rain really hard for hours upon hours -- so Tarek arranged to meet us earlier to give us the keys. He also left us some breakfast items. 

The apartment was very clean. Great location. Couldn't have been happier.

My girlfriend and I stayed in this condo for a few nights on a holiday to Montreal, and it was exactly what we needed. The condo itself is fully self contained and in a fantastic location to explore every corner of the city. Tarek was a great host, being very accommodating for late check ins and early check outs, while also recommending some delicious restaurants. The bathroom and kitchen were both very clean in good condition. I'd definitely recommend this condo to anyone, and we will definitely look to stay here again when we next come to Montreal!
Tarek's place is great! Great location, super clean, and Tarek was easy to reach and very accommodating. Would definitely stay again!
Very close to McGill.  A wonderful stay!
This place is very close to McGill University and also very practical to visit the city. A Great place to stay, with all you need to feel like home !

You'll find this place just as expected - charming, clean and in a great location. Separate side door entry is very convenient and the place itself is pretty well maintained. Tarek was easy to communicate with and a gracious host. We were very happy with our short stay here as we explored Montreal!
